T07vakobhau:694: nipāto vā 'tra pratighāto yā svaviṣaye pravṛttiḥ
T07vakobhau:696: ye dharmā viṣayapratighātena sapratighā āvaraṇapratighātenāpi ta iti catuṣkoṭikaḥ
T07vakobhau:697: prathamā koṭiḥ sapta cittadhātavo dharmadhātupradeśaśca yaḥ saṃprayuktaḥ /
T07vakobhau:701: ye dharmā viśayapratighātena sapratighā ālambana pratighātenāpi ta iti /
T07vakobhau:746: tasmādabhyavahāravītarāgāṇāṃ gandharasau tatra niṣprayojanau na tu spraṣṭavyam /
T07vakobhau:750: ata eṣāmeva trayāṇāṃ dhyānopapattau saṃbhavo na gandharasayoriti /
T07vakobhau:753: tābhyāṃ hi vinā'; śrayaśobhaiva na syāditi vyavahārśca /
T07vakobhau:754: yadyetat prayojanamadhiṣṭhānamevāstu śobhārthaṃ vacanārthaṃ ca mā bhūdindriyam /
T07vakobhau:775: yāni tatrendriyāṇi tairavikalā ahīnendriyā iti ko 'tra virodhaḥ /
T07vakobhau:778: sta eva tatra ghrāṇajivhendriye na tu gandharasau /
T07vakobhau:779: ātmabhāvamukhena hi ṣaḍāyatane tṛṣṇāsamudācāro na viṣayamukhena /
T07vakobhau:783: rūpavītarāgāṇāṃ tatropapattirato 'tra daśa rūpasvabhāvā dhātavastadāśrrayālambanāśca pañca vijñānadhātāvo na saṃabhavanti //
T07vakobhau:790: kati savitarkāḥ savicārāḥ katyavitarkā vicāramātrāḥ katyavitarkā avicārāḥ
T07vakobhau:796: tatra manodhāturmanovijñānadhātuḥ saṃprayuktaśca dharamadhāturanyatra vitarkavicārābhyāṃ kāmadhātau prathame ca dhyāne savitarkāḥ savicārāḥ /
T07vakobhau:801: kāmadhātau prathame dhyāne vicāra eṣu triprakāreṣu nāntarbhavati /
T07vakobhau:811: daśa rupiṇo dhātavaḥ śeṣā nityamavitarkā avicārā asaṃprayogitvāt //
T07vakobhau:812: yadi pañca vijñānakāyāḥ savitarkāḥ savicārāḥ kathamavikalpakā ityucyante /
T07vakobhau:824: tau prajñā mānasī vyagrā smṛtiḥ sarvaiva mānasī // VAkK_1.33 //
T07vakobhau:828: mānasyeva sarvā smṛtiḥ samāhitā cāsamāhitā cānusmaraṇavikalpaḥ /
T07vakobhau:831: cakṣuḥśrotraghrāṇajihvākāyamanovijñānadhātavo manodhātuśca ete sapta cittadhātavaḥ sālambanā viṣayagrahaṇāt /
T07vakobhau:834: śeṣā daśa rūpiṇo dhātavo dharmadhātupradeśaścāsaṃprayuktako 'nālambanā it isiddham /
T07vakobhau:838: ye sapta sālambanā uktāḥ aṣṭamaṣyārdhena sārdham /
T07vakobhau:847: anye 'nupāttāstadyathā mūlavarjeṣu keśaromanakhadanteṣu viṇmūtrakheṭasiṃghāṇakaśeṇitādiṣu bhūmyudakādiṣu ca /
T07vakobhau:864: tacca naivaṃ bhūtānāṃ catuṣṭva khakkhaṭādilakṣaṇāvadhāraṇāt sūtre /
T07vakobhau:866: na hi kāṭhinyādīni cakṣurādibhirgṛhyante nāpi varṇādayaḥ kāyendriyeṇa /
T07vakobhau:867: uktaṃ ca sūtre "cakṣurbhikṣo ādhyātmikamāyatanaṃ catvāri mahābhūtānyupādāya rūpaprasādo arupyanidarśanaṃ saprataighaṃ evaṃ yāvat
T07vakobhau:869: rūpāṇi bhikṣo bāhyamāyatanaṃ catvāri mahābhūtānyupādāyarupi sanidarśanaṃ sapratigham /
T07vakobhau:870: śabdo bhikṣo bāhyamāyatanaṃ catvāri mahābhūtānyupādāya rupyanidarśanaṃ sapratigham /
T07vakobhau:872: spraṣṭavyāni bhikṣo bāhyamāyatanaṃ catvāri mahābhūtāni catvāri mahābhūtānyupādāya rūpyanidarśanaṃ sapratighami"ti /
T07vakobhau:873: spraṣṭrvyāyatanikadeśenaiva bhūtānāṃ saṃgrahāccheṣaṃ na bhūtānīti spaṣṭamādarśitam /
T07vakobhau:874: yattarhi sūtre uktaṃ "yaccakṣuṣi maṃsapiṇḍe khakkhaṭaṃ kharagatami"ti
T07vakobhau:878: na ca yuktaṃ cittameva caittā ityabhyupetum /
T07vakobhau:879: "saṃjñā ca vedanā ca caitasika eṣa dharmaścittānvayāccittaniśrita'; iti sūtre vacanātsarāgacittādi vacanācca /
T07vakobhau:884: paramāṇusaṃghātatvāt śeṣā na saṃcitā iti siddhaṃ bhavati //
T07vakobhau:885: aṣṭādaśānaṃ dhātūnāṃ kaśchīnatti kaśiciādyate ko dahati ko dahyate kastulayati kastulyate
T07vakobhau:886: chinatti cchidyate caiva bāhyaṃ dhātue catuṣṭayam /
T07vakobhau:896: yathā cchinattī cchiyate caiva bāhyaṃ dhātucatuṣṭayam /
T07vakobhau:902: kecidāhuḥ tadeva dhātucatuṣṭayaṃ dāhakaṃ tulyaṃ ca
T07vakobhau:904: kati vipākajāḥ dhātavaḥ katyaupacayikāḥ kati naihṣyandikāḥ kati dravayuktāḥ kati kṣaṇikāḥ
T07vakobhau:907: adhyātmaṃ tāvat pañca dhātavaḥ cakṣurādayo vipākajāścaupacayikāśca /
T07vakobhau:916: bhavatu phalahetau phalopacāro yathā phale hetūpacāraḥ /
T07vakobhau:927: yattarhi prajñaptiśāstre uktaṃ "pāruṣyavirateḥ subhāvitatvād brahmasvaratā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ nirvartta iti /
T07vakobhau:929: karmabhyo hi bhūtāni bhūtebhyaḥ śabdaḥ iti /
T07vakobhau:931: karmabhyo hi vipākajāni mahābhūtāni tebhyaścaupacayikāni tebhyo naiḥṣyandikāni tebhyaḥ śabda iti /
T07vakobhau:932: evam tarhi śāhī hikyapi vedanā karmajabhūtasaṃbhūtatvānna vipākaḥ prapnoti /
T07vakobhau:942: te vipākajā apyaupacayikā api naiḥṣyandrikā api /
T07vakobhau:948: te prathamānāsrave duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntikalāpe kṣaṇamekamanaiḥṣyandikā bhavantyataḥ kṣaṇikā ityucyante /
T07vakobhau:956: cakṣurvijñānadhātvoḥ syāt pṛthak lābhaḥ sahāpi ca // VAkK_1.38 //
T07vakobhau:970: tṛtīyā kāmadhātau labdhāvihīnacakṣuḥ prathamadhyānopapanno dvitīyādidhyānopapannaśca paśyan
T07vakobhau:973: etasya prasaṅgasya samuccayārthaścaśabdaḥ sahāpi ca iti /
T07vakobhau:978: ṣaḍ vijñānāni ṣaḍāśrayā ityete dvādaśa dhātava ādhyātmakāḥ /
T07vakobhau:985: "cittasya damanaṃ sādhu cittaṃ dāntaṃ sukhāvaham" iti /
T07vakobhau:988: evam tarhi ṣaḍ vijñānadhātava ādhyātmikā na prāpnuvanti /
T07vakobhau:990: yadā tadā ta eva te bhavantīti lakṣaṇaṃ nātibarttante /
T07vakobhau:993: yadi cānāgatapratyutpannasya vijñānasya manodhātulakṣaṇaṃ na syāt atīte
T07vakobhau:1000: yo hi viṣayo yasya vijñānasya niyato yadi tatra tadvijñānamutpantaṃ bhavatyutpattidharmi vā evaṃ sa viṣayaḥ sabhāga ityucyate /
T07vakobhau:1001: na ca so 'sti kaściddharmadhāturyatra nānantaṃ manovijñānamutpannamutpatsyate vā /
T07vakobhau:1012: uktaṃ bhavati yaḥ svakarmakṛt sa sabhāga iti /
T07vakobhau:1013: tatra yena cakṣuṣā rūpāṇyapaśyat paśyati drakṣyati vā taducyate sabhāgaṃ acakṣuḥ /
T07vakobhau:1016: yad dṛṣṭvā rūpāṇi niaruddhaṃ nirudhyate nirotsyate vā yaccānutpattidharmi /
T07vakobhau:1018: tadevānutpattidharmi dvidhā kṛtvā vijñānasamāyuktaṃ cāsamāyusktaṃ ca /
T07vakobhau:1021: rūpāṇi ca yāni cakṣuṣā 'paśāyat paśyati drakṣyati vā tāni sabhāgāni /
T07vakobhau:1023: yānyadṛṣṭānyeva niruddhāni nirudhyante nirutsyante vā yāni cānutpattidharmīṇi /
T07vakobhau:1029: rūpaṃ tu yaḥ paśyati tasya sabhāgaṃ yo na paśyati tasya tatsabhāgam /
T07vakobhau:1031: asti hi saṃbhavo yadrūpamekaḥ paśyati taddhavo 'pi paśyeyuryathā candranaṭmallaprekṣāsu /
T07vakobhau:1032: natu saṃbhavo 'sti yadekena cakṣuṣā dvau paśyetām /
T07vakobhau:1037: gandhādayastu ya ekena gṛhyante na te 'nyena
T07vakobhau:1040: asti hyeṣa saṃbhavo ya eva gandhādaya ekasya ghrāṇādivijñānamutpādayeyusta evānyeṣāmapi /
T07vakobhau:1048: ye punarasabhāgāste teṣā sabhāgānāṃ jātisāmānyena sabhāgatvāt tatsabhāgāḥ
T07vakobhau:1049: kati dhātavo darśanaheyāḥ kati bhāvanāheyāḥ katyaheyāḥ /
T07vakobhau:1059: nanu cānyadapi darśanaprahātavyamasti pṛthagjanatvamāpāyikaṃ ca kāyavākkarma /
T07vakobhau:1070: tasmādanyatra jātamaṣaṣṭhajaṃ pañcendriyajaṃ ca yattadapi nāsti darśnaprahātavyam //
T07vakobhau:1071: aṣṭādaśānāṃ dhātūnāṃ kati dṛṣṭiḥ kati na dṛṣṭiḥ /
T07vakobhau:1075: pañca satkāyadṛṣṭyādikā dṛṣṭayaḥ laukikī samyag dṛṣṭiḥ śaiṅkṣī dṛṣṭiraśaikṣī dṛṣṭirityayamaṣṭaprakāro dharmadhāturdṛṣṭi ravraśiṣṭo na dṛṣṭiḥ /
T07vakobhau:1086: ata eva cānyā 'pi kliṣṭā 'kliṣṭā vā prājñā na dṛṣṭiḥ /
T07vakobhau:1095: savijñānakaṃ yadā bhavati tadā paśyatyanyadā neti /
T07vakobhau:1096: evam tarhi tadeva cakṣurāśritam vijñānaṃ paśyatītyastu /
T07vakobhau:1101: dṛśyate rūpaṃ na kilāntaritaṃ yataḥ // VAkK_1.42 //
T07vakobhau:1102: yasmāt kila rūpaṃ kuḍyādivyavahitaṃ na dṛśyate /
T07vakobhau:1103: yadi hi vijñānaṃ paśyettassyāpratighatvāt kuḍyādiṣu pratighāto nāsti ityvāṛtamapi rūpaṃ paśyet
T07vakobhau:1104: naiva hāvṛte cakṣurvijñānamutpadyata ityanutpannaṃ kathaṃ drakṣyati /
T07vakobhau:1106: yasya tu cakṣuḥ paśyati tasya cakṣuṣaḥ saparatighatvādvyayavahite vṛttyabhāva iti vijñānasyānutpatti rāśrayeṇaika viṣayapravṛttatvāt yujyate
T07vakobhau:1107: kiṃ nu vai cakṣuḥ prāptaviṣayaṃ kāyendriyavat yata āvṛtaṃ na paśyet /
T07vakobhau:1112: yatrālokasyāpratibandha āvṛte 'pi rupe tatropapadyata eva cakṣurvijñānam /
T07vakobhau:1113: yatra tu pratibandhastatra notpadyata ityanutpannatvādāvṛtaṃ nekṣyate /
T07vakobhau:1122: yathā ca sūtra uktaṃ "cakṣurvijñeyāni rūpāṇīṣṭāni kāntāni"ti /
T07vakobhau:1124: uktaṃ ca sūtre "cakṣurbrāhmaṇa dvāraṃ yāvadeva rūpāṇāṃ darśanāya" ityato gamyate cakṣuṣā dvāreṇa vijñānaṃ paśyatīti /
T07vakobhau:1128: yadi vijñānaṃ kpaśyati ko vijānāti kaścānayorviśeṣaḥ /
T07vakobhau:1129: yadeva hi rūpasya vijñānaṃ tadevāsya darśnamiti /
T07vakobhau:1130: tadyathā kācit prajñā paśyatītyapyucyate prajānātītyapyevaṃ kiñcidvijñānaṃ paśyatītyapyucyāte vijānātītyapi /
T07vakobhau:1132: "yadi cakṣuḥ paśyati kartṛbhūtasya cakṣuṣaḥ kā 'nyā dṛśikriye"ti vaktavyam
T07vakobhau:1143: tathā hi tasminnutpanne rūpaṃ dṛṣṭamityucyate na vijñātam /
T07vakobhau:1151: tatra kaḥ paśyati ko vā dṛśyate /
T07vakobhau:1155: uktaṃ hi bhagavatā "janapadaniruktiṃ nābhiniviśeta saṃjñāṃ ca lokasya
T07vakobhau:1158: cakṣuḥ paśyati śrotraṃ śṛṇoti ghrāṇaṃ jighrati jihvā āsvādayati kāyaḥ spṛśati mano vijānātīti
T07vakobhau:1159: tadyadi cakṣuḥ paśyati kimekena cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi paśyatyāhosvidubhābhyām /
T07vakobhau:1163: tathā hi dvayorvivṛtayoḥ paraiśāuddhataraṃ darāśanaṃ bhavati /
T07vakobhau:1164: ekasmiṃścīnmīlite cakṣuṣi dvitīye cārdhanimīlite dvicandrādigrahaṇaṃ bhavati /
T07vakobhau:1166: na cāśrayavicchedād vicchedaparasaṅgo vijñānasya deśāpratiṣṭhitatvād raupavaditi /
T07vakobhau:1167: yadi cakṣuḥ paśyati śrotraṃ śṛṇoti yāvanmano vijānāti kimeṣāṃ prāpto viṣaya āhosvidaprāptaḥ
T07vakobhau:1169: tathā hi dūrādrūpaṃ paśyatyakṣisthamañjanaṃ na paśyati /
T07vakobhau:1171: sati ca prāptaviṣayatve divyaṃ cakṣuḥśrotramiha dhyāyināṃ nopajāyeta /
T07vakobhau:1173: yadyaprāptaviṣayaṃ cakṣuḥ kasmānna sarvamaprāptaṃ paśyati dūraṃ tiraskṛtaṃ ca /
T07vakobhau:1176: kasmānna sarvaṃ prāptaṃ paśyatyañjanaṃ śalākāṃ vā /
T07vakobhau:1177: yathā ca ghrāṇādīnaṃ prāpto viṣayo na tu sarvaḥ /
T07vakobhau:1197: ata eva yadi hi spṛśeyurhasto haste 'bhyāhataḥ sajyeto palaścopale /
T07vakobhau:1200: kaścidvāyudhāturvikiraṇāya pravṛtto yathā saṃvarttanyāṃ kaścit saṃdhāraṇāya yathā vivarttanyāmiti
T07vakobhau:1204: evaṃ ca kṛtvā 'yamapi grantha upapanno bhavati vibhāṣāyām /
T07vakobhau:1205: kiṃ nu spṛṣṭahetukaṃ spṛṣṭamutpadyate āhosvidaspṛṣṭahetukamiti praśnayitvāha"kāraṇaṃ prati
T07vakobhau:1208: kadācit spṛṣṭahetukaṃ spṛṣṭaṃ yadā cayavatāṃ cayaḥ /
T07vakobhau:1214: anyathā hi sāntarāṇāṃ paramāṇūnāṃ śūnyeṣvantareṣu gatiḥ kena pratibadhyeta /
T07vakobhau:1217: ta eva te saṃghātāḥ paramāṇavaḥ spṛśyante yathā rūpyante /
T07vakobhau:1218: yadi ca paramāṇordigbhāgabhedaḥ kalpyate spṛṣṭasyāspṛṣṭasya vā sāvayavatvaprasaṅgaḥ /
T07vakobhau:1223: yāvanto hīndriyaparamāṇavastāvanto hi viṣayaparamāṇavaḥ sametya vijñānaṃ janayanti /
T07vakobhau:1227: kadācit bhūyāṃso yadā mahāntaṃ parvataṃ paśyatyunmiṣitamātreṇa /
T07vakobhau:1243: tatra cakṣurindriyaparamāṇavaḥ kadācit sarve sabhāgā bhavanti kadācittatsabhāgāḥ /
T07vakobhau:1252: ya ime ṣaḍvijñānadhātava uktāścakṣurvijñānaṃ yavanmanovijñānaṃ kimeṣāṃ yatha viṣayo varttamānaḥ pañcānāṃ caramasya trikāla evamāśrayo 'pi /
T07vakobhau:1259: tatra cakṣurvijñānasya cakṣuḥ sahaja āśārayo yāvat kāyavijñānasya kāyaḥ /
T07vakobhau:1260: atītaḥ punareṣāmāśrayo mana ityapyete pañca vijñānakāyā indriyadvayāśrayāḥ
T07vakobhau:1272: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇamubhayādhīnāyāṃ vijñānotpattau cakṣurādayaḥ evāśrayā ucyante na rūpādayaḥ
T07vakobhau:1275: cakṣurādīnāṃ hi vikāreṇa tadvijñānānāṃ vikāro bhavatyanugrahopaghātapaṭumandatānuvidhānāt na tu rūpādīnāṃ vikāreṇa tadvikāraḥ /
T07vakobhau:1276: tasmāt sādhīyastadadhīnatvat ta evāśrayā na rūpādayaḥ /
T07vakobhau:1277: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ rūpādayaśca tairvijñāyante cakṣurvijñānaṃ cocyate yāvanmanovijñānam /
T07vakobhau:1285: tasmādāśrayabhāvādasādhāraṇatvācca vijñānaṃ tenaiva nirdiśyate na rūpādibhiḥ /
T07vakobhau:1287: atha yatra kāye sthitaścakṣuṣā rūpāṇi paśyati kiṃ tāni kāyacakṣūrūpavijñānānyekabhūmikānyeva bhavantyāhosvidanyabhūmikānyapi /
T07vakobhau:1290: kāmadhātūpapannasya svena cakṣuṣā svāni rūpāṇi paśyataḥ sarvaṃ svabhūmikam bhavati /
T07vakobhau:1291: tasyaiva svāni rūpāṇi prathamadhyānabhūmīni paśyano rūpāṇi trīṇapi tadbhūmikāni /
T07vakobhau:1292: dvitīyadhyānacakṣuṣā svāni rūpoāṇi paśyataḥ kāyarūpe svabhūmike cakṣustadbhūmikaṃ vijñānaṃ prathamadhyāna bhūmikam /
T07vakobhau:1293: prathamadhyānabhūmīni paśyato vijñānarupe tadbhūmike kāyaḥ kāmāvacaraścakṣurdvitīyadyānabhūmikam
T07vakobhau:1294: dvitīyadhyānabhūmīni paśyataścakṣūarūpe tadbhūmike kāyaḥ kāmāvacaro vijñānaṃ prathamabhūmīkam
T07vakobhau:1295: evaṃ tṛtīyacaturthadhyānabhūmikena cakṣuṣā tadbhūmikādharabhumikāni rūpāṇi paśyato yojayitavyam
T07vakobhau:1296: prathmadhyānopapannasya svena cakṣuṣā svāni rūpāṇi paśyataḥ sarvaṃ svabhūmikamadharāṇi paśyataḥ trayaṃ svabhūmikaṃ /
T07vakobhau:1297: dvitīyadhyānacakṣuṣā svāni rūpāṇi paśyatastrayaṃ svabhūmikaṃ cakṣustadbhūmikam /
T07vakobhau:1298: kāmāvacarāṇi paśyataḥ kāyavijñāne svabhūmike rūpāṇyadharāṇi cakṣustadbhūmikam /
T07vakobhau:1301: dvitīyādidhyānopapannasya svaparacakṣurbhyāṃ svaparabhūmikāni rūpāṇi paśyato yathāyogaṃ yojayitavyam
T07vakobhau:1306: tatra yadbhūmikaḥ kāyastadbhūmikaṃ cakṣurūrdhvabhūmikaṃ vā cakṣurbhavati na tvadharabhūmikam
T07vakobhau:1307: yadbhūmikaṃ cakṣustadbhūmikamadharabhūmikaṃ vā rūpaṃ viṣayo bhavati /
T07vakobhau:1309: na hi kadācidūrdhrvabhūmikaṃ rūpamadhobhūmikena cakṣuṣā draṣṭuṃ śakyate /

T07vakobhau:2061: "āśraddhyaṃ kauśīdyaṃ muṣitasmṛtitā cetaso vikṣepaḥ avidyā asaṃprajanyamayoniśomanaskāro mithyādhimokṣa auddhatyaṃ pramādaśce" ti /

T07vakobhau:2070: prathamā koṭirvedanā cetanā saṃjñā cchandaḥ sparśaśca /
T07vakobhau:2076: styānaṃ punariṣyate sarvakleśasaṃprayogīti kleśamahābhūmikeṣu tasyāpāṭhe kasyāparādhaḥ /
T07vakobhau:2077: evaṃ tvāhuḥ paṭhitavyaṃ bhavetsamādhyanuguṇatvāttu na paṭhitam /
T07vakobhau:2079: kaḥ punaḥ styānacarito yo nauddhatyacaritaḥ ko vā auddhatyacarito yo na styānacaritaḥ /
T07vakobhau:2083: ete hi sadā kleṣṭa eva cetasi bhavanti nānyatra //
T07vakobhau:2085: akuśale tu cetasyāhrīkyamanapatrāpyaṃ ca nityaṃ bhavata ityetau dvau dharmāvakuśalamahābhūmikāvucyete
T07vakobhau:2089: parīttakleśā bhūmireṣāṃ ta ime parīttakleśabhūmikā avidyāmātreṇa bhāvanāheyena manobhūmikenaiva ca saṃprayogāt /
T07vakobhau:2093: tatra vaktavyaṃ kasmiṃścitte kati caittā avaśyaṃ bhavantīti /
T07vakobhau:2103: daśa mahābhūmikā daśa kuśalamahābhūmikā vitarko vicāraśca /
T07vakobhau:2106: yatra tvasti tatra tadevādhikaṃ kṛtvā trayoviṃśatiścaittā bhavanti /
T07vakobhau:2109: iha tu punaḥ kaukṛtyālambano dharmaḥ kaukṛtyamucyate cetaso vipratisāraḥ /
T07vakobhau:2110: tadyathā śūnyatālalmvanaṃ vimokṣamukhṃ śūnyatetyucyate aśubhālambanaścālobho 'śubha iti /
T07vakobhau:2111: loke 'pi ca dṛṣṭaḥ sthānena sthānināmatideśaḥ sarvo grāma āgataḥ sarvo deśa āgata iti /
T07vakobhau:2117: na mayā sādhu kṛtaṃ yanna kṛtamiti /
T07vakobhau:2124: daśa mahābhūmikāḥ ṣaṭ kleāśamahābhūmikā dvāvakuśalamahābhūmikau vitarkovicāraśca /
T07vakobhau:2125: āveṇikaṃ nāma cittaṃ yatrāvidyaiva kevalā nānyaḥ kleśo 'sti rāgādiḥ /
T07vakobhau:2130: tatrākuśalaṃ dṛṣṭiyuktaṃ yatra mithyādṛṣṭirvā dṛṣṭiparāmarśo vā śīlavrataparāmarśo vā /
T07vakobhau:2132: yatra punaścaturbhiḥ kleśaiḥ saṃprayuktamakuśalaṃ cittaṃ rāgeṇa va pratighena vā mānena vā vicikitsayā vā tatraikaviṃśatirbhavanti /
T07vakobhau:2134: krodhādibhirapyupakleśairyathoktaiḥ saṃprayukte citte ete ca viṃśatiḥ sa copakleśa ityekaviṃśatirbhavanti
T07vakobhau:2137: samāsata āveṇike cetasyakuśale dṛṣṭiyukte ca viṃśatiḥ /
T07vakobhau:2142: daśa mahābhūmikāḥ ṣaṭ kleśamahābhūmikāḥ vitarkavicārau ca /
T07vakobhau:2150: middhaṃ sarvāvirodhitvādyatra syādadhikam hi tat // VAkK_2.30 //
T07vakobhau:2154: ya eva kāmadhātau caittānāṃ niyama uktaḥ
T07vakobhau:2156: ato yathoktāt kaukṛtyaṃ middhaṃ ca sarvathā nāsti prathame dhyāne yat kiñcidakuśalam /
T07vakobhau:2159: ya eva prathame dhyāne na santi ta eva
T07vakobhau:2164: dhyānāntarāt pareṇa dvitīyādiṣu dhyāneṣvārūpyeṣu ca yathāpratiṣiddhaṃ nāsti vicāraśca /
T07vakobhau:2168: sa hi svasyāṃ parṣadyaśvajitā bhikṣuṇā praśnaṃ pṛṣṭaḥ "kutremāni brahman catavāri mahābhūtānyapariśeṣaṃ nirudhyante" iti /
T07vakobhau:2170: "ahamasmin brahmā īśvaraḥ kartā nirmātā sraṣṭā sṛjaḥ pitṛbhūto
T07vakobhau:2173: idānīṃ keṣāñcideva caittānāṃ tantravihitaṃ nānākāraṇaṃ vakṣyate /
T07vakobhau:2176: guṇeṣu guṇavatsu cāgauravatā apratīśatā abhayamavaśavartitā āhrīkyaṃ gauravapratidvandvo dharmaḥ
T07vakobhau:2181: kathamidaṃ vijñātavyam abhayasya darśanamabhayadarśitā āhosvit bhayasyādarśanam /
T07vakobhau:2183: abhayasya darśanaṃ cet prajñā vijñāsyate bhayasyādarśanaṃ cedavidyā vijñāsyate /
T07vakobhau:2189: evamapi dve apekṣe yugapat kathaṃ setsyataḥ /
T07vakobhau:2190: na khalūcyate yugapadātmānaṃ paraṃ cāpekṣata ityapi tvastyasau kadācidalajjā yā ātmānamapekṣamāṇasyāpi pravartate sā āhrīkyam /
T07vakobhau:2193: pratahamena tāvat kalpena sagauravatā sapratīśatā na bhayavaśavrtitā hrīḥ /
T07vakobhau:2207: pudgaleṣu tu prema na gauravaṃ putradārasārdhaṃ vihāryantevāsiṣu /
T07vakobhau:2220: nanu ca śraddhā hrīśca kuśalamahābhūmikatvāttatrāpi vidyete /
T07vakobhau:2221: dvividhā hi śraddhā dharmeṣu pudgaleṣu ca /
T07vakobhau:2223: tatra ye pudgalālambane śraddhāhriyau te tatra na staḥ /
T07vakobhau:2234: nātivilīyate evaṃvitarkavicārayogāccittaṃ nātisūkṣmaṃ bhavati nātyodārika mityubhayorapi tatrāsti vyāpāraḥ /
T07vakobhau:2235: evaṃ tarhi nimiṭtabhūtau vitarkavicārāvaudārika sūkṣmatayoḥ prāpnuto yathā payaścā tapaścasarpiṣaḥ śyānatva vilīnatvayornatu punastatsvabhāvau /
T07vakobhau:2241: tatra ye audārikāste vitarkāḥ ye sūkṣmāste vicārāḥ /
T07vakobhau:2242: yadi caikatra citte 'nyo dharma audāriko 'nyaḥ sūkṣmaḥ ko 'tra virodha iti /
T07vakobhau:2250: naiva hi vitarkavicārāvekatra citte bhavata ityapare /
T07vakobhau:2255: madaḥ svadharme raktasya paryādānaṃ tu cetasaḥ // VAkK_2.33 //
T07vakobhau:2256: yena kenacit parato viśeṣaparikalpena cetasa unnatiḥ mānaḥ /
T07vakobhau:2260: uktāḥ saha cittena caittāḥ prakāraśa steṣāṃ punarimāḥ saṃjñāḥ paribhāṣyante /
T07vakobhau:2274: ta eva hi cittacaittāḥ sāśrayā ucyante indriyāśritatvāt /
T07vakobhau:2282: yathaiva hyekaṃ cittamevaṃ caittā apyekaikā iti /
T07vakobhau:2285: āsaṃjñikaṃ samāpattī jīvitaṃ lakṣaṇāni ca // VAkK_2.35 //
T07vakobhau:2287: ime saṃskārā na cittena asaṃprayuktā naca rūpasvabhāvā iti cittaviprayuktāucyante /
T07vakobhau:2290: dvividhā hi prāptiraprāptavihīnasya ca lābhaḥ pratilabdhena ca samanvāgamaḥ /
T07vakobhau:2301: ata eva hi cottamabhidharme "anāsravairdharmaḥ kaḥ samanvāgataḥ /
T07vakobhau:2304: pratisaṃkhyānirodhena sakalabandhanādikṣaṇasthavarjyāḥ sarva āryāḥ pṛthagjanāśca kecitsamanvāgatāḥ
T07vakobhau:2307: yasya ca nāsti prāptistastasyāprāptirapi nāstīti siddhāntaḥ /
T07vakobhau:2313: tena tarhi asattvākhyairapi samanvāgamaḥ prāpnoti parasattvaiśca /
T07vakobhau:2316: "rājā bhikṣavaścakravarti saptabhī ratnaiḥ samanvāgata" iti vistaraḥ /
T07vakobhau:2318: tasya teṣu ratneṣu vaśitvaṃ kāmacāra iti /
T07vakobhau:2321: ayam ayogaḥ yad asyā naiva svabhāvaḥ prajñāyate rūpaśabdādivad rāgadveṣādivad vā na cāpi kṛtyaṃ cakṣuḥśrotrādivat /
T07vakobhau:2325: ye ca dharmā aprāptā ye ca tyaktā bhūmisaṃcāravaiarāgyatasteṣāṃ kathamutpattiḥ syāt /
T07vakobhau:2328: sakalabandhanānāṃ khalvapi mṛdumadhyādhimātrakleśotpattibhedo na syāt prāptyabhedāt /
T07vakobhau:2329: yato vā sa bhedastata evāstu tadutpattiḥ /
T07vakobhau:2334: asatyāṃ hi prāptau laukikamānasānāmāryapṛthagjanānāmāryā ime pṛthagjanā ima iti na syād vyavasthānam
T07vakobhau:2336: etaccaiva kathaṃ bhaviṣyatyeṣāṃ prahīṇaḥ kleśa eṣāmaprahīṇa iti /
T07vakobhau:2339: āśrayo hi sa āryāṇāṃ darśanabhāvanāmārgasāmarthyāttathā parāvṛtto bhavati yathā na punastatpraheyāṇāṃ kleśānāṃ prarohasamartho bhavati /
T07vakobhau:2343: yaścāprahīṇastena samanvāgato yaḥ prahīṇastenā samanvāgata iti prajñapyate
T07vakobhau:2344: kuśalā api dharmā dviprakārā ayatnabhāvino yatnabhāvinaśca ye ta ucyante utpattipratilambhikāḥ prāyogikāśceti /
T07vakobhau:2345: tatrāyatnabhāvibhirāśrayasya tadvījabhāvānupaghātāt samanvāgata upaghātādasamanvāgata ucyate samucchinnakuāśalamūlaḥ /
T07vakobhau:2347: na tu khalu kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ vījabhāvasyātyantaṃ santatau samudghātaḥ /
T07vakobhau:2349: tasmādvījamevātrānapoddhṛtamanupahatam paripṛṣṭaṃ ca vāśiatvakāle samanvāgamākhyāṃ tabhate nānyad dravyam /
T07vakobhau:2351: yannāmarūpaṃ phalotpattau samartha sākṣāt pāraṃparyeṇa vā /
T07vakobhau:2360: yāvaddhi tasyādhivāsako 'vinodako bhavati tāvat bhavyastāni bhāvayitum /
T07vakobhau:2361: evamayaṃ samanvāgamaḥ sarvāthā prajñaptidharmo na tu dravyadharmaḥ /
T07vakobhau:2378: tatrāpraptiṃsaṃṅkhyānirodhasya traidhātukī pratisaṃkhyānirodhasya rūpārūpyāvacarī cānāsravā ca /
T07vakobhau:2384: naivaśaikṣānāśaikṣā dharmā ucyante sāsravā dharmā asaṃskāṛtaṃ ca /
T07vakobhau:2388: tasyaiva śaikṣeṇa mārgeṇa praptasya śaikṣī aśaikṣeṇāśaikṣī /
T07vakobhau:2394: teṣāmapratisaṃkhyānirodhasya bhāvanāheyā prāptiḥ anāryaprāptasya ca pratisaṃkhyānirodhasya
T07vakobhau:2404: dve abhijñe avyākṛte nirmāṇacittaṃ ca varjayitvā /
T07vakobhau:2405: teṣāṃ hi balavattvāt prayogaviśeṣaniṣpatteḥ pūrva paścāt sahajā prāptiḥ /
T07vakobhau:2439: anyathā hi cuddho 'pi śrāvakapratyekabuddhagotrakai rasamanvāgamādanāryaḥ syāt /
T07vakobhau:2458: yathā tāvadāryamārgasyālābhaḥ pṛthagjanatvaṃ tasya lābhāttadvihīyate bhūmisaṃcārācca /
T07vakobhau:2468: tatra prāptyutpādāttena dharmeṇa samanvāgato bhavati prāptiprāptyā ca /
T07vakobhau:2469: prāptiprāptyutpādāt punaḥ prāptyaiva samanvāgato bhavatyato nānavsthā /
T07vakobhau:2470: evaṃ ca kṛtva ātmanā tṛtīyasya dharmasya kuśalasya kliṣṭasya kliṣṭasya vā dvitīye kṣaṇe tisraḥ prāptayo jāyante /
T07vakobhau:2471: tāsāṃ ca punastisro 'nuprāptaya iti ṣaḍ bhavanti /
T07vakobhau:2472: tṛtīye kṣaṇe prathamadvitīyakṣaṇotpannānāṃ dravyāṇāṃ nava prāptayaḥ sārdhamanuprāptibhirityaṣṭādāśa bhavanti /
T07vakobhau:2473: evamuttarottaravāṛddhiprasaṇṅgenaitāḥ praptayo visarpantyaḥ sarveṣāmatītānāgatānāṃ kleśopakleśakṣaṇānāmupapattilābhikānāṃ ca kuśalakṣaṇānāṃ saṃprayoga sahabhuvāmanādyantasaṃsāraparyāpannānāmanantā ekasya prāṇinaḥ kṣaṇe kṣaṇe upajāyante ityanantadravyāḥ pratisantānamātmabhāvakṣaṇāḥ sattvānāṃ bhavanti /
T07vakobhau:2476: itarathā hyākāśe 'pyava kāśo na syāt dvitīyasya prāṇinaḥ //
T07vakobhau:2480: sattvānāṃ sākṛśyaṃ nikāyasa bhāga ityasyāḥ śāstre saṃjñā /
T07vakobhau:2484: bhinnā punasteṣāmeva sattvānāṃ dhātubhūmigatiyonijātistrīpuruṣopāsakabhikṣuśaikṣā śaikṣyādibhedena pratiniyatā dharmasabhāgatā /
T07vakobhau:2485: punaḥ skndhāyatanadhātutaḥ yadi satvasabhāgatā dravyamaviśiṣtaṃ na syāt anyonyaviśeṣabhinneṣu sattveṣu sattvasttva ityabhedena buddhirna syāt prajñaptiśca /
T07vakobhau:2487: syāccyavetopapadyeta na ca sattvasabhāgatāṃ vijahyānna ca pratilabheteti /
T07vakobhau:2494: yadi pṛthagjanasabhāgatā nāma dravyamasti kiṃ punaḥ pṛthagjanatvena /
T07vakobhau:2496: naiva ca lokaḥ sabhāgatāṃ paśyatyarūpiṇītvāt nacaināṃ prajñayā paricchinatti pratipadyate ca satvānāṃ jātyabhedamiti satyā api tasyāḥ kathaṃ tatra vyāpāraḥ /
T07vakobhau:2498: śāliyavamudgamāsāmrapanasalohakāñcanādīnāṃ svajātisādṛśyāt tāsāṃ ca sabhāgatānāmanyonyabhinnānāṃ kathamabhedena sabhāgatā prajñaptiḥ kriyate /
T07vakobhau:2503: sa eko 'pyanekasmin varttate yadi dyotitā yadi na dyotitā /
T07vakobhau:2504: astyeṣā tu sabhāgatā sūtre vacanāditi vaibhāṣikāḥ /
T07vakobhau:2505: ustaṃ hi bhagavatā "sa ceditthantvamāgacchati manuṣyāṇāṃ sabhāgatāmi"ti /
T07vakobhau:2508: ta eva hi tathābhūtāḥ saṃskārā yeṣu manuṣyādiprajñaptiḥ śālyādiṣu sabhāgatāvat /
T07vakobhau:2513: asaṃjñisattveṣu devepūpapannānāṃ yaścittacaittānāṃ nirodhastadāsaṃjñikaṃnāma dravyaṃ yena cittacaittā anāgate 'dhvani
T07vakobhau:2522: bṛhatphalā nāma devā yeṣāṃ kecidasaṃjñisattvāḥ pradeśe bhavanti dhyānāntarikāvat /
T07vakobhau:2525: "prakṛṣṭamapi kālaṃ sthitvā saha saṃjñotpādātteṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tatsthānāt
T07vakobhau:2527: te ca tato dīrghasvapnavyutthitā iva cyutvā kāmadhātāvupapadyante nānyatra /
T07vakobhau:2528: pūrvasamāpattisaṃskāraparikṣayāt apūrvānupacayācca kṣiptā iva kṣīṇavegā iṣavaḥ pṛthivīṃ patanti
T07vakobhau:2529: yena ca tatropapattavyaṃ tasyāvaśyaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ karmāparaparyāyavedanīyaṃbhavati /
T07vakobhau:2531: atha samāpattī iti yaduktaṃ katame te samāpattī /
T07vakobhau:2555: yo 'pyenāmutpādya parihīyate so 'pi kilāvaśyaṃ punarutpādyāsaṃjñisattveṣūpapadyata iti /
T07vakobhau:2569: labdhayā tu dvitaīyādiṣu kṣaṇeṣvatītayā 'pi samanvāgato bhavati yāvanna
T07vakobhau:2592: aniyatā ca vipākaṃ prati kadācinna vipacyate /
T07vakobhau:2593: yadīha pariniarvāyāt tasyā hi bhavāgre catuḥskandhako vipākaḥ /
T07vakobhau:2596: nahi pṛthagjanā nirodhasamāpattimutpādayituṃ śaknuvantyucchedabhīrutvādāryamārgabalena cotpādanāddṛṣṭadharmanirvāṇasya tadadhimuktitaḥ /
T07vakobhau:2606: kṣayajñānasamanaṃ kālaṃ buddhā bhagavanta enāṃ labhante nāsti kiñcidbuddhānāṃ prāyogikaṃ nāma
T07vakobhau:2609: kathaṃ khalvi dānīmanutpāditāyāṃ nirodhasamāpattau kṣayajñānakāle bhagavānubhayotobhāgavimuktaḥ sidhyati /
T07vakobhau:2610: sidhyatyutpāditāyāmiva tasyāṃ vaśitvāt prāgeva tāṃ bodhisattvaḥ śaikṣyāvasthāyāmutpādayatīti pāścattyāḥ /
T07vakobhau:2612: evaṃ ca sthaviropaguptasyāpīdaṃ netrīpadaṃ prāmāṇikaṃ bhaviṣyati /
T07vakobhau:2615: nahi pūrvaṃ tasyā utapādanaṃ yujyata iti kāśmīrakāḥ /
T07vakobhau:2619: satyābhisamaye ṣoḍaśabhirbhavāgravairāgye cāṣṭādaśabhirnavaprakārāṇāṃ kleśānāṃ prahāṇāya navānantaryavimuktimārgotpādanāt
T07vakobhau:2626: kathaṃ tarhi "na tāvat bhetsyāmi paryaṅkamaprāpte āsravakṣaya" iti /
T07vakobhau:2631: ubhe api tvete asaṃjñinirodhasamāpattī kāmadhātau rūpadhātau cotpatsyete /
T07vakobhau:2632: ye tvasaṃjñisamāpattiṃ rūpadhātau necchanti teṣāmayaṃ grantho virudhyate /
T07vakobhau:2634: syādrūpāvacarāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ saṃjñināṃ devānāṃ visabhāge citte sthitānāmasaṃjñisamāpattiṃ nirodhasamāparttiṃ ca samāpannānāmasaṃjñināṃ ca devānāmāsaṃjñike pratilabdhe yo bhava" iti /
T07vakobhau:2643: so 'bhīkṣṇaṃ saṃjñāvedayita nirodhaṃ samāpadyate ca vyuttiṣṭhate cāsti
T07vakobhau:2644: caitat sthānamiti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti sa na haiva dṛṣṭa eva dharme pratipattye vājñāmārāgayati nāpi maraṇakālasamaye bhedācca kāyasyātikramya devān kavaḍīkārāhāra bhakṣānanyatarasmin divye manomaye kāya upapadyate /
T07vakobhau:2646: vyuttiṣṭahate cāsti caitat sthānamiti yathābhūtaṃ prajānātī"ti /
T07vakobhau:2647: atra hi divyo manomayaḥ kāyo rūpāvacara ukto bhagavatā /
T07vakobhau:2669: kathamidānīṃ bahukālaṃ niruddhāccittāt punarapi cittaṃ jāyate /
T07vakobhau:2672: kathaṃ tāvad rūpopapannānāṃ ciraniruddhe 'pi rūpe punarapi rūpaṃ jāyate /
T07vakobhau:2673: cittād eva hi taj jāyate na rūpāt /
T07vakobhau:2674: evaṃ cittam apy asmād eva sendriyāt kāyāj jāyate na cittāt /
T07vakobhau:2675: anyonyabījakaṃ hy etadubhayaṃ yaduta cittaṃ ca sendriyaśca kāya iti pūrvācāryāḥ /
T07vakobhau:2677: nirodhasamāpattistasyaiṣa doṣo mama tu sacittikā samāpattiri"ti /
T07vakobhau:2681: sparśapratyayā ca vedanā saṃjñā cetan''etyuktaṃ bhagavatā /
T07vakobhau:2685: satyāmapi tu vedanāyāmarhato na tṛṣṇotpattirevaṃ satyapi sparśe vedannādayo na syuriti /
T07vakobhau:2687: avidyāsaṃsparśajaṃ hi veditaṃ pratītyotpannā tṛṣṇetyuktaṃ natu vedanotpattau sparśo viśeṣita ityasamānametat /
T07vakobhau:2691: samāpatticittena ca tāṃ samāpadyante samāgacchantīti samāpattiḥ /
T07vakobhau:2692: kiṃ punarete samāpattī dravyataḥ sta utāho prajñaptitaḥ /
T07vakobhau:2697: samāpatticittameva hi taccittāntaraviruddhamutpadyate yena kālāntaraṃ cittasyā pravṛttimātraṃ bhavati /
T07vakobhau:2699: yā 'sau samāpattiriti prajñapyate taccāpravṛttimātraṃ na pūrvamāsīnna paścāt bhavati vyutthitasyeti saṃskṛtā 'sau samāpattiḥ prajñapyate /
T07vakobhau:2702: cittamevāsau tatra cittapravṛttiviruddhaṃ labhate taccāpravṛttimātramāsaṃjñikaṃ prajñapyata iti tadetanna varṇayanti /
T07vakobhau:2708: etaccaiva na jñāyate āyurnāma ka eṣa dharma iti /
T07vakobhau:2713: tad ya ūṣmaṇo vijñānasya cādhārabhūto dharmaḥ sthitihetustadāyuḥ /
T07vakobhau:2715: evaṃ tarhi parasparāpekṣyavṛttitvādeṣāṃ kaḥ pūrvaṃ nivartiṣyate /
T07vakobhau:2720: ūṣmaṇastarhi karmādhārbhūtaṃ bhaviṣyati ūṣmā ca vijñānasya /
T07vakobhau:2723: na vai labhyate kāmacāro yat kvacidevoṣmā vijñānasyādhāro bhaviṣyati kvacideva karmeti /
T07vakobhau:2731: yāvaddhi karmaṇā nikāyasabhāgasyāvedhaḥ kṛto bhavatyetāvantaṃ kālamavasthātavyamiti tāvat so 'vatiṣṭhate tadāyurityucyate /
T07vakobhau:2733: yastu manyate saṃskāro nāma kaścin guṇaviśeṣa iṣau jāyate yadvaśādgamanamāpatanād bhavatīti
T07vakobhau:2734: tasya tadekatvāt pratipannābhāvācca deśāntaraiḥ śīghra taratamaprāptikālabhedā nupapattiḥ patanānupapattiśca /
T07vakobhau:2749: kṣīṇe tvāyuṣi puṇyakṣayasya maraṇe nāsti sāmarthyam /
T07vakobhau:2754: kāmāvacarāṇāṃ sattvānāmasaṃjñisamāparttiṃ nirodhasamāparttiṃ ca samāpannānāṃ santatyupanibaddhaṃ varttata iti vaktavyam /
T07vakobhau:2755: samāpannānāṃ rūpārūpyāvacarāṇāṃ ca sattvānāṃ sakrdutpannaṃ tiṣṭhatīti
T07vakobhau:2759: yasya tvāśrayopaghāta eva nāsti tadyatho tpannāvasthānāt dvitīyam /
T07vakobhau:2765: ātmasaṃcetanaiva kramate kāmadhātau krīḍāpramoṣkāṇāṃ devānāṃ manaḥpradūṣakāṇāṃ ca /
T07vakobhau:2766: teṣāṃ hi praharṣamanaḥopradoṣābhyāṃ tasmāt sthānāccyutirbhavati nānyathā/
T07vakobhau:2771: nobhayaṃ sarveṣā mantarābhavikāṇāṃ rūpārūpyāvacarāṇāmanekajātīyānāṃ kāmāvacarāṇāṃ tadyathā nārakāṇā muttarakauravāṇāṃ darśanamārgamaitrīnirodhāsaṃjñi samāpattisamāpannānāṃ rājarṣijinadūtajinādiṣṭa dharmilo ttaragaṅgila śreṣṭhiputrayaśaḥ dumārajīvakādīnāṃ sarveṣā caramabhavikānāṃvodhisattva mātustadgarbhāyāḥ cakravarttinaścakravarttimātuśca tadgarbhāyāḥ/
T07vakobhau:2772: atha kasmātsūtra uktaṃ katame te bhadanta sattvā yeṣāṃ nātmasaṃcetanā kramate na parasaṃacetanā
T07vakobhau:2774: anyeṣu kila dhyānarūpyedhvātmasaṃcetanāsvabhūmika āryamārgaḥ parasaṃcetanā uttarabhūmisāmantakastatra cobhayaṃ nāstīti /
T07vakobhau:2775: nanu caivaṃ tatrāpi parabhūmika āryamārgaḥ parasaṃcetanā prāpnoti /
T07vakobhau:2785: ayamatra tadyathāśabdo dṛṣṭāntavācaka iti yukta etasmāccheṣasaṃ pratyayaḥ
T07vakobhau:2786: eṣa hi dṛṣṭāntadharmo yadekamapi tajjātīyakaṃ dṛśyate /
T07vakobhau:2788: yadyayaṃ tadyathāśabdo dṛṣṭāntavācakaḥ syādiha na prāpnuyāt /
T07vakobhau:2789: santi sattvā nānātvakāyā nānātvasaṃjñinastadyathā manuṣyastadekatyāścadevā iti /
T07vakobhau:2794: yatraitāni bhavanti sa dharmaḥ saṃskṛto lakṣyate /
T07vakobhau:2796: tatra jātistaṃ dharmaṃ janayati sthitiḥ sthapayati jarā jarayati anityatā vināśayati /
T07vakobhau:2803: jarāyā eṣa paryāyastadyathā jāterutpāda ityanityatāyāśca vyaya iti /
T07vakobhau:2804: ye hi dharmāḥ saṃskārāṇāmadhvasaṃcārāya pravṛttāsta eva sūtre lakṣaṇānyuktānyudvejanārtham
T07vakobhau:2807: tadyathā kila gahanapraviṣṭasya puruṣasya trayaḥ śatravaḥ /
T07vakobhau:2808: tata eka enaṃ gahanādākarṣet dvau punarjīvitādvacyaparopayetāṃ tadvaditi /
T07vakobhau:2812: anye punaḥ kalpayanti sthitiṃ jarāṃ cābhisamasya sthityanyathātvamityekaṃ lakṣaṇamuktaṃ sūtre
T07vakobhau:2814: eṣā hyeṣu saṅgāspadamataḥ śriyamivaināṃ kālakarṇīsahitāṃ darśayāmāsa tasyāmanāsaṅgārthamiti
T07vakobhau:2829: jātijātyādīnāṃ caikatra dharme kathaṃ kṛtvā ātmanā navamo hi dharma utpadyate /
T07vakobhau:2833: tadyathā kila kācit kukkuṭī bahūnya patyāni prajāyate kācidalpāni /
T07vakobhau:2834: tadvat sthitirapyātmānaṃ varjayitvā 'nyānaṣṭau dharmān sthāpayati sthitisthitistu tāmeva sthitim /
T07vakobhau:2838: nahyete jātyādayo dharmā dravyataḥ saṃvidyante yathā 'bhivyajyante /
T07vakobhau:2841: nahyeṣāṃ dravyato 'stitve kiñcidapi pramāṇamasti pratyakṣamanumānamāptāgamo vā yathā rūpādīnāṃ dharmāṇāmiti /
T07vakobhau:2847: avidyāndhā hi bālāḥ saṃskārapravāhamātmāta ātmīyataścādhimuktā abhiṣvajante /
T07vakobhau:2848: tasya mithyādhimokṣasya vyāvarttanārthaṃ bhagavāṃstasya saṃskārapravāhasyasaṃskṛtatvaṃ pratītyasamutpannatāṃ dyotayitukāma idamāha "triṇīmāni saṃskṛtasya saṃskṛtalakṣaṇāni" /
T07vakobhau:2853: punaḥ saṃskṛtagrahaṇaṃ saṃskṛtatve lakṣaṇānīti yathā vijñāye ta /
T07vakobhau:2854: maivaṃ vijñāyi saṃskṛtasya vastuno 'stitve lakṣaṇāni jalavalākāvat sādhvasādutve vā kanyālakṣaṇavaditi
T07vakobhau:2858: evaṃ ca kṛtvoktaṃ "viditā eva nandasya kulaputrasya vedanā utpadyante viditā ava tiṣṭhante viditā astaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gacchantī"ti /
T07vakobhau:2864: "kṣaṇikasya hi dharmasya vinā sthityā vyayo bhavet /
T07vakobhau:2865: na ca vyetyeva tenāsya vṛthā tatparikalpanā //"
T07vakobhau:2871: yadapi ca jñānaprasthāna uktam "ekasmiṃścitte ka utpādaḥ /
T07vakobhau:2877: pratikṣaṇaṃ cāpi saṃskṛtasyaitāni lakṣaṇāni yujyante vinā 'pi
T07vakobhau:2888: nātivahuviśeṣabhinnāstu saṃskārāḥ satyapyanyathātve sadṛśā eva dṛśyante /
T07vakobhau:2889: antimasya tarhi śabdārciḥkṣaṇasya parinirvāṇakāle ca ṣaḍāyatanasyottarakṣaṇābhāvāt sthityahnyanyathātvaṃ nāstītyavyāpinī lakṣaṇavyavasthā prāpnoti /
T07vakobhau:2892: ato yasyāsti sthitistasyāvaśyamanyathātvaṃ bhavatīti nāsti lakṣaṇavyavasthābhedaḥ /
T07vakobhau:2893: samāsatastvatra sūtre saṃskṛtasyedaṃ lakṣaṇamiti dyotitaṃ bhagavatā
T07vakobhau:2894: "saṃskṛtaṃ nāma yadbhūtavā bhavati bhūtvā ca punarna bhavati yaścāsya sthitisaṃjñakaḥ prabandhaḥ so 'nyathā cānyathā ca bhavatī"ti /
T07vakobhau:2895: kim atra dravyāntarair jātyādibhiḥ katham idānīṃ sa eva dharmo lakṣyas tasyaiva lakṣaṇaṃ yokṣyate
T07vakobhau:2896: kathaṃ tāvan mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni mahāpuruṣān nānyāni sāsnā-lāṅgūla-kakuda-śapha-viṣāṇādīni ca gotvalakṣaṇāni gor nānyāni kāṭhinyādīni ca pṛthivīdhātvādīnāṃ lakṣaṇāni tebhyo nānyāni yathā codhrvagamanena dūrāddhūmasya dhūmatvaṃ lakṣyate naca tattasmādanyat
T07vakobhau:2898: naca saṃskṛtānāṃ rūpādīnāṃ tāvat saṃskṛtatvaṃ lakṣyate /
T07vakobhau:2899: gṛhṇatāpi svabhāvaṃ yāvat prāgabhāvo na jñāyate paścācca santateśca viśeṣaḥ /
T07vakobhau:2900: tasmānna tenaiva tallakṣitaṃ bhavati naca tebhyo dravyāntarāṇyeva jātyādīni vidyante /
T07vakobhau:2903: eko dharmaḥ ekasminneva kāle jātaḥ sthito jīrṇo naṣṭaḥ syādeṣāṃ sahabhūtvāt /
T07vakobhau:2905: anāgatā hi jātiḥ kāritraṃ hi karoti /
T07vakobhau:2906: yasmānna jātaṃ janyate janite tu dharme varttamānāḥ kṣityādayaḥ kāritraṃ kurvantīti na yadā jāyate tadā tiṣṭati jīryati vinaśyati vā /
T07vakobhau:2908: kimanāgataṃ dravyato 'sti nāstīti paścājjanayati vā naveti sidhyet /
T07vakobhau:2909: satyapi tu tasmin jātiḥ kāritaraṃ kurvatī kathamanāgatā sidhyatītyanāgata lakṣaṇaṃ vaktavyam
T07vakobhau:2910: uparatakāritrā cotpannā kathaṃ varttamānā sidhyatīti varttamānalakṣāṇaṃ vaktavyam /
T07vakobhau:2911: sthityādayo 'pi ca yugapat kāritre varttamānā ekakṣaṇa eva dharmasya sthitajīrṇavinaṣṭatāṃ prasañjeyuḥ /
T07vakobhau:2912: yadaiva hyenaṃ sthitiḥ sthāpayati tadaiva jrā jarayati anityatā vināśayatīti /
T07vakobhau:2913: kimayaṃ tatra kāle tiṣṭatvāhosvijjīryatu vinaśyatu vā yo 'pi hi brūyāt sthityādīnāmapi kāritraṃ krameṇeti tasya kṣaṇikatvaṃ bādhyate /
T07vakobhau:2914: athāpyevaṃ brūyāt eṣa eva hi naḥ kṣaṇo yāvataitat sarvaṃ samāpyata iti /
T07vakobhau:2915: evamapoi tābhyāṃ sahotpannā sthitistāvat sthāpayati na jrā jarayati anityatā vā vināśyatīti
T07vakobhau:2923: śakyaṃ tu khalu sthityā sthāpyamatyantamapi sthāpayitum /
T07vakobhau:2927: yadi hi te balīyasyau syātāṃ pūrvameva syātām /
T07vakobhau:2928: nivṛttakāritrāyāṃ khalvapi sthitau ta cāpi na tiṣṭataḥ sa cāpi dharma iti kathaṃ kutra vā kāritraṃ karttumutsahiṣyete kiṃ vā punastābhyāṃ karttavyam
T07vakobhau:2929: sthitiparigrahāddhi sa dharma utpannamātro na vyanaśyat /
T07vakobhau:2930: sa tu tayā vyupekṣyamāṇo niyataṃ na sthāsyatyayamevāsya vināśaḥ /
T07vakobhau:2932: jarā tu khalu sarvathātvena na tathā /
T07vakobhau:2938: yo 'pyāha nikāyāntarīyo "vināśa kāraṇaṃ prāpyānityatā vināśāyatī"ti tasya harītakīṃ prāpya devatā virecayatītyāpannaṃ bhavati kiṃ punastāṃ kalpayitvā /
T07vakobhau:2939: tat evāstu vināśakāraṇādvināśaḥ cittacaittānāṃ ca kṣaṇikatvābhyupagamāttadanityatāyā vināśakāraṇānapekṣatvāt sthityanityate kāritramabhinnakālaṃ kuryātāmityekasyaikatra kāle sthita vinaṣṭatā saṃprasajyeta tasmāt pravāhaṃ pratyetāni saṃskṛtalakṣaṇānyuktānītyevametatsūtraṃ sūnītaṃ bhavati /
T07vakobhau:2940: apica yadyanāgatā jātirjanyasya janikā kimarthaṃ sarvamanāgataṃ yugapannotpadyate /
T07vakobhau:2945: sati sāmargya bhāvādasati cābhāvānna jāteriti hetupratyayā eva jana kāḥsantaḥ /
T07vakobhau:2948: jātamityeva tu na syādasatyāṃ jātau ṣaṣṭhivacanaṃ ca rūpasyotpādaḥ iti yathā rūpasya rūpamiti
T07vakobhau:2950: tena tarhy anātmatvam apy eṣṭavyam anātmabuddhi-siddhyartham /
T07vakobhau:2959: tasya viśeṣaṇārthaṃ rūpasyotpāda iti ṣaṣṭīṃ kurvanti yathā rupasaṃjñaka evotpādaḥ pratīyeta mā 'nyaḥ pratyāyīti /
T07vakobhau:2962: yadi jātyā vinā jāyate kasmādasaṃskṛtamapyākāśādikaṃ na jāyate /
T07vakobhau:2965: yathā ca dharmatayā na sarvaṃ jātimadiṣyate tathā na sarvaṃ jāyata ityeṣṭavyam /
T07vakobhau:2966: yathā ca tulye jātimattve tadanye pratyayāstadanyasyotpādane na samarthā bhavantyevamevāsaṃskṛtasyotpādane sarve 'pyasamarthāḥ syuḥ /
T07vakobhau:2967: siddhā eva tu dravyabhāvena jātyādaya iti vaibhāṣikāḥ /
T07vakobhau:2968: nahi dūṣakāḥ santītyāgamā apāsyante nahi mṛgāḥ santīti yavā noṣyante nahi makṣikāḥ patantīti modakā na bhakṣyante /
T07vakobhau:2980: na vai lipyavayavānāṃ pratyāyanārthamakṣārāṇi praṇītānyakṣarāṇāmeva tu pratyāyanārthaṃ lipyavayavāḥ praṇītāḥ /
T07vakobhau:2987: padakāyaḥ tadyathā "sarvasaṃskārā anityāḥ sarvadharma anātmānaḥ śāntaṃ
T07vakobhau:2989: vyañjanakāyastadyathā ka kha ga gha ñetyevamādi /
T07vakobhau:2990: nanu caite vāksvabhāvatvācchabdātmakā iti rūpasvabhāvā bhavanti /
T07vakobhau:2993: ghoṣo hi vāk naca ghoṣāmātrenārthāḥ pratīyante /
T07vakobhau:2995: vāṅnāmni pravrttate nāmārthaṃ dyotayati naiva ghoṣamātraṃ vāg yena tu ghoṣeṇārthaḥ pratīyate sa ghoṣo vāk /
T07vakobhau:3001: yo 'pi hi manyate nāmārthaṃ dyotayatīti tenāpyetadavaśyamabhyupagantavyaṃ yadi pratīpadārthakaṃ bhavatīti /
T07vakobhau:3002: taccaita cchabdamātrādeva pratītapadārthakāt sidhyatīti kimartharaṃ nāma kalpayitvā /
T07vakobhau:3003: idaṃ cāpi na jñāyate kathaṃ vāṅnāmni pravarttata iti /
T07vakobhau:3006: ghoṣasvavatvādvācaḥ sarvaṃ ghoṣamātraṃ nāmotpādayiṣyati yādṛśo vā ghoṣaviāśeṣa iṣyate nāmna utpādakaḥ sa evārthasya dyotako bhaviṣyati /
T07vakobhau:3008: ghoṣasvabhāvatvādvācaḥ sarvaṃ ghoṣamātraṃ nāma prakaśayiṣyati yādṛśo vā ghoṣaviśeṣa iṣyate nāmnaḥ parakāśakaḥ sa evārthasya dyotako bhaviṣyati /
T07vakobhau:3010: na caikasya bhāgaśa utpādo yukta iti kathamutpādayantī vāṅnāmotpādayet /
T07vakobhau:3012: evaṃ tarhi paścima eva de nāmna utpādādyo 'pi tamevaikam śṛṇoti so
T07vakobhau:3014: athāpyevaṃ kalpyeta vāgvyañjanaṃ janayati vyañjanaṃ tu nāmeti /
T07vakobhau:3015: atrāpi sa eva prasaṅgo vyañjanāṃ sāmargyābhāvāt /
T07vakobhau:3016: eṣa eva ca prasaṅgo nāmnaḥ prakāśakatve vācaḥ /
T07vakobhau:3017: vyañjanāṃ pi vāgviśiṣṭaprajñā apyavahitacetaskā lakṣaṇataḥ paricchettum notsahanta iti vyañjayāpi vāk naivotpādikā na prakāśikā yujyate /
T07vakobhau:3019: evaṃ satyatītānāgatasyārthasya varttamānaṃ nāma na syād /
T07vakobhau:3020: apatyānāṃ pitṛbhiryatheṣṭaṃ nāmāni kalpyanta iti katamannāma tatsahajaṃ syāt asaṃskṛtānāṃ ca dharmāṇāṃ kena sahajaṃ nāma syādityaniṣṭireveyam /
T07vakobhau:3023: atrārtheṣu kṛtāvadhiḥ śabdo nāma nāmnā ca racanāviśeṣo gātheti nāmasaṃnitābhavati racanāviśeṣāśca dravyāntaraṃ nopapadyate /
T07vakobhau:3027: santyeva tu viprayuktasaṃskārabhāvanā nāmakāyā dravyata iti vaibhāṣikāḥ /
T07vakobhau:3029: atha kiṃpratisaṃyuktā ete nāmakāyādayaḥ sattvākhyā asattvākhyā vipākajā aupacayikā naiḥṣyandikāḥ kuśalā akuśalā avyākṛtā iti vaktavyam /
T07vakobhau:3033: ārupyāptā api santi te tvanabhilāpyā ityapare /
T07vakobhau:3035: yaśca dyotayati sa taiḥ samanvāgato na yo dyotyate /
T07vakobhau:3037: yathā caite nāmakāyādayaḥ sattvākhyā naiḥṣyandikā anivṛtāvyākṛtāśca /
T07vakobhau:3053: yaktūktaṃ "janyasya janikā jātirna hetupratyayairvinā" iti ka ime hetavaḥ keca pratyayāḥ /
T07vakobhau:3057: kāraṇahetuḥ sahabhūhetuḥ sabhāgahetuḥ saṃprayuktakahetuḥ sarvatragahetuḥ vipākaheturiti /
T07vakobhau:3060: saṃskṛtasya hi dharmasya svabhāvavrjyāḥ sarvadharmāḥ kāraṇaheturutpādayati
T07vakobhau:3062: nanu ca ye 'syājānata udapatsyantāsravā jānato 'sya te notpadyanta iti
T07vakobhau:3063: jñānameṣāṃ vighnamuatpattau karoti sūryaprabhāvajjyotiṣāṃ darśanasyeti kathaṃ svabhāvavarjyāḥ sarvadharmāḥ saṃskṛtasya kāraṇaheturbhavanti /
T07vakobhau:3066: tadyathā anupadrotāraṃ bhojakamadhikṛtya grāmīṇā bhavanti vaktāraḥ svāminā smaḥ sukhitā iti
T07vakobhau:3067: yasya punarnāstyeva śaktirvighnayituṃ tasya kathaṃ hetubhāvastadyathā nirvāṇasyānutpattidharmakāṇāṃ ca sarvotpattau nārakādīnāṃ carūpyasattva skandhotpattau /
T07vakobhau:3068: asanto 'pi hyete tathaiva vidhnaṃ karttumasamarthaḥ syuḥ /
T07vakobhau:3069: asamarthe 'pi hi bhojake tathā vaktāro bhavantīti sa evātra dṛṣṭāntaḥ sāmānyenaiva nirdeśaḥ
T07vakobhau:3070: yastu pradhānaḥ kāraṇahetuḥ sa utpādane 'pi samartho yathā cakṣūrūpe
T07vakobhau:3072: yastvevaṃ codayati anāvaraṇabhāvena cetsarva dharmahetavo bhavanti kasmānā sarvasyotpādo yugapadbhavati prāṇātipātena ca ghātakavat sarve tadbhājo bhavantīti /
T07vakobhau:3074: yasmādanāvaraṇabhāvena sarvadharmāḥ hetuḥ pratijñāyante na kārakabhāveneti
T07vakobhau:3078: tena hyālambanāt manovijñānamutpadyate kuśalākuśālaṃ yataḥ krameṇa paścāccakṣurvijñānamiti kāraṇaparaparayā tasyāpi pratyayībhāvādasti sāmarthyam /
T07vakobhau:3083: mithaḥ pāraṃparyeṇa ye dharmāḥ parasparaphalāste parasparaḥ sahabhūheturyathā /
T07vakobhau:3089: evaṃ ca kṛtvā sarvameva saṃskṛtaṃ sahabhūheturyathāyogam /
T07vakobhau:3090: vināpi cānyonyaphalatvena dharmo 'nulakṣaṇānāṃ sahabhūheturna tāni tasyetyupasaṃkhyātavyam
T07vakobhau:3092: caittā dvau saṃvarau teṣāṃ cetaso lakṣaṇāni ca /
T07vakobhau:3114: satkāyadṛṣṭestatsaṃprayuktānāṃ ca dharmāṇāṃ jātiṃ jarāṃ sthitimanityatāṃ ca sthāpayitvā yattadanyat kliṣṭaṃ duḥkhasatyaṃ satkāyadṛṣṭihetukaṃ na satkāyadṛṣṭerhetuḥ /
T07vakobhau:3116: ye tarhi "tatsaṃprayuktānāṃ ca dharmāṇā mi" tyetanna pathanti tairapyetat
T07vakobhau:3122: anuparivarttyanulakṣanāni caivaṃ cittasya tāni cānyonyaṃ sapratighaṃ copādāyarūpamanyonyamapratighaṃ ca kiñcit sarvaṃ ca bhūtaiḥ prāptayaśca sahajāḥ prāptimataḥ sahabhuvo na sahabhūheturanekaphalavipāka niṣyandatvāt
T07vakobhau:3125: kiṃ tu prasiddhahetuphalabhāvānāṃ bījādīnāmeṣa nyāyo na dṛṣṭa iti vaktavyametat kathaṃ sahotpannānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ hetuphalabhāva iti /
T07vakobhau:3127: saṃpradhāryaṃ tāvadetatkiṃ prabhāyāḥ pradīpo heturāhosvit pūrvotpannaiva sāmagrī saprabhasya pradīpasya sacchāyasyāṅdurasyotpattau heturiti /
T07vakobhau:3130: yasya bhāvābhāvayoḥ yasya bhāvābhāvau niyamataḥ sa heturitaro hetumāniti /
T07vakobhau:3131: sahabhuvām ca dharmāṇāmekasya bhāve sarveṣāṃ bhāva ekasyābhāve sarveṣāmabhāva iti yukto hetuphalabhāvaḥ
T07vakobhau:3133: atha evāha evaṃ tarhyavinirbhāviṇo 'pyupādāyarūpasyānyonyameṣa prasaṅgaḥ bhūtaiśca sārdhaṃ cittānulakṣaṇādīnāṃ ce cittādibhiḥ /
T07vakobhau:3136: kimeṣāṃ sahotpannabalenāvasthānamāhosvit pūrvasāmagrīvaśāttathaivotpāda iti annyadapi ca tatra kiñcidbhavati sūtrakaṃ śaṅkuko vā pṛthivī vā dhārikā /
T07vakobhau:3137: eṣāmapi nāmānye 'pi sabhāgahetutvādayo bhavantīti siddhaḥ sahabhūhetuḥ /
T07vakobhau:3140: sadṛśā dharmāḥ sadṛśānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ sabhāgahetustadyathā kuśalāḥ pañca skandhāḥ kuśalānāmanyoyyaṃ kliṣṭāḥ kliṣṭānāmavyākṛtā avyākṛtānāṃ rūpamavyākṛtaṃ pañcānām /
T07vakobhau:3146: bāhyeṣvapi yavo yavasya śāliḥ śāleriti vistareṇa yojyam /
T07vakobhau:3147: ye tu rūpaṃ rūpasya necchanti sabhāgahetuṃ teṣāmeṣa granthaḥ icchāvighātāyasaṃpravarttate "atītāni mahābhūtānyanāgatānāṃ mahābhūtānāṃ heturadhipati" riti /
T07vakobhau:3152: svo nikāyo bhūścaiṣāṃ ta ime svanikāyabhuvaḥ /
T07vakobhau:3168: pūrvotpannāni kuśalamūlānipaścādutpannānāṃ kuśalamūlānāṃ tatsaṃprayuktānāṃ ca dharmāṇāṃ svadhātau sabhāgahetunā hetuḥ /
T07vakobhau:3171: idapi śāstraṃ "yo dharmo yasya dharmasya hetuḥ kadācitsa dharmastasya na hetuḥ /
T07vakobhau:3174: yastu manyate anāgato 'pi sa dharma utpadyamānāvasthāyāṃ sabhāgahetutve niyatībhūto bhavatyatastāṃ caramāvasthāmabhisaṃdhāyoktaṃ "na kadācinna
T07vakobhau:3176: tasyā yamaparihāro yasmātsa dharma utpadyamānāvasthāyāḥ pūrvaṃ sabhāgaheturabhūtvā paścāt bhavati /
T07vakobhau:3177: ihapi ca praśne yo dharmo yasya dharmasya samanantaraḥ kadācit sa dharmastasya dharmasya na samanantara iti śakyamanayā kalpanayā vaktuṃ syānna kadāciditi /
T07vakobhau:3179: yadi sa dharmo notpanno bhavatīti dvimukhasaṃdarśanārthaṃ yathā tatra tathehāpi karttavyam
T07vakobhau:3181: evaṃ sati ko guṇo labhyata ityakauśala mevātra śāstrakārasyaiva saṃbhāvyeta /
T07vakobhau:3183: yattarhīdamuktam "anāgatānāṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiṃ tatsaṃprayuktaṃ ca duḥkhasatyaṃ sthāpayitvā yattadanyat kliṣṭaṃ duḥkhasatyaṃ tatsatkāyadṛṣṭihetukaṃ na satkāyadṛṣṭerheturyattu sthāpitaṃ tatsatkāyadṛṣṭihetukaṃ satkāyadṛṣṭeśca heturi"ti /
T07vakobhau:3184: anāgatasatkāyadṛṣṭisaṃprayuktaṃ duḥkhasatyaṃ sthāpayitvetyevametat karttavyamarthato 'pi caivaṃ boddhavyamiti /
T07vakobhau:3185: idaṃ tarhi prajñaptibhāṣyaṃ kathaṃ nīyate "sarvadharmāścatuṣke niyatā hetauphale āśraye ālamvane niyatā" iti /
T07vakobhau:3189: nanu caivaṃ sati sabhāga heturabhūtvā heturbhavatīti prāptam /
T07vakobhau:3192: kiṃ punaḥ syādyadi vipākahetuvadanāgato 'pi sabhāgahetuḥ syāt /
T07vakobhau:3203: vīpākaphalasya pūrvaṃ saha cāyogādanāgate cādhvati pūrvapaścimatā 'bhāvāt
T07vakobhau:3210: yaduktaṃ svabhūmikaḥ sabhāgaheturbhavatīti kimeṣa niyamaḥ sarvasya sāsravasyaiṣa niyamaḥ /
T07vakobhau:3213: anāgamye dhyānāntarikāyāṃ caturṣuraneṣu triṣu cārūpyeṣu mārgasatyamanyo
T07vakobhau:3216: āgantuko hyasau tāsu bhūmiṣu na taddhātupatitastadbhami kābhistṛṣṇābhirasvīkṛtatvāt /
T07vakobhau:3221: tadyathā duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntistasyā evānāgatāyāḥ sabhāgahetuviśiṣṭasyaca yāvadanutpādajñānasya
T07vakobhau:3228: kathaṃ punarūrdhvaṃbhūmikasyādhobhūmmikomārgaḥ samo vā bhavati viśiṣṭo vā
T07vakobhau:3232: kiṃ punaḥ mārga eva samaviśiṣṭayoḥ sabhāgaheturbhavati /
T07vakobhau:3239: ete hi prāyogikāḥ śrutacintābhāvanāmayā guṇāḥ samaviśiṣṭayoreva heturnanyūnānām /
T07vakobhau:3245: teṣāmapi navaprakārabhedāt mṛdumṛdavaḥ sarveṣāṃ mṛdumadhyā aṣṭānāmityeṣānītiḥ /
T07vakobhau:3246: upapattipratilambhikāstu kuśalā dharmāḥ sarve navaprakārāḥ paraspara sabhāgahetuḥ /
T07vakobhau:3250: te yathākramaṃ catustrīdvekeṣāṃ sabhāgahetuḥ nirmāṇacittamapoi kāmāvacara caturdhyanaphalam
T07vakobhau:3253: tadyathā śāliryavādīnāṃ mā bhūnniṣphalaḥ prayatna iti /
T07vakobhau:3254: ata eva cāhuḥ syādutpanno 'nāsravo 'nutpannasyāsravasya na hetuḥ syāttadyathā duḥkhe dharmajñānamutpanāmanutpannānāṃ
T07vakobhau:3256: sarvaṃ ca viśiṣṭaṃ nyūnasya na hetuḥ /
T07vakobhau:3258: syādanāgatāḥ duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntayo duḥkhe dharmajñānasyayasmānna pūrvataraṃ phalamastyanāgato vā sabhāgahetuḥ /
T07vakobhau:3259: syāt pūrvotpanno 'nāsravo dharmaḥ paścādutpannasyānāsravasya na hetuḥ /
T07vakobhau:3261: tadyathottaraphalaparihīṇasyāvara phalasaṃmukhībhāve duḥkhe dharmajñānaprāptiścottarottara kṣaṇa sahotpannānāṃ duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntiprāptīnāṃ nyūnatvāditi /
T07vakobhau:3268: evaṃ tarhi sati bhinnasantānajānāmapi prasaṅgo navacandrādīni paśyatām /
T07vakobhau:3271: samāna āśrayo yeṣāṃ te cittacaittāḥ anyonyaṃ saṃprayuktakahetuḥ /
T07vakobhau:3272: samāna ityabhinnastatadyathā ya eva cakṣurindriyakṣaṇaścakṣurvijñānasyāśrayaḥ sa eva tatsaṃprayuktānāṃ vedanādīnāmeva yāvanmanaḥ /
T07vakobhau:3280: ekenāpi hi vinā sarveṇa na saṃprayujyanta ityayameṣāṃ hetubhāvaḥ /
T07vakobhau:3284: svabhūmikāḥ pūrvotpannāḥ sarvatragā dharmāḥ paścimānāṃ kliṣṭānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ sarvatragahetuḥ
T07vakobhau:3287: nikāyāntarīyāṇāmapi hetutvādeṣāṃ hi prabhāveṇānyanaikāyikā api kleśā upajāyante /
T07vakobhau:3289: sarva eva kliṣṭā dharmā darśanaprahātavyahetukā iti kāśmīrāḥ /
T07vakobhau:3291: kliṣṭā dharmāḥ yaśca darśanaprahātavyānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ vipāka iti /
T07vakobhau:3294: duḥkhasatyaṃ syāt satkāyadṛṣṭihetukaṃ na satkāyadṛṣṭerheturiti vistaro yāvanna satkāyadṛṣṭeḥ teṣāṃ ca dharmāṇāṃ jātiṃ jarāṃ sthitimanityatāṃ ca sthāpayitvā yattadanyat kliṣṭam duḥkhasatya"miti idaṃ tarhi prajñaptibhāṣyaṃ kathaṃ nīyate "syāddharmo 'kuśalo
T07vakobhau:3296: syādāryapudgalaḥ kāmavairāgyāt parihīyamāṇo yāṃ tatprathamataḥ klilṣṭāñcetanāṃ saṃmukhīkarotī"ti
T07vakobhau:3313: kathamidaṃ vijñātavyaṃ vipākasya heturvipākaheturāhosvidvipāka eva heturvipākahetuḥ /
T07vakobhau:3315: yadi vipākasya heturvipākahetuḥ "vīpākajaṃ cakṣuri"ti etanna prāpnoti /
T07vakobhau:3316: atha vipāka eva heturvipākahetuḥ "karmaṇo vipāka" ityetanna prāpnoti /
T07vakobhau:3332: dviskandhaka ekaphalaḥ prathame dhyāne vijñaptiḥ saha jātyādibhiḥ /
T07vakobhau:3337: asti karma yasyaikameva dharmāyatanaṃ vīpāko vipacyate jīvitendriyam /
T07vakobhau:3338: yasya mana āyatanaṃ tasya dve manodharmāyatane /
T07vakobhau:3339: evaṃ yasya spraṣṭavyāyatanaṃ yasya kāyāyatanaṃ tasya trīṇi kāyaspraṣṭavyadharmāyatanāni /
T07vakobhau:3343: asti tat karma yasya pañca ṣaṭ saptāṣṭau nava daśaikādaśāyatanāni vipāko vipacyate /
T07vakobhau:3349: na tu dvaiyadhvikasyāpyekādhviko mā bhūdatinyūnaṃ hetoḥ phalamiti /
T07vakobhau:3351: na ca karmaṇā saha vipāko vipacyate nāpyanantaraṃ samanantarapratyayākṛṣṭatvāt samanantarakṣaṇasya
T07vakobhau:3354: ukta eṣāmarthato 'dhvaniyamaḥ natu sūtrita ityataḥ sūtryate /
T07vakobhau:3368: evaṃ tarhi phalatvādasaṃskṛtasya hetunā bhavitavyaṃ yasya tat phalaṃ hetutvācca phalena bhavitavyaṃ yasya taddhetuḥ /
T07vakobhau:3374: yāsmāt sa utpādāvighnabhāvena vyavasthāpito na cāsaṃskṛtamutpattimat /
T07vakobhau:3375: kasyedānīṃ tatphalaṃ kathaṃ vā mārgasya phalam /
T07vakobhau:3393: anityān khalu hetupratyayān pratītyotpannaṃ rūpaṃ kuto nityam
T07vakobhau:3400: ityuktaṃ natūktaṃ ye vijñānasya pratyayāḥ tepyanityā iti /
T07vakobhau:3401: nanu ca hetavo 'pi ya utpādāya ta evānityā iti vacanādasaṃskṛtasyānāvaraṇabhāvamātreṇa kāraṇahetutvāpratiṣedhaḥ /
T07vakobhau:3402: ukta ālambanapratyayaḥ sūtre na tvanāvaraṇaheturiti na sūtre sidhyatyasaṃskṛtasya hetubhāvaḥ
T07vakobhau:3404: sūtrāṇi ca bahūnyantarhitānīti kathametannirdhāryate nokta iti /
T07vakobhau:3407: tadānīṃ "pratisaṃkhyānirodhaḥ katamo yo visaṃyoga" ityuktamidānīṃ isaṃyogaḥkathamaḥ /
T07vakobhau:3412: etāvaktu śakyate vaktum nityaṃ kuśalaṃ cāsti dravyāntaram /
T07vakobhau:3424: yastu punaḥ duḥkhasyānutpādaḥ saḥ utpādakāraṇānuśayavaikalyādeveti na tasminprajñāyāḥ sāmarthyamastyato 'sāvapratisaṃkhyānirodha iti /
T07vakobhau:3425: so 'pi tu nāntareṇa pratisaṃkhyāṃ sidhyatīti pratisamkhyānirodha evāsau /
T07vakobhau:3426: ya evotpannasya paścādabhāvaḥ sa eva svarasa nirodhādapratisaṃkhyānirodha ityapare /
T07vakobhau:3430: na vai sa pratisaṃkhyāpūrvako nahi poūrvaṃ pratisaṃkhyā paścādanutpannānāmanutpādaḥ /
T07vakobhau:3433: vinā tu pratisaṃkhyayā ye dharmā utpatsyante tadutpannāyāṃ pratisaṃkhyāyāṃ punarnopapadyanta iti /
T07vakobhau:3435: yadi narhi anutpāda eva nirvāṇamidaṃ sūtrapadaṃ kathaṃ nīyate "pañcemānīndriyāṇi āsevitāni bhāvitāni bahulīkṛtānyatītānāgatapratyūtpannasya duḥkhasya prahāṇāya saṃvarttanta"
T07vakobhau:3439: kiṃ tu tadālambanakleśaprahāṇāt duḥkhasya prahāṇamuktaṃ bhagavatā "yo rūpe cchandarāgastaṃ prajahīta /
T07vakobhau:3440: cchandarāge prahīṇe evaṃ vastadrūpaṃ prahīṇaṃ bhaviṣyati pārijñātaṃ vistareṇa yāvad vijñānami"ti
T07vakobhau:3444: athavā 'yamabhiprāyo bhavedatītaḥ kleśaḥ paurvajanmikaḥ pratyutpannaḥ kleśa aihajanmiko yathā tṛṣṇā vicariteṣvaṣṭādaśa
T07vakobhau:3446: tenā ca kleśadvayenāsyāṃ santatau bījabhāva āhito 'nāgatasyotpattaye /
T07vakobhau:3449: anāgatasya punarduḥkhasya kleśasya vā bījābhāvāt atyantamanutpādaḥ prahāṇam /
T07vakobhau:3451: nahi niruddhe nirodhābhimukhe ca yatnaḥ sārthako bhavatīti /
T07vakobhau:3452: yadyasaṃskṛṭaṃ nāstyeva, yaduktaṃ bhagavatā "ye keciddharmāḥ saṃskṛtā vā
T07vakobhau:3453: 'saṃskṛtā vā virāgasteṣāmagra ākhyāyate" iti kathamasatāmasannagro bhavitumarhati /
T07vakobhau:3456: tadyathā asti śabdasya prāgabhāvo 'sti paścādabhāva ityucyate /
T07vakobhau:3459: abhāvo 'pi ca kaścit praśasyatamo bhavati yaḥ sakalasyopadravasyātyantamabhāva ityanyeṣāṃ so 'gra iti praśaṃsāṃ labdhumarhati /
T07vakobhau:3465: ubhayamapi caitadaviparītaṃ dṛṣṭamāryairyaduta duḥkhaṃ ca duḥkhameveti duḥkhābhāvaścābhāva eveti ko 'syāryasatyatve virodhaḥ kathamabhāvaśca nāma
T07vakobhau:3467: ustaṃ yathāryasatyaṃ dvitīyasyānantaraṃ dṛṣṭamuddṛṣṭaṃ ceti tṛtīyaṃ bhavati /
T07vakobhau:3473: devatā enaṃ pālayiṣyanti pālanīyaṃ cet maṃsyate /
T07vakobhau:3476: nahi tasya rūpavedanādivat svabhāva upalabhyate nacāpi cakṣurādivatkarma /
T07vakobhau:3477: amuṣya ca vastuno 'yaṃ nirogha iti ṣaṣṭhīvyavasthā kathaṃ prakalpyate /
T07vakobhau:3478: nahi tasya tena sārdhaṃ kaścitsaṃbandho hetuphalādibhāvāsaṃbhavāt /
T07vakobhau:3480: bhāvāntaratve 'pi yasya kleśasya prāptivicchedāydyo nirodhaḥ prāpyate sa
T07vakobhau:3488: "yat svalpasya duḥkhasyāśeṣaprahāṇaṃ pratiniḥsargo vyantībhāvaḥ kṣayo virāgo nirodho vyupakṣamo 'staṅgamaḥ anyasya ca duḥkhasyāprati
T07vakobhau:3490: etatkāntametatpraṇītaṃ yaduta srvopādhipraniniḥ sargastṛṣṇākṣayo virāgo nirodho nirvāṇa" miti
T07vakobhau:3494: nāsminprādurbhavatīti yadi satītyabhisaṃbadhyate nityamevāprādurbhāvaprasaṅgo nirvāṇasya nityatvāt
T07vakobhau:3495: atha prāpta ityabhisaṃbadhyate yata eva tatprāptiḥ parikalpyate tasminneva saṃmukhībhūte prāpte vā duḥkhasyeṣyatāmaprādurbhāvaḥ /
T07vakobhau:3496: ayaṃ ca dṛṣṭānta evaṃ sūpanīto bhavati /
T07vakobhau:3498: yathā pradyotasya nirvāṇamabhāva evaṃ bhagavato 'pi cetaso vimokṣa iti /
T07vakobhau:3505: svabhāvavastu yathoktaṃ "yadvastu pratilabdhaṃ samanvāgataḥ sa tena
T07vakobhau:3510: yathoktaṃ "yasmin vastuni anunayaḥ saṃyojanena saṃprayuktaḥ pratighasaṃyojanenāpi tasminni"ti
T07vakobhau:3516: tasya tu hetuphale na vidyete iti /
T07vakobhau:3518: athaiṣāṃ phalānāṃ katamat phalaṃ kasya hetoḥ /
T07vakobhau:3542: yasmātsahotpannaṃ vā samanantarotpannaṃ vā puruṣakāraphalaṃ bhavati /
T07vakobhau:3546: kiṃ punaridaṃ vipākaphalaṃ nāma kiṃ yāvadadhipatiphalam /
T07vakobhau:3554: tasmādya utarakālaṃ bhavati na saha nāntaraṃ sa vipākaḥ /
T07vakobhau:3566: yadi sarvatragahetorapi samānaṃ phalaṃ kasmānna sabhāgahetoreveṣyate /
T07vakobhau:3567: yasmāt bhūmitaḥ kliṣṭatayā cāsya sādṛśyaṃ natu prakārataḥ /
T07vakobhau:3568: yasya tu prakārato 'pi sādṛśyaṃ so 'bhyupagamyata eva sabhāgahetuḥ /
T07vakobhau:3569: atha eva yo yasya sabhāgahetuḥ sarvatragaheturapi sa tasyeti catuṣkoṭikaḥ kriyate /
T07vakobhau:3579: tadyathā adharabhūmikasya prayogacittasyoparibhūmikaḥ samādhiḥ sāsravasyānāsravo dhyānacittasya nirmāṇacittamityevamādi /
T07vakobhau:3588: athaiṣāṃ hetūnāṃ katammo hetuḥ kasminkāle phalaṃ pratigṛhṇāti dadāti vā /
T07vakobhau:3592: sa tu nāvaśyaṃ saphala iti nocyate /
T07vakobhau:3601: nivṛtte tu phale tau cābhyatītau bhavataḥ /
T07vakobhau:3602: phalaṃ cāpi dattaṃ na punastadeva dattaḥ /
T07vakobhau:3603: asti kuśalaḥ sabhāgahetuḥ phalaṃ pratigṛhṇāti na dadātīti catuṣkoṭikaḥ /
T07vakobhau:3604: prathamā koṭiḥ kuśalamūlāni samucchindan yāḥ prāptīḥ sarvapaścādvijahāti /
T07vakobhau:3605: dvitīyā kuśalamūlāni pratisaṃdadhāno yāḥ sarvaprathamaṃ pratilabhate /
T07vakobhau:3607: syāttā eva pratisaṃdadhānasya tṛtīyā asamucchinnakuśalamūlasya śeṣāsvavasthāsu /
T07vakobhau:3610: kāmavairāgyamanuprāpnuvan yāḥ prāptīḥ sarvapaścādvijahāti dvitīyā kāmavairāgyāt parihīyamāṇo yāḥ sarvaprathamaṃ pratilabhate /
T07vakobhau:3620: kuśalaḥ sabhāgahetuḥ phalaṃ pratigṛhlāti na dadātīti /
T07vakobhau:3622: prathamā koṭiḥ kuśalacittānantaraṃ kliṣṭamavyākṛtaṃ vā cittaṃ saṃmukhīkarotīti /
T07vakobhau:3631: yasmānna saha vā samanantaro vā 'sti vipākaḥ /
T07vakobhau:3643: tatra katame dharmāḥ katibhiḥ hetubhirutpadyanta ityāha samāsata ime caturvidhā dharmāstadyathā kliṣṭā dharmā vipākajāḥ prathamānāsravāstebhyaśca śeṣāḥ /
T07vakobhau:3648: vipākaṃ sarvagaṃ hitvā tau sabhāgaṃ ca śeṣajāḥ // VAkK_2.60 //
T07vakobhau:3649: kliṣṭā dharmā vipākahetuṃ hitvā śeṣebhyaḥ pañcabhyo jāyante /
T07vakobhau:3650: vipākajā sarvatragahetuṃ hetvā śeṣebhyaḥ pañcabhya eva /
T07vakobhau:3651: śeṣā dharmāstau vipākasarvatragahetū hitvā śeṣebhyaścaturbhryo jāyante /
T07vakobhau:3652: prathamānāsravāstau ca vipākasarvatragahetū sabhāgahetuṃ ca hitvā śeṣebhyaḥ tribhyo jāyante
T07vakobhau:3655: atha ye cittaviprayuktā rūpiṇaśca dharmāste kathamityāha /
T07vakobhau:3657: prayuktakahetunaikena varjitāḥ anye 'pi kliṣṭādayo dharmāstathaivotpadyante yathā cittacaīttāḥ
T07vakobhau:3676: ata eva rūpaṃ na samanantarapratyayo viṣamotpatteḥ /
T07vakobhau:3677: tathāhi kāmāvacarasya rūpasyānantaraṃ kadācit kāmāvacaraṃ rūpāvacaraṃ cāvijñaptirūpamutpadyate kadācitkāmāvacaraṃ cānāsravaṃ ceti vyākulo rūpasaṃmukhībhāvaḥ /
T07vakobhau:3678: avyākulastu samanantarapratyayaḥ aniruddha evaikasminnaupa cayikarūpasantāne dvitīyotpatteriti bhadantavasumitraḥ /
T07vakobhau:3683: tadyathā vaṭanikāyāḥ krameṇa yāvadanekaśākhāvaroho nyagrodha iti /
T07vakobhau:3690: sakala eva kalāpaḥ sakalasya kalāpāntarasya samanantarapratyayo natvalpakādvedanādidravyāt prabhūtaṃ vedanādi dravyamutpadyata ityetāvadevātrottam /
T07vakobhau:3692: tadyathā cittaṃ cittasyaiva vedanā vedanāyā eve"ti vistaraḥ /
T07vakobhau:3693: yadā tvakliṣṭāntaraṃ kliṣṭamutpadyate tasya kleśasya pūrvaniruddhaḥ kleśaḥ samanantarapratyayastadyathā nirodhasamāpatticittaṃ vyutthānacittasyeti /
T07vakobhau:3699: kathaṃ tarhi bhagavān jānāti amuṣyānāgatattyānantaramidamanāgataṃ bhāvīti
T07vakobhau:3701: atītaṃ kilādhvānaṃ paśyati bhagavānevañjātīyakātkarmaṇaḥ evañjātīyako vīpākaḥ utpanno dharmādvā dharmaḥ /
T07vakobhau:3703: tasmādato 'pyevañjātīyako vipāka utpatsyate dharmādvā dharma iti jānāti /
T07vakobhau:3705: yasmādatītasāṃpratānumānena bhagavān vikīrṇānyanāgatāni dravyāṇi pratyakṣamīkṣitvā jānātyanena pudgalenaivaṃvidhaṃ karma kurvatedamanāgataṃ phalaṃ parigṛhītamiti /
T07vakobhau:3706: evaṃ tarhi bhagavān pūrvāntamadṛṣṭvā 'parāntaṃ na jānīyāt /
T07vakobhau:3709: yaṃ vyavalokya bhagavānanāgataṃ jānātyasaṃmukhīkṛtvāpi dhyānamabhijñāṃ ceti /
T07vakobhau:3710: naimiktiko hi nāma bhagavān syādevaṃ sati na punaḥ sākṣātkārī /
T07vakobhau:3713: atha asatyanāgatasya kramaniyamāvasthāne kasmādagradharmānantaraṃ duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntirevotpadyate nānyo dharmaḥ /
T07vakobhau:3714: evaṃ yāvadvarjo pamānantaraṃ kṣayajñānamevotpadyate nānyo dharma iti /
T07vakobhau:3719: nanu caivaṃ samanantaraniruddhaṃ cittaṃ mano bhavatītyanantara vijñānābhāvāt mano 'pi caramaṃ cittaṃ na prāpnoti /
T07vakobhau:3722: kāritraprabhāvitastu samanantarapratyayastena yo dharmaḥ phalaṃ kpratigṛhītaḥ sa sarvairapi dharmaīḥ sarvaprāṇibhirvā na śakyaṃ pratibnddhuṃ yathā notpadyate /
T07vakobhau:3725: prathamā koṭiracittakāyāḥ samāpattervyutthāna cittaṃ dvitīyādayaśca samāpattikṣaṇāḥ /
T07vakobhau:3726: dvitīyā koṭiḥ prathamasya samāpattikṣaṇasya sacittakāyāścāvasthāyā jātyādayaḥ /
T07vakobhau:3727: tṛtīyā koṭiḥ prathamaḥ samāpattikṣaṇaḥ sacittikā cāvasthā /
T07vakobhau:3728: caturthī koṭi dvīrtīyādīnāṃ samāpattikṣaṇānāṃ jātyādayo vyutthānacittasya ca /
T07vakobhau:3731: ye tṛtīyāvaturthyau te prathamādvitīye ye prathamādvitīye te tṛtīyācaturthyau karttavye /
T07vakobhau:3742: yo dharmo yasya dharmasyālambanaṃ na kadācitsa dharmastaddharmasya
T07vakobhau:3746: ta ete cittacaitā dharmā āyatanadravyalakṣaṇaniyamenālambane yathāsvaṃ niyatāḥ /
T07vakobhau:3753: ya eva kāraṇahetuḥ sa evā dhipatipratyayaḥ /
T07vakobhau:3756: na jātu sahabhuvo dharmā ālambanaṃ bhavanti /
T07vakobhau:3763: athaite pratyayāḥ kāritraṃ kurvantaḥ kimavasthe dharme kurvanti /
T07vakobhau:3785: tatra hetupratyaya eṣāṃ sarve pañca hetavaḥ /
T07vakobhau:3787: ālambanapratyayo yathāyogaṃ pañca viṣayāḥ sarve dharmāśca /
T07vakobhau:3793: sahabhūhetuśca jātyādayaḥ sabhāgahetuśca pūrvotpannā samānabhūmikāḥ kuśalā dharmāḥ /
T07vakobhau:3799: anye tu viprayuktā rūpiṇaśca dharmā hetvadhipatipratyayābhyāṃ jāyante yathāvihitameva /
T07vakobhau:3800: āha tu "pratyayebhyo bhāvā upajāyante na punaḥ sarvasyaiva jagataḥ
T07vakobhau:3804: nanu ca atha evāsya vādasya vyudāsaḥ prāpnotyekaṃ kāraṇamīśvarādikaṃ sarvasyeti /
T07vakobhau:3807: yadi hyekameva kāraṇamīśvaraḥ syādanyadvā yugapatsarveṇa jagatā bhavitavyaṃsyāt /
T07vakobhau:3809: sa tarhi cchandavaśā dīśvarasya syādayamidānīmutpadyatāmayaṃ nirudhyatāmayaṃ paścāditi /
T07vakobhau:3812: kāraṇāntarabhedāpekṣaṇe vā neśvara eva kāraṇaṃ syāt /
T07vakobhau:3813: teṣāmapi ca kramotpattau kāraṇāntarabhedāpekṣaṇādanavasthāprasaṅga syādityanantarabhedāyāḥ kāraṇaparaṃparāyā anāditvābhyupagamādayamīśvarakāraṇādhimuktaḥ śākyayūrvīyameva nyāyaṃ nātivṛttaḥ syāt /
T07vakobhau:3819: yadi prītistāṃ tarhi nāntareṇopāye śaktaḥ kartumiti na tasyāmīśvaraḥ syāttathaiva cānyasmin
T07vakobhau:3820: yadi ceśvaro narakādiṣu prajāṃ bahubhiścetibhirūpasṛṣṭāṃ sṛṣṭvā tena prīyate namo 'stu tasmai tādṛśāyeśvrāya /
T07vakobhau:3824: ekaṃ khalvapi jagataḥ kāraṇaṃ parigṛhṇatā 'nyeṣāmarthānāṃ pratyakṣaḥ puruṣakāro nihgṛhṇtaḥ syāt /
T07vakobhau:3825: sahāpi ca kāraṇaiḥ kāraka mīśvaraṃ kalpayatā kevalo bhaktivādaḥ syat /
T07vakobhau:3832: svānyevaiṣāṃ karmāṇi tasyāṃ tasyāṃ jātau janayanti /
T07vakobhau:3833: akṛtabuddhayastu varākāḥ svaṃ svaṃ vipākaphalaṃ cānubhavanta īśvaramaparaṃ mithyā parikalpayanti
T07vakobhau:3834: gatametadyattu khalu taduktaṃ "dvābhyāmanye tu jāyanta" iti /
T07vakobhau:3857: bhūtānāṃ tu tadbhūtikaṃ rūpaṃ vipākahetureva yasya kāyavākkarmaṇo bhūtāni vipākāḥ /
T07vakobhau:3858: abhedena cittacaittāḥ samanantarapratyaya uktā niyamastu noktaḥ kasya cittasyānantaraṃ kasyotpaktiriti
T07vakobhau:3876: kāmadhātau yatkuśalaṃ cittaṃ tasmādanantaraṃ nava cittānyutpadyante /
T07vakobhau:3886: tatra punaḥ kāmāvacaraṃ kuśalaṃ cittamaṣṭābhyaḥ samanantaramutpadyate /
T07vakobhau:3892: śaikṣāśaikṣe hitvā kāmadhātau hi pratisandhimukhataḥ sarvebhyo rūpārūpyacittebhyaḥ samanantaramakuśalaṃ cittamutpadyate /
T07vakobhau:3910: rūpe dhātau yatkukśalaṃ cittaṃ tasmādanantaramekādaśa cittānyutpadyante /
T07vakobhau:3913: rūpāvacaraṃ tu kuśalaṃ cittaṃ navabhyaḥ samanantaramutpadyate /
T07vakobhau:3937: ārūpyāvacaraṃ kukśalaṃ svebhyastribhyo rūpāvacarāt kukśalācchaikṣāśaikṣābhyāṃ ca /
T07vakobhau:3939: ārūpyāvacarānnivṛtātsvabhūmikāni trīṇi rūpāvacaraṃ kuśalaṃ nivṛtaṃ ca kāmāvacaraṃ kliṣṭadvayam
T07vakobhau:3956: prāyogikopapattyāptaṃ śubhaṃ bhittvā triṣu dvidhā // VAkK_2.71 //
T07vakobhau:3957: triṣu dhātuṣu kuśalaṃ cittaṃ dvidhā bhidyate /
T07vakobhau:3980: svebhyaḥ kuśalakliṣṭebhyaḥ rūpāvacarābhyāṃ prāyogika kliṣṭābhyāṃ śaikṣāśaikṣābhyāṃ ca /
T07vakobhau:3984: svebhyaḥ saptabhyaḥ pūrvavat rūpāvacarābhyāṃ prāyogikakliṣṭābhyāṃ śaikṣāśaikṣābhyāṃ ca /
T07vakobhau:3992: svabhūmikāni ṣaḍanyatra prāyogikābhijñāphalābhyāṃ rūpārupyāvacāre ca kliṣṭe /
T07vakobhau:3993: te punaḥ saptacittānantaraṃ svebhya eva pūrvavat /
T07vakobhau:4003: kāmāvacare kuśale abhijñāphalaṃ ca svāni ṣaṭ ārupyāvacaraṃ ca prāyogikaṃśaikṣamaśaikṣaṃ ca
T07vakobhau:4008: kāmāvacare kliṣṭe svāni pañcānyatrābhijñāphalāt ārupyāvacaraṃ kliṣṭam/
T07vakobhau:4013: kāmāvacarebhya utpattipratilambhikairyāpathika vipākajebhyaḥ svebhyaḥ pañcabhyo 'nyatrābhijñāphalāt ārūpyāvacarebhyastribhyo 'nyatra prāyogikāt
T07vakobhau:4015: kāmāvacare kliṣṭe svāni catvāryanyatra prāyogikābhijñāphalābhyāmārūpyāvacaraṃ ca kliṣṭam /
T07vakobhau:4023: rūpāvacaraṃ prāyogikaṃ svāni catvāri śaikṣamaśaikṣaṃ ca /
T07vakobhau:4030: svāni catvāri rūpāvacare prāyogikakliṣṭe kāmāvacāre kliṣṭe /
T07vakobhau:4044: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ prāyogikacittānantaraṃ vīpākajaiyāpathikaśailpasthānikānicittānyutpadyante na punrebhyaḥ prāyogikam /
T07vakobhau:4064: trividhamanaskārānantaramāryamārgaṃ saṃmukhīkaroti tasmādapi trividhaṃ māskāram evaṃ sati yutamidaṃ bhavati "aśubhāsahagataṃ smṛtisaṃbodhyaṅga
T07vakobhau:4068: aśubhayā tu cittaṃ damayitvā sāmānyamanaskārānantaraṃ mārgaṃ saṃmukhīkaroti /
T07vakobhau:4072: syāttāvadanāgamyāditribhūmisaṃniḥśrayeṇa niyāmāvakrāntau tanmārgānantaraṃ kāmāvacaraṃ sāmānyamanaskāraṃ saṃmukhīkuryād /
T07vakobhau:4077: nahi prāptaphalasya tatprayogasaṃmukhībhāvo yukta iti anyo 'pyasya
T07vakobhau:4079: tadyathā "sarvasaṃkārā anityāḥ sarvadharmā anātmānaḥ śāntaṃ nirvāṇa"miti
T07vakobhau:4082: anāgamyaṃ niśrityārhattvaṃ prāpnuvataḥ tadbhūmikaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ vā vyutthānaṃ cittam /
T07vakobhau:4095: yāni dvādaśa cittāni uktānyeṣāṃ katamasmiṃścitte katīnāṃ lābhaḥ /
T07vakobhau:4096: kliṣṭe traidhātuke lābhaḥ ṣaṇṇāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ dvayoḥ
T07vakobhau:4097: kāmāvacare kliṣṭe citte saṃmukhībhūte ṣaṇṇāṃ cittānāṃ lābhaḥ /
T07vakobhau:4099: akuśalanivṛtāvyākṛtayoḥ rūpāvacarasya ca kliṣṭasya dhātupratyāgamanāt parihāṇitaśca /
T07vakobhau:4108: rūpāvacare kuśale trayāṇāṃ cittānāṃ lābhastasyaiva kuśalasya kāmarūpāvacarayoścānivṛtāvyākṛtayoḥ
T07vakobhau:4114: yatra citte lābhho na vyākhyātastatra tasyaiva lābho draṣṭavyo nānyasya /
T07vakobhau:4116: "kliṣṭe citte navānāṃ hi lābhaḥ ityucyate budhaiḥ /
T07vakobhau:4117: ṣaṇṇāṃ tu kuśale citte tasyaivā vyākṛṭe khalu //"
T07vakobhau:4118: tatra saptānāṃ kuśale citta iti vaktavyam /
T07vakobhau:4119: kāmāvacarasya kuśalasya samyagdṛṣṭyā kuśalamūlapratisaṃdhānāt kāmarūpāvacarayoranivṛtāvyākṛtayorvairāgyataḥ rūpārūpyāvacarayoḥ kuśalayostatastyasamādhilābhataḥ śaikṣāśaikṣasya ca niyāmāvakrāntyarhattvayoḥ śeṣamata evavyākhyānādavadhāryam /
T07vakobhau:4137: ṣaṭ ca devanikāyāstadyathā cāturmahārājakāyikā strāyastriṃśā yāmāstuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavaśavarttinaścetyeṣa kāmadhātuḥ saha bhājanalokena /
T07vakobhau:4142: saṃjīvaḥ kālasūtraḥ saṃghāto rauravo mahārauravastapanaḥ pratāpano
T07vakobhau:4146: ṣaṭ cānantaroktā devanikāyāḥ tiryaścaḥ pretāśca viṃśatiḥ sthānāni /
T07vakobhau:4147: kāmadhātuḥ paranirmitavaśavartibhyo yāvadavīciḥ sabhājanagrahaṇena tu yāvadvāyumaṇḍalam /
T07vakobhau:4158: caturthamanabhrakāḥ puṇyaprasavāḥ bṛhatphalā abṛhā atapāḥ sudṛśāḥ sudarśanā akaniṣṭhā ityetāni saptadaśa sthānāni rūpadhātuḥ /
T07vakobhau:4160: brahmapurohiteṣveva kila sthānamutkṛṣṭataraṃ mahābrahmaṇaḥ parigaṇa ivābhinirvṛttamekanāyakaṃ natu bhūmyantaramiti /
T07vakobhau:4163: atītānāgatāvijñaptyarūpiṇo hi dharmā ādeśasthā iti niyamaḥ /
T07vakobhau:4169: yatraiva hi deśe tatsmāpattilābhinaścyavante tatraivopapadyante iti /
T07vakobhau:4171: yathā rūpiṇāṃ sattvānāṃ rūpaṃ niśritya pravarttate cittasaṃtatirevamārūpyeṣu kiṃ niśritya pravrttate /
T07vakobhau:4172: nikāyaṃ jīvitaṃ cātra niśritā cittasantatiḥ // VAkK_3.3 //
T07vakobhau:4174: rupiṇāmapi tarhi sattvānāṃ kimartha na tadeva dvayaṃ niśritya pravarttate cittasantatiḥ /
T07vakobhau:4179: tata eva tarhi balavattvāt pravarttiṣyate kim punarniśrayeṇa /
T07vakobhau:4181: yathā rūpiṇāṃ sattvānāṃ rūpaṃ niśritya pravarttate nikāyasabhāgo jīvitendriyaṃ ca evamarūpiṇāṃ sattvānāṃ kiṃ niśritya pravarttate /
T07vakobhau:4183: rūpiṇāmapi tarhi kimarthaṃ na tadeva dvayamanyonyam /
T07vakobhau:4188: tasmānnāstyarūpiṇāṃ sattvānāṃ cittasantateranyonyam niśraya iti sautrāntikāḥ /
T07vakobhau:4189: api tu yasyāścittasantaterākṣepaheturavītatṛṣṇo rūpe tasyāḥ saha rūpeṇa saṃbhavādrūpaṃ niśritya pravṛttiryasyāstu heturvītatṛṣṇo rūpe tasyā anapekṣya rūpaṃ pravṛttiḥ /
T07vakobhau:4193: kāmapratisaṃyuktodhātuḥ kāmadhātuḥ rūpapratisaṃyukto dhātū rūpadhāturmadhyapadalopādvajrabālakavat maricapānakavacca /
T07vakobhau:4199: kāmānāṃ dhātuḥ kāmadhātuḥ kāmān yo dadhāti /
T07vakobhau:4203: "na te kāmā yāni citrāṇi loke saṃkalparāgaḥ puruṣasya kāmaḥ /
T07vakobhau:4204: tiṣṭhanti citrāṇi tathaiva loke aṭhātra dhīrā vinayanti kāmam" //
T07vakobhau:4208: "na te kāmā yāni citrāṇi loke saṃkalparāgaṃ vadasīha kāmam /
T07vakobhau:4211: te cetkāmā yāni citrāṇi loke saṃkalparāgo yadi te na kāmaḥ /
T07vakobhau:4212: śāstā 'pi te bhavitā kāmabhogī dṛṣṭvaiva rūpāṇi manoramāṇi"//
T07vakobhau:4213: kiṃ punarye kecana dharmāḥ kāmarūpārupyadhātuṣu samudācaranti sarve te kāmarūpārūpyapratisaṃyuktāḥ
T07vakobhau:4241: pratibuddhotpādaṃ cāsaṃkhyeyasattvaparinirvāṇe 'pi nāsti sattvānāṃ parikṣaya ākāśavat /
T07vakobhau:4243: tiryaksūtra uktaṃ tadyathā "īṣādhāre deve varṣati nāsti vīcirvā antarikā va antarīkṣādvāridhārāṇāṃ prapatantīnām /
T07vakobhau:4244: evaṃ pūrvasyāṃ diśi nāsti vīcirvā antarikā vā lokadhātūnāṃ saṃvarttamānānāṃ vivarttamānāṃ ca /
T07vakobhau:4245: yathā pūrvasyāṃ diśi evaṃ dakṣiṇāsyāṃ paścimāyāmuttarasyāmi"ti /
T07vakobhau:4253: yaśca prathamadhyānasaṃniśrayāddhi utpādayati sa yatra lokadhātau jāta utpādayati tatratyameva brahmalokamupāgacchati nānyam /
T07vakobhau:4260: kiṃ punargatinirmuktāḥ santi dhātavo yata dhātuṣvityucyante /
T07vakobhau:4268: prajñyaptipūktam "catasṛbhiryonibhiḥ pañca gatayaḥ saṃgṛhītā natu pañcabhirgatibhiścatasro yonayaḥ /
T07vakobhau:4272: catvāri mahābhūtānyupādāya yo rūpaprasādaścakṣuścakṣurindriyaṃ cakṣurāyatanaṃ cakṣurdhātunarikastairyagyonikaṃ paitṛviṣayiko devyo mānuṣyako bhāvanāmayo 'ntarābhavikaśce"ti /
T07vakobhau:4275: "sapta bhavā narakabhavastiryagbhavaḥ pretabhavo devabhavo manuṣyabhavaḥ karmabhavo 'ntarābhava" iti /
T07vakobhau:4276: atra hi pañca gatayaḥ sahetukāḥ sahāgamanāścoktāḥ /
T07vakobhau:4282: teṣāmāyuṣman kāyavāṅmanovaṅkānāṃ kāyavāṅmanodoṣakaṣāyāṇā narakeṣu rūpaṃ saṃjñā vedanā saṃskāro vijñānaṃ vipāko vipacyate /
T07vakobhau:4283: nirvṛtte vipāke nāraka iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati /
T07vakobhau:4287: pratisaṃdhicittāni hi gatīnāṃ pañcaprakārāṇi santyataḥ sapraveśagatigrahaṇādadoṣa eva /
T07vakobhau:4303: yadi hi gatiḥ syādantarābhava ityeva na syāt /
T07vakobhau:4304: yatarhi sthaviraśāriputreṇoktaṃ "nirvṛtte vipāke nāraka iti saṃkhyāṃ
T07vakobhau:4306: nirvṛtte vīpāka ityuktaḥ natu vipāka eveti /
T07vakobhau:4309: gatigāminaḥ pudgaladravyasya pratiṣedhaṃ karoti nānyatra skandhebhya upalabhyate nāraka iti na tu skandhāntarapratiṣedham /
T07vakobhau:4310: avyākṛtā eva tu gatayo varṇyante vaibhāṣikaiḥ /
T07vakobhau:4327: rūpiṇaḥ santi nānātvakāyā ekatvasaṃjñinastadyathā devā brahmakāyikā ye tatprathamābhinirvṛttāḥ
T07vakobhau:4329: te hi prathamābhinirvṛttāḥ sarva ekaikasaṃjñino bhavanti anena vayaṃ brahmaṇā sṛṣṭā iti /
T07vakobhau:4332: anyathaiva tu mahābrahmaṇa ārohapariṇāha ākṛtivigraho vāgbhāṣā cīvaradhāraṇaṃ ca anyathā tatparṣada iti nānātvakāyāḥ /
T07vakobhau:4333: yadidamuktaṃ sūtre "teṣāmevaṃ bhavati imaṃ vayaṃ sattvamadrākṣma dīrghāyuṣaṃ dīrghamadhvānaṃ tiṣṭhantaṃ yāvadaho vatānye 'pi sattvā ihopapadyeranmama sabhāmatāyāmi"ti /
T07vakobhau:4334: asya ca sattvasyaivañcetasaḥ praṇidhirvayaṃ cehopapannā iti /
T07vakobhau:4337: tato hi te pracyutāḥ kathamidānīmalabdhāyāṃ dvitīyadhyānasamāpattau tadbhūmikaṃ pūrvenivāsamasmārṣuḥ labdhāyāṃ vā kathaṃ mahābrahmālambanāṃ śīlavrataparāmarśadṛṣṭiṃ niviṣṭāḥ /
T07vakobhau:4340: kathaṃ teṣāmevaṃ bhavati sma "imaṃ vayaṃ sattvamadrākṣma dīrghāyuṣaṃ
T07vakobhau:4342: tasmāttatrasthā eva te tasya pūrvavṛttāntaṃ samanusmaranta eva dīrghamadhvānaṃ tiṣṭhantaṃ dṛṣṭavanto dṛṣṭvā ca paścādadrākṣmetyeṣāṃ babhūva /
T07vakobhau:4343: rupiṇaḥ santi sattvā ekatvakāyā nānātvasaṃjñinastadyathā devā ābhāsvarāḥ /
T07vakobhau:4346: anyathā hi parīttābhā apramāṇābhāśca kasyāṃ vijñānasthitau vyavasthāpyeran
T07vakobhau:4349: te kila maulyāṃ bhūmau saumanasyendriyaparikhinnāḥ sāmantakādupekṣendriyaṃ saṃmukhībhavanti
T07vakobhau:4350: sāmantake copekṣendriyaparikhinnāḥ punamaulyā bhumeḥ saumanasyendriyaṃ saṃmukhīkurvanti /
T07vakobhau:4351: yathā kāmaratiparikhinnā īśvarā dharmaratiṃ pratyanubhavanti dharmaratiparikhinnāḥ kāmaratimiti
T07vakobhau:4355: śāntaṃ hi tatsukhamaśāntaṃ ca saumanasyaṃ cetasa utplāvakatvāditi sautrāntikā vyācakṣate /
T07vakobhau:4357: tatra ye sattvā ābhāsvare devanikāye 'ciropapannā bhavanti naiva saṃvarttanīkuśalā na vivarttanīkuśalā asya lokasya te tāmarciṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhītāḥ santa udvijante saṃvegamāpadyante /
T07vakobhau:4359: tatra ye sattvā ābhāsvare devanikāye ciropapannāḥ saṃvarttanīkuśalā vivarttanīkuśalāścāsya lokasya te tān sattvān bhītānāśvāsayanti /
T07vakobhau:4360: mā bhaiṣṭa māṛṣāḥ mā bhaiṣṭa mārṣāḥ /
T07vakobhau:4362: ato 'rciṣa āgamavyapagamasaṃjñitvāt bhītā bhītasaṃjñitvācca te nānātvasaṃjñino na sukhāduḥkhāsukhasaṃjñitvāditi
T07vakobhau:4363: rūpiṇaḥ santi sattvā ekatvakāyā ekatvasaṃjñinastadyathā devāḥ śubhakṛtsnāḥ
T07vakobhau:4367: tatra prathame dhyāne kliṣṭayā saṃjñayā ekatvasaṃjñinaḥ /
T07vakobhau:4368: dvitīye kuśalayā saṃjñayā nānātvasaṃjñinastṛtīye vipākajayā saṃjñayāekatvasaṃjñinaḥ /
T07vakobhau:4377: atra hi vijñānaparibhedāḥ santyata eva na vijñānasthitiḥ /
T07vakobhau:4378: kaḥ punaḥ paribhedaḥ yena vijñānaṃ paribhidyate
T07vakobhau:4386: caturthe dhyāne sattvā uccalitamānasāḥ pṛthagjanā āsaṃjñikaṃ praveṣṭukāmā āryāḥ śuddhāvāsān bhavāgrānapaṭupracāratvānna vijñānasthitiriti /
T07vakobhau:4396: anyatra sūtre sapta vijñānasthitaya uktāḥ anyatra
T07vakobhau:4399: rūpopagā vijñāna sthitirvedanopagā saṃjñopagā saṃskāropagā iti /
T07vakobhau:4408: na ca visabhāgabhūmikeṣu skanheṣu vijñānaṃ tṛṣṇāvaśāt pratitiṣṭhatīti /
T07vakobhau:4409: kasmānna vijñānaṃ vijñānasthitirucyate yathā saptasu vijñānasthitiṣu pañca skandhā iti /
T07vakobhau:4413: yāṃśca dharmānabhiruhya vijñānaṃ vāhayati naunāvikanyāyena te dharmā vijñānasthitaya uktāḥ
T07vakobhau:4414: natu vijñānaṃ vijñānamevāruhya vāhayatyato noktamiti vaibhāṣikāḥ /
T07vakobhau:4415: yattarhi sūtra uktaṃ "vijñāne āhāre asti nandī asti rāga iti /
T07vakobhau:4416: yatrāsti nandī asti rāgaḥ pratiṣṭhitaṃ tatra vijñānamadhirūḍhami"ti /
T07vakobhau:4419: evaṃ tarhyabhedenopapattyāyatanasaṃgṛhīteṣu skandheṣu sābhirāmāyāṃ vijñānapravṛttau vijñānaṃ vijñānasthitiḥ /
T07vakobhau:4420: pratyekaṃ tu yathā rūpādayo vijñānasya saṃkleśāya bhavanti /
T07vakobhau:4424: api ca kṣetrabhāvena bhagavatā catasro vijñānasthitayo deśitāḥ /
T07vakobhau:4425: vījabhāvena ca sopādānaṃ vijñānaṃ kṛtsnameveti na punarbījaṃ bījasya kṣetrabhāvena vyavasthāpayāṃbabhūvetyabhiprāyaṃ parikalapayāmāsa /
T07vakobhau:4426: ye dharmāḥ sahavarttino vijñānasya te 'sya kṣetrabhāvena sādhīyāṃso bhavantīti ta evāsya sthitaya uktāḥ /
T07vakobhau:4427: atha kathaṃ saptabhirvijñānasthitibhiścatasro vijñānasthitayaḥ saṃgṛhītāścātasṛbhirvā sapta
T07vakobhau:4428: naiva hi saptabhiścatasro nāpi catasṛbhiḥ sapta /
T07vakobhau:4433: dvitīyā apāyeṣu caturthe dhyāne bhavāgre ca vijñānavarjyāḥ skandhāḥ /
T07vakobhau:4450: ye sattvā avikalā ahīnendriyāḥ sarvāṅgapratyaṅgopetāḥ sakṛdupajāyante /
T07vakobhau:4451: ata eva upapadane (read: upapādane) sādhukāritvādupapādukā ityucyante /
T07vakobhau:4453: atha kasyāṃ gatau kati yonayaḥ saṃvidyanta ityāha
T07vakobhau:4456: aṇḍajāstāvadyathā kroñcīniryātau śailopaśailau sthavirau mṛgāramātuśca dvātriṃśat putrāḥ pañcālarājasya ca pañca putraśatāni /
T07vakobhau:4469: "pañca putrānahaṃ rātrau divā paña tathā parān /
T07vakobhau:4470: bhakṣayāmi janitvā tān nāsti tṛptistathāpi me //"
T07vakobhau:4478: api caināṃ siddhiṃ gacchantīti vineyānā mutsāhārtham /
T07vakobhau:4479: itarathā hyaprajñāyamānakulagotraḥ ko 'pyayaṃ māyāpuruṣa ityevaṃ parikalpayeyurdevaḥ piśāca iti vā yathā 'nyatīrthyā apabhāṣante kalpaśatasyātyayādevaṃvidho māyāvī loke prādurbhūya māyayā lokaṃ bhakṣayatīti /
T07vakobhau:4481: śarīradhātūnāmavasthāpanārthaṃ yeṣumanuṣyā anye ca prajāṃ vijñāya sahasraśaḥ svargaṃ ca prāptā apavargaṃ ceti upapādukānāṃ hi sattvānāṃ bāhyabījābhāvān mṛtānāṃ kāyo nāvatiṣṭhate niśānta iva tailapradyoto
T07vakobhau:4483: ādhiṣṭhānikīmṛddhiṃ bhagavata icchatāṃ na yukta ekṣa parihāraḥ /
T07vakobhau:4485: yadyapyupapādukānāṃ kāyanidhanaṃ na prajñayate kathamuktaṃ sūtre
T07vakobhau:4488: bhakṣayati vā yāvanna mṛto bhavati na pounrmṛtasyāsya tṛṣyatīti /
T07vakobhau:4491: sā hi dvigatī tisṛṇāṃ ca pradeśaḥ sarve cāntarābhāvikā iti /
T07vakobhau:4510: santānavarttināṃ hi dharmāṇāmavicchedena deśāntareṣu prādurbhāvo dṛṣṭastadyathā vrīhisantānasya
T07vakobhau:4512: vicchinno 'pi dṛṣṭaḥ prādurbhāvastadyathā ādarśādiṣu bimbāt pratibimbasya /
T07vakobhau:4519: tatraiva hi deśe ādarśarūpaṃ dṛśyate pratibimbaṃ ca /
T07vakobhau:4520: na caikatra deśe rūpadvayasyāsti sahabhāva āśrayabhūtabhedāt /
T07vakobhau:4521: tathā digbhedavyavasthiterekasminvāpyambudeśe svābhimukhadeśasthānāṃ rūpāṇāmanyo 'nyaṃ pratibimbakamupalabhyate natvekatra rūpe dvayoḥ paśyatoḥ sahadarśanaṃ na bhavatīti na tatra rūpāntaropapattiryuktā chāyātapayośca dvayoḥ sahaikatrabhāvo na dṛṣṭaḥ /
T07vakobhau:4522: upalabhyate ca chāyāstha ādarśe sūryasya prativimbakamiti na yukto 'sya
T07vakobhau:4526: anyatraiva hi deśe ādarśatalaṃ bhavatyanyatraivāntargataṃ candrapratibimbakaṃ dṛśyate kūpa ivodakam /
T07vakobhau:4529: sāmagryāstu sa tasyāstādṛśaḥ prabhāvo yattathā darśanaṃ bhavati //
T07vakobhau:4530: acintyo hi dharmāṇāṃ hi dharmāṇāṃ śaktibhedaḥ /
T07vakobhau:4536: santānaṃ ca pratyavicchedena deśāntareṣu prādurbhāva udāhṛato nāsantānamityasāmyaṃ dṛṣṭāntasya pratibimbasya ca /
T07vakobhau:4539: bimbāccādarśā cceti yat prādhānaṃ kāraṇaṃ tadāśrityotpadyate /
T07vakobhau:4540: nacaivamupapattibhavasyāpi dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ saṃbhavo maraṇabhavāccānyataśca pradhānabhūtādityato 'pyayamasamāno dṛṣṭāntaḥ /
T07vakobhau:4541: na ca yuktamuktaṃ bāhyameva cetanaṃ śukraśoṇitaṃ pradhānakāraṇamiti /
T07vakobhau:4542: yatra cāndhakāṇa eva prādurbhāva upapādukānāṃ tatra kiṃ parikalpyate /
T07vakobhau:4548: narakabhavastiryagbhavaḥ pretabhavo devabhavo manuṣyabhavaḥ karmabhavo 'ntarābhava iti
T07vakobhau:4553: mātā kalyā spi bhavati ṛtumatī ca /
T07vakobhau:4562: kṣatriyo vā 'sau brāhmaṇo vā vaiśyo vā śūdro vā /
T07vakobhau:4563: yadi vā pūrvasyā diśa āgato yadi vā dakṣiṇasyā paścimāyā uttrasyā" iti /
T07vakobhau:4572: upapadyādayo 'pi hi nāma devā evaṃ sati prasajyate /
T07vakobhau:4579: tadyathā parīttaḥ sakalikāgnirabhinivarttamāna eva parinirvāyādevaṃ prathamaḥ /
T07vakobhau:4582: nacaivamantarā nāma devāstriprakārāḥ kāladeśaprakarṣabhinnāḥ santīti kalpanaiveyaṃ kevalā
T07vakobhau:4584: āyupramāṇāntare vā devasamīpāntare vā yaḥ kleśān prajahāti so 'ntarāparinirvāyī /
T07vakobhau:4585: sa punardhātugato vā parinirvāti saṃjñāgato vā vitarkagato vā /
T07vakobhau:4587: prathamo vā rūpadhātau nikāyasabhāgaparigrahaṃ kṛtvā parinirvāti /
T07vakobhau:4590: upapadyaparinirvāyī punaḥ prakarṣayuktāṃ saṃgītimanupraviśya parinirvāti bhūyasā vā āyurūpahatya nopapannamātra eveti ta ete sarve 'pi
T07vakobhau:4596: saṃjñayā ṣaṭṭikāṃ kṛtvā vargo bhavati samuditaḥ //
T07vakobhau:4600: kimidānīṃ kurmo yacchāstā ca parinirvṛtaḥ śāsanaṃ cedamanāyakaṃ bahudhā bhinnaṃ bhidyate cādyāpi yathecchaṃ granthataścārthataśca /
T07vakobhau:4601: yeṣāṃ tu tāvadayamāgamaḥ pramāṇaṃ teṣāmāgamato 'pi siddho 'ntarābhavaḥ /
T07vakobhau:4602: yattarhi sūtra uttam "atha ca punardūṣī māraḥ svaśarīreṇāvicau mahānarake prapatita" iti
T07vakobhau:4606: atyudīrṇaparipūrṇāni hi karmāṇi kāyasya nikṣepaṃ na pratīkṣante /
T07vakobhau:4607: ato 'sya dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyaṃ karma pūrvaṃ vīpakvaṃ paścādupapadyavedanīyamiti /
T07vakobhau:4608: idamidānīṃ kathaṃ nīyate "pañcānantaryāṇi karmāṇi yāni kṛtvopacitya
T07vakobhau:4615: na kālāntaraṃ jīvitvā ko vā 'ntarābhavasyopapadyamānatvaṃ necchati /
T07vakobhau:4621: vāso 'pi hi nāsti te 'ntarā pātheyaṃ ca na vidyate tave" ti //
T07vakobhau:4631: ato yāṃ gatiṃ gantā bhavati tasyāṃ gatau ya āgamiṣyatpūrvakālabhavastasyaivāsyākṛtirbhavati
T07vakobhau:4634: pūrvakālabhave 'pi tāvannārakā na nityaṃ prajvalitā bhavantyutsadeṣu bhramantaḥ kiṃ punarantarābhavikāḥ
T07vakobhau:4636: sa tu yathā na draṣṭuṃ śasyate tathā na spraṣṭumapyacchatvādātmabhāvasyetyacodyametat /
T07vakobhau:4638: pramāṇaṃ tu yathā pañcaṣaḍvarṣasya dārakasya sa tu ṣaṭindriyo bhavati bodhisattvasya punaryathā saṃpūrṇayūnaḥ salakṣaṇānuvyañjanaśca /
T07vakobhau:4639: ata evāntarābhavasthena mātuḥ kukṣiṃ praviśatā koṭīśataścāturdvīpikānāmavabhāsitaḥ /
T07vakobhau:4640: yattarhi mātā bodhisatvasya svapne gajapotaṃ pāṇḍaraṃ kukṣiṃ praviśantamadrākṣīt /
T07vakobhau:4644: aśucikapiḥ paṭakalahāviti daśa dṛṣṭā nṛpeṇa kṛkiṇā svapnāḥ" //
T07vakobhau:4645: naiva cāntarābhavikaḥ kukṣiṃ bhittvā praviśatyapi tu māturyonidvāreṇa /
T07vakobhau:4646: ata eva yamalayoryaḥ paścāt prajāyate sa jyāyānucyate yaḥ pūrvaṃ sa kanīyāniti /
T07vakobhau:4653: kavīnāṃ ca kāvyaṃ samāyojayatāṃ kecit bhāvāḥ samāropitā gacchanti /
T07vakobhau:4655: yathā 'sya mātā svapne taṃ praviśantamadrākṣittathā so 'pi
T07vakobhau:4659: bodhisattvasya savastraḥ śuklāyāśca bhikṣuṇyāḥ praṇidhānavaśādhyāvantameva pariveṣṭitā nirdagdhā
T07vakobhau:4668: tasmāt pareṇa maraṇakṣaṇaṃ paryudasyānyaḥ sarvo bhavaḥ pūrvakālabhavaḥ /
T07vakobhau:4669: caramakṣaṇo maraṇabhabo yata ūrdhvamantarābhavo bhavati rūpiṣu cetsattveṣūpapadyate /
T07vakobhau:4673: yeṣāṃ ca divyaṃ cakṣuḥ suviśuddhamabhijñāmayaṃ ta enaṃ paśyanti /
T07vakobhau:4692: tathā hi pradīptāyaḥpiṇdabhede tanmadhyasaṃbhūtaḥ krimirūpalabdhaḥ śrūyate
T07vakobhau:4693: yasyāṃ ca gatau sa utpatsyamānastasyāḥ sarvathā /
T07vakobhau:4708: yāvadupapattisāmagrīṃ na labhate nahi tasyāyuṣaḥ pṛthagevākṣepaḥ /
T07vakobhau:4711: yadyāsumeroḥ sthalaṃ māṃsasya syāttatsarva varṣāsu krimīṇāṃ pūryeta /
T07vakobhau:4712: kimidānīṃ tatpratīkṣā eva teṣāmantarābhavā āsan kuto yā tadā tebhyo gatā iti vaktavyam /
T07vakobhau:4716: te taṃ gandhaṃ ghrātvā gandharasābhigṛddhāḥ kālaṃ kurvantaḥ krimibhāvasaṃvarttanīyaṃ karma pravodhya tayā tṛṣṇayā krimiṣūpapadyanta iti /
