T07vakobhau:4717: athavā nūnaṃ tatpratyayapracūra eva kāle tatsaṃvarttanīyāni karmāṇi vīpākābhinirvṛttau vṛttiṃ labhnte nānyatra /
T07vakobhau:4718: tathāhi cakravarttisaṃvarttanīyāni karmaṇi aśītivarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ vahutarāyuṣi vā cakravarttino jāyante nānyasyām /
T07vakobhau:4719: ata eva coktaṃ bhagavatā "acintyaḥ sattvānāṃ karmavipāka" iti /
T07vakobhau:4721: yadi tāvatā sāmagrīṃ na labhate tatraiva punaścyutyā jāyante /
T07vakobhau:4724: sa hi saṃbhavaiṣitvātsamdhāvagatvā samdhiṃ badhnātīti yathātvasamagrāḥ pratyayā bhavanti /
T07vakobhau:4725: niyataṃ cānena tasmin deśe tasyāṃ jātau janitavyaṃ bhavati /
T07vakobhau:4727: athāniyātaṃ tato 'nyatra deśe tasyāṃ jātau jāyate sadṛśyā mityapare /
T07vakobhau:4728: tadyathā gavāmūṣmasu maithunasya prācuryaṃ śaradi śunāṃ ṛkṣānāṃ hemante cākṣvānām /
T07vakobhau:4729: gavayaśṛgālakharatarakṣāṇāṃ punaḥ kālo nāstīti yenānyatra kāle goṣūpapattavyaṃ sa gavayeṣūpapadyate yena śvas sa śṛgāleṣu yenāśvesu sa gardabheṣu yena ṛkṣeṣu sa tarakṣeṣūpapadyate iti /
T07vakobhau:4730: na tvasya nikāyasabhāgāntarābhavo nānyatra nikāyasabhāge śakyamutpattumekakāmākṣepāditi vaktavyametat
T07vakobhau:4733: sa hi karmaprabhāvasaṃbhūtena cakṣuṣā sudūrastho 'pi svamupapattideśaṃ prekṣate /
T07vakobhau:4734: tatrāsya mātāpitrostāṃ vipratipattiṃ dṛṣṭvā puṃsaḥ sataḥ pauṃsno rāga utpadyate mātari stryā satyā straiṇo rāgāḥ udpadyate pitari /
T07vakobhau:4736: evaṃ paṭhacyate prajñaptau "gandharvasya tasmin samaye dvayościttayoranyatarānyataraccittaṃ saṃmukhībhūtaṃ bhavatyanunayasahagataṃ vā pratighasahagataṃ veti /
T07vakobhau:4737: sa tābhyāṃ viparyasto rantukāmatayā tam deśamāśliṣya tāmavasthāmātmanyadhimucyate /
T07vakobhau:4740: sa cetpumān bhavati māturdakṣiṇakukṣimāśritya pṛṣṭhābhimukha utkeṭukaḥ saṃbhavatyatha strī tato vāmakukṣimāśrityodarābhimukhī /
T07vakobhau:4741: athedānīṃ napuṃsakaṃ tadyena rāgeṇāśliṣṭaṃ tathā tiṣṭhati /
T07vakobhau:4743: athaḥ strībhūtaḥ puruṣabhūto vā 'nupraviśya yathāsthānaṃ tiṣṭhati paścāt
T07vakobhau:4749: anindriyaṃ hi śukraśoṇitamantarābhavena sārdhaṃ nirudhyate sendriyaṃ prādurbhavati /
T07vakobhau:4751: evaṃ ca kṛtvedaṃ sūtrapadaṃ sūtre sūnītaṃ bhavati
T07vakobhau:4758: evaṃ tāvadaṇḍajāṃ jarāyujāṃ ca yorni pratipadyate /
T07vakobhau:4762: saṃsvedajāṃ yoniṃ pratipadyamāna upapattisthānaṃ gatvābhilāṣāt gacchatyamedhyaṃ medhyaṃ vā yathākramam /
T07vakobhau:4766: sa hi śītavātavarṣābhiṣekairātmānaṃ bādhyamānaṃ paśyati narakeṣu cāgniṃ dīpyamānam /
T07vakobhau:4768: punastaptavātātapāgnisaṃtāpairātmānaṃ bādhyamānamanupaśyan śaityaṃ ca narakeṣu śītābhilāṣāddhāvati
T07vakobhau:4769: yad avasthas tad upapattisaṃvarttanīyaṃ karmākārṣīt tadavasthātmānaṃ tāśca sattvān paśyan dhāvatīti pūrvācāryāḥ /
T07vakobhau:4770: tatra punardevāntarābhava ūrdhvaṃ gacchatyā sanādivottiṣṭhan manuṣyatiryakpretānāṃ manuṣyādivat
T07vakobhau:4790: kaścit punaḥ sarvāṇyevāsaṃprajānan karoti praviśatyasaṃprajānan tiṣṭhati niṣkrāmatyapi /
T07vakobhau:4794: aṇḍajaḥ sattvo nityaṃ mūḍha eva sarvāṇi karoti /
T07vakobhau:4798: tadyathā "saṃkṛtamabhisaṃskarotī"ti sūtre odanaṃ pacatīti saktum pinaṣṭīti loke /
T07vakobhau:4800: kathaṃ punarasaṃprajānan mātuḥ kukṣiṃ praviśati yāvanniṣkrāmati kathaṃ vā saṃprajānan /
T07vakobhau:4801: alpeśākhyasya tāvatsattvasya mātuḥ kukṣiṃ praviśataḥ evaṃ vīparītau saṃjñādhimokṣau pravarttete
T07vakobhau:4803: śītaṃ durdinaṃ mahato vā janakāyasya kolāhalaṃ hnta tṛṇagahanaṃ vā praviśāmi vanagahanaṃ vā tṛṇakuṭīṃ vā parṇakuṭīṃ vā vṛkṣamūlaṃ vā sarpāmi kuṇḍayamūlaṃ veti /
T07vakobhau:4805: maheśākhyasya tu sattvasyārāmaṃ vā praviśāmyudyānaṃ vāprāsādaṃ vā
T07vakobhau:4809: saṃprajānaṃstu samyak prajānāti mātuḥ kukṣiṃ praviśāmyatraiva tiṣṭhāmi ata eva niryāmiti /
T07vakobhau:4816: sa hi praviśatyeva saṃprajānan na tiṣṭhati nāpi niṣkrāmati /
T07vakobhau:4824: ta eva tvete cakravarttyādaya evaṃbhūtā yujyante yathākramam /
T07vakobhau:4827: yadi sattvo lokāntaraṃ saṃcaratīti pratijñāyate siddha ātmā bhavatīti /
T07vakobhau:4830: kīdṛśa ātmā ya imān nikṣipatyanyāśca skndhān pratisaṃdadhātīti parikalpyate /
T07vakobhau:4832: evaṃ tūktaṃ bhagavatā "asti karmāsti vipākaḥ kārakastu nopalabhyate ya imāṃśca skandhānnikṣipati anyāṃśca skandhān pratisaṃdadhātyanyatra dharmasaṃketāt /
T07vakobhau:4833: tatrāyaṃ dharmasaṃketo yadutāsmin satīdaṃ bhavatīti vistareṇa pratītyasamutpādaḥ "/
T07vakobhau:4837: evaṃ tarhi skandhā eva lokāntaraṃ saṃcarantīti prāptaṃ skandhamātraṃ tu nātra saṃcaratīti
T07vakobhau:4840: kṣaṇikā hi skandhāsteṣāṃ saṃcarituṃ nāsti śaktiḥ /
T07vakobhau:4841: kleśaistu paribhāvitaṃ karmabhiśca kleśamātramantarābhāsaṃjñikayā saṃtatyā mātuḥ kukṣimāyāti
T07vakobhau:4842: tadyathā pradīpaḥ kṣaṇiko 'pi saṃtatyā deśāntaramiti nāstyeṣa doṣaḥ /
T07vakobhau:4843: tasmātsiddhametadasatyapyātmani kleśakarmābhisaṃskṛṭaḥ skandhānāṃ saṃtāno mātuḥ kukṣimāpadyata iti /
T07vakobhau:4847: nahi sarvasya skandhasantānasyākṣepastulyo bhavatyāyupyasya karmaṇo bhedāt
T07vakobhau:4848: ato yasya yāvānākṣpastasya tāvatī vṛddhiḥ krameṇa bhavati /
T07vakobhau:4856: tasya khalu kālāntareṇa paripākaprāptasya garbhaśatlasyābhyantarāt mātuḥ kukṣau karmavipākajā vāyavo vānti ye taṃ garbhaśalyaṃ saṃparivarttya mātuḥ kāyāvakṣaradvārābhimukhamavasthāpayanti sakrūrapurīṣapiṇḍa ivātimātraṃ sthānāt pracyuto duḥkhaṃ saṃparivarttyate /
T07vakobhau:4857: yadi punaḥ kadācinmāturāhāravihārakriyāpacāreṇa ca pūrvakarmāparādhena garbha eva vyāpādaṃ prāpnoti tata enaṃ tajjñāstriyaḥ kumārabhṛtyakā vā sukhoṣṇena sarpistailena supiṣṭena śālmalīkalkenānyena vā hastamabhyajya tīkṣṇaṃ tanukaṃ cātra śastrakamupanivadhya tasminvarcaskūpa ivogradurgandhāndhakārasamalapalvale suvahukrimikulasahasrāvāse nityasrāviṇi satatapratikriye śukraśroṇitalasikāmalasaṃklinnaviklinnakvathitapicchile paramavībhatsadarśane chidratanucarmāvacchādite pūrvakarmavīpākarje mahati kāmanāḍīrvaṇe hastaṃ praveśyā ṅgamaṅgaṃ nikṛtyādhyāharanti /
T07vakobhau:4858: sa cāpyaparaparyāyavedanīyena karmaṇā pūrvakeṇa kāmapi gatiṃ nīyate /
T07vakobhau:4859: atha punaḥ svasti prajāyate tata enaṃ mātā putrābhilāṣiṇī tatparikā vā striyaḥ sadyojātakaṃ taruṇavrṇāyamānātmānaṃ śastrakṣārā yamāṇasaṃsparśābhyāṃ pāṇibhyāṃ parigṛhya snāpayanti stanyena sarpipā vāpyāyayanti audārikaṃ cāhāramāhartuṃ krameṇābhyāsayanti /
T07vakobhau:4860: tasya vṛddheranvayādindriyāṇāṃ paripākānpunarapi kleśāḥ samudācaranti karmaṇi copacayaṃ gacchanti
T07vakobhau:4861: saḥ taiḥ kāyasya bhedādantarābhavasaṃtatyā pūrvavat paralokaṃ punaryāti /
T07vakobhau:4863: etena prakāreṇa kleśakarmahetukaṃ janma taddhetukāni punaḥ kleśakarmāṇi tebhyaḥ punarjanmetyanādibhavacakrakaṃ veditavyam /
T07vakobhau:4864: ādau hi parikalpyamāne tsyāhetukatvameteṣu sajyeta sati cāhetukatve sarvamevedamahetukaṃ prāduḥsyāt
T07vakobhau:4865: dṛṣṭaṃ cāṅkurādīṣu vījādīnāṃ sāmarthyaṃ deśakālapratiniyamādagnyādīnāṃ ca pākajādiṣviti nāsti nirhetukaḥ prādurbhāvaḥ /
T07vakobhau:4872: tatra dvādaśāṅgāni avidyā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ nāmarūpaṃ ṣaḍāyatanaṃ sparśo vedanā tṛṣṇā upādānaṃ bhavo jātirjarāmaraṇaṃ ca /
T07vakobhau:4882: parīpūro 'syāstīti paripūro ya etāni sarvāṇyevāvasthāntarāṇi spṛśati so
T07vakobhau:4883: 'tra pudgalo 'bhipreto na tu yo 'ntarāla eva mriyate /
T07vakobhau:4885: tathā hi mahānidānaparyāye kāmāvacara eva pudgalo nirdiṣṭaḥ /
T07vakobhau:4887: yadā tu dvividhaḥ pratītyasamutpāda ucyate paurvāntikaścāparāntikaśceti tadā saptāṅgāni paurvāntiko yāvadvedanāntaḥ pañcāparāntikaḥ /
T07vakobhau:4896: pūrvajanmanyeva yā puṇyādikarmāvasthā seha saṃskārā ityucyante yasya karmaṇa iha vipākaḥ /
T07vakobhau:4898: mātuḥ kukṣī pratisaṃdhikṣaṇe pañca skandhā vijñānam /
T07vakobhau:4901: saṃdhicittāt pareṇa yāvat ṣaḍāyatanaṃ notpadyate sā 'vasthā nāmarūpaṃ tāvat ṣaḍāyatanamityucyate
T07vakobhau:4904: utpanne ṣaḍāyatane sāvasthā tāvat ṣaḍāyatanamityucyate yāvadindriyaviṣayavijñānatrikasaṃnipātaḥ
T07vakobhau:4907: sa yāvadvedanātrayakāraṇaparicchedena samartho bhavati sā 'vasthā sparśa ityucyate /
T07vakobhau:4913: upādānaṃ tu bhogānāṃ prāptaye paridhāvataḥ // VAkK_3.23 //
T07vakobhau:4914: yasyāmavasthāyāṃ viṣayaprāptaye paryeṣṭimāpannaḥ sarvato dhāvatyasāvavasthā upādānamityucyate
T07vakobhau:4916: sa bhaviṣyat bhavaphalaṃ kurute karma tat bhavaḥ /
T07vakobhau:4917: sa viṣayāṇāṃ prāptihetoḥ paridhāvan paunarbhavikaṃ karmopacinoti so 'sya
T07vakobhau:4919: tena hi karmaṇā punaritaḥ pracyutasyāyatyāṃ pratisaṃdhirbhavati /
T07vakobhau:4942: teṣāṃ dharmāṇāmutsarjanaṃ jātiḥ parīpāko jarā bhaṅgo maraṇamiti /
T07vakobhau:4950: yadyaṅgamaṅgaṃ pañca skandhāḥ kiṃ kāraṇamavidyādīneva dharmān kīrttayati sma /
T07vakobhau:4953: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ sūtre dvādaśāṅga uktaḥ prakaraṇeṣvanyathā
T07vakobhau:4957: tathāvasthikaḥ kṣaṇikaḥ prākarṣikaḥ sāṃbandhikaḥ sattvākhyo 'sattvākhyaśceti bhedaḥ /
T07vakobhau:4961: tatra pūrvāntasaṃmoho yata iyaṃ vicikitsā kiṃ nva hamabhūvamatīte 'dhvani
T07vakobhau:4963: aparāntasaṃmoho yata iyaṃ vicicitsā kiṃ nu bhaviṣyāmyanāgate 'dhvanīti
T07vakobhau:4965: madhyasaṃmoho yata iyaṃ vicikitsā kimsvididaṃ ke santaḥ ke bhaviṣyāma iti
T07vakobhau:4966: etasya trividhasya saṃmohasya vyāvarttanārthaṃ sattvākhya eva trikāṇḍaśca pratītyasamutpāda upadiṣṭaḥ sūtre yathākramamavidyā saṃskārāśca jātirjarāmaraṇaṃ ca vijñānaṃ yāvat bhavaśca tathāhi sūtra evoktaṃ "yataśca bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇā pratītyasamutpādaśca
T07vakobhau:4967: pratītyasamutpannāśca dharmā evaṃ yathābhūtaṃ samyak prajñayā dṛṣṭā bhavanti /
T07vakobhau:4968: sa na pūrvāntaṃ pratisarati kiṃ nvahamabhūvamatīte 'dhvanī"ti vistaraḥ /
T07vakobhau:4970: tasyaiva hyete hetava iti sa punareṣa dvādaśāṅgaḥ pratītyasamutpādastrisvabhāvo veditavyaḥ
T07vakobhau:4985: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ madhye phalahetū viśālitau /
T07vakobhau:4994: yadi khalu dvādaśāṅga eva pratītyasamutpāda evaṃ satyavidyāyā anupadiṣṭahetukatvādādimān saṃsāraḥ prāpnoti jarāmaraṇasya cānupadiṣṭaphalatvādantavān /
T07vakobhau:4998: kleśāt kleśaḥ kriyā caiva tato vastu tataḥ punaḥ /
T07vakobhau:5004: vastuno vastuvijñānānāmarūpaṃ yāvat sparśādvedanā jāteśca jarāmaraṇam /
T07vakobhau:5006: yasmādeṣa nayo vyavasthito bhavāṅgānāṃ tasmādavidyā 'pi kleśasvabhāvā vastunaḥ kleśādveti jñāpitaṃ bhavati /
T07vakobhau:5007: vedanāvaśācca jarāmaraṇavastunaḥ punaḥ kleśo bhāvīti nātra punaḥ kiñcidupasaṃkhyeyam /
T07vakobhau:5008: "evamasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya samudayo bhavatī"ti vacanāt /
T07vakobhau:5016: satyapi cāntarbhāve kathamatredaṃ jñāpitaṃ bhavatyayoniśomanaskārahetukā avidyeti /
T07vakobhau:5022: "cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpāṇi cotpadyate āvilo manaskāro mohaja" iti /
T07vakobhau:5025: ataḥ sparśakāle bhavannayoniśomanaskāro vedanāsahavarttinyā avidyāyāḥ pratyayabhāvena siddha iti nāstyahetukatvamavidyāyā na cāṅgāntaramupasaṃkhyeyam /
T07vakobhau:5033: nahi niravadyā vedanā tṛṣṇāyāḥ pratyayībhavatyarhatāṃ na cāvīparītaḥ sparśaḥ kliṣṭāyā vedanāyāḥ
T07vakobhau:5034: naca punarniravadyasyārhataḥ sparśo viparīta ityanayā yuktyā /
T07vakobhau:5036: yauvat yuktyā saṃbhavati tāvadanuktam gamyata iti /
T07vakobhau:5042: pravṛttisaṃmūḍebhyo vineyebhyaḥ kathaṃ paralokādihaloka ihalokācca punaḥ paralokaḥ saṃbadhyata ityetāvato 'trārthasya vivakṣitatvāt /
T07vakobhau:5048: ubhyaṃ hi sarve saṃskṛtā dharmā iti /
T07vakobhau:5053: te 'pi cetitāḥ kuśalayā cetanayā prāptiṃ prati /
T07vakobhau:5055: tajjātīyatvāttattatraivātideśo yathā naca tāvadrūpyate rūpaṃ cocyate tajjātīyatvādityadoṣaḥ
T07vakobhau:5062: yadapakṣaya pratītyasamutpādo na tadevāpekṣya pratītyasamutpannaṃ hetuphalavat pitṛputravacca
T07vakobhau:5063: sthavirapūrṇāśaḥ kilāha syāt pratīyasamutpādo na pratītyasamutpannā dharmā iti /
T07vakobhau:5070: kiṃ khalvetā iṣṭaya ucyante yā yasyeṣṭirāhosvitsūtrārthaḥ /
T07vakobhau:5074: yattāvaduktamā "vasthika eṣa pratītyasamutpādo dvādaśa pañcaskandhikā avasthā dvādaśaṅgānī" tyetadutsūtram /
T07vakobhau:5078: yacca nītārthaṃ na tat punarneyaṃ bhavatīti naiṣa sūtrārthaḥ /
T07vakobhau:5079: na vai sarvaṃ nirdeśato nītārthaṃ bhavati /
T07vakobhau:5087: yata eṣāmaparipūrṇo nirdeśaḥ syādapi tu keśādibhireva pṛthivīdhātuḥ tatra nirdeśyate /
T07vakobhau:5088: na ca keśādīnabhyatītyāpyasti pṛthivīdhāturiti saṃpūrṇa evāsya nirdeśaḥ /
T07vakobhau:5089: evamihāpyavidyādīnāṃ paripūrṇa eva nirdeśo na sāvaśeṣaḥ /
T07vakobhau:5090: nanu cābhyatītyāpi keśādīnaśrukheṭa śiṅghāṇakā diṣvasti pṛthivīdhātuḥ /
T07vakobhau:5092: yadva "punaranyadapyasmin kāye khakūkhaṭaṃ kharagatamiti vacanāt bhavatu vā tathaivāvidyāvaśeṣo yadi śakyate darśayitum /
T07vakobhau:5094: yadyapi ca tāsvavasthāsu pañca skandhā vidyante yasya tu bhāvābhāvayoryasya bhāvābhāvaniyamaḥ tadevāṅgaṃ vyavasthāpayitum /
T07vakobhau:5095: satyapi ca pañcaskandhake 'rhataḥ saṃskārā na bhavanti pañcaskandhahetukāḥ
T07vakobhau:5097: tathā puṇyāpuṇyāneñjyopagaṃ ca vijñānaṃ tṛṣṇā dayaśceti /
T07vakobhau:5099: yadapyuktaṃ "heturatra samutpādaḥ samutpannaṃ phalaṃ yāvaccatuṣkoṭika" iti
T07vakobhau:5103: yadutāsmin satīdaṃ bhavatīti vistareṇoktvā iti yā 'tra dharmatā dharmasthititā yāvadaviparyastatā ayamucyate pratītyasamutpāda" iti /
T07vakobhau:5104: dhrmatā ca nāma dharmajātiḥ dharmāṇāṃ śailiḥ /
T07vakobhau:5105: ato yeyaṃ dharmatā ya eṣa niyamaḥ /
T07vakobhau:5108: yadapi catuṣkoṭikamuktaṃ tatra yadyanāgatāḥ dharmā na pratītyasamutpannāḥ sūtraṃ virudhyate
T07vakobhau:5116: yadyayamabhiprāya utpādadvā tathāgatānāmanutpādādvā nityamavidyādīn pratītya saṃskārādīnāmanutpādo na kadācidapratītyānyadvā pratītyāto nitya iti evametaditi pratigrāhyam /
T07vakobhau:5117: athāyamabhiprāyaḥ pratītyasamutpādo nāma kiñcit bhāvāntaraṃ nityamastīti /
T07vakobhau:5121: na ca nityaṃ bhāvāntaramanityasya lakṣaṇaṃ yujyate /
T07vakobhau:5122: utpādaśca nāmotpatturbhavatīti ko 'syāvidyādibhirabhisambandho yatasteṣāṃ pratītyasamutpāda ityucyeta /
T07vakobhau:5126: upasargavaśena dhātvarthapariṇāmāt prāpyeti yo 'rthaḥ so'rthaḥ pratītyeti

T07vakobhau:5691: yānyapi tu nābhyavahniyante sthitiṃ cāharanti tānyapi sūkṣma āhāraḥ /
T07vakobhau:5696: āhāro hi nāma ya indriyamahābhūtānāmanugrahāya saṃvarttate /
T07vakobhau:5697: rūpāyatanaṃ cābhyavaharaṇakāle svamindriyaṃ tanmahābhūtāni vā nānugṛhṇāti
T07vakobhau:5699: yadāpi ca dṛśyamāne sukhasaumanasye ādadhāti tadāpi tadālambanaḥ sukhavedanīyaḥ sparśa āhāro bhavati na rūpam /
T07vakobhau:5703: cetanā manaskarma vijñānaṃ ca sāsravāṇyevāhārāḥ triṣvapi dhātuṣu saṃvidyante /
T07vakobhau:5707: api tu sūtra uktaṃ "catvāra ime āhārā bhūtānāṃ sattvānāṃ sthitaye yāpanāyai saṃbhavaiṣiṇāṃ cānugrahāye"ti /
T07vakobhau:5709: bhūtā hi tāvatsattvā upapannā iti vijñāyante /
T07vakobhau:5727: atha katyāhārāḥ sattvānāṃ sthitaye kati saṃbhavaiṣiṇāmanugrahāya /
T07vakobhau:5731: bhagavatā "atvāra ime āhārā rogasya mūlalṃ gaṇḍasya śalyasya jarāmaraṇasya
T07vakobhau:5734: evaṃ hi varṇayanti durbhikṣābhyāhatena kīla pitrā putrakau saktava iti bhasmanā bhastrāṃ paripūrya kīlake āsajyāśvāsitau /
T07vakobhau:5735: tau ca tāṃ parikalpayantau ciramapyāsitau kenāpi codghāṭitāyāṃ bhasmeti nairāśyamāpannau vyāpannāviti
T07vakobhau:5736: punaśca mahāsamudre bhagnayānapātrāḥ puruṣāḥ sthalamiti mahāntaṃ phenapiṇḍaṃ pradrutāḥ āmṛśya cainaṃ nirāśā uparemuriti /
T07vakobhau:5737: saṃgītiparyāye coktaṃ mahāsamudrādaudārikāḥ prāṇino jalāt sthalamabhiruhya sikatāsthale 'ṇḍāni sthāpayitvā sikatābhiravaṣṭabhya punarapi mahāsamudre
T07vakobhau:5739: tatra yāsāṃ mātṛṇāmaṇḍānyārabhya smṛtirna muṣyate tānyaṇḍāni na pūtībhavanti yāsāṃ tu muṣyate tāni pūtībhavanti /
T07vakobhau:5743: yeṣāmaṇḍānāṃ mātaramārabhya smṛtirna muṣyate tāni na pūtībhavanti /
T07vakobhau:5747: nanu ca sarva eva sāsravā dharmā bhavānāṃ poṣakāḥ /
T07vakobhau:5755: manaḥsaṃcetanayā punarbhavasyākṣepaḥ ākṣiptasya punaḥ karmaparibhāvitādvijñānavījādabhinirvṛttirityanayoranutpannasya bhavasyākaraṇe prādhānyam /
T07vakobhau:5757: pūrvakau hi dvau dhātrīsthānīyau jātasya poṣakatvāt /
T07vakobhau:5759: yaḥ kaścit kavaḍīkāraḥ sarvaḥ sa āhāraḥ /
T07vakobhau:5761: prathamā koṭiryaṃ kavaḍīkāraṃ pratītyendriyāṇāmapacayo bhavati mahābhūtānāṃ ca paribhedaḥ
T07vakobhau:5763: tṛtīyā yaṃ kavaḍīkāraṃ pratītyendriyāṇāmupacayo bhavati mahābhūtānāṃ ca vṛddhiḥ /
T07vakobhau:5766: syāt sparśādīn pratītyendriyāṇāmupacayo mahābhūtānāṃ ca vṛddhirna ca ta āhārāḥ /
T07vakobhau:5768: yo 'pi hi paribhukto bhokturbādhāmādadhāti so 'pyāhāra eva /
T07vakobhau:5770: dvayorhi kālayorāhāra āhārakṛtyaṃ karoti paribhujyamāno jīryaṃśceti vaibhāṣikāḥ /
T07vakobhau:5778: yaṃ kavaḍīkāraṃ pratītyendriyāṇāmupacayo bhavati mahābhutānāṃ ca vṛddhiryāpanā 'nuyāpaneti vistareṇa yāvadvijñānam /"
T07vakobhau:5781: so 'pi hi jighatsāṃ pipāsāṃ hantuṃ samartha iti /
T07vakobhau:5783: uktaṃ bhagavatā "yaśca bāhyakānāmṛṣīṇāṃ kāmebhyo vītarāgāṇāṃ śataṃ bhojayedyaścaikaṃ jambūṣaṇḍagataṃ pṛthagajanam /
T07vakobhau:5789: syādyadi bhūyasaḥ pṛthagjanān bhojayitvā bhūyaḥ puṇyaṃ syāt nālpīyaso vītarāgāniti /
T07vakobhau:5791: tadetanna varṇayanti "bahutaraṃ hi tasmai datvā puṇyaṃ nārhatkoṭibhya" iti
T07vakobhau:5792: ato nirvedhabhāgīyalābhī pṛthagjana eṣo'bhipretaḥ iti vaibhāṣikāḥ /
T07vakobhau:5793: natviyamanvarthā saṃjñā nāpikvacitparibhāṣitā sūtre śāstre vā /
T07vakobhau:5795: bodhisattva eva tveṣu jambūdvīpaṣaṇḍeṣu niṣaṇṇo yujyate /
T07vakobhau:5796: sa hi pṛthagjana kāmavairāgyasaṃbandhena tadānīṃ tebhyo viśiṣyamāṇa ukta iti /
T07vakobhau:5799: itthaṃ caitadevaṃ yadevaṃ paryudasya bāhyakebhya eva srotāpatti phalapratipannakaṃ viśeṣayāṃbabhūva
T07vakobhau:5801: ukto yathā sattvānāṃ pratītyasamutpādo yathāvasthitiścyutirapyuktā yathāyuḥkṣayādibhiḥ /
T07vakobhau:5803: katamasmin vijñāne vartamāne cyutyupapattī bhavata ityāha
T07vakobhau:5807: ete ṣaṭ dharmā manovijñāna eveṣyante nānyatra /
T07vakobhau:5821: yadā cāsyāśrayo vipariṇantumārabhate tadāvaśyamasya tadāśrayapratibaddhaṃ cittaṃ saṃmukhībhūya paścāt pracyaveta nānyathā /
T07vakobhau:5831: atha mriyamāṇasya kasmin śarīrapradeśe vijñānaṃ nirudhyate /
T07vakobhau:5839: teṣāṃ yathāsaṃkhyaṃ pādayornābhyāṃ hṛdaye ca vijñānaṃ saṃnirudhyate /
T07vakobhau:5843: kāyendriyasya teṣu nirodhāt kāyendriyaṃ hi mriyamāṇasya tapta ivopale jalaṃ niṣṭhyūtaṃ saṃkocamāpadyamānaṃ pādādiṣvantardhīyata iti /
T07vakobhau:5849: tāni cāptejovāyudhātūnāmanyatamenātiprāyaṃ gatena niśitaśastrasaṃpātasyardhināḍītībrābhirvedanābhiḥ chidyanta iva na ca punastāni kāṣṭhādivacchidyante chinnabadvā punarna ceṣṭanta iti cchinnānyucyante kasmānna pṛthivīdhātunā /
T07vakobhau:5855: kiṃ tu cyavanadharmaṇo devaputrasya pañcopanimittāni prādurbhavanti /
T07vakobhau:5856: vastrāṇāmābharaṇānāṃ ca manojñaḥ śabdo niścarati śarīraprabhā mandībhavati snātasyodabindavaḥ kāye saṃtiṣṭhante capalātmanā 'pyekatra viṣaye buddhiravatiṣṭhate unmeṣanimeṣau cākṣṇoḥ saṃbhavataḥ etāni tu vyabhicārīṇi /
T07vakobhau:5858: vāsāṃsi kliśyanti mālā mlāyanti kakṣābhyāṃ svedo mucyate daurgandhyaṃ kāye'vakrāmati sve cāsane devaputro nābhiramate /
T07vakobhau:5859: so'yaṃ sattvaloka evamutpadyamānastiṣṭhan cyavamanaśca triṣu rāśiṣu sthāpito bhagavatā
T07vakobhau:5865: yattatparyādāya rāgaprahāṇaṃ paryādāya dveṣaprahāṇaṃ paryādāya mohaprahāṇaṃ paryādāya sarvakleśaprahāṇamidamucyate samyaktva"miti sūtram
T07vakobhau:5870: ete hi kleśakṣaye niyatatvāt samyaktvaniyatāḥ mokṣabhāgīyalābhino
T07vakobhau:5874: na ca te kālaniyamena samyaktve niyatā yathā saptakṛtvaḥ paramādayaḥ /
T07vakobhau:5885: karmādhipatyena tasya yojanalakṣāṇāṃ ṣoḍaśakamudvedhaḥ pariṇāhenāsaṃkhyaṃ tathā ca dṛḍhaṃṃ yanmahālagno'pi vajreṇa bhettumaśaktaḥ /
T07vakobhau:5894: yathā hi bhuktaṃ pītamannaṃ pānaṃ ca nāpakvaṃ pakvāśayamāpatatī tyeke /
T07vakobhau:5901: sā kāñcanamayī mahī bhavatyapāmupariṣṭāt ukto jalakāñcanamaṇḍalocchrāyaḥ /
T07vakobhau:5906: samantataḥ parikṣepeṇa tu parigaṇyamānaṃ triguṇaṃ jāyate ṣaṭtriṃśallakṣā daśasahasrāṇi sārdhāni ca trīṇi śatāni yojanānām /
T07vakobhau:5925: suvarṇamayo rūpyamayo vaidūryamayaḥ sphaṭikamayaśca yathāsaṃkhyaṃ caturṣu pārśveṣu /
T07vakobhau:5926: yacca yanmayaṃ pārśvaṃ sumerostasyānubhāvena tadvarṇa tasyāṃ diśi nabho dṛśyate /
T07vakobhau:5928: tasyeha prabhānurāgeṇa vaidūryamayaṃ nabho dṛśyata iti /
T07vakobhau:5931: tā hyāpo nānāvidhabījagarbhā bahuvidhaprabhāvabhinnairvāyubhirmathyamānāstāṃ tāṃ jātiṃ pariṇamayanti
T07vakobhau:5932: evaṃ ca punaḥ pariṇamayanti yadbhinnajātīyasya kāryaviśeṣotpattāvasamavadhānena pratyayībhavanti
T07vakobhau:5933: na tu khalu yathā sāṃkhyānāṃ pariṇāmaḥ /
T07vakobhau:5937: sa eva hi dharmī na saṃvidyate yasyāvasthitasya dharmāṇāṃ pariṇāmaḥ kaspyeta /
T07vakobhau:5942: tadeva cedaṃ na cedaṃ tatheti apūrvaiṣā vāyo yuktiḥ /
T07vakobhau:5943: evaṃ ca punaḥ saṃbhūtāḥ suvarṇādayaḥ karmaprabhāvāt preritairvāyubhiḥ samāhṛtya rāśīkriyante
T07vakobhau:5948: kāñcanamayyāḥ pṛthivyā uparyaśītiyyojanasahasrāṇyudakaṃ tatra te magnāḥ /
T07vakobhau:5950: iti hi meroḥ ṣaṣṭi yojanaśatasahasraṃ samucchrayaḥ /
T07vakobhau:5953: tato 'rdhena īśādhara ityevamanyeṣvapyardhārdhahānirveditavyā yāvannimindharārdhenārdhatrayodaśottarāṇi trīṇi yojanaśatāni cakravāḍaḥ /
T07vakobhau:5955: yāvāneva caiṣāṃ jalādūrdhvaṃ samucchrāyastāvāneva ghano vistāra ityarthaḥ
T07vakobhau:5957: eṣāṃ ca nimindharāntanāṃ parvatānāṃ saptāntarāṇi sapta śītā ucyante pūrṇā aṣṭāṅgopetasya pānīyasya
T07vakobhau:5958: taddhi pānīyaṃ śītalaṃ ca svādu ca laghu ca mṛdu cācchaṃ ca niṣpratikaṃ ca pibataśca kaṇṭhaṃ na kṣiṇoti pītaṃ ca kukṣiṃ na vyābādhate /
T07vakobhau:5968: pārśvatasriguṇo bhavati yugandharatīreṇa gaṇyamānaḥ catvāriṃśat sahasrāṇi lakṣadvayaṃ ca /
T07vakobhau:5970: yugandharasyeṣādhārasya cāntaraṃ dvitīyā śītā ardhena prathamāyāścatvāriṃśat yojanasahasrāṇi
T07vakobhau:5977: taddhi bāhyo mahāsamudro lavaṇaṃ pūrṇaḥ hṣārodakasya /
T07vakobhau:5984: tasya ca madhye kāñcanamayyāṃ pṛthivyāṃ vajrāsanamabhinirvṛttaṃ yasminniṣadya sarve bodhisattvā vajropamaṃ samādhimutpādayanti //
T07vakobhau:5985: nahi tamanya āśrayaḥ pradeśo vā soḍhuṃ samarthaḥ /
T07vakobhau:5990: itaḥ pūrveṇa sumerupārśve pūrvaṃ videho dvīpaḥ /
T07vakobhau:5998: itaḥ paścimena sumerupārśve 'paragodānīyo dvīpaḥ sārdhāni sapta
T07vakobhau:6007: sarveṣu ca pārśveṣu samo yathaikaṃ pārśvaṃ dviyojanasahasre /
T07vakobhau:6009: yaśca dvīpo yadākṛtistadākṛtīnyeva tatra manuṣyāṇāṃ mukhāni /
T07vakobhau:6021: ihaiva jambūdvīpe uttareṇāsya jambūdvīpasya kṛṣṇaparvatāstrayastānatikramyāpare trayaḥ punaśca traya iti navabhyaḥ kīṭaparvatebhyaḥ pareṇa himavān parvataḥ /
T07vakobhau:6024: tasmāddhimavataḥ pareṇānavataptaṃ nāma saro gandhamādanādarvāk yataścatasro nadyaḥ sravnti gaṅga sindhuḥ śītā vakṣuśca /
T07vakobhau:6028: tasyaiva cāntike jambūrabhinirvṛttā madhurasvādūni yasyāḥ phalāni tasyā adhikāreṇāyaṃ jambūdvīpa iti khyātaḥ /
T07vakobhau:6032: asyaiva jambūdvīpasyādho viṃśatyā yojanasahasrairavīcirmahānarako viṃśatisahasrapramāṇa evodvedhavistārābhyāmevamasyādharatalamitaścatvāriṃśatā yojanasahasrairbhavati /
T07vakobhau:6034: anyeṣu sāntaraṃ duḥkham taddyathā saṃjīve cchinnāvabhinnasaṃpiṣṭaśarīrāṇāṃ śītalā vāyavo vānti punarapi tān sattvān saṃjīvayanti /
T07vakobhau:6041: pratāpanastāpano mahārauravo rauravaḥ saṃghātaḥ kālasūtraḥ saṃjīvaśca /
T07vakobhau:6057: yatra teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ nikṣipte saṃśīryate tvaṅmāṃsaśoṇitamutkṣipte pāde punarapi saṃjāyate tvaṅmāṃsaśoṇitam /
T07vakobhau:6058: kuṇapaṃ gūthamṛttikā yatra nyaṅkuṭā nāma prāṇinaḥ prativasanti sarvaśvetāḥ kṛṣṇaśirasaḥ sūcimukhāsteṣāṃ sattvānāṃ yāvadasthīni bhindanti /
T07vakobhau:6059: kṣuradhārācito mahāpathaḥ yatra teṣāṃ sattvānā manvākrāmatāṃ nikṣipte pāde saṃchidyate tvaṅmāṃsaśoṇitamiti pūrvavat /
T07vakobhau:6060: asipatravanaṃ yatra teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tīkṣṇā asayaḥ saṃnipatanti aṅgapratyaṅgānyavakṛntanti śyāmaśabalāśca śvāno bhakṣayanti /
T07vakobhau:6062: teṣāṃ sattvānāmabhirohatāṃ kaṇṭakā avāṅmukhībhavantaḥ kāyaṃ bhindanti avataratāṃ cordhvībhavantaḥ
T07vakobhau:6065: caturtha utsado nadī vaitaraṇi pūrṇa taptasya kṣārodakasya yasyāṃ te sattvā asiśaktiprāsahastaiḥ puruṣairubhābhyāṃ tīrābhyāṃ prativāryamāṇā ūrdhvamapi gacchantaḥ svidyante pacyante adhastiryagapi gacchantaḥ svidyante pacyante /
T07vakobhau:6068: ta ete catvāra utsadā digbhedena ṣoḍaśocyante /
T07vakobhau:6073: kiṃ te narakapālāḥ sattvasaṃkhyātā utāho neti /
T07vakobhau:6079: duḥkhiteṣu ca nandanti jāyante yamarākṣasā" iti //
T07vakobhau:6080: ye te yamenānuśiṣṭāḥ sattvān narakeṣu prakṣipanti ta ete yamarākṣasā uktā na tu ye kāraṇāḥ kārayantīti /
T07vakobhau:6083: teṣveva narakeṣu hi ānantaryakāriṇāṃ vipākāvakāśastatra teṣāṃ ko vipratibandhaḥ /
T07vakobhau:6090: tadyathā arvudo nirarvudaḥ aṭato hahavaḥ huhuvaḥ utpalaḥ padmo mahāpadmaśca /
T07vakobhau:6099: teṣāmanekaprakalpo bhedaḥ sthānaṃ cāniyataṃ nadīparvatamarupradeśeṣvanyeṣu vā 'dhaśca bhāvāt
T07vakobhau:6102: teṣāṃ kila mūlaṃ sthānaṃ mahāsamudrastato 'nyatra visṛtā iti /
T07vakobhau:6104: tasya jambūdvīpasyādhastāt pañcayojanaśatāntaraparicchinnā rājadhānī teṣāṃ mūlasthānaṃ tato 'nyatra visṛtāḥ /
T07vakobhau:6121: sūryavimānasyādhastāt vahiḥ sphaṭikamaṇḍalaṃ taijasamabhinirvṛttaṃ tāpanaṃ prakāśanaṃ ca /
T07vakobhau:6125: kiṃ punaścaturdvīpeṣu sūryo yugapat kṛtyaṃ karoti /
T07vakobhau:6130: yadottarakurāvardharātraṃ tadā pūrvavidehe sūryasyāstaṅgamanaṃ jambūdvīpe madhyāhno godānīye udayaḥ /
T07vakobhau:6135: varṣāṇāṃ dvitīye māse bhādrapade dvitīyasya pakṣasya navamyāṃ vardhate rātriḥ /
T07vakobhau:6148: jambūdvipasya dakṣiṇaṃ pārśvaṃ gacchati bhāskare rātrivṛddhiḥ uttaraṃ gacchatyaharvṛddhiḥ
T07vakobhau:6152: yadā hi saurasya vimānasyāsanne cāndramasaṃ vimānaṃ vahati tadā kila sauryo bhāsastasmin vimāne patanti /
T07vakobhau:6153: tato 'parapārśve chāyā patantī vikalaṃ maṇḍalaṃ darśayatīti prājñaptiko
T07vakobhau:6155: vāhayogaḥ sa tādṛśo bhavati yatkadācidvimānasyārdhaṃ dṛśyata iti pūrvācāryāḥ /
T07vakobhau:6167: ṣoḍaśāṣṭau sahasrāṇi catvāri dve ca nirgatāḥ // VAkK_3.63 //
T07vakobhau:6168: prathamā pariṣaṇḍā ṣoḍaśa sahasrāṇi yojanānāṃ sumerornirgatā /
T07vakobhau:6172: prathamāyāṃ pariṣaṇḍāyāṃ karoṭapāṇayo nāma yakṣāḥ prativasanti /
T07vakobhau:6175: caturthyāṃ tu catvāro mahārājāḥ svayaṃ prativasanti tatparicārāśca /
T07vakobhau:6192: tāsu pañcayojanaśatapramāṇāścatvāraḥ kūṭā abhyudgatā yeṣu vajrapāṇayo nāma yakṣāḥ prativasanti
T07vakobhau:6195: puraṃ sudarśanaṃ nāma haimaṃ citratalaṃ mṛdu // VAkK_3.66 //
T07vakobhau:6196: sumerutalasya madhye sudarśanaṃ nāma nagaram dairdhye sārdhatṛtīyayojanasahasre ekaikaṃ parśvamucchrāyeṇādhyardhayojanam
T07vakobhau:6198: tacca bhūmitalaṃ tūlapicuvat mṛdusaṃsparśaṃ pādakṣepotkṣepābhyāṃ natonnataṃ śakrasya devānāmindrasya rājadhānī /
T07vakobhau:6200: śakrasya devānāmindrasya vaijayanto nāma prāsādo nagarasya madhye nānāratnasthānavidhānasaṃpadā sarvānyabhavanaśrīmahimnā hrepaṇo dairdhyeṇārdhatṛtīye yojanaśate pārśvaṃ pārśvam /
T07vakobhau:6204: tasya hi nagarasya bahiścaturṣu pārśveṣu catvāryudyānādīni devānāṃ kriḍābhūmayaḥ /
T07vakobhau:6208: eṣāṃ codyānānāṃ caturdiśaṃ catvāri sumūmīni viṃśatiyojanāntaritāni krīḍāsthānānyeva devānāṃ parasparaspardhayaiva śobhāṃ vitanvanti /
T07vakobhau:6214: tasya khalu sarvapariphullasya yojanaśatamanuvātaṃ gandho vāti pañcāśadyojana yojanāni prativātam
T07vakobhau:6219: tasyaiva tu sā gandhasya tādṛśo prabhāvasaṃpadeṣṭavyā yāt
T07vakobhau:6221: mandataratamasamārambhāttu saṃtāna āśveva samucchidyate yato na tathā viprakṛṣṭamadhvānaṃ prasarpati /
T07vakobhau:6222: kiṃ punaḥ svabhūtāśrita evamapuṣpagandhasaṃtāno vartate utāho vāyuradhivāsito jāyate /
T07vakobhau:6227: satāṃ tu gandhaḥ prativātameti sarvā diśaḥ satpuruṣaḥ pravātī"ti /
T07vakobhau:6230: na ca tasya tādṛśī śaktiḥ mahīsāsakāstu pathanti "yojanaśatamanuvātaṃ
T07vakobhau:6232: sudharmā nāma devasabhā dakṣiṇapaścime digbhāge yasyāṃ niṣadya devāḥ kṛtyākṛtyaṃ samarthayanti
T07vakobhau:6236: te punaryāmāstuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavaśavartinaśca brahmakāyikādayaśca pūrvoktāḥ ṣoḍaśasthānāntaragatāḥ /
T07vakobhau:6237: ityete dvāviṃśatidevanikāyāḥ samāsena yeṣāṃ bhājanaṃ prajñāyate /
T07vakobhau:6239: teṣāṃ tu ṣaṭ kāmāvacarā devanikāyāḥ kāmān paribhuñjate na śeṣāḥ /
T07vakobhau:6247: pāṇisaṃprāptyā tuṣitānāṃ hasitena nirmāṇaratīnāṃ prekṣitena paranirmitavaśavartinām /
T07vakobhau:6251: yasya devasya devyā vā utsaṅge devakumāro devakanyā vā jāyate sa tayoḥ putro bhavati sā ca duhitā /
T07vakobhau:6258: rūpāvacarā devāḥ saṃpūrṇakāyāḥ vastreṇa saṃvītā upapadyante /
T07vakobhau:6263: santi sattvāḥ pratyupasthitakāmāḥ pratyupasthiteṣu kāmeṣvaiśvaryaṃ vaśe vartayanti /
T07vakobhau:6266: santi sattvā nirmitakāmā nirmāya kāmānaiśvarya vaśe vartayanti /
T07vakobhau:6268: santi sattvāḥ paranirmitakāmāḥ paranirmiteṣu kāmeṣvaiśvarya vaśe varttayanti /
T07vakobhau:6270: tā etā yathot pannaparibhogitvāt yathecchātmanirmitaparibhogitvādyathecchātmapara nirmitaparibhogitvācca tisraḥ kāmopapattaya ityucyante /
T07vakobhau:6273: triṣu dhyāneṣu yā nava bhūmayaḥ tāstisraḥ sukhopapattayaḥ /
T07vakobhau:6274: te hi devā vivekajena samādhijena ca prītisukhena ca niṣprītikena ca sukhena sukhaṃ viharanto dīrghamadhvānaṃ tiṣṭhanti /
T07vakobhau:6281: jambūdvīpāt prabhṛti yaduttaraṃ sthānaṃ tasmādyāvadadho jambūdvīpastāvat punastasmādūrdhvaṃ sthānāntaram /
T07vakobhau:6282: tadyathā caturthī pariṣaṇḍā caturṇāṃ mahārājānāṃ mūlasthānamitaścatvāriṃśadyojanasahasrāṇi
T07vakobhau:6283: tasmādyāvadadhojambūdvīpastāvadūrdhvaṃ tridaśānāṃ sthānam tasmādapi yāvadadho jambūdvīpastāvadūrdhvaṃ yāmānāṃ sthānam /
T07vakobhau:6285: evaṃ vistareṇa sarvamanukramya sudarśanebhyo yāvadadho jambūdvīpastāvadūrdhvaṃmakaniṣṭhānāṃ sthānam /
T07vakobhau:6290: kiṃ punaradharasthānopapannā urdhvāni vimānāni gatvā paśyanti
T07vakobhau:6294: parāśrayeṇa vā yadvṛddhimatā nīyeran devena vā tatratyena /
T07vakobhau:6299: kiṃ tarhi nirmitenādharabhūmikena tadicchayā paśyedihatyamiveti nikāyāntarīyāḥ /
T07vakobhau:6309: atha ko'yaṃ sāhasraścūḍiko lokadhātuḥ ko dvisāhasrastrisāhasro vā /
T07vakobhau:6312: sahasrañjaṃbūdvīpānāṃ pūrvavidehānāmaparagodānīyānāmuttarakuruṇāṃ sahasraṃ sūryāṇāṃ candrāṇāṃ sumerūṇāṃ sahasraṃ cāturmahārājakāyikānāṃ devānāṃ yāvat paranirmitavaśavartināṃ sahasraṃ brahmalokānāmayamucyate sāhasraścūḍiko lokadhātuḥ /
T07vakobhau:6314: teṣāṃ cūḍikānāṃ lokadhātūnāṃ sahasraṃ dvisāhasro madhyamo lokadhātuḥ /
T07vakobhau:6316: teṣāṃ dvisāhasrāṇāṃ lokadhātūnāṃ sahasraṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ
T07vakobhau:6321: kiṃ khalu yathā bhājanānāṃ pramāṇabheda evaṃ tadvāsināmapi sattvānāṃ pramāṇabhedo'sti /
T07vakobhau:6327: pūrvavidehakā godānīkā uttarakauravāśca manuṣyā aṣṭaṣoḍaśadvātriṃśaddhastakā yathākramam /
T07vakobhau:6331: tanmātraṃ śarīraṃ cāturmahārājakāyikānāṃ dvau pādau trāyastriṃśānāṃ trayo yāmānāṃ catvārastuṣitānāṃ pañca nirmāṇaratīnāṃ adhyardhaḥ krośaḥ paranirmitavaśavartinām /
T07vakobhau:6333: rūpiṇāṃ devānāṃ prathame sthāne brahmakāyikānāmardhayojanamātraṃ śarīram /
T07vakobhau:6343: anabhrakāṇāṃ tato yojanatrayeṇa hīnaṃ dviguṇaṃ pañcaviṃśatiyojana śatam /
T07vakobhau:6344: tasmāt pareṇa punaḥ puṇyaprasavānāṃ dviguṇaṃ dviguṇaṃ yāvadakaniṣṭhānāṃ ṣoḍaśayojanasahasrāṇi śarīram /
T07vakobhau:6353: jambūdvīpe nāstyāyuṣo niyamaḥ kadācit bhūyo bhavati kadācidalpīyaḥ /
T07vakobhau:6361: taccāhorātraṃ vyavasthāpya śakyaṃ vaktumiti sa eva caiṣāṃ vyavasthāpyate /
T07vakobhau:6364: yāni manuṣyāṇāṃ pañcāśadvarṣāṇi tāni kāmadhātāvadharāṇāṃ devānāṃ cāturmahārājakāyikānāmekaṃ rātrindivam /
T07vakobhau:6366: tena tatastenāhorātreṇa teṣāṃ triṃśadrātrakeṇa māsena dvādaśamāsakena saṃvatsareṇa divyāni pañcavarṣaśatānyāyuḥ pramāṇam /
T07vakobhau:6373: mānuṣyakāṇi dve catvāryaṣṭau ṣoḍaśa varṣaśatānyekaṃ rātrindivam /
T07vakobhau:6374: tena rātrindevena dve catvāryaṣṭau ṣoḍaśa divyāni varṣasahasrāṇyāyuṣaḥ pramāṇam /
T07vakobhau:6377: puṣpāṇāṃ saṃkocavikāsātkumudabandhu vat śakunīnāṃ kūjanākūjanāt middhāpagamāgamācca ālokakṛtyaṃ svayaṃprabhatvāt /
T07vakobhau:6383: evaṃ yasya yāvadyojanamāśrayastasya tāvatkalpamāyuryavadakaniṣṭhānāṃ ṣoḍaśakalpasahasrāṇyāyuḥ pramāṇam /
T07vakobhau:6389: evaṃ teṣāṃ yathākramaṃ viṃśatiścatvāriṃśat ṣaṣṭiraśītiḥ kalpasahasrāṇyāyuḥpramāṇam /
T07vakobhau:6396: yacca loko viṃśatimantarakalpān vivartate yacca loko viṃśatimantarakalpānvivarta āste yacca viṃśatimantarakalpānsaṃvartate ime ṣaṣṭirantarakalpā mahābrahmaṇo'dhyardhaḥ kalpaḥ uktaḥ /
T07vakobhau:6397: evaṃ ca kṛtvā mahākalpasyārdhaṃ catvāriṃśadantarakalpān kalpīkṛtya teṣāmāyuḥ pramāṇamuktam
T07vakobhau:6403: yāvat ṣaṇṇāṃ kāmāvacarāṇāṃ devanikāyānāmāyuruktaṃ tena tulyā ahorātrāḥ ṣaṭṣu narakeṣu yathākramaṃ veditavyāḥ /
T07vakobhau:6404: saṃjīve kālasūtre saṃghāte raurave mahāraurave tāpane ca /
T07vakobhau:6406: tairidānīṃ svairahorātraisteṣāṃ yathā ṣaṇṇāṃ kāmāvacarāṇāṃ devānāmāyustathaiva yathākramaṃ veditavyam /
T07vakobhau:6408: yaddhi cāturmahārājakāyikānāmāyuḥ pramāṇaṃ tatsaṃjīvane mahānarake ekaṃ rātrindivaṃ /
T07vakobhau:6409: tena yāvat dvādaśamāsakena saṃvatsareṇa tatratyāni pañcavarṣaśatānyāyuḥ /
T07vakobhau:6410: yattrāyastriṃśānāmāyuḥ pramāṇaṃ tat kālasūtre mahānarake ekaṃ rātrindivam
T07vakobhau:6412: evamanyeṣvapi yathāyogaṃ yojyaṃ yāvat paranirmitavaśavartināmāyuḥpramāṇaṃ tattulyenāhorātreṇa tāpane ṣoḍaśa varṣasahasrāṇyāyuḥpramāṇam /
T07vakobhau:6420: uktaṃ hi bhagavatā "aṣṭāvime bhikṣavo nāgā mahānāgāḥ kalpasthā
T07vakobhau:6428: upamānamātreṇa teṣvāyurākhyātaṃ bhagavatā "tadyathā bhikṣavaḥ iha syādviṃśatikhārīko māgadhakastilavāhaḥ pūrṇastilānāṃ cūḍikāvaddhaḥ /
T07vakobhau:6429: tataḥ kaścideva varṣaśatasyātyayādekaṃ tilamapanayate kṣiprataraṃ bhikṣavaḥ saviṃśatikhārīko māgadhastilavāho'nenopakrameṇa parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gacchet /
T07vakobhau:6431: yathā khalu bhikṣavo viṃśatirvudā evameko nirarvudo vistareṇa yathā khalu bhikṣavo viṃśatiḥ padyā evameko mahāpadma" iti /
T07vakobhau:6438: tuṣitastharsyakajātibaddhasya bodhisattvasya caramabhavikasattvasya jinādiṣṭasya jinabhutasya śraddhādharmānusāriṇo bodhisattvacakravarttimātrośca tadgarbhayorityevamādinām /
T07vakobhau:6439: yojanapramaṇena sthānāni śarīrāṇi cotkāni varṣapramāṇenāyuruktaṃ tayośca pramāṇaṃ noktamiti vaktavyaṃ nānā ca sarveṣāṃ vavasthānamatastasyāpi paryanto vaktavyaḥ /
T07vakobhau:6444: kālasya paryantaḥ kṣaṇo nāmnaḥ paryanto'kṣaraṃ tadyathā gauriti /
T07vakobhau:6446: samagreṣu pratyayeṣu yāvatā dharmasyātmalābhaḥ gacchanvā dharmo yāvatā paramāṇoḥ paramāṇvantaraṃ gacchati /
T07vakobhau:6455: tāni sapta gorajaḥ tāni sapta vātāyanacchidrarajaḥ /
T07vakobhau:6458: sapta yavā aṅgulīparva trīṇi parvāṇyaṅgurīti prasiddhameveti noktam /
T07vakobhau:6463: pañcaśatānyeṣāṃ krośo raṇyaṃ ca tanmatam // VAkK_3.87 //
T07vakobhau:6481: catvāro māsā hemantānāṃ catvāro grīṣmāṇāṃ catvāro varṣāṇāmityete dvādaśa māsā saṃvatsaraḥ sārdhamūnarātraiḥ /
T07vakobhau:6492: narakeṣu hi sattvāsaṃbhavāt prabhṛti yāvat bhājanasaṃkṣayaḥ /
T07vakobhau:6497: bhavati sa kālo yannarakeṣu sattvāścyavante nopapadyante /
T07vakobhau:6499: yadayaṃ loko viṃśatyantarakalpān vivṛtto'sthāt tanniryātaṃ vaktavyam /
T07vakobhau:6501: yadā narakeṣvekasattvo nāvaśiṣṭo bhavati iyatā 'yaṃ lokaḥ saṃvṛtto bhavati
T07vakobhau:6502: yaduta narakasaṃvarttanyā yasya tadānīṃ niyataṃ narakavedanīyaṃ karma ghriyate sa lokadhātvantaranarakeṣu kṣipyate /
T07vakobhau:6506: sa kālo yanmanuṣyeṣvanyatamaḥ sattvaḥ svayamanācāryakaṃ dharmatāprātilambhikaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate sa tasmāt vyutthāya vācaṃ bhāṣate sukhaṃ vata vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ śāntaṃ vata vivekajaṃ prītisukhamiti /
T07vakobhau:6507: taṃ ca śabdaṃ śrutvā anye'pi sattvāḥ samāpadyante /
T07vakobhau:6509: yadā jambūdvīpa ekasattvo'pi nāvaśiṣṭo bhavati iyatā'yaṃ lokaḥ saṃvṛtto bhavati yaduta jambūdvīpasaṃvartanyā /
T07vakobhau:6511: yadā manuṣyeṣvekasattvo'pi nāvaśiṣṭo bhavati iyatā'yaṃ lokaḥ saṃvṛtto bhavati yaduta manuṣyagatisaṃvarttanyā
T07vakobhau:6514: evaṃ cāturmahārājakāyikeṣvapi deveṣu prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadya brahmaloka upapadyante /
T07vakobhau:6515: yadā tatraikasattvo'pi nāvaśiṣṭo bhavati iyatā'yaṃ lokaḥ saṃvṛtto bhavati
T07vakobhau:6518: yadaikasattvo'pi kāmāvacareṣu deveṣu nāvaśiṣṭo bhavati iyatā'yaṃ lokaḥ saṃvṛtto bhavati yaduta kāmadhātusaṃvartanyā /
T07vakobhau:6519: brahmaloke'pyanyatamaḥ sattvo dharmatāprātilambhikaṃ dvitīyaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyotthāya vācaṃ bhāṣate sukhaṃ vata samādhijaṃ prītisukhaṃ śāntaṃ
T07vakobhau:6521: taṃ śabdaṃ śrutvā'nye'pi sattvāḥ samāpadyante kālaṃ ca kṛtvā ābhāsvareṣu
T07vakobhau:6523: yadā brahmaloka ekasattvo'pi nāvaśiṣṭo bhavati iyatā'yaṃ lokaḥ saṃvṛtto bhavati yaduta sattvasaṃvartanyā /
T07vakobhau:6524: tataḥ śūnye bhājane ita eva sāmantakāt sattvānāṃ tadākṣepake karmaṇi parikṣīṇe sapta sūryāḥ prādurbhūya krameṇa yāvat pṛthivīṃ sumeruṃ ca niḥśeṣaṃ dahanti /
T07vakobhau:6525: tasmādevaṃ prajvalitādarcirvāyunā kṣiptaṃ śūnyaṃ brāhmaṃ vimānaṃ nirdahat paraiti /
T07vakobhau:6531: narakeṣu sattvānāṃ cyutyanutpādāt prabhṛti yāvat bhājanānāṃ saṃkṣaya eṣa kālaḥ /
T07vakobhau:6533: thamādvāyoḥ prabhṛti yāvannarakeṣu sattvasambhavaḥ eṣa kālo vivartakalpa ityucyate /
T07vakobhau:6534: tathā saṃvṛte hi loka ākāśamātrāvaśeṣaścira kālaṃ tiṣṭhati yāvat punarapi sattvānāṃ karmādhipatyena bhājanānāṃ pūrvanimittabhūtā ākāśe mandamandā vāyavaḥ syandante /
T07vakobhau:6535: tadā yadayaṃ loko viṃśatimantarakalpān saṃvṛtto'sthāttanniryātaṃ vaktavyam
T07vakobhau:6537: tataste vāyavo vardhamānā yathoktaṃ vāyumaṇḍalaṃ jāyate /
T07vakobhau:6538: tataḥ śanairyathoktakramavidhānaṃ sarvaṃ jāyate apmaṇḍalaṃ kāñcanamayī mahāpṛthivī dvīpāḥ sumervādayaśca /
T07vakobhau:6541: iyatā'yaṃ loko vivṛtto bhavati yaduta bhājanavivartanyā /
T07vakobhau:6542: athānyataraḥ sattva ābhāsvarebhyaścyutvā śūnye brāhme vimāna utpadyate /
T07vakobhau:6545: krameṇa yāvaduttarakurau godānīye pūrvavidehe jambūdvīpe preteṣu tiryakṣu narakeṣūpapadyante
T07vakobhau:6546: dharmatā hyeṣā yat paścāt saṃvartate tat pūrvaṃ vivarttate /
T07vakobhau:6547: yadā narakeṣvekaḥ sattvo'pi prādurbhūto bhavati tadā yadayaṃ loko viṃśatimantarakalpān vivartate tanniryātaṃ bhavati /
T07vakobhau:6550: vivartamāne loke ekānna viṃśatirantarakalpā aparimitāyuṣāṃ manuṣyāṇāmatikrāmanti /
T07vakobhau:6557: tebhyo hi daśavarṣāyuṣkebhya utkarṣaṃ gacchantaḥ krameṇāśītivarṣasahasrāyuṣo bhavanti /
T07vakobhau:6566: nātaḥ pareṇa vardhante yāvāneva cānyeṣāmantarakalpānāmutkarṣāpakarṣakālastāvāneva prathamasyāpakarṣakālaḥ paścimasya cotkarṣakāla iti samānakālāḥ sarve bhavanti /
T07vakobhau:6567: iti loko vivṛtto'yaṃ kalpāṃstiṣṭhati viṃśatim // VAkK_3.92 //
T07vakobhau:6571: viṃśatimevāntarakalpān vivartate viṃśatiṃ saṃvartate viṃśatiṃ saṃvṛtta āste /
T07vakobhau:6572: yadyapi tadānīmutkarṣā apakarṣāśca na pravartante kālastu samānaḥ parisaṃkhyāyate /
T07vakobhau:6581: yaducyate tribhirasaṃkhyeyaiḥ kalpānāṃ budhatvaṃ prāpyata" iti /
T07vakobhau:6648: na tu naiva parisaṃkhyātuṃ śakyanta iti /
T07vakobhau:6649: kintu khalu kālaprakarṣeṇaiva kṛtapraṇidhānā bodhisattvā bodhimabhisaṃbudhyante /
T07vakobhau:6651: mahatāṃ hi puṇyajñānasaṃbhāreṇa ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhiḥ bahubhirduṣkaraśatasahasraistribhiḥ kalpāsaṃkhyeyairanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyante bodhisattvāḥ /
T07vakobhau:6652: yadyapyanyathā'pyasti mokṣāvakāśaḥ kimarthaṃ ta iyantaṃ yatnamārabhante /
T07vakobhau:6653: parārthaṃ ta iyantaṃ yatnamārabhante kathaṃ parānapi mahato duḥkhaughāt paritrātuṃ śaknuyāmiti
T07vakobhau:6655: eṣa eva teṣāṃ svārtho yaḥ parārthastasyābhimatatvāt /
T07vakobhau:6658: kāruṇikaistu śraddhitamevaitat yathā ceha kecidabhyastanairdhṛṇyā asatyapi svārthe paravyasanābhiratā upalabhyante /
T07vakobhau:6659: tathā punarabhyastakāruṇyā asatyapi svārthe parahitakriyābhirāmāḥ santīti saṃbhāvyam /
T07vakobhau:6660: yathaiva cābhyāsavaśādanātmabhūteṣu saṃskāreṣu saṃskṛtalakṣaṇānabhijñā ātmasnehaṃ niveśya taddhetorduḥkhānyudvahanti evaṃ punarabhyāsavaśādātmasnehaṃ tebhyo nirvartya pareṣvapekṣāṃ vardhayitvā taddhetorduḥkhānyudvahantīti saṃbhāvyam /
T07vakobhau:6661: gotrāntarameva hi tattathājātīyaṃ nirvartate yat pareṣāṃ duḥkhena duḥkhāyate sukhena sukhāyate nātmana iti /
T07vakobhau:6664: "hīnaḥ prārthayate svasaṃtatigataṃ yaistairūpāyaḥ sukhaṃ madhyo duḥkhanivṛttimeva na sukhaṃ duḥkhāspadaṃ tadyataḥ /
T07vakobhau:6665: śreṣṭhaḥ prārthayate svasaṃtatigatairduḥkhaiḥ pareṣāṃ sukhaṃ duḥkhātyantanivṛttimeva ca yatastadduḥkhaduḥkhyeva saḥ //"
T07vakobhau:6668: aśītivarṣaśatāyupi prajāyāmapakarṣe ārabdhe yāvadvarṣaśatāyuṣo manuṣyā bhavantyetasminnantare buddhā utpadyante /
T07vakobhau:6672: tadā hi pañca kaṣāyā abhyutsadā bhavanti /
T07vakobhau:6674: apakarṣasyādhastāt pratyavarā āyurādayaḥ kiṭabhūtatvāt kaṣāyā ucyante /
T07vakobhau:6687: tathāhi pūrvayogaṃ paṭhanti "parvate kila pañcaśatāni tāpasānāṃ kaṣṭāni tapāṃsi tapyante sma yāvat pratyekabuddhasahoṣitena markaṭenāgamya tadīryāpathasaṃdarśanāt pratyekabodhimabhisaṃbanddhā" iti /
T07vakobhau:6692: mahākalpānāṃ śataṃ bodhisaṃbhāreṣu caritaḥ khaḍgaṃ viṣāṇakalpo bhavati /
T07vakobhau:6697: śakyaṃ ca taiḥ pūrvabuddhānāṃ śāsanamanusmṛtyāpi dharmaṃ deśayitum /
T07vakobhau:6704: anusroto gāminīnāṃ hi prajānāṃ duṣkaraṃ pratisroto nayanam /
T07vakobhau:6708: amite cāyuṣi manuṣyāṇāṃ yāvadaśītisahasrake cotpattiścakravarttināṃ nādhaḥ
T07vakobhau:6714: prathama eṣāmuttamo dvitīya upottamaḥ tṛtīyo madhyamaścaturtho 'dhamaḥ /
T07vakobhau:6723: "yasya rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya mūrdhābhiṣiktasya tadaīva poṣadhe pañcadaśyāṃ
T07vakobhau:6724: śiraḥsnātasyopoṣadho poṣitasyopariprāsādatalagatasyāmātyagaṇaparivṛtasya pūrvasyāṃ diśi cakraratnaṃ prādurbhavati sahasrāraṃ sanābhikaṃ sanemikaṃ sarvākāraparipūrṇaṃ śubhakarmārakṛtaṃ divyaṃ sarvasauvarṇaṃ sa rājā bhavati cakravartī"ti /
T07vakobhau:6727: sūtra ukta" masthānamanavakāśo yadapūrvācaramau dvau tathāgatāvarhantau samyaksaṃbuddhau loka utpadyeyātāṃ nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate sthānametadvidyate yadaikastathāgataḥ /
T07vakobhau:6730: kimatra trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhāturloka iṣṭa utāho sarvalokadhātava iti /
T07vakobhau:6734: eka eva hi bhagavān sarvatra śaktaḥ /
T07vakobhau:6735: yatra buddha eko na śaktaḥ syād vineyān vinetuṃ tatrā'nyo'pi na śakta iti
T07vakobhau:6736: uktaṃ ca sūtre "sa cettvāṃ śāriputra kaścidupasaṃkramyaivaṃ pṛcchet asti kaścidetarhi śramaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā samasamaḥ śramaṇena gotamena yadutābhisaṃbodhāya /
T07vakobhau:6738: sa cenmāṃ bhadanta kaścidupasaṃkramyevaṃ pṛcchettasyāhaṃ pṛṣṭa evaṃ vyākuryā nāsti kaścidetarhhi śṛamaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā samasamo bhagavatā yadutābhisaṃbodhāya /
T07vakobhau:6740: saṃmukhaṃ me bhagavato'ntikācchrutaṃ saṃmukhamudgṛhītaṃ asthānamanavakāso yadapūrvācaramau tathāgatau loka utpadyeyātāṃ nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyata" iti /
T07vakobhau:6741: yattarhi bhagavatoktaṃ brahmasūtre "yāvattrisāhasramahāsāhasrako loko vaśe me'tra vartata" iti /
T07vakobhau:6747: bahavo hi samaṃ saṃbhāreṣu pravartamānā dṛśyante /
T07vakobhau:6748: na caikatra bahūnāṃ buddhānāṃ yugapat yoga utpattuṃ na cāsti tadut pattau kakścit pratibandhaḥ iti niyataṃ lokadhātvantareṣūtpadyante /
T07vakobhau:6749: anantā lokadhātava iti na śakyaṃ bhagavatā kalpamapyāyurvirbhratā yitheha tathā'nyeṣvapi ananteṣu lokadhātuṣu vyāpartuṃ kiṃ punaḥ puruṣāyuṣam /
T07vakobhau:6751: asya pudgalasyedamindriyam iyatā kālelāmuṣmin deśe amuṃ pudgalamāgamyāsya doṣasya parihārādasyāṅgasyopasaṃhārādanena prayogeṇānutpannaṃ votpatsyate aparipūrṇaṃ vā paripūrayiṣyatīti /
T07vakobhau:6752: yattvidaṃ sūtramatropanīta "masthānamanavakāśo yadpūrvācaramau dvī tathāgatāvekatra loka utpadyeyātāmi"ti tadevedaṃ saṃpradhāryate kimidamekaṃ lokadhātumadhikṛtyoktamāhosvit sarvāniti cakravartino'pi cāsya lokaddhātau na syādutpādaḥ /
T07vakobhau:6754: athaitat kṣamyate idaṃ tu kasmānna kṣamyate "puṇyastu buddhānāṃ loka utpāda" iti /
T07vakobhau:6755: yadi bahūnāṃ bahuṣu syānna doṣaḥ syāt /
T07vakobhau:6757: athaiṅkasminnapi kasmāt dvau tathāgatau na sahotpadyete /
T07vakobhau:6759: evaṃ hi bodhisattvāḥ praṇidhānaṃ kurvanti aho vatāhamandhe loke 'pariṇāyake buddho loka utpadyeyamanāthānāṃ nātha iti /
T07vakobhau:6761: ekasminhi buddhe sutarāmādriyante durlabha īdṛśo'nya iti manyamānāḥ sutarāṃ cābhitvarante śāsanapratipattau mā'smin gate parinirvṛte vā 'nāthā
T07vakobhau:6763: athaite cakravartinaḥ suvarṇādimayaiścakraiḥ pṛthivīṃ jayantaḥ kathaṃ jayanti /
T07vakobhau:6766: yasya sauvarṇa cakraṃ bhavati taṃ koṭarājānaḥ svayaṃ pratyudgacchanti /
T07vakobhau:6767: ime devasya janapadāḥ ṛddhāśca sphītāśca kṣemāśca subhikṣāścākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyāśca /
T07vakobhau:6770: yasya rūpyamayaṃ sa svayameva teṣāmantikaṃ yāti paścādasya prahvībhavanti /
T07vakobhau:6771: yasya tāmramayaṃ sa teṣāmantikaṃ gatvā kalahāyate paścāt prahvībhavanti /
T07vakobhau:6772: yasya śastramayaṃ sa teṣāmantikaṃ gacchati anyonyaṃ śastrāṇyāvahanti paścānnamanti /
T07vakobhau:6775: śastreṇāpi jayatāṃ badho na pravartate nirjitya ca sattvān daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayanti
T07vakobhau:6777: sūtra uktaṃ "rājñaścakravartino loke prādurbhāvātsaptānāṃ ratnānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati
T07vakobhau:6778: tadyathā cakraratnasya hastiratnasyāśvaratnasya maṇiratnasya strīratnasya gṛhapatiratnasya pariṇāyakaratnasye"ti /
T07vakobhau:6781: yena tu sattvena tatsaṃbandha saṃvartanīyaṃ karmopacitaṃ tasminnutpanne svānyevainaṃ karmāṇyutpādayanti
T07vakobhau:6789: kiṃ khalu prāthamakalpikā api manuṣyāḥ sarājakā āsan /
T07vakobhau:6794: sūtra uktaṃ "te bhavanti rūpiṇo manomayāḥ sarvāṅgapratyaṅgopetā āvikalā ahīnendriyāḥ śubhā varṇasthāyinaḥ svayaṃ prabhā vihāyasaṃgamāḥ
T07vakobhau:6799: tasyānyatamo lolupajātīyaḥ sattvo gandhaṃ ghrātvā rasaṃ svāditavān bhakṣitavāṃśca /
T07vakobhau:6802: teṣāṃ tadāhārābhyāsāt kharatvaṃ gurutvaṃ ca kāye'vakrāntaṃ prabhāvā antarhitāḥ /
T07vakobhau:6804: so'pyeṣāṃ bhūmirasa āsvādagṛddhānāṃ krameṇāntarhito bhūmiparpaṭakaṃ prādurbhūtam /
T07vakobhau:6809: tasyedānīmaudārikatvānniḥsyandanirvāhārthaṃ sattvānāṃ mūtrapurīṣamārgau saha strīpuruṣendriyābhyāṃ prādurbhūtau saṃsthānaṃ ca bhinnam /
T07vakobhau:6810: teṣāmanyonyaṃ paśyatāṃ pūrvābhyāsavaśādayoniśomanaskāragrāhagrāsatāṃ gatānāṃ kāmarāga udīrṇo yato vipratipannāḥ /
T07vakobhau:6812: te ca khalu taṃ śāliṃ sāyaṃ ca sāyamāśārthaṃ prātaśca prātarāśārthaṃ praveśayanti sma /
T07vakobhau:6815: teṣāṃ tatra mamakāra utpanne sa śālirlūno lūno na punarjāyate sma /
T07vakobhau:6816: tataḥ kṣetrāṇi pravibhajya sveṣvāgrahaṃ kṛtvā parakīyaṃ hartumārabdhāḥ /
T07vakobhau:6818: taisteṣāmaṅkuśārthaṃ sametyānyatamaḥ puruṣaviśeṣaḥ kṣetrāṇi pālayituṃ ṣaṣṭhabhāgena bhṛtaḥ
T07vakobhau:6819: tasya kṣetrāṇāmadhipatiḥ kṣatriyaḥ kṣatriya iti saṃjñotpannā /
T07vakobhau:6820: mahājanakāyasya saṃmataḥ prajāṃ ca rañjayatīti mahāsaṃmato rājeti samjñotpannā /
T07vakobhau:6822: tatra ye gṛhebhyo vahirmanasaḥ saṃvṛttāsteṣāṃ brāhmaṇā iti saṃjñotpannā /
T07vakobhau:6823: athānyatamasya rājño lobhāt samvibhāgamakurvantaḥ sattvānāṃ tāskaryaṃ prācuryamāpannaṃ sa tān śastreṇopasaṃkramate sma /
T07vakobhau:6824: tato'nye naivaṅkārakāḥ sma iti mṛṣā vācaṃ vaktumārabdhāḥ iti
T07vakobhau:6826: tata evaṃ karmapathānāṃ vṛddhau satyāṃ krameṇa hrasatāṃ manusyāṇāṃ daśavarṣāyuṣo manuṣyāḥ saṃbhavanti /
T07vakobhau:6827: ato'sya kṛtsnasyānarthaughasya dvau dharmau mūlayoniḥ rasarāga ālasyaṃ ca
T07vakobhau:6833: antarakalpasya niryāṇakāle daśavarṣāyuṣo manuṣyāḥ adharmarāgaraktā bhavanti viṣamalobhāvibhūtā mithyādharmaparītāḥ /
T07vakobhau:6834: teṣāṃ vyāpāda utkarṣa gato'nyonyaṃ sattvaṃ dṛṣṭvā tīvramāghātacittaṃ
T07vakobhau:6836: tadyathedānīṃ mṛgalubdhakasyāraṇyakaṃ mṛgaṃ dṛṣṭvā te yadyadeva gṛhṇanti kāṣṭham vā loṣṭaṃ vā tatteṣāṃ tīkṣṇaṃ śastraṃ prādurbhavati /
T07vakobhau:6838: punaḥ kalpasya niryāṇakāle daśavarṣāyuṣāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ taireva doṣairamanuṣyā īti mutsṛjanti
T07vakobhau:6840: punardaśavarṣāyuṣāṃ taireva doṣairdevā varṣaṃ notsṛjanti yato durbhikṣaṃ jāyate cañcaḥ śvetāsthi śalākāvṛttiḥ /
T07vakobhau:6843: ya idānīṃ samavāyaḥ sa tadānīṃ cañca ityucyate /
T07vakobhau:6845: te ca manuṣyā jighatsādaurbalyaparītāḥ sametya kālaṃ kurvanti samudreṣu cānāgatajanatā'nugrahārthaṃ bījānyavasthāpayanti /
T07vakobhau:6849: teṣāṃ hi śuṣkarukṣakāyānāṃ kālaṃ kurvatāmāśvevāsthīni śvetāni bhavanti bubhukṣāhatāśca śvetānyasthīni saṃhṛtya kvāthayitvā pivanti /
T07vakobhau:6852: te hi sattvāḥ śalākoddeśikayā gṛheṣvāmirṣaṃ samvibhajante adya gṛhasvāmī bhokṣyate śvo gṛhasvāminītyevamādi dhānyasthānavivarebhyaśca śalākayā dhānyaphalāni niṣkṛṣya bahulodakena kvāthayitvā pivanti evaṃ varṇayanti /
T07vakobhau:6853: yenaikāhamapi prāṇātīpātaviratiḥ samrakṣitā bhavati ekaharītakī vā saṃghāyaikapiṇḍapāto vā satkṛtyānupradatto bhavati sa teṣu śastrarogadurbhikṣāntarakalpeṣu notpadyata iti /
T07vakobhau:6854: atha kiyantaṃ kālametāni śastrāghātarogadurbhikṣāṇi teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ
T07vakobhau:6856: divasān sapta māsāṃśca varṣāṇi ca ythākramam // VAkK_3.99 //
T07vakobhau:6859: durbhikṣaṃ saptavarṣāṇi ca māsāṃśca divasāmśceti samuccayārthaścakāraḥ /
T07vakobhau:6861: vyāpāda udrekaprāpto bhavati vaivastryadaurbalye jighatsāpipāse ca /
T07vakobhau:6865: ekatra dhyāne sattvāḥ samaṃ saṃvartante etasyāmiti saṃvartanī /
T07vakobhau:6866: saptabhiḥ sūryaistejaḥ saṃvartanī bhavati varṣodakenāpsaṃvartanī vāyuprakopādvāyusaṃvartanī
T07vakobhau:6872: nanu ca sattvānāṃ karmajaḥ prabhāvaviśiṣṭo vāyurbījamuktam /
T07vakobhau:6874: "vāyunā lokāntarebhyo bījānyāhriyanta" iti mahīśāsakāḥ sūtre paṭhanti /
T07vakobhau:6887: citro hi guṇadharmo dravyaṃ tu naivam /
T07vakobhau:6888: samānajātīyebhyaḥ eva hi dravyebhyaḥ samānajātīyānāṃ dṛṣṭa utpādastadyathā vīraṇebhyaḥ kaṭasya tantubhyaḥ paṭasyeti /
T07vakobhau:6892: anyo vīraṇebhyaḥ kaṭo'nyaśca tantubhyaḥ paṭa iti /
T07vakobhau:6893: ta eva hi te yathāsaṃniviṣṭāstāṃ tāṃ saṃjñāṃ labhnte /
T07vakobhau:6897: ko hi tadā sataḥ paṭasyopalabdhau pratibandhaḥ /
T07vakobhau:6901: anekā śrayasaṃyogāpekṣaṇe daśāmātrasaṃyoge paṭopalabdhiḥ syānna vā kadācit
T07vakobhau:6906: citrarūpāditve vijātīyārambho'pi syāt acitre ca pārśvāntare paṭasyādarśanaṃ citradarśanaṃ vā /
T07vakobhau:6909: paramāṇvatīndriyatve'pi samastānāṃ pratyakṣatvaṃ yathā teṣāṃ kāryārambhakatvaṃ cakṣurādīnāṃ ca taimirikāṇāṃ ca vikīrṇakeśopalabdhiḥ /
T07vakobhau:6911: rūpādiṣveva ca paramāṇusaṃjñāniveśā ttadvināśe siddhaḥ paramāṇuvināśaḥ /
T07vakobhau:6912: dravyaṃ hi paramāṇuranyacca rūpādibhyo dravyamiti na teṣaṃ vināśe tadvināśaḥ siddhyati /
T07vakobhau:6913: ayuktamasyānyatvaṃ yāvatā na nirdhāryate kenacit imāni pṛthivyaptejāṃsi ima eṣāṃ rūpādaya iti /
T07vakobhau:6914: cakṣuḥsparśanagrāhyāṇi ca prajñāyante dagdheṣu corṇākarpāsakusumbhakuṅkumādiṣu tadbuddhyabhāvādrūpādibhedeṣveva tadbuddhiḥ /
T07vakobhau:6917: ko vā bālapralāpeṣvādaraḥ iti tiṣṭhatu tāvadevāpratiṣedhaḥ /
T07vakobhau:6919: dhyānatrayaṃ dvitīyādi śīrṣa tāsām yathākramam // VAkK_3.100 //
T07vakobhau:6921: tejaḥsaṃvartanyā dvitīyaṃ dhyānaṃ śīrṣaṃ bhavatyadho dahyate /
T07vakobhau:6930: ata evatasmin kṛtsnakāyakrauryāpagamāt duḥkhendriyasya nirodha uktaḥ sūtre
T07vakobhau:6936: pṛthivyeva hi bhājanākhyā tasyāṃ tejojalavāyubhirvirodho na pṛthhivyeti /
T07vakobhau:6940: ato'tra bāhyo'pakṣālo na pravartata iti nāstyatra saṃvartanī /
T07vakobhau:6942: nahi taiḥ śakyamārupyān praveṣṭuṃ nāpyanyatra gantumiti /
T07vakobhau:6944: na nityaṃ saha sattvena tadvimānodayavyayāt // VAkK_3.101 //
T07vakobhau:6959: etena krameṇāpsaṃvartanīnāṃ gate saptake punaḥ tejaḥsaṃvartanīnāṃ saptako bhavati /
T07vakobhau:6963: yathiva hi teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ samāpattiviśeṣādātmabhāvānāṃ sthitiviśeṣastathā bhājanānāmapāmiti tā etā bhavanti ṣaṭpañcāśattejaḥ saṃvartanyaḥ saptāpsaṃvarttanyaḥ ekā vāyusaṃvarttanī /
T07vakobhau:6964: evaṃ ca prajñaptibhāṣyaṃ sunītaṃ bhavati "catuḥṣaṣṭi kalpāḥ śubhakṛtsnānāṃ devānāmāyuḥpramāṇami"ti
T07vakobhau:6966: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodha evaṃvādī mahāśramaṇa" // iti /
T07vakobhau:6971: atha yadetatsattvabhājanalokasya bahudhā vaicitryamukta tat kena kṛtam /
T07vakobhau:6976: yadi karmajaṃ kasmātsattvānāṃ karmabhiḥ kuṅkumacandanādayo ramyatarā jāyante na teṣāṃ śarīrāṇi
T07vakobhau:6977: karmāṇyeva tānyevañjātīyāti vyābhiśrakāriṇāṃ sattvānāṃ yadāśrayāśca vraṇabhūtā jāyante bhogāśca ramyāstatpratīkārabhūtāḥ /
T07vakobhau:6981: sūtra uktaṃ "dve karmaṇī cetanā karma cetayitvā ce"ti /
T07vakobhau:6983: te ete dve karmaṇī trīṇi bhavanti /
T07vakobhau:6997: yattaccetanājanitaṃ cetayitvā karmetyuktaṃ kāyavākkarmaṇī te veditavye /
T07vakobhau:6999: te tu kāyavākkarmaṇī pratyekaṃ vijñaptyavijñaptisvabhāve veditavye /
T07vakobhau:7003: cittavaśena kāyasya tathā tathā saṃsthānaṃ kāyavijñaptiḥ /
T07vakobhau:7012: sarva hi saṃskṛtamātmalābhā dūrdhvaṃ na bhavatīti yatraiva jātaṃ tatraiva dhvasyate /
T07vakobhau:7025: so 'sāvākasmikok vināśo yadi bhāvasyotpannamātrasya na syāt paścādapi na syādbhāvasya tulyatvāt
T07vakobhau:7029: na hi sa eva tasmādvilakṣaṇo yujyate /
T07vakobhau:7032: na ca sarvasyākasmiko vināśaḥ kathaṃ tāvat bhavān kāṣṭhādīnāmagnyādisaṃyogādvināśaṃ paśyāmīti manyate /
T07vakobhau:7035: kimagnisaṃyogātkāṣṭhādayo vinaṣṭā ato na dṛśyante utāho svayaṃ vinaṣṭā anye ca punarnotpannā ato na dṛśyante /
T07vakobhau:7043: kṣaṇikānāṃ ca buddhiśabdārciṣāṃ dṛṣṭa ākasmiko vināśa iti nāyaṃ hetumapekṣate /
T07vakobhau:7047: na hi śaṃsayaniścayajñānayoryuktaṃ samavadhānaṃ sukhaduḥkhayo rāgadveṣayorvā /
T07vakobhau:7048: yadā ca paṭubuddhiśabdānantaramapaṭubuddhiśabdāvutpadyete tadā kathamapaṭuḥ samānajātīyo dharmaḥ paṭīyāṃsaṃ hiṃsyāt /
T07vakobhau:7052: na cāpyutpādavināśahetvordharmārdharmayoḥ kṣaṇe kṣaṇe vṛttilābhapratibandhau bhavitumarhataḥ
T07vakobhau:7053: sakyaṣcaiṣa kāraṇa parikalpaḥ sarvatra samskṛte kartumityalaṃ vivādena /
T07vakobhau:7054: yadi ca kāṣṭhādīnāmagnyādisaṃyogahetuko vināśaḥ syādevaṃ sati pākajānāṃ guṇānāṃ pakvataratamotpattau
T07vakobhau:7058: ghāsādyagnisaṃbandhā guṇāḥ pākajā utpannāstata eva tādṛśādvā punaḥ pakvataratamotpattau teṣāṃ vināśa iti hetureva teṣāṃ vināśakaḥ syāddhetvaviśiṣṭo vā /
T07vakobhau:7059: na ca yuktaṃ yata eva tādṛśāddvā teṣāṃ bhāvastata eva tādṛśācca teṣāṃ punarabhāva iti /
T07vakobhau:7062: yattarhyāpaḥ kvāthyamānāḥ kṣīyante kiṃ tatrāgnisaṃyogāḥ kurvanti /
T07vakobhau:7063: tejodhātuṃ prabhāvato vardhayanti yasya prābhāvādapāṃ saṃghātaḥ kṣāmakṣāmo jāyate yāvadatikṣāmatāṃ gato 'nte na punaḥ saṃtānaṃ saṃtanoti /
T07vakobhau:7065: tasmānnāsti bhāvānāṃ vināśahetuḥ svayameva tu bhaṅguratvādvinaśyanta utpannamātrā vinaśyantīti siddha eṣāṃ kṣaṇabhaṅgaḥ kṣaṇabhaṅgācca gatyabhāvaḥ /
T07vakobhau:7069: ekadiṅmukhe hi bhūyasi varṇa utpanne dīrghaṃ rūpamiti prajñapyate /
T07vakobhau:7074: tadyathā 'lātamekasyāṃ diśi deśāntareṣvanantareṣu nirantaramāśu dṛśyamānaṃ dīrghamiti pratīyate sarvato dṛśyamānaṃ maṇḍalamiti /
T07vakobhau:7078: cakṣuṣā hi dṛṣṭvā dīrghamityavasīyate kāyendriyeṇāpi spṛṣṭveti dvābhyāmasya grahaṇaṃ prāpnuyāt
T07vakobhau:7080: yathā vā spraṣṭavye dīrghādigrahaṇaṃ tathā varṇe saṃbhāvyatām /
T07vakobhau:7082: sa tu sāhacaryāt bhavati na tu sākṣāt grahaṇam /
T07vakobhau:7083: yathā 'gnirūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā tasyoṣṇatāyāṃ smṛtirbhavati puṣpagandhaṃ ca ghrātvā
T07vakobhau:7085: yuktamatrāvyabhicāratvādanyenānyasya smaraṇaṃ natu kiñcit spraṣṭavyaṃ kvacit saṃsthāne niyataṃ yatastatra smaraṇaṃ niyamena syāt /
T07vakobhau:7093: yaccāpi kiñcit sapratighaṃ rūpamasti tadavaśyaṃ paramāṇau vidyate /
T07vakobhau:7095: na ca saṃsthānaṃ paramāṇau vidyate dīrghādi /
T07vakobhau:7097: atha mattaṃ saṃsthānaparamāṇava eva tathā saṃniviṣṭā dīrghādisaṃjñāṃ labhanta iti /
T07vakobhau:7100: na ca saṃsthānāvayavānāṃ varṇādivat svabhāvaḥ siddha iti kuta eṣāṃ saṃcayaḥ /
T07vakobhau:7101: yattarhi varṇaścābhinno bhavati saṃsthānaṃ ca bhinnaṃ dṛśyate mṛdbhājanānām /
T07vakobhau:7102: nanu coktaṃ yathā kṛtvā varṇe dīrghādisaṃjñā prajñapyate tathā ca pipīlikādīnāmabhede paṅkticakrādīnāṃ bhedaḥ prajñāyate tathā saṃsthānasyāpi /
T07vakobhau:7103: yattarhi tamapi dūrādvā varṇamapaśyantaḥ sthāṇvādīnāṃ dairghyādīni paśyanti varṇameva te tatrāvyaktaṃ dṛṣṭvā dīrghādiparikalpaṃ kurvanti /
T07vakobhau:7107: athedānīṃ kāyasya gatiṃ nirākṛṭya samsthānaṃ ca tatra bhavantaḥ sautrāntikāḥ kāṃ kāyavijñarptiṃ prajñapayanti /
T07vakobhau:7110: tāṃ ca prajñapayantaḥ kathaṃ kāyakarma prajñapayanti /
T07vakobhau:7111: kāyādhiṣṭhānaṃ karma kāyakarma yā cetanā kāyasya tatra tatra praṇetrī /
T07vakobhau:7113: yattarhi "cetanā karma cetayitvā ce"tyuktaṃ saṃkalpacetanā pūrvaṃ bhavatyevaṃ saṃkalpacetanā pūrvaṃ bhavatyevaṃ caivaṃ ca kariṣyāmīti /
T07vakobhau:7115: yayā kāyaḥ preryate sā 'sau cetayitvā karmetyucyate /
T07vakobhau:7116: evaṃ tarhi vijñaptyabhāvādavijñaptirapi kāmāvacarī nāstīti mahānto doṣā anuṣajyante /
T07vakobhau:7121: sā 'pi ca vijñaptiḥ satī tadākṣepe cetanāyā balaṃ nibhālayate /
T07vakobhau:7123: dravyameva tu saṃsthānaṃ vaibhāṣikā varṇayanti saṃsthānātmikāṃ tu kāyavijñaptim /
T07vakobhau:7140: yasmin rūpe 'tītānāgatapratyutpanno notpadyate 'nunayo vā pratigho vā
T07vakobhau:7143: na cā vijñaptiṃ virahayyāsti rūpamanidarśanamapratighaṃ nāpyanā sravam /
T07vakobhau:7145: "ebhiḥ saptabhiraupadhikaiḥ puṇyakriyāvastubhiḥ samanvāgatasya śrāddhasya kulaputrasya kuladuhiturvā carato vā svapato vā tiṣṭhato vā jāgrato vā satatasamitamabhivardhata eva puṇyamupajāyata eva puṇyam /
T07vakobhau:7148: akurvataśca svayaṃ paraiḥ kārayataḥ karmapathā na sidhyeyurasatyāmavijñaptau /
T07vakobhau:7155: tatra kiṃ prayojanaṃ syādyadi dharmāyatanāntargatamavijñaptirūpaṃ naśyeta
T07vakobhau:7159: samyagdṛṣṭirbhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchati samyak saṃkalpaḥ samyak vyāyāmaḥ samyak smṛtiḥ samyak samādhiḥ /
T07vakobhau:7160: pūrvameva cāsya samyak vāvakrmāntājīvāḥ pariśuddhā bhavanti paryavadātā"
T07vakobhau:7164: na hi samādānādurdhvaṃ tadasti yenānyamanasko 'pyayaṃ bhikṣuḥ syāt bhikṣuṇī veti /
T07vakobhau:7179: yadapyuktamanāsravarūpokteriti tad eva samādhiprabhāvasaṃbhūtaṃ rūpamanāsrave samādhāvanāsravaṃ varṇayanti yogācārāḥ /
T07vakobhau:7185: paryāyeṇa tarhi tadeva sāsravaṃ cānāsravaṃ ca syāt /
T07vakobhau:7188: yathā tat sāsravaṃ tathā na kadācidanāsravamiti ko 'tra saṃkaraḥ /
T07vakobhau:7189: yadi ca rūpāyatanādīni ekāntena sāsravāṇi syuriha sūtre kimartha viśeṣitāni syu"ryāni rūpāṇi sāsravāṇi sopādānīyāni
T07vakobhau:7192: "dharmatā hyeṣā yathā dātṝṇāṃ dāyāḥ paribhujyante tathā tathā bhoktṝṇāṃ guṇaviśeṣādanugrahaviśeṣāccānyamanasāmapi dātṝṇāṃ tadālambanadānacetanā
T07vakobhau:7193: bhāvitāḥ saṃtatayaḥ sūkṣmaṃ pariṇāmaviśeṣaṃ prāpnuvanti yenāyatyāṃ bahutaraphalābhiniṣpattaye samarthā bhavanti /"
T07vakobhau:7194: "idamabhisaṃdhāyoktaṃ" bhavedabhivardhata eva puṇyamupajāyata eva puṇyam iti /
T07vakobhau:7195: atha mataṃ kathamidānīṃ saṃtānāntaraviśeṣādanyamanaso 'pi saṃtānāntarasya pariṇāmaḥ setsyatīti
T07vakobhau:7197: kathamidānīṃ saṃtānāntaraviśeṣātsaṃtānāntare dharmāntaramavijñaptiḥ setsyatīti nirūpadhikeṣvidānīṃ puṇyakriyāvastuṣu kathaṃ bhaviṣyatīti /
T07vakobhau:7199: avijñaptivādinastu niraupadhike yatra vijñaptirnāsti tatra kathāmavijñaptiḥ syāt /
T07vakobhau:7201: yattarhi sūtra uktaṃ "yasyograbhikṣuḥ śīlavān kalyāṇadharmā piṇḍakaṃ
T07vakobhau:7202: paribhujyāpramāṇaṃ cetaḥsamārdhiṃ kāyena sākṣātkṛtvopasaṃpadya viharatyapramāṇastannidānadāyakasya dānapateḥ puṇyābhiṣyandaḥ kuśalābhiṣyandaḥ sukhāsvādadhāraḥ pratikāṅkṣitavya" ityatra tadānīṃ dātuḥ
T07vakobhau:7205: yadapyuktaṃ "kārayataḥ kathaṃ karmapathāḥ setsyantī"ti tatrāpyevaṃ varṇayanti /
T07vakobhau:7206: tatprayogeṇa pareṣāmupaghātaviśeṣātprayoktuḥ sūkṣmaḥ saṃtatipariṇāma viśeṣo jāyate yata āyatyāṃ samante 'pi bahutaraphalābhinirvarttanasamarthā bhavatīti svayamapi ca kurvataḥ kriyāphalaparisamāptāveṣa eva nyāyo veditavyaḥ /
T07vakobhau:7210: upātteṣu skandheṣu trikālayā cetanayā prāṇātipātāvadhvena spṛśyata iti bhadantaḥ /
T07vakobhau:7211: haniṣyāmi hanmi hatamiti cāsya yadā bhavatīti /
T07vakobhau:7214: svayaṃ tu ghnata etāvāṃścetanāsamudācāra ityayamatrābhiprāyo yuktarūpaḥ syāt /
T07vakobhau:7215: ka idānīmeṣa pradveṣo yadavijñaptiḥ prakṣipyate saṃtatipariṇāmaviśeṣaścābhyupagamyate tathaivāprajñāyamānaḥ
T07vakobhau:7217: kintu cittānvayakāyaprayogeṇa kriyāparisamāptau tābhyāṃ pṛthagbhūtaṃ dharmāntaraṃ prayojayiturutpadyata iti notpadyate paritoṣaḥ /
T07vakobhau:7218: yatkṛtaprayogasaṃbhūtā tu kriyāparisamāptistasyaiva tannimittaḥ saṃtatipariṇāmo bhavatīti bhavati paritoṣaḥ /
T07vakobhau:7229: kimasau vācaṃ bhāṣyate kriyāṃ vā karoti cīvarādīn vā paryeṣate /
T07vakobhau:7236: yadyevamihāpyevaṃ kiṃ na gṛhyate mārgasamāpanno vināpyavijñaptyā tadrūpamāśayaṃ ca āśrayaṃ ca pratilabhate yasya pratilambhāt vyutthito 'pi
T07vakobhau:7237: na punarmithyāvāgādiṣu pravartate samyagvāgādiṣu ca pravartate /
T07vakobhau:7238: ato nimitte naimittikopacāraṃ kṛtvā aṣṭau mārgāṅgāni vyavasthāpyanta iti /
T07vakobhau:7243: tadyāthā 'ṣṭau lokadharmāḥ lābho 'lābhaḥ yaśo 'yaśaḥ nindā praśaṃsā sukhaṃ
T07vakobhau:7246: prātimokṣasaṃvaro 'pi syāt yayā cetanayā vidhipūrvaṃ kṛtvā 'bhyupagamaḥ
T07vakobhau:7251: syādakriyāṃ pratijñāṃ saṃsmṛtya saṃsmṛtya lajjito dauḥśīlyākaraṇāt ityarthameva ca tasyāḥ samādānam /
T07vakobhau:7252: yadi punaravijñaptereva dauḥsīlyaṃ pratibadhnīyāt na kaścitmuṣitasmṛtiḥ śikṣāṃ bhindyāt /
T07vakobhau:7254: yadyasti tacca mahābhūtānyupādāyetyuktam tat kim vijñaptimahābhūtānyevopādāyāvijñaptirutpadyate athānyāni /
T07vakobhau:7256: na hi saiva sāmagrī sukṣmaphalā caudārikaphālā ca yujyate /
T07vakobhau:7257: kiṃ khalu yadātanī vijñaptistadātanānyeva sā mahābhūtānyupādāya vartate /
T07vakobhau:7258: sarvamupādāyarūpaṃ prāyeṇaivaṃ kiñcittu vartamānamanāgataṃ cātītāni mahābhūtānyupādāya /
T07vakobhau:7268: kāmāvacaraṃ kāyavākkarmaṃ kāmāvacarāṇyeva mahābhūtānyupādāya evaṃ yāvaccaturthadhyānabhūmikaṃ tadbhūmikānyevopādāya /
T07vakobhau:7270: asravaṃ tu kāyavākkarma yasyāṃ bhūmau jātastadutpādayati tadbhūmikānyupādāya tadveditavyam
T07vakobhau:7281: sā samādhisaṃbhūtānyaupacayikānyanupātāni ca mahābhūtānyupādāyotpadyate abhinnāni ca yānyeva ca bhūtānyupādāya prāṇātipātādviratirutpadyate tānyeva yāvat saṃbhinnapralāpāt /
T07vakobhau:7287: kiṃ punariyaṃ vijñaptirutpadyamānā pūrvakasya saṃsthānasya saṃtānaṃ bādhitvotpadyate utāho na /
T07vakobhau:7293: anyānyeva tāni naiḥṣyandikāni tadānīmupajāyante yānyupādāya vijñaptirbhavati /
T07vakobhau:7294: evaṃ tarhi yadyadevāṅgaṃ niśrityotpadyate vijñaptistena tenāṅgena mahīyasā bhavitavyam /
T07vakobhau:7296: anabhivyāpane ca punaḥ kathaṃ kṛtsnāṅgena vijñapayet /
T07vakobhau:7298: tat khalvetat karma paryāyeṇa dvividhaṃ trividhaṃ pañcavidhaṃ cottam /
T07vakobhau:7303: evaṃ vākkarma cetanā ceti pañcavidhaṃ bhavati /
T07vakobhau:7308: avyākṛtaṃ hi cittaṃ durbalamato na śaktaṃ balavatkarmākṣeptuṃ yanniruddhe 'pi tasminnanuvadhnīyāt
T07vakobhau:7337: kāmadhātau prathame ca dhyāne na tata ūrdhvam /
T07vakobhau:7342: sa hi svaparṣanmadhye āyuṣmato 'śvajitaḥ kṣepārthamātmānaṃ kṣiptavāt /
T07vakobhau:7343: tata ūrdhvamasatyāṃ vāgvijñaptau kathaṃ tatra śabdāyatanaṃ bāhyamahābhūtahetukam /
T07vakobhau:7348: na hi teṣūpapannastajjātīyamadhobhūmikaṃ cittaṃ saṃmukhīkaroti yena tāṃ vijñaptiṃ samutthāpayet
T07vakobhau:7351: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇamūrdhvaṃ brahmalokānnāsti vijñaptiḥ kāmadhātau ca nivṛktāvyākṛtā nāsti /
T07vakobhau:7354: tacca dvitīyādiṣu dhyāneṣu nāsti bhāvanāprahātavyena cotthāpyate /
T07vakobhau:7357: kiṃ khalu samutthānavaśādevaṃ dharmāṇāṃ kuśalākuśalatvaṃ veditavyam /
T07vakobhau:7360: caturbhiḥ prakāraiḥ paramārthataḥ svabhāvataḥ saṃprayogataḥ samutthānataśca /
T07vakobhau:7370: taireva kuśalamūlahyar patrāpyaiḥ saṃprayuktā dharmāḥ saṃprayogeṇa kuśalāstairasaṃprayuktānāṃ kuśalatvābhāvādauṣadhamiśrapānīyavat /
T07vakobhau:7372: kāyavāvakkarmaṇi cittaviprayuktāśca saṃskārajātyādayaḥ prāptinirodhāsaṃjñisamāpattayastaireva kuśalamūlādisaṃprayuktai dharmaḥ samupasthāpitāḥ samutthānena kuśalāḥ /
T07vakobhau:7374: prāptīnāṃ tu visabhāgacittasamutthāpitānāṃ kathaṃ kuśalatvamiti vaktavyam
T07vakobhau:7384: evaṃ tarhi na kiñcitsāsravamavyākṛtaṃ bhaviṣyati kuśalaṃ vā /
T07vakobhau:7386: paramārthata evamuktaṃ vipākaṃ tu prati yatsāsravaṃ na vyākriyate tadavyākṛtamityucyate /
T07vakobhau:7393: yadi samutthānavaśātkuśalākuśalatvaṃ kāyavākkarmaṇaḥ kiṃ na mahābhūtānām /
T07vakobhau:7395: samāhitasyāvijñaptau nāstyabhiprāyo na cāsamāhitaṃ cittaṃ tasyāḥ samutthāpakaṃ visabhāgabhūmikatvāditi kathaṃ tasyāḥ kuśalatvam /
T07vakobhau:7399: kiṃ tarhi bhagavatoktaṃ "tato 'pi mithyādṛṣṭermithyāsaṃkalpaḥ prabhavati mithyā vāgmithyākarmānta" mityevamādi /
T07vakobhau:7408: tena hi vinā 'sau mṛtasyeva na syādā kṣiptā 'pi satī /
T07vakobhau:7424: naivaṃ bhaviṣyati yathā na kuśalākuśalāni bhavanti /
T07vakobhau:7442: kiṃ khalu yathā pravartakaṃ tathaivānuvartakaṃ bhavati /
T07vakobhau:7452: na tu kadācit kuślaṃ pravartakamanuvartakaṃ cāvyākṛtaṃ bhavati /
T07vakobhau:7455: kuśalaikatānā hi buddhānāṃ saṃtatayo nityaṃ samāhitatvāt /
T07vakobhau:7458: svapan samāhito nāgo niṣaṇṇo 'pi samāhita" iti /
T07vakobhau:7459: anicchayā 'sya cittasyāvisaraṇādevamuktaṃ na tu na santyavyākṛtāni vipākajairyā pathikanirmāṇacittāni buddhānāmiti vaibhāṣikāḥ /
T07vakobhau:7463: vipākajaṃ tu cittaṃ naiva pravartakaṃ nānuvartakaṃ nirabhisaṃskāravāhitvāt
T07vakobhau:7469: na vā sarvaṃ darśanaprahātavyaṃ pravartakamiti viśeṣaṇaṃ vaktavyam /
T07vakobhau:7470: yathānuvartakaṃ cet akukśalāvyākṛtacittasya prātimokṣavijñaptiḥ kuśalā na prāpnoti /
T07vakobhau:7471: yathā pravartakaṃ tathā vijñaptirnatu yathā darśanaprahātavyam /
T07vakobhau:7473: yadi nānuvartakavaśādvijñapteḥ kuśalāditvaṃ na tarhīdaṃ vaktavyam /
T07vakobhau:7492: bhikṣusaṃvaro bhikṣuṇīsaṃvaraḥ śikṣamāṇāsaṃvara śrāmaṇerasaṃvaraḥ śrāmaṇerīsaṃvaraḥ upāsakasaṃvara upāsikāsaṃvara upavāsasaṃvaraśca /
T07vakobhau:7506: parivṛtte hi vyañjane bhikṣurbhikṣuṇītyucyate bhikṣuṇī ca punarbhikṣuḥ /
T07vakobhau:7507: śrāmaṇerītyucyate śrāmaṇerī ca punaḥ śikṣamāṇā ca śrāmaṇeraḥ /
T07vakobhau:7508: upāsaka upāsiketyucyate upāsikā ca punarūpāsaka iti /
T07vakobhau:7509: na ca vyañjanaparivṛttau pūrvasaṃvaratyāge kāraṇamasti nāpyapūrvasaṃvarapratilambhe /
T07vakobhau:7510: tasmādabhinna eṣāṃ caturṇā saṃvarāṇāṃ tribhyaḥ svabhāvaḥ /
T07vakobhau:7511: ya upāsakasaṃvarācchrāmaṇerasaṃvaraṃ samādatte tasmācca punarbhikṣusaṃvaraṃ kiṃ te saṃvarā virativṛddhiyogādanyo 'nya ucyante pañcadaśa viṃśativat dīnāraśateravacca āhosvit pṛthageva te sakalā jāyante
T07vakobhau:7520: yathā yathā hi vahutarāṇi śikṣāpadāni samāditsate tathā tathā bahutarebhyo maddapramādapadebhyo nivartamāno bahutarebhyaḥ prāṇātipātādīnāṃ nidānebhyo nivartate viratīnāṃ ca nidāneṣu pravartata iti nidānaviśeṣādviratīnāṃ viśeṣaḥ /
T07vakobhau:7521: evaṃ cāsati bhikṣusaṃvaraṃ pratyācakṣāṇastrīnapi saṃvarānvijahyāddayorapi tatrāntarbhāvāt
T07vakobhau:7528: kathaṃ cāyamupāsako bhavati kathamupavāsastho yāvat bhikṣuḥ /
T07vakobhau:7539: sarvebhya eva varjanīyebhyaḥ kāyavākkarmabhyaḥ viratisamādānāt bhikṣurityucyate /
T07vakobhau:7550: na kurvanti tayā samāttayā lajjinaḥ pāpamityakriyetyucyate /
T07vakobhau:7551: sāpi tu vijñapticittābhyāṃ kriyata iti kriyā bhavati /
T07vakobhau:7562: dvitīyādiṣu kṣaṇeṣui prātimokṣasaṃvara eva na prātimokṣaḥ /
T07vakobhau:7593: tābhyāṃ dauḥśīlyasya tatsamutthāpakānāṃ ca kleśānāṃ prahāṇāt /
T07vakobhau:7594: ata eva syāddhyānasaṃvaro na prahāṇasaṃvara iti catuṣkoṭikaṃ kriyate //
T07vakobhau:7599: evaṃ syādanāsravasaṃvaro na prahāṇasaṃvara iti catuṣkoṭikaṃ yathāyogaṃ veditavyam /
T07vakobhau:7602: manasā saṃvaraḥ sādhu sādhu sarvatra saṃvaraḥ /
T07vakobhau:7609: pratyekaṃ dvisvabhāvajñapanārthaṃ punardvigrahaṇaṃ mā yathāsaṃkhyaṃ vijñāyīti manaḥsaṃvaro 'pi smṛtisaṃprajñānasvabhāva iti /
T07vakobhau:7612: kaḥ katamayā vijñaptyā 'vijñaptyā vā kiyantaṃ kālaṃ samanvāgata iti /
T07vakobhau:7616: yaḥ prātimokṣāsaṃvarasthaḥ pudgala uktaḥ sa yāvattāmavijñaptir na tyajati tāvattayā vartamānayā nityaṃ samanvāgataḥ /
T07vakobhau:7622: asaṃvarastho 'pi yāvadasaṃvaraṃ na tyajati tāvannityamavijñaptyā vartamānayā samanvāgataḥ
T07vakobhau:7627: prathame hi kṣaṇe sa janmāntaratyaktaṃ dhyānasaṃvaramatītaṃ labhate /
T07vakobhau:7631: sa prathame kṣaṇe nātītayā samanvāgato mārgasya pūrvamanutpāditatvāt /
T07vakobhau:7633: tau dhyānānāsravasaṃvarānvitau samāhitaryamārgasamāpannau vartamānayā avijñaptyā samanvāgatau yathākramaṃ na tu vyutthitau /
T07vakobhau:7637: yo naiva saṃvare nāsaṃvare sthitaḥ sa madhyasthaḥ /
T07vakobhau:7639: yasya tvasti dauḥśīlyaśīlāṅgādisaṃgṛhītā sa ādau madhyayā samanvāgataḥ /
T07vakobhau:7644: kimasaṃvarasthaḥ kadācitkuśalayā vijñaptyā samanvāgato bhavati saṃvarastho vā punarakuśalayā bhavati /
T07vakobhau:7649: stavavandanādikriyāṃ kurvataḥ yena ca kleśavegena saṃvarasthasyākuśalā
T07vakobhau:7652: sa ādye kṣaṇe vartamānayaivāvijñaptyā samanvāgato bhavatyanyeṣvatītayā 'pi
T07vakobhau:7654: vijñaptyā tu punaḥ sarve kurvanto madhyayānvitāḥ /
T07vakobhau:7655: sarve saṃvarāsaṃvaramadhyasthā yāvadijñaptiṃ kurvanti tāvattayā vartamānayā samanvāgatāḥ /
T07vakobhau:7659: anāgatayā tu vijñaptyā na kaścit samanvāgataḥ /
T07vakobhau:7662: durbalasya hi dharmasya prāptirapi durbalā nānubandhībhavati /
T07vakobhau:7672: asaṃvaro duścaritaṃ dauḥśīlyaṃ karmaṃ tatpathaḥ // VAkK_4.24 //
T07vakobhau:7682: mṛdvyā cetanayā kuśalamakukśalaṃ vā kurvannaivasaṃvaranāsaṃvarasthito vijñaptyaiva samanvāgato bhavati nāvijñaptyā prāgevāvyākṛte anyatraupadhikapuṇyakriyāvastukarmapathebhyaḥ /
T07vakobhau:7684: avijñaptyaiva samanvāgato na vijñaptyā yenāryapudgalena janmāntaraparivṛttau na tāvadvijñaptaṃ vā punarvihīnam /
T07vakobhau:7688: yadā dhyānabhūmikaṃ cittaṃ pratilabhyate maulīyaṃ sāmantakīyaṃ vā sāsravaṃ tadā dhyānasaṃvaro 'pi sahabhūtatvāt /
T07vakobhau:7692: tatra ṣaṭ dhyānabhūmayo 'nāsravā bhavanti catvāri dhyānāni
T07vakobhau:7696: yadyenaṃ paro vijñapayati asau ca param /
T07vakobhau:7701: svayaṃbhūtvena buddhānāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ ca niyāmāvakrāntyā pañcakānām ehibhikṣukayā yaśaḥprabhṛtīnām śāsturabhyupagamānmahākāśyapasya praśnārādhanena sodāyinaḥ gurudharmābhyupagamena mahāprajāpatyāḥ dūtena dharmadinnāyāḥ vinayaddharapañcamena pratyantimeṣu janapadeṣu daśavargeṇa madhyeṣu janapadeṣu śaraṇagamanaṃ traivācikena ṣaṣṭibhadravargapūgopasaṃpāditānāmiti teṣāṃ nāvaśyaṃ vijñaptyadhīnaḥ prātimokṣasaṃvaraḥ /
T07vakobhau:7702: sa punareṣa prātimokṣāsaṃvaraḥ samādīyamānaḥ kiyantaṃ kālaṃ samādātavyaḥ /
T07vakobhau:7704: saptanaikāyikasya prātimokṣasaṃvarasya yāvajjīvaṃ samādānam upavāsasaṃvarasyāhorātramityeṣa niyamaḥ /
T07vakobhau:7715: athāhorātrādūrdhvaṃ pañcarātraṃ daśarātraṃ vā upavāsasamādānasya kaḥ pratibandho bahūnāmupavāsasaṃvarāṇāmutpattau
T07vakobhau:7718: kiṃ tāvadahorātrādūrdhvaṃ saṃvarasyānutpartti paśyatā tathāgatenāhorātrika upavāso deśita utāho durbalendriyāṇāmahorātrake 'pi saṃvarasamādānena saṃniyojanārthamiti /
T07vakobhau:7727: na kila kaścidevamasaṃvaraṃ samādatte yathopavāsaṃ kaccidahamahorātramasaṃvṛtaḥ syāmiti /
T07vakobhau:7729: evaṃ caiva na kaścidādatte kaccidahaṃ yāvajīvamasaṃvṛtaḥ syāmiti /
T07vakobhau:7731: yadyapi naivamādatte tathāpyatyantavipannenāśayena tāṃ kriyāṃ prakurvannasaṃvaraṃ pratilabhate na kālāntaravipannena /
T07vakobhau:7734: yadi punaḥ kaścidasaṃvareṇāpyarthī kālāntaramasaṃvaraṃ samādadīta so
T07vakobhau:7745: yastu pūrvakṛtasamādāno nityamaṣṭabhyāmupaceṣyāmīti sa bhuktvāpi gṛhṇīyāt
T07vakobhau:7746: anyataśca grahītavyo na svayamevāparāpekṣayā satsvapi pratyayeṣvanatikramārtham /
T07vakobhau:7747: nīcaiḥ sthitenotkuṭṭakena vā jānupātena vā kapotakamañjaliṃ kṛtvā 'nyatra
T07vakobhau:7760: evaṃ ca kṛtvā aurabhrikapāradārikayo rātridivasopavāsakayoḥ sāphalyaṃ prayujyate /
T07vakobhau:7764: "poṣaṃ dadhāti manasaḥ kuśalasya yasmāduktastato bhagavatā kila
T07vakobhau:7778: madyaṃ hi pivataḥ kāryā kāryasmṛtireva naśyet /
T07vakobhau:7786: evaṃ tu sati sūtrapāṭho na yujyeta /
T07vakobhau:7787: akālabhojanādvirati muktvā "anenāhamaṣṭamāṅgena teṣāmāryāṇāmarhatāṃ śikṣāyāmanuśikṣe anuvidhīya" iti /
T07vakobhau:7790: yathā sthasyāṅgāni caturaṅgo balakāyaḥ pañcāṅgaṃ tūryaṃ tathā 'ṣṭāṅga
T07vakobhau:7792: akālabhojanāt prativiratirūpavāsa upavāsāṅgaṃ ca yathā samyagdṛṣṭirmārgo mārgāṅgaṃ ca /
T07vakobhau:7793: dharmapravicayasaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ bodhirvodhyaṅgaṃ samādhirdhyānaṃ dhyānāṅgaṃ ceti vaibhāṣikāḥ
T07vakobhau:7794: natu teṣāmeva samyagdṛṣṭyādīnāṃ ta evāṅgatvāya kalpanta iti /
T07vakobhau:7795: pūrvakāḥ samyagdṛṣṭyādaya uttareṣāmaṅgaṃ yadi syuḥ prathamakṣaṇotpanna āryamārgo nāṣṭāṅgaḥ syāt /
T07vakobhau:7798: anupavāsako 'pi yastamahorātraṃ buddhadharmasaṃghān śaraṇaṃ gatvopavāsaṃ gṛhṇāti tasyotpadyate upavāsasaṃvaro nānyathā /
T07vakobhau:7800: sūtra uktaṃ "yataśca mahānāman gṛhī avadātavasanaḥ puruṣaḥ puruṣendriyeṇa samanvāgato buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchati dharmaṃ saṃghaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchati vācaṃ ca bhāṣate upavāsakaṃ ca māṃ dharaya iyatā upāvāsako bhavatī"ti /
T07vakobhau:7814: yathaivaṃ bhikṣurlabdhasaṃvaro 'pi punaḥ śikṣāpadāni grāhyate śrāmaṇeraśca vyutpādanārthamita ścāmutaśca te saṃvara iti tathopavāsako 'pi na tu vinā
T07vakobhau:7817: yadi sarva evopāsakā upāsakasaṃvarasthāḥ kathaṃ bhagavatā ekadeśakārī pradeśakārī yadbhūyaḥkārī pūripūrṇakārī copāsaka uktaḥ /
T07vakobhau:7819: yo hi yacchikṣāpadaṃ pālayati sa tatkārītyuktaḥ /
T07vakobhau:7824: na hyevaṃ sūtrapāṭhaḥ ukto yathā mahānāmasūtre pāṭhaḥ /
T07vakobhau:7827: tatra te dṛṣṭasatyā "avetyaprasādānvayaṃ prāṇairapi saddharmopagamanaṃ darśayanti sma /
T07vakobhau:7832: ekadeśakāryādīṃstu khaṇḍitaśikṣānadhikṛtya praśna eva na yujyate /
T07vakobhau:7834: ko hyapāsakasaṃvaraṃ jānan etanna jñāsyate yo hi yacchikṣāpadaṃ na khaṇḍayati sa tatkārī bhavatīti
T07vakobhau:7835: upāsakasaṃvarasya tu parimāṇānabhijñāṃstanmātraśikṣākṣamān pratyeṣa praśno yujyate /
T07vakobhau:7836: "kiyatā bhadantopāsaka ekadeśakārī bhavati yāvat paripūrṇakārī bhavati /"
T07vakobhau:7837: yadi tarhi vinā saṃvareṇopāsakaḥ syādvikalena vā bhikṣuśrāmaṇerāvapi syātām /
T07vakobhau:7841: vināpi hi saṃvareṇopāsakaḥ prajñaptito na tu bhikṣuśrāmaṇerāviti te tvetannecchanti kāśmīrāḥ
T07vakobhau:7845: evaṃ ca kṛtvā 'rhato 'pi mṛduḥ prātimokṣasaṃvaraḥ syāt
T07vakobhau:7849: yo buddhadharmasaṃghāñcharaṇaṃ gacchati kimasau śaraṇaṃ gacchati /
T07vakobhau:7851: nirvāṇaṃ ceti śaraṇaṃ yo yāti śāraṇatrayam // VAkK_4.32 //
T07vakobhau:7852: yo buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchati aśaikṣānasau budhakarakāndharmāñcharaṇaṃ gacchati yeṣāṃ prādhānyena sa ātmabhāvo budhā ityucyate yeṣāṃ vā lābhena sarvāvabodhasāmarthyādbuddho bhavati /
T07vakobhau:7859: yaḥ saṃghaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchati śaikṣāśaikṣānasausaṃghakarakānharmān gacchati yeṣāṃ lābhenāṣṭau pudgalāḥ saṃghībhavanti /
T07vakobhau:7863: yattu sūtra uktaṃ "yo 'pyasau bhaviṣyatyanāgate 'dhvani saṃgho nāma tamapi
T07vakobhau:7866: yo dharmaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchati asau nirvāṇaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchati pratisaṃkhyānirodham /
T07vakobhau:7868: yadyaśaikṣā dharmā eva buddhaḥ kathaṃ tathāgatasyāntike dukṣṭacittarudhirotpādanādānantaryaṃ bhavati /
T07vakobhau:7870: śāstraṃ tu naivaṃ vācakamaśaikṣā dharmā eva buddha iti /
T07vakobhau:7874: anyathā hi laukikacittastho na buddhaḥ syānna saṃghaḥ śīlameva ca bhikṣukarakaṃ bhikṣuḥ syāt
T07vakobhau:7875: yathā tu yo bhikṣūn pūjayati bhikṣukarakamasau śīlaṃ pūjayati /
T07vakobhau:7876: evaṃ yo buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchatyaśaikṣānasau buddhakarakāndharmān śaraṇaṃ gacchati /
T07vakobhau:7884: "bahavaḥ śaraṇaṃ yānti parvatāṃśca vanāni ca ārāmānvṛkṣāṃścaityāṃśca manuṣyā bhayavarjitāḥ
T07vakobhau:7887: yastu buddhaṃ ca dharmaṃ ca saṃghaṃ ca śaraṇaṃ gataḥ /
T07vakobhau:7894: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇamanyeṣu saṃvareṣvabrahmacaryādviratiḥ śikṣāpadaṃ vyavasthāpitam upāsakasya tu kāmamithyācārāt /
T07vakobhau:7899: sukarā ca kāmamithyācārādviratirgṛhānadhyāvasatāṃ duṣkarātvabrahmacaryāditi duṣkaraṃ karttuṃ notsaheran /
T07vakobhau:7901: janmāntareṣvapyanadhyācaraṇānnatvabrahmacryādityupāsakasyāpi tasmādeva viratiḥ śikṣāpadaṃ vyavasthāpitaṃ mā bhūt parivṛttajanmāntaraḥ śaikṣa upāsakasaṃvarāṅgeṣvasaṃvṛta iti /
T07vakobhau:7903: ya upāsakāḥ santo bhāryāḥ pariṇayanti kiṃ taistābhyo 'pi saṃvaraḥ pratilabdho 'tha na /
T07vakobhau:7907: yathābhyupagamaṃ lābhaḥ saṃvarasya na saṃtateḥ // VAkK_4.33 //
T07vakobhau:7911: na tvatra saṃtāne mayā brahmacaryaṃ na kartavyamityata evaiṣāṃ tadadhiṣṭhātkāmamithyācārāṅgādeva saṃvaralābho nābrahmacaryāditi nāsti bhāryībhūtāyāṃ saṃvarakṣobhaḥ /
T07vakobhau:7912: atha kasmāt mṛṣāvādād viratirevopāsakasaṃvaraśikṣāpadaṃ na paiśunyādiviratiḥ /
T07vakobhau:7916: sarvatra hi śikṣātikrame samanuyujyamānasyopasthitamidaṃ bhavati nāhamevamahārṣamiti mṛṣāvādasya prasaṅgo bhavatyato mṛṣāvādādviratirvidhīyate kathaṃ kṛtātikramo 'pyātmani māviṣkuryāditi kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ pratikṣepaṇasāvadyācchikṣāpadasya na vyavasthāpitam /
T07vakobhau:7924: śakyaṃ tu madyaṃ pratīkārabuddhyaiva pātuṃ yāvanna madayet /
T07vakobhau:7926: na tat kliṣṭaṃ yadamadanīyamātrāṃ viditvā pibati /
T07vakobhau:7931: idaṃ coktaṃ māṃ bhikṣavaḥ śāstāramuddiśadbhiḥ kuśāgreṇāpi madyaṃ na pātavyami" tyataḥ prakṛtisāvadyamiti jñāyate /
T07vakobhau:7941: ata evātra pramādasthānagrahaṇaṃ nānyeṣu teṣāṃ prakṛtisāvadyatvāt /
T07vakobhau:7947: te ca kadācidaprāptacyutamadyabhāve bhavataḥ ityato madyagrahaṇam /
T07vakobhau:7951: ya ime trayaḥ prātimokṣadhyānānāsravasaṃvarāḥ kimeṣāṃ yata eko labhyate tataḥ śeṣau /
T07vakobhau:7955: vartamānebhya eva skandhāyatana dhātubhyaḥ kāmāpta iti prātimokṣasaṃvaraḥ
T07vakobhau:7957: ubhayebhya iti sattvāsattvākhyebhyaḥ prakṛtipratikṣepaṇasāvadyebhyaśca vartamānebhya eva skandhāyatanadhātubhyo labhyate /
T07vakobhau:7961: maulebhya eva karmapathebhyo dhyānānāsravasaṃvarau labhyete na prayogapṛṣṭhebhyaḥ kuta eva prajñaptisāvadyebhyaḥ sarvakālebhyaśca skandhāyatanadhātubhyo labhyete atītānāgatebhyo 'pi ata eva catuṣkoṭikaṃ kriyate /
T07vakobhau:7962: santi tāni skandha dhātvāyatanāti yebhyaḥ prātimokṣasaṃvaraḥ eva labhyate na dhyānānāsravasaṃvarāviti vistaraḥ /
T07vakobhau:7967: natu saṃvarakāle vartamānāḥ karmapathāḥ santīti vartamānādhiṣṭhānebhyaḥ iti vaktavyam /
T07vakobhau:7969: atha kiṃ saṃvarāsaṃvarau sarvasattvebhya eva labhyete sarvāṅgebhyaḥ sarvakāraṇaiśca āhosvidasti bhedaḥ /
T07vakobhau:7972: sarvasattvebhya eva saṃvaro labhyate kebhyaścit aṅgebhyastu vibhāṣā /
T07vakobhau:7983: paścimaṃ paryāyaṃ niyamayyocyate asti saṃvarasthāyī sarvasattveṣu saṃvṛto na sarvāṅgaiḥ na sarvakāraṇaiḥ /
T07vakobhau:7984: yo mṛdunā cittena madhyenādhimātreṇa vā upāsakovāsa śrāmaṇerasaṃvaraṃ samādatte /
T07vakobhau:7985: asti sarvasattveṣu saṃvṛtaḥ sarvaṅgaiśca na tu sarakāraṇaiḥ /
T07vakobhau:7986: yo mṛdunā cittena madhyenādhimātreṇa vā bhikṣusaṃvaraṃ samādatte /
T07vakobhau:7989: asti sarvasattveṣu sarvakāraṇaiśca na tu sarvāṅgaiḥ /
T07vakobhau:7992: yasmātsarvasattvānugate kalyāṇāśaye sthitaḥ saṃvaraṃ pratilabhate nānyathā pāpāśayasyānuparatatvāt
T07vakobhau:8003: yadi punaḥ śakyebhya eva saṃvaro labhyate cayāpacayayuktaḥ syāt /
T07vakobhau:8005: evaṃ ca sati vināpi lābhatyāgakāraṇābhyāṃ saṃvarasya lābhatyāgau syātāmiti vaibhāṣikāḥ /
T07vakobhau:8007: yathā hyapūrvatṛṇādyutpattau śoṣe vā saṃvarasya vṛddhihlāsau na bhavatastathā śakyāśakyasaṃcāre 'pi na syātām /
T07vakobhau:8008: na sattvānāṃ pūrvaṃ paścācca bhāvāttṛṇādīnāṃ tvabhāvāt /
T07vakobhau:8009: ko nvatra viśeṣo na vā bhavedasatsu tṛṇādiṣu saṃvarastadvadaśakyo vā bhavet /
T07vakobhau:8010: yadā ca parinirvṛtā na bhavantyeva tadā kathaṃ saṃvarahlāso na syāditi naiṣa yuktaḥ parihāraḥ
T07vakobhau:8012: evaṃ tarhi pūrvabuddhaparinirvṛtebhya uttareṣāṃ buddhānāṃ pratimokṣasaṃvarasyā lābhātkathaṃ śīlanyūnatā na prasajyeta /
T07vakobhau:8016: asamvarastu sarvebhyaḥ sarvāṅgebhyo na kāraṇaiḥ // VAkK_4.36 //
T07vakobhau:8020: yo mṛdunā cittenāsaṃvaraṃ pratilabhate so 'dhimātreṇāpi cittena prāṇinaṃ jīvitādvyaparopayanmṛdunaivā saṃvareṇa samanvāgato bhavatyadhimātrayā tu prāṇātipātavijñaptyā /
T07vakobhau:8022: tatreme āsaṃvarikāstadyathā aurabhrikāḥ kaukkuṭikāḥ saukarikāḥ śākunikā mātsikā mṛgalubdhakāścaurā vadhyaghātakā bandhanapālakā nāgabandhakāḥ śvapākā vāgurikāśca /
T07vakobhau:8023: rājāno daṇḍanetāro vyāvahārikāścārthata āsaṃvarikāḥ asaṃvare bhavatvāt tatrashatayā asaṃvara eṣāmastīti āsaṃvarikā vā /
T07vakobhau:8028: aurabhrikādīnāṃ tu mātāpitṛputradārādiṣvavipannāśayānāṃ jīvitahetorapyahantukāmānāṃ kathamasaṃvaraḥ sarvasattvebhyo yujyate /
T07vakobhau:8030: na hi tāvatte ta eva iti vidvāṃso hanyuḥ /
T07vakobhau:8031: āryībhūtānāṃ ca punaḥ paśu bhavituṃ nāstyavakāśa iti tebhyaḥ kathaṃ syāt /
T07vakobhau:8032: yadi cā nāgatātmabhāvāpekṣayā varttamānādasaṃvṛtaḥ syādurabhrādīnapi te putrībhūtāt sarvathā na hanyuriti ina syāttebhyyo 'saṃvaraḥ /
T07vakobhau:8033: kathaṃ hi nāma jighāṃsatāmeva tebhyo na syādasaṃvaraḥ /
T07vakobhau:8035: kathaṃ hi nāmājighāṃsatāmeva tebhyaḥ syādasaṃvara iti /
T07vakobhau:8039: mūko 'pi ca vākprāpaṇīyamarthaṃ kāyena prāpayituṃ śakta iti /
T07vakobhau:8040: yastarhi dve trīṇi vā śikṣāpadāni samādatte /
T07vakobhau:8041: sarvathā nāsti vikalaḥ prādeśikaścāsaṃvarika iti vaibhāṣikāḥ /
T07vakobhau:8055: athavā samādānamādatte buddhamavanditvā na bhokṣye tithimāsārdhamāsabhaktāni vā nityaṃ kariṣyāmītyādi
T07vakobhau:8056: ādareṇa tadrūpeṇa kriyāmīhate kuśalāmakuśalāṃ vā yato
T07vakobhau:8066: śikṣāpadānāṃ vijñapuruṣasyāntike pratyākhyānadāśayataḥ nikāyasabhāgatyāgāt yugapadu bhayavyañjanaprādurbhāvāt kuśalamūlasamucchedācca /
T07vakobhau:8080: na hyekadeśakṣobhāt kṛtsna saṃvaratyāgo yukta iti /
T07vakobhau:8085: āviṣkṛtāyāṃ tu tasyāmāpattau śīlavānbhavati na duḥśīlo yathā ṛṇaṃ śodhayitvā dhanavānbhavati na tvṛṇavāniti /
T07vakobhau:8087: katamasya bhavati śrāmaṇyaṃ dhvastaṃ patitaṃ parājitamiti /
T07vakobhau:8098: na cāsau pūrvaṃ paramārthabhikṣurāsīdyataḥ paścādabhikṣurbhavet yaccoktamekadeśakṣobhāditi atra śāstraiva datto 'nuyoga "stadyathā tālo mastakācchinno 'bhavyo 'ṅkuritatvāya abhavyo viruḍhiṃ vṛddhiṃ
