T07vakobhau:8101: evamekadeśa syāpi mūlabhūtasya cchedādabhavyaḥ saṃvaraśeṣo viroḍumiti /
T07vakobhau:8102: sa ca gurvīṃ bhikṣubhāvamaryādābhedinīṃ maulīmāpattimāpadyamānastīvrānapatrāpyayogātsaṃvarasya mūlaṃ cchinattīti yuktaḥ kṛtsnasaṃvaratyāgaḥ /
T07vakobhau:8103: yasya caikagrāsaparibhogo 'pyekapāda pārṣṇirpradeśaparibhogo 'pi ca nābhyanujñāyate sāṃghikayorāhāravihārayoḥ sarvabhikṣusaṃbhogabahiṣkṛtaśca śāstrā yaṃ cādhikṛtyoktaṃ /
T07vakobhau:8111: "mārgajino mārgadeśiko mārge jīvati yaśca mārgadūṣī" astyetaduktam /
T07vakobhau:8112: sa tveṣa ākṛtimātrāvaśeṣatvācchamaṇa ukto dagdhakāṣṭhaśuṣkahladaśukanāśā pūtivījālātacakramṛtasattvavat
T07vakobhau:8113: yadi hi dauḥśīlyādabhikṣuḥ syāt śikṣādattako na syāt /
T07vakobhau:8114: na vayaṃ brūmaḥ sahādhyāpattyā sarvaḥ pārājikaḥ iti /
T07vakobhau:8116: kaścittu saṃtānaviśeṣānna pārājika ekacittenāpyapraticchādanāditi vyavasthāpitaṃ dharmasvāminā
T07vakobhau:8117: yadi tarhi pārājiko na bhikṣuḥ kiṃ punarna pravrājyate /
T07vakobhau:8118: tīvrānapatrāpyavipāditatvāt saṃtateḥ saṃvarābhavyatvānna tu khalu bhikṣubhāvāpekṣayā /
T07vakobhau:8120: kaścāyamanarthe nirbandho yadyasau tathābhūto 'pi bhikṣurnamo 'stu tasmai tādṛśāya bhikṣutvāya
T07vakobhau:8125: sarvameva dhyānāptaṃ kuśalaṃ dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ parityajyate /
T07vakobhau:8126: upapattito vā bhūmisaṃcārādūrdhvaṃ cāvaśyaṃ parihāṇito vā samāpatternikāyasabhāgatvācca kiñcit
T07vakobhau:8127: yathā ca rūpāptaṃ kuśalaṃ bhūmisaṃcārahānibhyāṃ tyajyate
T07vakobhau:8129: anāsravaṃ tu kuśalaṃ tribhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ parityakṣyate /
T07vakobhau:8138: yadi saṃvaraṃ samādatte dhyānasaṃvaraṃ vā labhate /
T07vakobhau:8147: ya āsaṃvarika upavāsaṃ gṛhṇāti kimasau tasmātsaṃvarātpunarasaṃvaraṃ gacchatyāhosvinnaivasaṃvaraṃ nāsaṃvaram /
T07vakobhau:8154: yena hyasau prasādakleśavegenāvijñaptirākṣiptā bhavati tasya cchedātsā 'pi
T07vakobhau:8164: yadā kuśalamūlāni samucchettumārabhata ityebhiḥ ṣadbhiḥ kāraṇairavijñaptirmadhyamā tyajyate
T07vakobhau:8170: yasyopakleśaprakārasya yaḥ prahāṇamārgastenāsau saparivāraḥ parityajyate nānyathā /
T07vakobhau:8171: atha keṣāṃ sattvānāmasaṃvaro bhavati keṣāṃ saṃvaraḥ /
T07vakobhau:8177: saṃvaro hi manuṣyāṇāmeva yathoktaṃ hitvā devānāṃ ceti gatidvaye saṃvaraḥ /
T07vakobhau:8180: sūtra uktaṃ yataśca mahānāma gṛhī avadātavasanaḥ puruṣaḥ puruṣendriyeṇa samanvāgato buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchati yāvadvācaṃ bhāṣate upāsakaṃ māṃ dhāraya iyatā copāsako bhavatī"ti /
T07vakobhau:8188: āpāyikānāmapi tīvraṃ hrīvyapatrāpyaṃ nāsti yadyogād yadvipādanācca saṃvarāsaṃvarau syātām
T07vakobhau:8189: api khalvāśraya eva sa teṣāṃ tādṛśa ūṣarakṣetrabhūtaḥ śaṇḍapaṇḍakobhayavyañjanottarakauravāpāyikānāṃ yatrāśraye saṃvaro pi na virohatyasaṃvaro 'pyūṣara iva kṣetre sasyamapyatimātraṃ kakvamapīti yattarhi sūtra uktam "aṇḍajo bhikṣavo nāgo 'ṣṭamyāṃ pakṣasya
T07vakobhau:8201: ārūpyopapannānāmapi teṣāṃ tu samanvāgamato 'sti na saṃmukhībhāvataḥ /
T07vakobhau:8202: ataḥ paramidānīṃ karmanirdeśādhikārātsūtrīddiṣṭānāṃ karmaṇāṃ nirdeṣa ārapsyate /
T07vakobhau:8208: kṣemaṃ karma kuśalaṃ yadiṣṭavipākaṃ nirvāṇaprāpakaṃ ca duḥkhaparitrāṇāt /
T07vakobhau:8209: tatkālamatyantaṃ ca akṣemamakuśalaṃ kṣemapratidvandvabhāvena yasyāniṣṭo vipākaḥ /
T07vakobhau:8210: tābhyāmitaratkarma naiva kṣemaṃ nākṣemaṃ yattatkuśalākuśalābhyāmitarat veditavyam /
T07vakobhau:8213: puṇyāpuṇyamaviñjaṃ ca sukhavedyādi ca trayam // VAkK_4.45 //
T07vakobhau:8221: nanu ca trīṇi dhyānāni señjitānyuktāni bhagavatā /
T07vakobhau:8227: tadbhūmiṣu yataḥ karmavipākaṃ prati neñjati // VAkK_4.46 //
T07vakobhau:8233: yadeva hi pramāṇabalavarṇakarmānyabhūmika sukhabhogādi saṃvartanīyaṃ karma deveṣu vipacyate tadeva kadācidanyapratyayavaśānmanuṣyatiryakapreteṣu vipacyate /
T07vakobhau:8234: rūpārūpyāvacaraṃ tu karmānyabhūmikamanyasyāṃ bhūmau vipaktuṃ na jātūtsahate /
T07vakobhau:8237: yaśca lokato 'rthaḥ prasiddhaḥ kiṃ tatra yatnena /
T07vakobhau:8243: eṣā hi bhūmiḥ sukhāyā vedanāyā yaduta kāmadhātustrīṇi ca dhyānāni /
T07vakobhau:8258: itarathā hi dhyānāntarakarmaṇo vipāko na syāddhyānāntaraṃ vā kasyacitkarmaṇaḥ /
T07vakobhau:8260: dhyānāntarakarmaṇo dhyāna eva sukhendrīyaṃ vipāka ityeke /
T07vakobhau:8263: śāstre hi paṭhitaṃ "syātkarmaṇaścaitasikyeva vedanā vipāko vipacyeta /
T07vakobhau:8273: evaṃ tarhi "sukhavedyaṃ śubhaṃ dhyānādātṛtīyā" "diṣṭa-vipākaṃ ca kuśala"
T07vakobhau:8277: sukhavedanāyai hitaṃ sukhavedanoyaṃ sukho 'sya vedanīya iti vā /
T07vakobhau:8280: sa hyasau vidyate sukhasya vā vedanīyaṃ yena sukhaṃ vedayate /
T07vakobhau:8291: yathoktaṃ "cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā rūpapratisaṃvedī bhavati notu rūparāgapratisaṃvedī"tyevamādi
T07vakobhau:8296: yathoktaṃ "yasmin samaye sukhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayate dve asya vedane tasminsamaye niruddhe bhavata" iti /
T07vakobhau:8297: nahi yasminsamaye sukhā vedanā vartate tasminpunaranyā vedanā 'sti sa yāṃ tāṃ vedayate
T07vakobhau:8301: taccaitatsukhavedanīyādi trividhaṃ karma niyataṃ cāniyataṃ ca veditavyam /
T07vakobhau:8305: dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyamupapadyavedanīyamaparaparyāyavedanīyaṃ cetyetattrividhaṃ karma niyatamityetaccaturvidhaṃ karma bhavati sahāniyatavedanīyena /
T07vakobhau:8310: tatra dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyaṃ yatra janmani kṛtaṃ tatraiva vipacyate /
T07vakobhau:8317: asti hi karma saṃnikṛṣṭaphalaṃ na viprakṛṣṭaphalamasti viparyayādbāhyabījavat /
T07vakobhau:8318: yathā tripakṣā suvarcalā tribhiḥ pakṣaiḥ phalaṃ dadhāti yavagodhūmādayaḥ ṣaḍbhirmāsairiti
T07vakobhau:8331: syāttriṣu paraṃ prayojya kāmamithyācāre svayaṃ prayuktasteṣāṃ yugapatsamāptau /
T07vakobhau:8335: katamasmindhātau katividhaṃ karmākṣipyate kasyāṃ vā gatau /
T07vakobhau:8337: sarveṣu triṣu dhātuṣu sarvāsu ca gatiṣu caturṇāṃ karmaṇāmākṣepaḥ kuśalānāmakuśalānāṃ ca yathāsaṃbhavam
T07vakobhau:8340: narakeṣu kuśalasya karmaṇastrividhasyā kṣepo na dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyasya /
T07vakobhau:8343: yato bhūmeḥ vītarāgapṛthagjano bhavatyasau ca sthiro bhavatyaparihāṇadharmā sa tatropapadyavedanīyaṃ karma na karoti /
T07vakobhau:8347: āryapudgalastu yato vītarāgo na ca parihāṇadharmā sa tatropapadyadanīyaṃ cāparaparyāyavedanīyaṃ ca karma na karoti /
T07vakobhau:8348: na hyasau bhavyaḥ punarādhastanīṃ bhūmimāyātumaniyataṃ kuryāddṛṣṭadharmavedanīyaṃ cātropapannaḥ
T07vakobhau:8350: parihāṇadharmāpi tvāryapudgalaḥ kāmadhātorbhavāgrā dvītarāgaḥ tayorūpapadyāparaparyāyavedanīyaṃ karmābhavyaḥ karttum /
T07vakobhau:8369: eka eva hyasau nikāyasabhāga ekakarmākṣipto yaścāntarābhavo yāśca tadanvayā daśāvasthāḥ /
T07vakobhau:8374: guṇakṣetre ca niyataṃ tatpitrorghātakaṃ ca yat // VAkK_4.54 //
T07vakobhau:8375: yaddhi karma tīvreṇa kleśena kṛtaṃ yacca tīvreṇa prasādena yacca sātatyena gunakṣetre ca tanniyataṃ veditavyam /
T07vakobhau:8378: tatra hyantareṇāpi tīvrakleśaprasādānāṃ sātatyaṃ ca kuśalamakuśalaṃ ca karma niyataṃ saṃpadyate
T07vakobhau:8380: tayoścāpi yatra ghātikaṃ karma yathā tathā vā tanniyataṃ saṃpadyate nānyat
T07vakobhau:8389: tasya vā karmaṇo yā bhūmiḥ kuśalasyākuśalasya vā tato 'tyantavairāgyāttatkarma dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyaṃ karma saṃpadyate /
T07vakobhau:8392: yaddhi karma niyataṃ vipāke na tvavasthāyāṃ nāpyaniyataṃ tatyaiṣa niyamaḥ
T07vakobhau:8395: kīdṛśaṃ punaḥ kṣetraṃ yatrāvaśyaṃ dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyaṃ karma saṃpadyate /
T07vakobhau:8407: ata eteṣu kṛtānāṃ kārāpakārāṇāṃ phalaṃ dṛṣṭa eva dharme niyataṃ prāpyate /
T07vakobhau:8408: śeṣasya tu bhāvanāmārgasyāparipūrṇasvabhāvaphalatvācca tadvyutthitānāṃ na tathā pratyagrāśrayaparivṛttiśuddhāśayasaṃtatirvartata iti na te tathā puṇyakṣetraṃ bhavati /
T07vakobhau:8411: syāt karmaṇaścaitasikyeva vedanā vipāko vipacyeta na kāyikī /
T07vakobhau:8415: avitarkaṃ karma dhyānāntarāt prabhṛti yāvat bhavāgre /
T07vakobhau:8422: tasya hi duḥkhā vedanā vipākaścaitasikī ca duḥkhā vedanā daurmanasyaṃ na ca daurmanasyaṃ vipāka iti vyākhyātametat /
T07vakobhau:8424: katamasminnasau citte bhavati kena vā kāraṇena /
T07vakobhau:8431: ye hi dravyamantraprayogeṇa vā pareṣāṃ cittaṃ kṣepayanti akāmakaṃ vā viṣaṃ madyaṃ vā pāyayanti trāsayanti vā mṛgayādiṣvagnim vā dāveṣutsṛjanti prapātādvā pātayantyanyena vā kenacitpareṣāṃ smṛtiṃ bhraṃśayanti teṣāṃ tasya karmaṇo vipākenāyatyāṃ cittaṃ kṣipyate /
T07vakobhau:8437: amanuṣyā eva kupitā manuṣyāṇāṃ marmasu praharanti /
T07vakobhau:8443: kathaṃ na caitasikī vedanā vipākaḥ prāpnoti /
T07vakobhau:8444: nahi brūmastadeva cittavipāka ityapi tu yo mahābhūtānāṃ prakopaḥ sa vipākaḥ /
T07vakobhau:8446: karmajena hi dhātunā vaiṣamyeṇa vyākulamavaśaṃ bhraṣṭasmṛtikaṃ cittaṃ vartata iti kṣiptamityucyate
T07vakobhau:8448: asti cittaṃ kṣiptaṃ na vikṣiptamiti vistaraḥ /
T07vakobhau:8450: kliṣṭaṃ cittaṃ vikṣiptaṃ na kṣiptaṃ svasthacittasya kliṣṭam /
T07vakobhau:8459: te hi vividhayātanāsahasravyatibhinnamarmāṇastīrvābhirvedanābhirabhitunnā ātmānamapi tāvannābhicetayanti kiṃ punaḥ kāryamakāryaṃ vā /
T07vakobhau:8495: aśubhaṃ karma ekāntena kṛṣṇaṃ kliṣṭatvāt kṛṣṇavipākaṃ cāmanojñavipākatvāt
T07vakobhau:8499: yatra kila dvividho 'sti vipāka āntarābhavika aupapattibhavikaśca /
T07vakobhau:8505: na hyevañjātīyakamekaṃ karmāsti vipāko vā yat kṛṣṇaṃ ca syāt śuklaṃ cānyonyavirodhāt /
T07vakobhau:8506: nanu caivamakuśalasyāpi karmaṇaḥ kuśalavyavakīrṇatvāt kṛṣṇaśuklatvaṃ prāpnoti /
T07vakobhau:8511: anasravaṃ karmaiṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ karmaṇāṃ kṣayāya prahāṇāya saṃvartate /
T07vakobhau:8514: uktaṃ tu bhagavatā mahatyāṃ śunyatāyā maśaikṣān dharmānārabhya "ime te ānanda dharmā ekāntakuśalā ekāntānavadyā" iti /
T07vakobhau:8519: kiṃ punaḥ sarvamanāsravaṃ karma sarvasyāsya trividhasya karmaṇaḥ kṣayāya saṃvartate /
T07vakobhau:8523: yā cetanā dvādaśadhā karma kṛṣṇakṣayāya tat // VAkK_4.61 //
T07vakobhau:8524: darśanamārge catasṛṣu dharmajñānakṣāntiṣu kāmavairāgye cāṣṭāsvānantaryamārgeṣu yā cetanā seyaṃ dvādaśavidhā cetanā kṛṣṇasya karmaṇaḥ prahāṇāya karma /
T07vakobhau:8525: navame cetanā yā sā kṛṣṇaśuklakṣayāya ca /
T07vakobhau:8526: navame kāmavairāgyānantaryamārge yā cetanā sā kṛṣṇaśuklasya kuśalasya karmaṇaḥ kṛṣṇasya cākuśalasya navamasya prakārasya prahāṇāya /
T07vakobhau:8528: dhyānādvyānādvairāgyaṃ kurvato yo 'ntyo navama ānantaryamārgastatra yā
T07vakobhau:8529: cetanā iyaṃ caturvidhā cetanā śuklasya karmaṇaḥ prahāṇāya /
T07vakobhau:8530: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇamantyenaivānantaryamārgeṇa kuśalasya karmaṇaḥ prahāṇaṃ nānyena /
T07vakobhau:8534: ato yāvadeko 'pi tadālambanakleśaprakāra āste tāvadasya prahāṇaṃ nopapadyate /
T07vakobhau:8536: anye punarācāryāḥ paśyanti narakavedanīyaṃ narakāccānyakāmadhātuvedanīyaṃ karma yathākrama kṛṣṇaṃ kṛṣṇaśuklaṃ ceti /
T07vakobhau:8537: narake hyakuśalasyaiva karmaṇo vipākastena tadvedanīyaṃ kṛṣṇamityucyate ato 'nya kāmadhātau kuśalākuśalasya karmaṇo vipākastena tadvedanīyaṃ kṛṣṇaśuklamityuktam /
T07vakobhau:8545: sūtra uktaṃ trīṇi mauneyāni kāyamauneyaṃ vāṅmauneyaṃ manomauneyaṃ ca /
T07vakobhau:8550: aśaikṣaṃ tu mana eva manomauneyaṃ na manaskarmeti /
T07vakobhau:8554: api khalu kāyavākkarmaṇī viratisvabhāvena na manaskarma /
T07vakobhau:8568: eṣā ca deśanā mithyāmauna śaucādhimuktikānāṃ vivecānārtham /
T07vakobhau:8574: akarmasvabhāvamapyasti trividhaṃ manoduścaritaṃ cetanārthāntarabhūtamabhidhyā vyāpādo mithyādṛṣṭiśca
T07vakobhau:8578: kim syādyadi kaścit kleśo 'pi karma syāt /
T07vakobhau:8581: sūtre tu cetanāyāstanmukhena pravṛttestaistāṃ darśayatīti vaibhāṣikāḥ /
T07vakobhau:8589: daśa karmapathā uktā yathāyogaṃ śubhāśubhāḥ // VAkK_4.66 //
T07vakobhau:8590: teṣāmeva sucaritaduścaritānāṃ caudārikasaṃgraheṇa daśa karmapathāḥ sūtra uktāḥ yathāyogaṃ kuśalāḥ sucaritebhyo 'kuśalā duścaritebhyaḥ /
T07vakobhau:8592: akukśaleṣu tatkarmapathesu kāyaduścaritasya pradeśo na saṃgṛhītaḥ prayogapṛṣṭhabhūtaḥ kliṣṭaścānyo 'pi bandhānādiḥ /
T07vakobhau:8594: yaddhi kāyaduścaritaṃ pareṣāṃ jīvitabhogadārebhyaścyāvakaṃ tatkarmapatha uktaṃ tato vivecanārtham
T07vakobhau:8595: vāgduścaritamapi yadeva praśādaṃ tatkarmapatha uktaṃ tadarthameva /
T07vakobhau:8597: kuśaleṣvapi kāyasucaritasya pradeśaḥ prayogapṛṣṭhamadyādiviratidānejyādiko vāksucaritasya priyavacanādiko manaḥ sucaritasya cetanā /
T07vakobhau:8606: te 'pi ṣaṭ karmapathāḥ svayaṃ kurvato dvividhā bhavanti
T07vakobhau:8610: kuśalāḥ sapta rūpiṇaḥ karmapathā avaśyaṃ dviprakārā vijñaptiravijñaptiśca
T07vakobhau:8618: yadi tīvreṇa paryavasthānena pramādena vā ghanarasena prayogamārabheta syādavijñaptiranyathā na syāt /
T07vakobhau:8623: yadi karmapathaṃ kṛṭvā punastasyānudharmaṃ ceṣṭeta tasya syāt vijñaptiranyathā na syāt /
T07vakobhau:8625: yadā tāvadiha kaścit paśuṃ hantukāmo mañcakāduttiṣṭhati mūlyaṃ gṛhlāti gacchatyāmṛśati paśuṃ krīṇātyānayati puṣṇāti praveśayati nihantuṃ śāstramādatte prahāramekaṃ dadāti dvau vā yāvanna jīvitā dvacyaparopayati tāvat prayogaḥ /
T07vakobhau:8626: yena tu prahāreṇa jīvitādvyaparopayati tatra yā vijñaptistatkṣaṇikā vā 'vijñaptirayaṃ maulaḥ karmapathaḥ /
T07vakobhau:8627: dvābhyāṃ hi kāraṇābhyāṃ prāṇātipātāvadyena spṛśyate prayogataḥ mṛte sati phalaparipūritaśca
T07vakobhau:8629: yāvacca taṃ paśuṃ kuṣṇāti śodhayati vikrīṇīte pacati khādayatyanukīrtayati vā tāvadasya vijñaptikṣaṇā api pṛṣṭhaṃ bhavanti /
T07vakobhau:8631: abhidhyādīnāṃ nāsti prayogo na pṛṣṭhaṃ saṃmukhībhāvamātrātkarmapathaḥ /
T07vakobhau:8633: kiṃ tāvat maraṇabhavasthe tasmin prāṇini ye vijñaptyavijñaptī te karmapatha āhosvinmṛte /
T07vakobhau:8635: yadi tāvanmaraṇabhavasthe sahamṛṭasyāpio anturghātayiturvā prāṇātipātāvadyena yogaḥ prāpnoti
T07vakobhau:8638: yaduktaṃ "yena tu prahāreṇa jīvitādvacyaparopayati tatra yā vijñaptistatkṣaṇikā vā 'vijñaptirayaṃ maulaḥ karmapatha" iti tanā vaktavyam /
T07vakobhau:8639: yaccāpīdaṃ śāstra uktaṃ "syāt prāṇī hataḥ prāṇātipātaścāniruddhaḥ /
T07vakobhau:8640: syādyathā hi tatprāṇī jīvitādvyaparopito bhavati prayogaścāpratiprasragdha" ityatra pṛṣṭhaṃ
T07vakobhau:8645: vijñaptistarhi tadā kathaṃ maulaḥ karmapatho bhavati /
T07vakobhau:8649: tasmāt prayogaphalaparipūrikāle tadubhayaṃ karmapathaḥ syāt karmatpatho
T07vakobhau:8652: yathā ca śatrorvadhārthaṃ kṛtyaṃ samupasthāpayan paśunā valiṃ kuryāt parakīyaṃ kṛtvā dāreṣu cāsya vipratipadyeta taireva tadghātanārtham anṛtapiśunaparuṣasāntavaiścāsya mitrabhedaṃ kuryādyānyasya paritrāṇāya kalperan abhidhyāṃ ca tatsva kuryāttatraiva ca vyāpādaṃ tadvadhārthaṃ ca
T07vakobhau:8658: sūtra uktaṃ "prāṇātipāto bhikṣavastrividho lobhajo dveṣajo mohajo
T07vakobhau:8660: tatra kīdṛśaḥ prāṇātipāto lobhaja ityevamādi vaktavyam /
T07vakobhau:8664: tatra lobhajapraṇātipāto yathā taccharīrāvayavārthamarthārthaṃ krītārthaṃ ca prāṇinaṃ jīvitādvyaparopayati ātmasuhṛtparitrāṇāya /
T07vakobhau:8666: mohajo yathā yājñikānāṃ dharmabuddhyā rājñāṃ ca dharmapāṭhakaprāmāṇyāddhiṃsatām /
T07vakobhau:8667: duṣṭānāṃ kila nigrahaṃ kurvanto rājānaḥ puṇyabhājo bhavantīti /
T07vakobhau:8673: lobhajamadattādānaṃ yo yenārthi sa tadvarati anyalābhasatkārayaśo 'rthaṃ
T07vakobhau:8677: duṣṭanigrahārthaṃ yathā brāhmaṇā āhuḥ "sarvamidaṃ brahmaṇā brāhmaṇebhyo dattaṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ daurbalyādvṛṣlāḥ paribhuñjate /
T07vakobhau:8678: tasmādapaharan brāhmaṇaḥ sumādatte svameva brāhmaṇo bhuṅkte svaṃ vaste svaṃ dadāti ce" ti
T07vakobhau:8683: mohajo yathā pārasīkānāṃ mātrādigamanaṃ gosave ca yajñe /
T07vakobhau:8685: upahā udakaṃ cūṣati tṛṇāni cchinatti upaiti mātaramupasvasāramupa
T07vakobhau:8698: lobhādanantaramutpannā lobhajāḥ dveṣādanantaraṃ dveṣajā mohādanantaraṃ mohajāḥ /
T07vakobhau:8704: tasya ca avaśya malobhādibhiḥ saṃprayogāt tatrākuśala karmapathaprayogādviratiḥ kuśalakarmapathaprayogaḥ
T07vakobhau:8707: tadyathā śrāmaṇera upasaṃpādyamāno nānāvāsaṃ praviśati bhikṣūnvandate upādhyāyaṃ yācate yāvadekaṃ karmavācanaṃ kriyate dvitīyaṃ ca /
T07vakobhau:8709: tṛtīya karmavācane yā vijñaptistatkṣaṇikā cāvijñaptirayaṃ maulaḥ karmapathaḥ /
T07vakobhau:8710: tata ūrdhvaṃ yāvanniśrayā ārocyante tadadhiṣṭhānaṃ ca vijñapayati avijñaptica yāvadatuvartate idaṃ pṛṣṭham /
T07vakobhau:8711: yaduktaṃ "na sarveṣāṃ karmapathānāṃ lobhādibhirniṣṭhe"tyatha kasya kena niṣṭhā /
T07vakobhau:8723: eṣāṃ tribhirapi niṣṭhā lobhena dveṣeṇa mohena vā
T07vakobhau:8724: ya ete karmapathāścaturbhiḥ kāṇḍairuktāstrayastraya ekastrayaśca eṣāṃ
T07vakobhau:8726: sattvabhogāvadhiṣṭhānaṃ nāmarūpaṃ ca nāma ca // VAkK_4.71 //
T07vakobhau:8731: yaḥ paraṃ maraṇānniyamayya samaṃ tena pūrvaṃ vā mriyate kimasya maulaḥ karmapatho bhavatyutāho na /
T07vakobhau:8732: samaṃ prāk ca mṛtasyāsti na maulaḥ
T07vakobhau:8733: ata evocyate "syāt prayogaṃ kuryāt phalaṃ ca paripūrayenna ca
T07vakobhau:8736: syāt yathāpi tadvyaparopavaḥ pūrvaṃ saha vā kālaṃ kuryā"diti kiṃ punastatkāraṇam nahi vadhye jīvati hantuḥ prāṇātipātāvadyenāsti yogo nāpi
T07vakobhau:8739: thenāśrayeṇa tatprayogaḥ kṛtaḥ sa ucchinno 'nya evāśrayo nikāyasabhāgabhinna utpannaḥ /
T07vakobhau:8740: tasya prayoktṛtvāt karmapathena yogo na yuktaḥ /
T07vakobhau:8741: yatsenāpātamṛgayāvaskandheṣu pareṣāṃ vadhārthaṃ bahavaḥ samagrāḥ patantyekaśca prāṇātipātaṃ karoti kastena samanvāgato bhavati /
T07vakobhau:8743: yathaiva hi karttā tathā sarve samanvāgatā bhavantyekakāryatvāt /
T07vakobhau:8745: yastarhi balānnīyate so'pi samanvāgato bhavatyanyatra ya evaṃ naścitya yāyāt yāvajjīvitahetorapi prāṇinaṃ na haniṣyāmīti /
T07vakobhau:8746: kiyatā punaḥ prāṇātipātaṃ svayaṃ kurvataḥ karmapatho bhavati kiyatā yāvanmithyādṛṣṭiḥ karmapathaḥ iti lakṣaṇaṃ vaktavyaṃ taducyate /
T07vakobhau:8748: yadi mārayiṣyāmyenamiti saṃjñāya paraṃ mārayati tameva ca mārayati nānyaṃ bhramitvā /
T07vakobhau:8750: yastarhi saṃdigdho mārayati kimayaṃ prāṇī na prāṇīti sa evānyo veti so 'pyavaśyametaṃ niścayaṃ labdhvā tatra praharati /
T07vakobhau:8757: yadyekasyāpi jīvitakṣaṇasyotpadyamānasyāntarāyaṃ karoti prāṇātipātāvadyena spṛśyate nānyathā
T07vakobhau:8763: tasmātsendriyaḥ kāyo jīvatītyucyate anindriyo mṛta iti /
T07vakobhau:8764: abuddhipūrvādapi prāṇivadhāt karturadharmo yathā 'gnisaṃyogāddāha iti nirgranthāḥ /
T07vakobhau:8766: nirgranthaśiroluñcane ca kaṣṭatapodeśane ca śāstuḥ tadvisūcikāmaraṇe ca dāturvaidyānāṃ cāturapīḍane maraṇe ca mātṛgabhasthayoścānyonyaṃ duḥkhanimittatvāt /
T07vakobhau:8770: acetanānāṃ ca kāṣṭhādīnāṃ gṛhapāte prāṇivadhāt pāpaprasaṅgo na vā dṛṣṭāntamātrātsiddhiriti
T07vakobhau:8774: yadi balādvā cauryeṇa vā parasvaṃ svīkaroti yatraiva ca balacauryābhiprāyeṇānyatra saṃjñāvibhramāt iyatā 'dattādānaṃ bhavati /
T07vakobhau:8778: asvāmikaṃ ca nidhimuddharato viṣayasvāmikāt parivartakaṃ harataḥ kṛte karmaṇi sīmāprāptebhyaḥ akṛte sarvabuddhaśaikṣyebhyaḥ /
T07vakobhau:8781: agamyāṃ gacchati paraparigṛhītāṃ vā mātaraṃ duhitaraṃ vā mātṛpitṛsaṃbandhinīṃ vā /
T07vakobhau:8782: anaṅge vā gacchati svāmapi bhāryām apāne mukhe vā /
T07vakobhau:8783: adeśe vā gacchati prakāśe caitye vihāre vā /
T07vakobhau:8786: garbhiṇīṃ vā gacchati pāyayantīṃ vā saniyamāṃ vā /
T07vakobhau:8789: yadi svasaṃjñī parastriyaṃ yāyāt na syāt karmapathaḥ /
T07vakobhau:8796: tasyāpi saniyamā svabhāryeva tu sā na gamyā /
T07vakobhau:8797: kumārīṃ gacchato yasya nisṛṣṭā no cedyasya rakṣā 'ntato rājñaḥ /
T07vakobhau:8799: yadi yamarthaṃ bravīti tasminnanyathāsamjñī bhavati yaṃ cādhikṛtya bravīti sa tasya vākyasyārthābhijño bhavati tadvākyaṃ mṛṣāvādaḥ /
T07vakobhau:8803: kadācicca bahavo varṇā vākyaṃ bhavantīti katamaḥ tatra karmapathaḥ /
T07vakobhau:8807: ki tāvadabhijñātārthe śrotari āhosvit abhijñātuṃ samarthe /
T07vakobhau:8809: yadyabhijñātārthe manovijñānaviṣayatvādvākyārthasya śrotravijñānena saha nirodhācca vāgvijñapteravijñaptireva syāt karmapathaḥ /
T07vakobhau:8818: yāvadavijñāte avijñātavāditā itīme āryā aṣṭau vyavahārāḥ /
T07vakobhau:8831: sūtraṃ tāvat "tatkiṃ manyase māhakīmātaḥ yāni tvayā cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi na dṛṣṭāni na dṛṣṭapūrvāṇi na paśyasi nāpi te evaṃ bhavati paśyeyamiti /
T07vakobhau:8832: api nu te tannidānamutpannaśchando vā rāgo vā sneho vā yena vā ālayo vā nīyatiradhyavasānaṃ vā /
T07vakobhau:8834: ye tvayā śrotreṇa śabdā na śrutā na śrutapūrvā vistareṇa yāvanmanasā dharmā na vijñātā vistareṇa yāvanno bhadanta /
T07vakobhau:8835: atra ca te māhakīmātardṛṣṭe dṛṣṭamātraṃ bhaviṣyati śrute mate vijñāte
T07vakobhau:8838: ata evaṃ cāniṣyamāṇe dṛṣṭādibhāvabāhyatvāt gandhādiṣu vyavahāro na syādityeṣā yuktiḥ /
T07vakobhau:8840: na hyatra sūtre bhagavān vyavahārānāṃ lakṣāṇaṃ śāsti sma /
T07vakobhau:8842: atra ca te ṣaḍvidhe viṣaye caturṣu vyavahāreṣu dṛṣṭādivyavahāramātraṃ bhaviṣyati na priyāpriyanimittādhyāropa ityayamatra sūtrārtho dṛśyate /
T07vakobhau:8849: ete ca pañca viṣayāḥ pratyekaṃ dṛṣṭā iti vā kṛtvā vyavahrilyante /
T07vakobhau:8863: syādvācā parākrameta syānna vācā parākrameta mṛṣāvādāvadyena ca spṛśyeta /
T07vakobhau:8864: syāt kāyena parākrameta syānna kāyena na vācā parākrakmeta ubhayāvadyena ca spṛśyeta /
T07vakobhau:8866: yadyubhayathā 'pi na parākrameta na cāvijñaptikāstyavijñaptiḥ kāmāvacarī kathaṃ tayoḥ karmapathaḥ siddhyati /
T07vakobhau:8870: yat kliṣṭacittasya pareṣāṃ bhedāya vacanamaprītaye tat paiśunyam /
T07vakobhau:8876: yat kliṣṭacittasya pareṣāmapriyavacanamarthābhijñe tatraiva ca yat vivakṣitaṃ tat pāruṣyam
T07vakobhau:8883: ato mṛṣāvādādikādvākkarmaṇo yadanyat kliṣṭaṃ vacanaṃ tatsaṃbhinnapralāpa ityapare /
T07vakobhau:8886: tadyathā bhikṣurmithyājīvī lapanāṃ karoti raktāśca kecit gāyanti nāṭacye ca naṭāḥ pareṣāṃ rañjanārthaṃ pralapanti /
T07vakobhau:8888: evaṃ paridevasaṃgaṇikādikamapi yadanyanmṛṣāvādādibhyaḥ kliṣṭaṃ vākkarma tatsaṃbhinnapralāpaḥ
T07vakobhau:8889: kathaṃ cakravartikāle gītaṃ cāsti na ca saṃbhinnapralāpaḥ /
T07vakobhau:8890: naiṣkramyopasaṃhitāni hi tadānīṃ giyante sma na grāmyarasopasaṃhitāni /
T07vakobhau:8893: aho vata yat pareṣāṃ tanmama syāditi parasvebhyo yā viṣameṇānyāyena spṛhā svīkaranecchā balādvā copāyādvā sā 'bhidhyā karmapathaḥ /
T07vakobhau:8897: yadyapi sarvābhidhyā natu sarvā karmapatha audārikaduṣcaritasaṃgrahādityapare /
T07vakobhau:8903: śubhe cāśubhe ca karmaṇi yā nāstīti dṛṣṭiḥ sā mithyādṛṣṭiḥ /
T07vakobhau:8904: tadyathā "nāsti dattaṃ nāstīṣṭaṃ nāsti hutaṃ nāsti sucaritaṃ nāsti duścaritamityevamādi yāvanna santi loke 'hanta" iti /
T07vakobhau:8909: trayo hyatra panthānaḥ sapta karma ca // VAkK_4.78 //
T07vakobhau:8910: abhidhyādayo hi trayaḥ karmaṇaḥ panthāna iti karmapathāḥ /
T07vakobhau:8911: tatsaṃprayogiṇī hi cetanā teṣāṃ vāhena vahati teṣāṃ gatyā gacchati /
T07vakobhau:8913: sapta tu prāṇātipātādayaḥ karma ca kāyavākkarmatvāt karmaṇaśca panthāna iti karmapathāstatsamutthānacetanāyāstānadhiṣṭhāya pravṛtteriti /
T07vakobhau:8917: prayogapṛṣṭāni karmāṇi karmapathāḥ yasmāttadarthaṃ tanmūlikā ca teṣāṃ pravṛttiḥ /
T07vakobhau:8920: ye tarhi dārṣṭāntikā abhidhyādīneva manaskarmecchanti teṣāṃ te kathaṃ karmapathāḥ /
T07vakobhau:8922: api tu śakyaṃ vaktuṃ karma ca te panthānaśca sugatidurgatīnāmiti karmapathāḥ /
T07vakobhau:8924: ya ete daśākuśalāḥ karmapathāḥ sarve ete kuśalānāṃ karmaṇāṃ samudācāravirodhinaḥ /
T07vakobhau:8928: yairakuśalamūlaiḥ kuśalamūlāni samucchinatti kāmavairāgyaṃ cānuprāpnuvan yāni tatprathamata upalikhatī"ti /
T07vakobhau:8929: akuśalamūlādhyāhṛtatvāt mithyādṛṣṭesteṣveva tatkarmāpadeśa eṣa kriyate tadyathāgnireva grāmaṃ dahani caurāstu tasyādhyāhārakā iti caurairgrāmo dagdha ityucyate /
T07vakobhau:8943: yā ca hetumapavadate nāsti sucaritaṃ nāsti duścaritamiti yā ca phalaṃ nāsti sucaritaduścaritānāṃ karmaṇāṃ phalavipāka iti /
T07vakobhau:8945: sāsravālambanayaiva nānāsravālambanayā sabhāgadhātvālambanayaiva ca na visabhāgadhātvālambanayā
T07vakobhau:8958: yairakuśalamūlaiḥ kuśalāni samucchinnāni sarvapaścāt vijahāti yaiḥ vikīrṇaiḥ samucchinna kuśalamūla iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchatī"ti /
T07vakobhau:8964: eko 'pi hi prakāra steṣāmasamucchinnaḥ sarveṣāṃ punarutpattau hetuḥ
T07vakobhau:8968: pūrvaṃ saṃvaraṃ vijahāti paścāt kuśalamūlāni samucchinattītyeke /
T07vakobhau:8983: stri ca samucchinatti puruṣaśca mandacchandavīryaprajñatvāt na strītyapare
T07vakobhau:8991: dṛḍhagūḍhapāpāśayatvāt ata eva na śaṇḍādayastṛṣṇācarite pakṣyatvāt
T07vakobhau:8995: yadā hi kuśalamūlānāṃ prāptirna punarutpadyate aprāptirapyutpadyate /
T07vakobhau:9002: navaprakārāṇāṃ yugapat pratisaṃdhānaṃ krameṇa tu saṃmukhībhāva ārogyabalalābhavat /
T07vakobhau:9006: tameva saṃdhāyoktam "abhavyo'yaṃ pudgalo dṛṣṭa eva dharme kuśalamūlāni pratisaṃdhātuṃ niyatamayaṃ navakebhyaścyavamāno vā upapadyamāno vā
T07vakobhau:9008: upapadyamāno 'ntarābhavasthaścyavamānaścyutyabhimukhastatra punaryo hetubalena samucchinatti sa cyavamānaḥ pratisaṃdadhāti yaḥ pratyayabalena sa upapadyamānaḥ /
T07vakobhau:9011: ya āśayavipannaḥ samucchinatti sa dṛṣṭe dharme pratisaṃdadhāti /
T07vakobhau:9013: evaṃ yo dṛṣṭivipanno dṛṣṭi śīlavipanna iti /
T07vakobhau:9021: ānantaryakāriṇāṃ tu tatra vā 'nyatra vā narake /
T07vakobhau:9023: tatra vaktavyaṃ katibhiḥ karmapathaiḥ saha cetanā yugapadutpannā vartata iti /
T07vakobhau:9030: vyāpannacittasya prāṇivadhe abhidhyāviṣṭasya vā 'dattādāne kāmamithyācāre saṃbhinnapralāpe vā /
T07vakobhau:9042: ṣaṭsu prayoggaṃ kṛtvā svayaṃ kāmabhithyācāraṃ kurvataḥ samaṃ niṣṭhāgamane /
T07vakobhau:9045: kuśalaiḥ punaḥ karmapatharyāvat daśabhiḥ saha cetanā vartata ityutsargaṃ kṛtvā 'pavādaṃ karoti
T07vakobhau:9047: ekenāṣṭābhi pañcabhiśca karmapathaiḥ saha na vartate /
T07vakobhau:9054: saptabhiḥ kuśale manovijñāne tatsamādāna eva akuśalāvyākṛtacittasya ca bhikṣusaṃvarasamādāne
T07vakobhau:9056: tatsamādāne kṣayānutpādajñānasaṃprayukte ca manovijñāne tasminneva ca dhyānasaṃgṛhīte /
T07vakobhau:9059: kṣayānutpādajñānābhyām saṃvaranirmuktena tvekenāpi saha syādanya cittasyaikāṅgaviratisamādāne
T07vakobhau:9061: kasyāṃ gatau kati karmapathā akuśalā kuśalā vā saṃmukhībhāvataḥ samanvāgamato vā /
T07vakobhau:9063: ityete trayaḥ karmapathā narake dvābhyāṃ saprakārābhyāṃ santi /
T07vakobhau:9084: te khalu yayā striyā sārdhaṃ rantukāmā bhavanti tāṃ bāhau gṛhītvā vṛkṣamūlamupasarpanti /
T07vakobhau:9085: gamyā cet vṛkṣaśchādayati tāṃ te gacchanti /
T07vakobhau:9086: agamyā cenna chādayati tāṃ te na gacchanti /
T07vakobhau:9089: narakottarakurubhyāmanyatra kāmadhātau daśākuśalāḥ karmapathāḥ saṃmukhībhāvato 'pi vidyante
T07vakobhau:9092: yadyapi devo devaṃ na mārayati anyagatisthaṃ tu mārayati /
T07vakobhau:9099: kāyikavācikāḥ sapta kuśalā ārūpyeṣvasaṃjñisattveṣu samanvāgamata eva /
T07vakobhau:9102: yadbhūmyā śrayamāryeṇānāsravaṃ śīlamutpāditaṃ nirodhitaṃ bhavati tenārūpyeṣvatītena samanvāgato bhavati /

T07vakobhau:9615: yadāryo vītarāgaścaitye dadāti sthāpayitvā dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyaṃ taddānamubhayeṣāṃ nārthāya
T07vakobhau:9628: ato 'sya dātustattādṛśaṃ dānaṃ dattvā yathākramaṃ catvāro viśeṣā bhavanti
T07vakobhau:9634: uktaṃ yathā dātā viśiṣyate tadviśeṣācca dānaviśeṣaḥ /
T07vakobhau:9649: sparśasaṃpannaṃ dattvā sukumārāṅgāśca bhavati ṛtusukhasparśāni cāsyāṅgāni bhavanti yathā strīratnasya
T07vakobhau:9653: tathā hyuktaṃ bhagavatā "tiryagyonigatāya dānaṃ dattvā śataguṇo vipākaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ
T07vakobhau:9654: duḥśīlāya manuṣyabhūtāya dānaṃ dattvā sahasraguṇa" iti /
T07vakobhau:9658: śītalikādiṣu ca dānamuktvoktame" bhiḥ saptabhiḥ auṣadhikaiḥ
T07vakobhau:9659: puṇyakriyāvastubhiḥsamanvāgatasya śrāddhasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā na labhyaṃ puṇyānāṃ pramāṇamudgrahītumi"ti /
T07vakobhau:9661: guṇaviśeṣādyathā" śīlavate dattvā śatasahasraguṇo vipāka" ityevamādi /
T07vakobhau:9667: tat sthāpayitvā yāni bhagavato 'nyānyaṣṭau dānānyuktāni teṣām
T07vakobhau:9671: āsādya dānaṃ bhayadānam adānme dānaṃ dāsyati me dānaṃ dattpūrvaṃ me dānaṃ pitṛbhiśca pitāmahaiśceti dānaṃ dadāti svargārthaṃ dānaṃ kīrtyarthaṃ dānaṃ cittālaṅkārārthaṃ dānaṃ cittapariṣkārārthaṃ
T07vakobhau:9673: tatrāsādya dānaṃ yat āsannebhya upagatebhyo dānaṃ dadātīti paurāṇāḥ /
T07vakobhau:9674: bhayadānaṃ yadvināśābhimukhaṃ dṛṣṭvā varaṃ dadāmīti dadāti /
T07vakobhau:9681: ebhyaḥ pañcabhyaḥ pṛthagjanabhūtebhyo 'pyaprameyā phalato dakṣiṇā bhavati
T07vakobhau:9685: sa hi mahākalyāṇamitram avidyāndhāyāṃ prajāyāṃ prajñācakṣuṣo dātā samaviṣamasya prakāśayitā anāsravasya dharmakāyasyātinivartayitā samāsato buddhakṛtyasya kartā /
T07vakobhau:9686: karmaṇāṃ tu gurulaghutvaṃ jñātukāmena samāsataḥ ṣaṭ kāraṇāni jñeyāni /
T07vakobhau:9695: āśayastadabhiprāya evaṃ caivaṃ ca kuryāmevaṃ caivaṃ ca na kariṣyāmīti /
T07vakobhau:9699: tatraiva kṣetre punaradhiṣṭhānavaśāt guru saṃpadyate nānyathā /
T07vakobhau:9702: yasya tu sarvāṇyadhimātrāṇi bhavanti tasyātyarthamadhimātraṃ guru karma veditavyam /
T07vakobhau:9710: saṃcintya kṛtaṃ bhavati nābuddhipūrvaṃ na sahasā kṛtam /
T07vakobhau:9714: tatra yo yāvatā gacchati tasminnasamāpte kṛtaṃ tatkarma nopacitam samāpte tūpacitam /
T07vakobhau:9716: nirvipratisāraṃ ca tat karma bhavati niṣpratipakṣaṃ ca /
T07vakobhau:9725: dvividhaṃ hi puṇyaṃ tyāgānvayaṃ tyāgādeva yadupapadyate paribhogānvayaṃ ca deyadharmaparibhogādyadutpadyate
T07vakobhau:9729: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ sati pratigrahītari bhavitavyaṃ nāsatīti /
T07vakobhau:9732: yadi hi puṇyaṃ parānugrahādeva syāt maitryādyapramāṇasamyagdṛṣṭibhāvanāyāṃ na syāt /
T07vakobhau:9735: yathā maitryādiṣvantareṇāpi pratigrāhakaṃ parānugrahaṃ vā puṇyaṃ bhavati svacittaprabhavaṃ tathābhyatīte 'pi guṇavati tadbhaktikṛtaṃ svacittāt
T07vakobhau:9743: tathābhyatīte śāstari tadbhaktisamutthāṃ dānamānakriyāṃ kurvato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ jāyate /
T07vakobhau:9745: yadi svakṣetre dānakriyāvījamiṣṭaphalaṃ bhavati tatkṣetre tarhyaniṣṭaphalaṃ bhaviṣyati /
T07vakobhau:9760: yayā ca viramyate vijñaptyā yacca tadviramaṇam avijñaptiḥ /
T07vakobhau:9764: yadapi na prakṛtyā dauḥśīlayaṃ bhagavatā ca buddhena pratikṣiptamakālabhojanādikaṃ tasmādapi dvidhā viratiḥ śīlam /
T07vakobhau:9779: maulaiḥ karmapathairviśuddhaṃ bhavati sāmantakairviśuddhaṃ vitarkairanupahataṃ smṛtyā 'nuparigahītaṃ nirvāṇapariṇāmitaṃ ceti /
T07vakobhau:9800: sutra uktaṃ "catvāraḥ pudgalā brāhmaṇyaṃ puṇyaṃ prasavantī"ti /
T07vakobhau:9804: caturṇāṃ brāhmapuṇyatvaṃ kalpaṃ svargeṣu modanāt // VAkK_4.124 //
T07vakobhau:9805: yāvatā puṇyena kalpaṃ svargeṣu modate idaṃ brāhmaṃ puṇyam /
T07vakobhau:9808: "brāhmaṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati kalpaṃ svargeṣu modata" iti /
T07vakobhau:9814: ato mahatīṃ ta ātmanaḥ puṇyajyāniṃ kurvanti ye viparītadharmaṃ deśayanti /
T07vakobhau:9818: puṇyabhāgīyaṃ yadiṣṭavipākaṃ mokṣabhāgīyaṃ yasminnutpanne niyataṃ parinirvāṇadharmā bhavati
T07vakobhau:9819: yasya saṃsārādīnavanairātmyanirvāṇaguṇadyotikāṃ kathāṃ śrutvā romaharṣāśrūpātau bhavatastasyāsti mokṣabhāgīyaṃ kuśalamūlamityavaseyaṃ pravṛṣīvāṅkuraprarohāt khalavileṣu bījāstitvam /
T07vakobhau:9821: yadidaṃ loka ucyate lipimudrāgaṇanā kāvyaṃ saṃkhyeti ka eṣāṃ svabhāvaḥ /
T07vakobhau:9823: lipimudre sagaṇanaṃ kāvyaṃ saṃkhyā yathākramam // VAkK_4.126 //
T07vakobhau:9833: kliṣṭānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ sāvadyā nivṛtā hīnā iti paryāyāḥ /
T07vakobhau:9852: tāni karmāṇyanuśayavaśādupacayaṃ gacchanti antareṇa cānuśayān bhavābhinirvarttane na samarthāni bhavanti /
T07vakobhau:9855: kleśo hi pravartamāno daśa kṛtyāni karoti /
T07vakobhau:9856: mūlaṃ ca dṛḍhīkaroti saṃtatimavasthāpayati kṣetramāpādayati niḥṣyandaṃ nirvartayati karmabhavamabhinirharati svasaṃbhāraṃ arigṛhṇāti ālambane saṃmohayati vijñānasroto namayati kuśalapakṣādvyutkrāmati pandhanārthaṃ ca spharati dhātvanatikramayogeneti /
T07vakobhau:9866: ta ete ṣaḍnuśayāḥ sūtre rāgasya dvidhā bhedaṃ kṛtvā saptoktāḥ /
T07vakobhau:9867: kāmarāgānuśayaḥ pratighānuśayo bhavarāgānuśayo mānānuśyaḥ avidyānuśayo dṛṣṭyanuśayo vicikitsānuśaya iti /
T07vakobhau:9868: kathamidaṃ jñātavyaṃ kāmarāga evānuśayaḥ kāmarāgānuśayaḥ āhosvit kāmarāgasyānuśayaḥ kāmarāganuśayaḥ
T07vakobhau:9873: tasya tatkāmarāgaparyavasthānaṃ sthāmaśaḥ samyaktvasamavahataṃ sānuśayaṃ prahīyata"iti
T07vakobhau:9888: yasmādanuśayaiḥ kliṣṭaṃ cittaṃ bhavatyapūrvaṃ kuśalaṃ notpadyate utpannācca parihīyate tasmānna viprayuktāḥ /
T07vakobhau:9895: tadidamajñāpakaṃ yasmādyo viprayuktamanuśayamicchati sa etatsarvamanuśayakṛtaṃ necchati /
T07vakobhau:9910: yastu kleśānāṃ bījārthamarthāntaraṃ vīprayuktamanuśayaṃ kalpayati tena smṛtibījamapyarthāntaraṃ kalpayitavyaṃ jāyate /
T07vakobhau:9911: yattarhi sūtre kleśa evānuśaya uktaḥ ṣaṭṣaṭke "so 'sya bhavati sukhāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ rāgānuśaya" iti /
T07vakobhau:9918: ya eṣa sūtre rāgasya bhedaḥ kṛtaḥ kāmarāgo bhavarāga iti /
T07vakobhau:9928: te ca sattvāḥ samāpattiṃ sāśrayā māsvādayanta ātmabhāvamevāsvādayanti kāmavītarāgatvāt /
T07vakobhau:9934: ṣaṇṇāmanuśayānāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ pañcadhā kṛtvā daśa bhavanti /
T07vakobhau:9938: kāmāvacarāḥ ṣaṭtriṃśad rūpāvacarā ekatriṃśat ārūpyāvacarā ekatriṃśat /
T07vakobhau:9945: ya ete daśānuśayā uktā ete kāmadhātau daśāpi duḥkhadarśanaheyāḥ santi /
T07vakobhau:9947: sapta nirodhadarśanaheyāḥ satkāyadṛṣṭimantagrāhadṛṣṭiṃ śīlavrataparāmarśaṃ ca varjayitvā /
T07vakobhau:9961: kīdṛśā ete duḥkhadarśanaheyāḥ kīdṛśā yāvad bhāvanāheyāḥ /
T07vakobhau:9963: tā eva dvādaśa dṛṣṭayo bhavanti catasro vicikitsāḥ pañca rāgāḥ pañca pratighāḥ pañca mānāṃ pañcāvidyā ityete kāmāvacarāḥ ṣaṭtriṃśadanuśayā bhavanti /
T07vakobhau:9966: pañcaprakāraṃ pratighamapahāya ta eva rūpāvacarā ekatriṃśadanuśayā bhavanti /
T07vakobhau:9972: ya ime darśanaprahātavyānuśayā uktāḥ kimete niyataṃ darśanenaiva prahīyante /
T07vakobhau:9976: ye bhavāgrabhūmijā anvayajñānakṣāntiheyā anuśayāste darśanaheyā eva na bhāvanāheyāḥ /
T07vakobhau:9980: śeṣāsu bhūmiṣu yathāyogaṃ dharmānvayajñānakṣāntiheyā anuśayā āryāṇāṃ darśanaheyāḥ pṛthagjanānāṃ bhāvanāheyāḥ /
T07vakobhau:9982: sarvāsu bhūmiṣu ye 'nuśayā jñānavadhyāste ubhayeṣāṃ nityaṃ bhāvanāheyāḥ /
T07vakobhau:9983: naiva hi bāhyakānāṃ darśanaprahātavyāḥ prahīyanta ityapare /
T07vakobhau:9984: tathāhi mahākarmavibhāgasūtre pūrvāntakalpakānāṃ ca śāśvatavādināmekatyaśāśvatikānām ahetusamutpattikānāṃ ca vītarāgāṇāṃ ca kāmadhātvālambanānāṃ dṛṣṭīnāṃ samudācāra uktaḥ /
T07vakobhau:9985: na ca rūpāvacarāṇāṃ kleśānāṃ kāmadhāturālambanaṃ vītarāgatvāt /
T07vakobhau:9986: tasmāt kāmapratisaṃyuktā eva tā aprahīṇā iti /
T07vakobhau:9987: dṛṣṭyutpādasamakālaṃ te parihīṇā devadatta iveti vaibhāṣikāḥ /
T07vakobhau:9988: dṛṣṭayaḥ paṇca nāmato nirdiṣṭā na tu svabhāvatastat kastāsāṃ svabhāvaḥ /
T07vakobhau:10000: yathā gamyeta satkāyadṛṣṭiriyaṃ nātmani nātmīye veti /
T07vakobhau:10001: yathoktaṃ "ye kecid bhikṣavaḥ śramaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā ātmeti samanupaśyantaḥ samanupaśyanti sarve ta imāneva pañcopādānaskandhāni"ti /
T07vakobhau:10005: sarvaiva hi viparītasvabhāvapravṛṭtā dṛṣṭirmithyādṛṣṭiḥ ekaiva tūktā /
T07vakobhau:10016: taṃ ca hetuṃ paśyati prajāpatimanyaṃ vā /
T07vakobhau:10017: agnijalapraveśādayaśca na hetuḥ svargasya tāṃśca hetuṃ paśyati /
T07vakobhau:10018: śīlavratamātrakaṃ sāṃkhyayogajñānādayaśca na mārgo mokṣāsya tāṃśca mārgaṃ paśyati /
T07vakobhau:10019: atrāpi kilādiśabdalopaḥ kṛta ityetāstāḥ pañca dṛṣṭayo veditavyāḥ /
T07vakobhau:10022: yo hi kaścidīśvaraḥ prajāpatimanyaṃ vā kāraṇaṃ paśyati sa tannityamekaṃ cātmānaṃ kartāramabhiniviśya
T07vakobhau:10026: duḥkhadarśanādeva hi teṣu tau nityātmagrāhau prahīyete /
T07vakobhau:10028: yastarhi jalāgnipraveśādibhiḥ svargopapattiṃ paśyati śīlavṛtena vā śuddhiṃ so 'pi duḥkhadarśanaprahātavya eva /
T07vakobhau:10030: "ye caivaṃ dṛṣṭaya evaṃvādino yadayaṃ puruṣapudgalo gośīlaṃ samādāya vartate mṛgaśīlaṃ kukkuraśīlaṃ, sa tena śudhyati mucyate sukhaduḥkhaṃ vyatikrāmati sukhaduḥkhavyatikramaṃ cānuprāpnoti akāraṇaṃ kāraṇataḥ pratyeti śīlavrataparāmarśo duḥkhadarśanaprahātavyaḥ"
T07vakobhau:10038: yasya ca mārgālambanā mithyādṛṣṭirvicikitsā vā 'sti sa nāsti mokṣamārga
T07vakobhau:10039: iti paśyan vicikitsan vā kathaṃ tayā śuddhiṃ pratyeṣyati /
T07vakobhau:10040: athānyaṃ mokṣamārgaṃ parāmṛśya eṣa mokṣamārgo nāstītyāha /
T07vakobhau:10041: so 'pi tenaivānyena śuddhiṃ pratyeti na tayā mithyādṛṣṭyeti /
T07vakobhau:10043: yaścāpi samudayanirodhadarśanaprahātavyālambanayā mithyādṛṣṭyā śuddhiṃ pratyeti sa kasmānna taddarśanaheyaḥ /
T07vakobhau:10061: ātmānameva tatra vaśinaṃ paśyennātmīyaṃ paśyatītyātmadṛṣṭirevāsau dvimukhī athāhamityetasmāt mameti dṛṣṭyantaraṃ syāt /
T07vakobhau:10071: anye kleśā na santīrakā ato na viparyāsāḥ /
T07vakobhau:10072: yattarhi sūtre ukta "manitye nityamiti saṃjñāviparyāsaḥ cittaviparyāso
T07vakobhau:10079: loke hi viparyastasaṃjño viparyastacitta iti prasiddhaṃ na punarviparyastavedana iti /
T07vakobhau:10080: ta ete viparyāsāḥ sarve 'pi srota āpannasya prahīṇā bhavanti /
T07vakobhau:10086: duḥkhe ca saṃjñā cittaviparyāsāvaśucau ceti nikāyāntarīyāḥ /
T07vakobhau:10087: itarathā hi kathamantareṇa sukhaśucisaṃjñāmavītarāgasyāryasya kāmarāgaḥ saṃbhavediti /
T07vakobhau:10091: na hi striyāmātmani ca vinā sattvasaṃjñāyā kāmarāgo yukta iti /
T07vakobhau:10094: yāvat tasya tasmin samaye yo 'nitye nityamiti saṃjñāviparyāsaḥ cittaviparyāso dṛṣṭivīparyāsaḥ sa prahīyata" iti vistaraḥ /
T07vakobhau:10095: tasmād dṛṣṭisamutye eva saṃjñācitte viparyāsau nānye tatkāla bhrāntimātratvādalātacakracitra yakṣabhrāntivat /
T07vakobhau:10099: tasmāt sarva evāṣṭau saṃjñācittaviparyāsāḥ śaikṣasyāprahīṇā ityapare /
T07vakobhau:10102: atha kiṃ dṛṣṭyanuśayasya eva bhedo nānyasya /
T07vakobhau:10120: asti me śreyānasti me sadṛśo 'sti me hīnaḥ /
T07vakobhau:10121: nāsti me śreyānnāsti me sadṛśo nāsti me hīna" iti /
T07vakobhau:10130: nāsti me hīna ityatra kimunnati sthānam /
T07vakobhau:10131: asti sadṛśo yo 'bhiprete vare sattvarāśau nihīnamapyātmānaṃ bahu manyate /
T07vakobhau:10133: prākaraṇaṃ tu nirdeśaṃ parigṛhya śreyānasmītyekeṣu māno 'pi syādati māno 'pi mānātimāno 'pi hīnasamaviśiṣṭāpekṣayā /
T07vakobhau:10137: etaduktaṃ bhavati sarve darśanabhāvanāprahātavyā iti yadbhāvanāheyamaprahīṇaṃ kimavaśyaṃ tadāryāṇāṃ samudācarati /
T07vakobhau:10140: yena kleśaparyavasthānena saṃcintya prāṇivadhaṃ kuryādyāvanmṛṣāvādaṃ tad bhāvanāheyaṃ bhāvanāheyadharmālambanatvāt
T07vakobhau:10165: vimatiḥ saha tābhiśca yā 'vidyā 'veṇikī ca yā // VAkK_5.12 //
T07vakobhau:10166: duḥkhasamudayadarśanaprahātavyā dṛṣṭayo vicikitsā ca tābhiśca saṃprayuktā avidyā āveṇikī ca duḥkhasamudayaprahātavye cāvidyā /
T07vakobhau:10168: sapta dṛṣṭayo dve vicikitse dve avidye sakalasvadhātvālambanatvāt /
T07vakobhau:10171: atha yugapat kaḥ sakalena kāmadhātunā śuddhiṃ pratyetyakāraṇaṃ vā kāraṇataḥ /
T07vakobhau:10174: evamapi yatrātmadṛṣṭistatrātmatṛṣṇā yatrāgraśuddhidṛṣṭī tatra tatprārthanā tena ca māna iti tṛṣṇāmānayorapi sarvatragatvaṃ prāpnoti /
T07vakobhau:10187: yadā kāmadhātau sthito brahmaṇi sattvadṛṣṭiṃ nityadṛṣṭiṃ cojtpādayati tadā kathaṃ satkāyānta grāhadṛṣṭī visabhāgadhātvālambane na bhavataḥ /
T07vakobhau:10191: kuto nu khalvetadanyā tadālambanā dṛṣṭireṣā na dṛṣṭiriti siddhāntastu pramāṇayitayaḥ /
T07vakobhau:10195: sarvatragairanuśayaiḥ sahabhuvo ye 'pyanye dharmāste 'pi sarvatragāḥ prāptayastu naivam /
T07vakobhau:10197: ata eva syuḥ sarvatragānuśayā na sarvatrahetunā heturiti catuṣkoṭikaṃ kriyate /
T07vakobhau:10204: nirodhadarśanaprahātavyāstrayo 'nuśayā mithyādṛṣṭirvicikitsā 'vidyā ca tābhyāṃ saṃprayuktā '; 'veṇikī ca /
T07vakobhau:10211: nirodhālambanānāṃ mithyādṛṣṭyādīnāṃ svabhūminirodha evālambanaṃ kāmāvacarāṇāṃ kāmadhātoreva yāvat bhavāgrabhūmikānāṃ bhavāgrasyaiva /
T07vakobhau:10212: mārgālambanānāṃ kāmāvacarāṇāṃ ṣaḍbhūmiko dharmajñānapakṣo mārgaḥ sarva evālambanam /
T07vakobhau:10215: yadyapi dharmajñānānvayajñāne apyanyonyahetuke natvanvayajñānaṃ kāmadhātupratipakṣa iti /
T07vakobhau:10222: varjanīyo hi rāgaḥ yadi cānāsravālambanaḥ syānna varjanīyaḥ syātkuśaladharmacchandavat /
T07vakobhau:10226: na māno na parāmarśau śāntaśuddhayagrabhāvataḥ // VAkK_5.16 //
T07vakobhau:10235: ye sarvatragā anuśayāste sakalāṃ pañcaprakārāmapi svāṃ bhūmimālambanato
T07vakobhau:10237: asarvatragāstu svasyāṃ bhūmau svameva nikāyamālambanato 'nuśerate nānyam /
T07vakobhau:10253: kuśalo 'sau dharmmacchandaḥ vipakṣabhūtau ca nirvāṇamārgau tadālambanānāṃ kleśānāmūrdhvā ca bhūmiradharāṇām /
T07vakobhau:10260: yena yaḥ saṃprayuktastu sa tasmin saṃprayogataḥ // VAkK_5.18 //
T07vakobhau:10265: te cānuśayāḥ saṃprayogato 'nuśayīrannālambanataḥ na syurvisabhāgabhūmisarvatragā anuśayāḥ
T07vakobhau:10277: ahaṃ pretya sukhī bhaviṣyāmīti dānaṃ dadāti śīlaṃ rakṣati /
T07vakobhau:10279: ata evoktaṃ bhagavatā "etadagraṃ bāhyakānāṃ dṛṣṭigatānāṃ yaduta no ca syāṃ
T07vakobhau:10280: no ca me syāt na bhaviṣyāmi na me bhaviṣyatī"ti /
T07vakobhau:10300: setyavyākṛtatāṃ darśayati yā kācidavyākṛtā tṛṣṇā avidyā prajñā cāntato vipākajā api sarvā 'sāvavyākṛtamūlamiti kāśmīrāḥ /
T07vakobhau:10305: vividhasmṛtimūlāni hi sthirāṇyadhovṛttīni ca loke dṛṣṭānnīti /
T07vakobhau:10316: yāni sūtre caturdaśāvyākṛtavastūni kiṃ tāni avyākṛtatvāt /
T07vakobhau:10326: kiṃ sarve janiṣyanta iti vibhajya vyākarttavyaṃ saṃkleśā janiṣyante na niḥkleśā iti /
T07vakobhau:10327: kiṃ manuṣyo viśiṣṭo hīna iti paripṛcchayya vyākattevyam /
T07vakobhau:10339: yastu pṛcchedye mariṣyanti kiṃ te janiṣyanta ityetadvibhajyavyākaraṇīyaṃ syāt /
T07vakobhau:10340: manuṣyeṣu cobhayamasti hīnatvaṃ viśiṣṭatvaṃ cāpekṣikamityubhayamekāṃśena vyākarttavyam /
T07vakobhau:10341: tadyathā vijñānaṃ kāryaṃ kāraṇaṃ ceti ekāntena tu pṛcchato naikāntavyākaraṇāt vibhajyavyākaraṇaṃ yujyate /
T07vakobhau:10347: "tathāgato bhagavānarhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ svākhyāto 'sya dharmaḥ supratipannaḥ śrāvakasaṃghaḥ rūpamanityaṃ yāvadvijñāna duḥkhaprajñaptiryāvanmārgaprajñaptirekāṃśena vyākarttavyamarthopasaṃhitatvāt vibhajjavyākaraṇaṃ nāma yadi kaścid brūyāddharmān vadeti sa vaktavyo bahavo dharmā atītā anāgatāḥ pratyutpannāḥ katamān vadāmīti /
T07vakobhau:10349: sa vyaktavyo 'tītā api bahavo rūpaṃ yāvadvijñānamiti /
T07vakobhau:10351: sa vaktavyo rūpamapi trividhaṃ kuśalamakuśalamavyākṛtaṃ ca /
T07vakobhau:10360: na tu vibhaktavyā yāvattūṣṇim vā tiṣṭhati svayaṃ vā vyākarotīti /
T07vakobhau:10361: yadā tau na kiñcit pṛcchataḥ kevalamadhyeṣayataḥ tayośca na kiñcit vyākriyate kevalaṃ paripraśnyete tat kathamanayoḥ praśno bhavati kathaṃ vā vyākaraṇam /
T07vakobhau:10362: yo hhi panthānaṃ brūhītyāha kim tena panthā na pṛṣṭo bhavati /
T07vakobhau:10363: paripṛcchayaiva vyākaraṇāt kathaṃ na paripṛcchāvyākaraṇaṃ bhavati /
T07vakobhau:10364: sthāpanīyastu yathā antavān loko 'nantavānityevamādi sūtrāntādeva tu praśnavyākaraṇānāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ draṣṭavyam /
T07vakobhau:10371: sarve saṃskārā anityā ityayaṃ bhikṣava ekāṃśavyākaraṇīyaḥ praśnaḥ /
T07vakobhau:10373: saṃcetanīyaṃ karma kṛtvā kiṃ prativedayata ityayam vibhajyavyākaraṇīyaḥ praśnaḥ /
T07vakobhau:10375: saṃjñāsu puruṣasyātmā utāho 'nyāsaṃjñā anya ātmeti pṛṣṭena satā paripraṣṭavyaḥ katamaṃ punarāyuṣmānātmānaṃ pratyeti /
T07vakobhau:10376: sa cedevaṃ vadedau dārikaṃ khalvahayāyuṣmannātmānaṃ pratyemi /
T07vakobhau:10377: evaṃ satyanyā saṃjñā anya ātmetyevaṃ vacanīyaḥ /
T07vakobhau:10386: bhavati tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇānna bhavati tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇāt yāvadanyo jīvo 'nyaccharīramityayaṃ bhikṣavaḥ sthāpanīyaḥ praśna" iti /
T07vakobhau:10387: yasya pudgalasya yo 'nuśayo yasminnālambane 'nuśete sa tena tasmin
T07vakobhau:10389: idaṃ tu vaktavyamatīte na kasmin yāvat pratyupanne na kasminniti /
T07vakobhau:10396: atītāḥ pratyutpannāśca rāgapratighamānā yasmin vastunyutpannā na ca prahīṇāstasmin vastuni taiḥ saṃyuktaḥ /
T07vakobhau:10420: kathaṃ tatra tena vā saṃyukto bhavati visaṃyukto vā /
T07vakobhau:10421: na saṃskārāṇāṃ śāśvatatvaṃ pratijñāyate vaibhāṣikaiḥ saṃskṛtalakṣaṇayogāt
T07vakobhau:10426: uktaṃ hi bhagavatā '"tītaṃ ced bhikṣavo rūpaṃ nābhaviṣyanna śrutavānāryaśrāvako 'tīte rūpe 'napekṣo 'bhaviṣyat /
T07vakobhau:10429: anāgataṃ cedrūpaṃ nābhaviṣyat na śrutavānāryaśrāvako 'nāgataṃ rūpaṃ nābhyanandiṣyat /
T07vakobhau:10434: cakṣū rūpāṇi yāvat mano dharmā iti /
T07vakobhau:10435: asati vā 'tītānāgate tadālambanaṃ vijñānaṃ dvayaṃ pratītya na syāt /
T07vakobhau:10439: yadi cātītānāgataṃ na syādasadālambanaṃ vijñānaṃ syāt /
T07vakobhau:10442: yadi cātītaṃ na syāt śubhāśubhasya karmaṇaḥ phalamāyatyāṃ kathaṃ syāt /
T07vakobhau:10448: ye he sarvamastīti vadanti atītamanāmataṃ pratyutpannaṃ ca te sarvāstivādāḥ /
T07vakobhau:10449: ye tu kecidasti yat pratyutpannamadattaphalaṃ cātītaṃ karma kiñcinnāsti yaddattaphalamatītamanāgataṃ ceti vibhajya vadanti te vibhajyavādinaḥ /
T07vakobhau:10455: dharmasyādhvasu, pravartamānasya bhāvānyathātvaṃ bhavati na dravyānyathātvam /
T07vakobhau:10456: yathā suvarṇabhājanasya bhittvā 'nyathā kriyamāṇasya saṃsthānānyathātvaṃ bhavati na varṇānyathātvam
T07vakobhau:10457: yathā ca kṣīraṃ dadhitvena pariṇamadrasavīryavipākān parityajati na varṇam /
T07vakobhau:10460: evaṃ pratyutpannādatītamadhvānaṃ gacchan pratyutpannabhāvaṃ jahāti na dravyabhāvamiti /
T07vakobhau:10467: tadyathā puruṣa ekasyāṃ striyāṃ raktaḥ śeṣāsvavirakta iti /
T07vakobhau:10470: dharmo 'dhvasu pravartamāno 'vasthāmavasthāṃ prāpyānyo 'nyo nidiśyate avasthāntarato na dravyāntarataḥ
T07vakobhau:10471: yathaikā vartikā ekāṅke nikṣiptā ekamityucyate śatāṅke śataṃ sahasrāṅke sahasramiti /
T07vakobhau:10474: dharmo 'dhvasu pravartamānaḥ pūrvāparamapekṣyānyo 'nya ucyate avasthāntarato na dravyāntarataḥ
T07vakobhau:10475: yathaikā strī mātā vocyate duhitā veti /
T07vakobhau:10477: eṣāṃ tu prathamaḥ pariṇāmavāditvāt sāṃkhyapakṣe nikṣeptavyaḥ /
T07vakobhau:10480: puruṣasya tu kasyāñcit striyāṃ rāgaḥ samudācarati kasyāñcit kevalaṃ samanvāgama iti kimatra sāmyam /
T07vakobhau:10482: atīte 'dhvani pūrvapaścimau kṣaṇāvatītānāgatau madhyamaḥ kṣaṇaḥ pratyutpanna iti /
T07vakobhau:10489: yadā sa dharmaḥ kāritraṃ na karoti tadā 'nāgataḥ /
T07vakobhau:10497: yadyevaṃ pratyutpannasya tatsabhāgasya cakṣuṣaḥ kiṃ kāritram /
T07vakobhau:10499: atītānāmapi tarhi sabhāgahetvādīnāṃ phaladānāt kāritraprasaṅgo 'rdhakāritrasya veti lakṣaṇasaṃkaraḥ
T07vakobhau:10510: atha tannaivātītaṃ nāpyanāgataṃ na pratyutpannamasti ca /
T07vakobhau:10512: ato na vaktavyaṃ yadā karitraṃ na karoti dharmastadā 'nāgata iti /
T07vakobhau:10519: yadi dharma eva kāritraṃ kasmātsa eva dharmastenaivātmanā vidyamānaḥ kadācidatīta ityucyate kadācidanāgata ityadhvanāṃ vyavasthā na sidhyati /
T07vakobhau:10522: yo jāto bhavati na ca vinaṣṭaḥ sa varttamānaḥ /
T07vakobhau:10525: yadi yathā varttamānaṃ dravyato 'sti tathā 'tītamanāgataṃ cāsti /
T07vakobhau:10529: tenaiva svabhāvena sato dharmasya kathamidaṃ sidhyatyajāta iti yo vinaṣṭaḥ iti veti /
T07vakobhau:10531: kiṃ ca paścānnāsti yasyābhāvā dvinaṣṭa ityucyate /
T07vakobhau:10533: yadyabhutvā bhavatīti neṣyate bhūtvā ca punarna bhavatīti /
T07vakobhau:10536: nityaṃ ca nāmāsti sa dharmo na ca nitya ityapūrvaiṣā vāco yuktiḥ /
T07vakobhau:10544: evaṃ ca kṛtvā 'stītyucyate na tu punardravyataḥ /
T07vakobhau:10551: tasmāt bhūtapūrvasya ca hetorbhāvinaśca phalasya bhūtapūratāṃ bhāvitāṃ ca jñāpayituṃ hetuphalāpavādadṛṣṭipratiṣedhārthamuktaṃ
T07vakobhau:10554: yathā 'sti dīpasya prāgabhāvo 'sti paścādabhāva iti vaktāro bhavanti yathā cāsti niruddhaḥ sa dīpo na tu mayā nirodhita iti /
T07vakobhau:10559: kiṃ te tasya tasya karmaṇo bhūtapūrvatvaṃ necchanti sma /
T07vakobhau:10560: tatra punastadāhitaṃ tasyāṃ saṃtatau phaladānasāmarthyaṃ saṃdhāyoktam /
T07vakobhau:10561: anyathā hi svena bhāvena vidyamānamatītaṃ na sidhyet /
T07vakobhau:10562: itthaṃ caitadevaṃ yat paramārthaśūnyatayāmuktaṃ bhagavatā "cakṣurutpadyamānaṃ na kutaścidāgacchati nirudhyamānaṃ na kvacitsaṃnicayaṃ gacchati /
T07vakobhau:10563: iti hi bhikṣavaścakṣurabhūtvā bhavati bhūtvā ca pratigacchatī"ti
T07vakobhau:10564: yadi cānāgataṃ cakṣuḥ syānnoktaṃ syād bhūtvā na bhavatīti /
T07vakobhau:10569: yadapyuktaṃ "dvayaṃ pratītya vijñānasyotpādāditi idaṃ tāvadiha saṃpradhāryam /
T07vakobhau:10570: yanmanaḥ pratītya dharmaścotpadyate manovijñānaṃ kiṃ tasya yathā manojanakaḥ pratyaya evaṃ dharmā āhosvidālambanamātraṃ dharmā iti /
T07vakobhau:10571: yadi tāvat janakaḥ pratyayo dharmāḥ kathaṃ yadanāgataṃ kalpasahasreṇa bhaviṣyati vā na vā tadidānīṃ vijñānaṃ janayiṣyati /
T07vakobhau:10577: yadā tadālambanaṃ tathāsti kathaṃ tadālambanam abhūt bhaviṣyati ceti /
T07vakobhau:10578: na hi kaścidatītaṃ rūpaṃ vedanāṃ vā smarannastīti paśyati /
T07vakobhau:10581: yathā khalvapi varttamānaṃ rūpamanubhūtaṃ tathā tadatītaṃ smaryate /
T07vakobhau:10582: yathā cānāgataṃ varttamānaṃ bhaviṣyati tathā buddhyā gṛhyate /
T07vakobhau:10589: yadi ca tattadeva rūpaṃ kevalaṃ paramāṇuśo vibhaktam /
T07vakobhau:10592: na tu kiñcidutpadyate nāpi nirudhyata ityājīvikavāda ālambito bhavati /
T07vakobhau:10597: yadi ca te tathaiva santi nityāḥ prāpnuvanti /
T07vakobhau:10603: evaṃ tarhi nāma eva nāstīti pratīyeta /
T07vakobhau:10606: evaṃ tarhi yaḥ śabdābhāvaṃ prārthayate tasya śabda eva kartavyaḥ syāt /
T07vakobhau:10614: yattarhi bodhisattvenoktam "yattat loke nāstitadahaṃ jñāsyāmi vā drakṣyāmi vā nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyata" iti /
T07vakobhau:10617: itarathā hi sarvabuddhīnāṃ sadālambanatve kuto 'sya vimarśaḥ syāt ko vā viśeṣaḥ /
T07vakobhau:10619: yadanyatra bhagavatoktam "etat bhikṣurmama śrāvako yāvatsa mayā kalpamavoditaḥ sāyaṃ viśeṣāya paraiṣyati /
T07vakobhau:10621: sacca sato jñāsyati asaccāsataḥ sottarañca sottarataḥ anuttaraṃ
T07vakobhau:10626: naiva hi sautrāntikā atītāt karmaṇaḥ phalotpatti varṇayanti /
T07vakobhau:10629: yasya tvatītānāgataṃ dravyato 'sti tasya phalaṃ nityamevāstīti kiṃ tatra karmaṇaḥ sāmarthyam
T07vakobhau:10653: yathā tu tadasti tathoktaṃ athāsatyatītātānāgate kathaṃ tena tasminvā saṃyukto bhavati /
T07vakobhau:10654: tajjataddhetvanuśayabhāvāt kleśena tadālambane kleśānuśayabhāvādvastuni saṃyukto bhavati /
T07vakobhau:10670: yatra vā visaṃ yuktaḥ prahīṇaṃ tasya tadvastviti /
T07vakobhau:10672: syātu prahīṇaṃ na ca tatra visaṃyuktastadyathā
T07vakobhau:10674: prāk prahīṇe prakāre ca śeṣaistadviṣayairmalaiḥ // VAkK_5.28 //
T07vakobhau:10675: duḥkhajñāne samutpanne samudayajñāne 'nutpanne duḥkhadarśanaprahātavyo nikāyaḥ prahīṇo bhavati
T07vakobhau:10676: tasmin prahīṇe tadālambanaiḥ samudayadarśanaprahātavyaiḥ sarvatragaiḥ saṃyuktaḥ /
T07vakobhau:10677: bhāvanāprahātavye 'pi nikāye navānāṃ prakārāṇāṃ yaḥ prakāraḥ prāk
T07vakobhau:10678: prahīṇastasmin prahīṇe 'pi śeṣaistadālambanaiḥ kleśaiḥ saṃyukto veditavyaḥ
T07vakobhau:10679: kasminvastuni katyanuśayā anuśerata iti etatpratipadamabhidhīyamānaṃ bahutaraṃ vaktavyaṃ jāyate
T07vakobhau:10681: kathamalpenālpena yatnena mahato mahataḥ praśnaughān pratipādyemahīti /
T07vakobhau:10682: samāsata ime ṣoḍaśa dharmāḥ kāmarūpārupyāvacarāḥ pañcaprakārāḥ anāsravāśca
T07vakobhau:10684: tatra katamo dharmaḥ kasya cittasyālambanamiti jñātvā amuṣminniyanto
T07vakobhau:10692: kāmāvacarāstāvad duḥkhasamudayadarśanaheyā bhāvanāheyāśca dharmāḥ pañcānāṃ cittānāmālambanam
T07vakobhau:10693: svadhātukānāṃ trayāṇāṃ teṣāmeva ūrdhvadhātukasyaikasya bhāvanāheyasyaiva anāsravasya ceti
T07vakobhau:10695: rūpāvacarāsta eva triprakārā dharmā aṣṭānāṃ cittānāmālambanam /
T07vakobhau:10701: ārūpyāvacarāsta eva triprakārā dharmā daśānāṃ cittānāmālambanam /
T07vakobhau:10709: kāmāvacarā hi nirodhadarśanaheyā dharmāḥ ṣaṇṇāṃ vijñānānāmālambanam /
T07vakobhau:10714: nirodhamārgadarśanaprahātavyāstasyaiva nirodhamārgadarśanaprahātavyasyādhikasya cittasyālambanamiti navānāmekādaśānāṃ ca cittānāmālambanaṃ bhavanti /
T07vakobhau:10723: evameṣāṃ ṣoḍaśānāṃ cittānāṃ ṣoḍaśadharmālambanavyavasthāṃ viditvā kathamanuśayakāryāṃ yojayitavyam
T07vakobhau:10725: sukhendriyālambane vijñāne katyanuśayāḥ anuśerata iti praśna āgate vicārayitavyam /
T07vakobhau:10726: sukhendriyaṃ saptavidhaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ bhāvanāprahātavyaṃ rūpāvacaraṃ ca pañcaprakāramanāsravaṃ ceti /
T07vakobhau:10731: tatra yathāsaṃbhavaṃ kāmāvacarāścatvāro nikāyā rūpāvacarāśca saṃskṛtālambanā ārūpyāvacarau ca dvau nikāyau sarvatragāścānuśayā anuśerata iti jñātavyam /
T07vakobhau:10733: tat punaḥ sukhendriyālambanālambanaṃ dvādaśavidhaṃ vijñānaṃ katamasya vijñānasyālambanam /
T07vakobhau:10734: tasyaiva dvādaśavidhāsyārūpyāvacarasya ca bhūyo dviprakārasya duḥkhasamudayadarśanaprahātavyasya
T07vakobhau:10735: idaṃ caturdaśavidhaṃ sukhendriyālambanālambanaṃ vijñānaṃ tatrārūpyāvacarau dvau duḥkhasamudayadarśanaheyau vardhayitvā kāmāvacarā ārūpyāvacarāścatvāro nikāyā rūpāvacarāḥ saṃskṛtālambanā anuśayā anuśerata iti jñātavyam /
T07vakobhau:10774: apare svadṛṣṭāvevānyatra gṛhīte tyaktāyāṃ dveṣamicchanti darśanaheyānāṃ rāgādīnāṃ svāsāntānikadṛṣṭyālambanatvāt
T07vakobhau:10779: tadyathā rāgānuśayo 'prahīṇo bhavatyaparijñātaḥ kāmarāgaparyavasthānīyāśca dharmā ābhāsagatā bhavanti tatra cāyoniśo manaskāra evaṃ kāmarāga utpadyate /
T07vakobhau:10781: evamanyo 'pi kleśa utpadyata iti veditavyo yaḥ
T07vakobhau:10786: eta evānuśayāḥ sūtre bhagavatā traya āsravā uktāḥ kāmasravo bhavāsravo
T07vakobhau:10794: avidyāṃ varjayitvā 'nye kāmāvacarāḥ kleśāḥ saha paryavasthānaiḥ kāmāsravo veditavya ekacatvāriṃśaddravyāṇi
T07vakobhau:10801: nanu ca tatrāpyasti paryavasthānadvayaṃ styānamauddhatyaṃ ca /
T07vakobhau:10807: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ rūpārūpyāvacarā anuśayāḥ samasyaiko bhavāgra uktaḥ /
T07vakobhau:10810: te hyūbhaye 'pyavyākṛtā antarmukhapravṛttāḥ samāhitabhūmikāśceti trividhena sādhamyerṇaikatāḥ
T07vakobhau:10811: yenaiva ca kāraṇena bhavarāga uktastenaiva bhavāsravaḥ ityavidyedānīṃ traidhātukyavidyāsrava iti siddham /
T07vakobhau:10819: evaṃ bhavāsrava eva bhavaugho bhavayogaścānyatra dṛṣṭibhyaḥ /
T07vakobhau:10823: na ca kila kevalā dṛṣṭya āsyānukūlāḥ paṭutvāt /
T07vakobhau:10825: miśrīkṛtya sthāpitā iti tadevaṃ kāmaugha ekānnatriṃśaddravyāṇi /
T07vakobhau:10841: gṛhiṇo 'pyanena vipralabdhā anaśanādibhiḥ svargamārgasaṃjñayā pravrajitā apīṣṭaviṣayaparivarjanena śuddhipratyāgamanāditi /
T07vakobhau:10844: avidyā tu grāhikā neti miśritā // VAkK_5.38 //
T07vakobhau:10845: asaṃprakhyānalakṣaṇatayā 'paṭutvādavidyā na grāhikā bhavatyataḥ kila miśritā /
T07vakobhau:10847: vistareṇa yāvadyo 'sya bhavati kāmeṣu kāmarāgaḥ kāmacchandaḥ kāmasnehaḥ kāmaprema kāmecchā kāmamūrcchā kāmagṛddhaḥ kāmaparigarddhaḥ kāmanandī
T07vakobhau:10851: cchandarāgaścopādānamuktaṃ sutrāntareṣvato vijñāyate kāma hyupādānamapi kāmādiṣu cchandarāga iti /
T07vakobhau:10863: āsayanti saṃsāre āsravanti bhavāgrādyāvadavīciṃ ṣaṅbhirāyatanavraṇair ityāsravāḥ /
T07vakobhau:10883: ata evocyate syāt dṣṭisaṃprayukteṣu dharmeṣvanunayasaṃyojanena saṃyukto na dṛṣṭisaṃyojanena na ca tatra dṛṣṭyanuśayo nānuśayīta /
T07vakobhau:10890: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ saṃyojaneṣu tisro dṛṣṭayo dṛṣṭisaṃprayojanaṃ pṛthaguktaṃ dve punardṛṣṭī parāmarśāsaṃyojanaṃ pṛthak /
T07vakobhau:10894: ataḥ kila dravya sāmānyādete saṃyojanāntaram kṛte /
T07vakobhau:10895: ete ca dve parāmarśasvabhāvena śeṣāiti parāmarśanasāmānyādapyete pṛthagvihite grāhyagrāhakabhedāt
T07vakobhau:10896: atha kasmādīṣryāmātsarye saṃyojane pṛthaksaṃyojanadvayamuktaṃ nānyat paryavasthānam /
T07vakobhau:10905: tadyathā satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ śīlavrataparāmarśo vicikitsā kāmacchando vyāpāda iti /
T07vakobhau:10908: avaro hi bhāgaḥ kāmadhāturetāni ca tasyānuguṇāni /
T07vakobhau:10914: tribhiḥ sattvāvaratāṃ nātikrāmati pṛthagjanatvaṃ dvābhyāṃ dhātvavaratāṃ kāmadhātum /
T07vakobhau:10916: yadā srota āpannasya paryādāya trisaṃyojanaprahāṇāt ṣaṭkleśāḥ prahīṇāḥ kimarthaṃ tisro dṛṣṭīrapahāya trayamevāha satkāyadṛṣṭiṃ śīlavrataparāmarśaṃ vicikitsāṃ ca /
T07vakobhau:10934: eṣāṃ mokṣagamanāntarāyāṇāṃ prahāṇaṃ dyotayan bhagavān kleśatrayasyaiva prahāṇaṃ deśitavān
T07vakobhau:10943: tadyathā rūparāga ārūpyarāga auddhatyaṃ māno 'vidyā ca /
T07vakobhau:10948: rāgo bandhanaṃ sarvaḥ dveṣo bandhanaṃ sarvaḥ moho bandhanaṃ sarvaḥ /
T07vakobhau:10958: tatra ye yāvat kleśā upakleśā api te /
T07vakobhau:10962: ye 'pyanye kleśebhyaḥ kliṣṭā dharmāḥ saṃskāraskandhasaṃgṛhītāścaitasikāsta upakleśāste punarye kṣudravastuke paṭhitāḥ /
T07vakobhau:10978: kaukṛtyaṃ ca vyāpāda vihiṃsāvarjitaḥ sattvāsattvayorāghātaḥ krodhaḥ /
T07vakobhau:10991: pratighasamutthe ityete ca daśa kleśaniḥṣyandā upakleśāḥ /
T07vakobhau:10997: cittakauṭilyaṃ śāṭhyaṃ yena yathābhūtaṃ nāviṣkaroti vikṣipatya parisphuṭaṃ vā pratipadyate
T07vakobhau:10999: sāvadyavastudṛḍhagrāhitā pradāśo yena nyāyasaṃjñaptiṃ na gṛhṇāti /
T07vakobhau:11001: viheṭhnaṃ vihiṃsā yena prahārapāruṣyādibhiḥ parān viheṭhyate /
T07vakobhau:11011: ete pañca dharmā dvividhā darśanabhāvanāprahātavyā ubhayaprakārakleśasaṃprayogāt /
T07vakobhau:11030: etau dvau kāmadhātau prathame ca dhyāne /
T07vakobhau:11033: sa hi tatra mahābrahmā vitathātmasaṃdarśanatayā āyuṣmantamaśvajitaṃ vañcayituṃ pravṛttaḥ /
T07vakobhau:11043: darśanaprahātavyāḥ sarve manobhūmikāḥ saha mānasiddhābhyāṃ bhāvanāheyābhyāmapi /
T07vakobhau:11046: ye ca kecidupakleśāḥ svatantrāste bhāvanāheyā api santo manobhūmikā eva draṣṭavyāḥ /
T07vakobhau:11053: yānīmāni sukhādīni pañcendriyāṇi eṣāṃ katamenendriyeṇa katamaḥ kleśa upakleśo vā saṃprayuktaḥ
T07vakobhau:11064: tābhyaṃ mithyādṛṣṭiḥ saṃprayuktā puṇyakarmaṇāṃ pāpakarmaṇāṃ ca yathākramam
T07vakobhau:11104: na hi tasyāḥ kvacit pratiṣedho yathā 'vidyāyāḥ /
T07vakobhau:11106: āhlīkyamanapatrāpyaṃ styānamauddhatyaṃ caitānicatvāri paryavasthānāni pañcabhirapīndriyaiḥ saṃprayujyante /
T07vakobhau:11108: yāni sūtre pañca nivaraṇāni uktāni kāmacchando vyāpādaḥ styānamiddhamauddhatyakaukṛtyaṃ vicikitsā ca /
T07vakobhau:11114: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ dve styānamiddhe ekaṃ nivaraṇamuktaṃ dve cauddhatyakaukṛtye ekam /
T07vakobhau:11125: ubhe api hyete cittaṃ layaṃ codayataḥ /
T07vakobhau:11129: jñātivitarko janapadavitarko 'maravitarkaḥ paurāṇasya ca hasitakriḍitaramitaparibhāvitasyānusmartā bhavatīti /
T07vakobhau:11138: styānamiddhena prajñāskandhasyauddhatyakaukṛtyena samādhiskandhasya samādhiprajñayorabhāve satyeṣu vicikitsako bhavatītyataḥ pañcoktāni /
T07vakobhau:11139: etasyāṃ tu kalpanāyāṃ samādhiskandhavirodhina auddhatyakaukṛtyanivaraṇasya pūrva grahaṇaṃ prāpnoti /
T07vakobhau:11145: cāragatasya priyāpriyarūpeṣu viṣayeṣu nimittagrāhādvihāragatasya tatpūrvakau kāmacchandavyāpādau samādhipraveśasyādito 'ntarāyaṃ kurutaḥ /
T07vakobhau:11146: tataḥ samādhipraviṣṭasyāprayogeṇa śamathavipaśyanā sevanāt styānamiddhamauddhatyakaukṛtyaṃ vicikitsā ca yathākramaṃ śamathavipaśyanayorantarāyaṃ kurutaḥ /
T07vakobhau:11150: visabhāgadhātusarvatragāṇāṃ nirodhamārgadarśanaprahātavyānāṃ ca sāsravālambanānāṃ yadālambanaṃ parijñāyate tadā na prahīyante /
T07vakobhau:11151: yadā prahīyante tadālambanaṃ na parijñāyate iti kathameṣāṃ prahāṇam /
T07vakobhau:11168: yasya hi kleśaprakārasya pratipakṣo mārga utpadyate sa prahīyate /
T07vakobhau:11179: vidūṣaṇāpratipakṣo yena mārgeṇa taṃ dhātum doṣato darśanādvidūṣayati /
T07vakobhau:11187: na hi saṃprayogāt kleśo vivecayituṃ śakyate ālambanācca śakyate /
T07vakobhau:11224: kim mārgaviśeṣagamanāt kleśānāṃ punaḥ prahāṇaviśeṣo bhavati /
T07vakobhau:11238: sa eva visaṃyogastāsu tāsvavasthāsu parijñāsaṃjñāṃ labhate /
T07vakobhau:11239: dve hi parijñe jñānaparijñā prahāṇaparijñā ca /
T07vakobhau:11254: yathā kāmāvacarāṇāṃ darśanaprahātavyānāṃ prahāṇaṃ tisraḥ parijñāḥ
T07vakobhau:11256: rūpārūpyāvacarāṇāṃ darśanaprahātavyānāṃ prahāṇaṃ tathaiva tisraḥ parijñā bhavanti /
T07vakobhau:11257: duḥkhasamudayadarśanaprahātavyānāṃ prahāṇamekā nirodhadarśanaheyānāṃ prahāṇaṃ dvitīyā mārgadarśanaheyānāṃ prahāṇaṃ tṛtīyeti traidhātukānāṃ darśanaheyānāṃ prahāṇaṃ ṣaṭ parijñā bhavanti /
T07vakobhau:11263: kasmādrūpārūpyāvacarāṇāṃ bhāvanāheyānāṃ prahāṇaṃ pṛthak parijñā na darśanaheyānām /
T07vakobhau:11277: vaibhāṣikamatena mauladhyānaphalaṃ pañca parijñā yā rūpārūpyāvacarakleśaprahāṇa svabhāvāḥ
T07vakobhau:11279: sa hi vītarāgasyāpi kāmāvacarāṇāṃ darśanaheyānāṃ prahāṇaṃ darśanamārgaphalamicchanti /
T07vakobhau:11297: dharmajñānapakṣasya ṣaṭ parijñāḥ phalaṃ yā eva dharmajñāna kṣantijñānānām /
T07vakobhau:11304: yatraitāni trīṇi kāraṇāni bhavanti tat prahāṇaṃ parijñocyate /
T07vakobhau:11305: pṛthagjanasya tāvadanāsravā visaṃyogaprāptirnāsti bhavāgravikalīkaraṇaṃ ceti nāsya prahāṇaṃ parijñākhyāṃ labhate /
T07vakobhau:11307: tatra yāvat duḥkhe 'nvayajñānakṣāntāvanāsravā visaṃyogaprāptirasti na tu
T07vakobhau:11319: yaḥ prakāraḥ prahīṇo yadi tatrānyena tadālambanena kleśena visaṃyukto bhavatīti /
T07vakobhau:11320: sa tu nāsya ubhayahetusamudghātāt dhātusamatikramācceti na brūmaḥ /
T07vakobhau:11329: bhavanāsthaḥ punaḥ ṣaṅbhirekayā vā dvayena vā // VAkK_5.69 //
T07vakobhau:11330: bhāvanāmārgasthaḥ punarāryapudgalo mārgānvayajñāne ṣaḍibhiḥ parijñābhiḥ samanvāgato yāvat kāmavairāgyaṃ na prāptaḥ /
T07vakobhau:11331: parihīṇo vā tataḥ kāmavairāgyaṃ prāptaḥ pūrvaṃ paścād vā ekayā
T07vakobhau:11337: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇamanāgāmyarhatorekaiva parijñā vyavasthāpyate na bhūyasyaḥ
T07vakobhau:11340: dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ parijñānāṃ saṃkalanaṃ bhavatyekatvena vyavasthāpanaṃ dhātuvairāgyāt phalaprāptitaśca
T07vakobhau:11343: atha kaḥ kati parijñāstyajati labhate vā /
T07vakobhau:11344: ekāṃ dve pañca ṣaṭ kaścijjahātyāpnoti pañca na // VAkK_5.70 //
T07vakobhau:11345: ekāṃ tyajati arhattvāt kāmavairāgyād vā parihīyamāṇaḥ /
T07vakobhau:11346: dve parijñe tyajatyanāgāmī rūpavītarāgaḥ kāmavairāgyāt parihīyamāṇaḥ /
T07vakobhau:11378: iti nirodhasatyaṃ "duḥkhaṃ samudayo loka" ityatra duḥkhasamudayasatye /
T07vakobhau:11389: itarathā hi pūrvaṃ hetunirdeśo 'bhaviṣyat paścāt phalanirdeśaḥ /
T07vakobhau:11393: na hyeṣa niyamo yat pūrvamutpannānāṃ prahāṇāya cchandaṃ janayati /
T07vakobhau:11397: yatra hi satto yena ca vādhyate yataśca mokṣaṃ prarthayate tadevādau vyavacāraṇāvasthāyāṃ duḥkhasatyaṃ parīkṣyate /
T07vakobhau:11398: paścātko 'sya heturiti samudayasatyaṃ ko 'sya nirodha iti nirodhasatyaṃ ko
T07vakobhau:11404: yathā ca vyavacāraṇāvasthāyāṃ satyaparīkṣā tathābhisamayāvasthāyāṃ satyābhisamayaḥ /
T07vakobhau:11415: ata eva tayoḥ phalahetubhāvānnāmato bhedo na dravyataḥ /
T07vakobhau:11423: ata āryāṇāmetāni satyānyucyante na tvanāryāṇāṃ vīparītadarśanāt /
T07vakobhau:11427: dve āryāṇāṃ satye dve ārye cāryāṇāṃ ca satye ityapare /
T07vakobhau:11431: manāṣā amanāpāśca tadanye caiva sāsravāḥ // VAkK_6.3 //
T07vakobhau:11432: tisro hi duḥkhatā duḥkhaduḥkhatā saṃskāraduḥkhatā vipariṇāmaduḥkhatā ca /
T07vakobhau:11438: tisro vedanā yathākramaṃ tadvaśena sukhavedanīyādayo 'pi saṃskārā manāpādisaṃjñāṃ labhante
T07vakobhau:11440: sūtra uktaṃ "sukhā vedanā utpādamukhā sthitisukhā vipariṇāmaduḥkh"ti /
T07vakobhau:11452: "ūrṇāpakṣma yathaiva hi karatalasaṃsthaṃ na vedyate pumbhiḥ
T07vakobhau:11453: akṣigataṃ tu tathaiva hi janayatyaratiṃ ca pīḍaṃ ca /
T07vakobhau:11454: karatalasadṛśo bālo na vetti saṃskāraduḥkhatāpakṣma akṣisadṛśastu vidvāṃstenaivodvijyate gāḍhami"ti
T07vakobhau:11455: na hi bālānāmāvīcikeṣvapi skandheṣu tathā duḥkhabuddhiḥ pravartate yathāryāṇāṃ bhāvāgrikeṣvapīti
T07vakobhau:11458: pratikūlaṃ hi duḥkhamiti lakṣaṇānna mārgo duḥkham /
T07vakobhau:11459: na hi tasyotpāda āryāṇāṃ pratikūlaḥ sarvaduḥkhakṣayāvāhanāt /
T07vakobhau:11460: yadāpi te nirvāṇaṃ śāntataḥ paśyanti tadāpi yadeva duḥkhato dṛṣṭaṃ tasyaiva nirodhaṃ śāntataḥ paśyantina mārgasya /
T07vakobhau:11463: ko hi vidvān pariṣekasukhāṇukena gaṇḍasukhamiti vyavasyet /
T07vakobhau:11466: duḥkhe ca sati tadiṣṭerduḥkhaṃ sukhamiti vyavasyanti" iti //
T07vakobhau:11467: sahaiva tu sukhena sarvaṃ bhavamāryā duḥkhataḥ paśyanti /
T07vakobhau:11477: na hi punasteṣāṃ duḥkhavedanāhetuḥ skandhā bhavanti /
T07vakobhau:11478: saṃskāraduḥkhatā ca sūtre kimarthaṃ pṛthaguktā bhavet /
T07vakobhau:11483: anityaṃ tu dṛśyamānaṃ pratikūlaṃ bhavatītyanityākāro duḥkhākāramākarṣati /
T07vakobhau:11484: nāstyeva sukha vedanetyekīyā duḥkhaiva tu sarvā /
T07vakobhau:11494: ya eva hi kecitpānabhojanaśītoṣṇādaya iṣyante sukhahetavasta evātyupayuktā akālopayuktāśca punarduḥkhahetavaḥ saṃpadyante /
T07vakobhau:11495: na ca yuktā sukhahetubṛddhacyā samena vā 'nyasminkāle
T07vakobhau:11496: duḥkhotpattirityādita eva te duḥkhahetavo na sukhasya /
T07vakobhau:11497: ante tu tadduḥkhaṃ vṛddhimāpannaṃ vyaktimāpadyata iti /
T07vakobhau:11500: na hi tāvat sukhamiti vedyate kiñcidyāvanna duḥkhāntareṇopadruto bhavati kṣutpipāsāśītoṣṇaśramakāmarāgaprabhaveṇa
T07vakobhau:11501: tasmāt pratīkāra evāviduṣāṃ sukhabuddhirnasukhe duḥkhavikalpe ca vālaḥ sukhabuddhimutpādaynti yathāṃśādaṃśaṃ bhāraṃ saṃcārayantaḥ /
T07vakobhau:11518: yā hi vedanā svena lakṣaṇenābhipretā nāsau pouonastenaiva jātvanabhipretā bhavati /
T07vakobhau:11519: tathā hyenāmākārāntareṇa vidūṣayantyāryāḥ pramādapadaṃ caināṃ paśyanti mahābhisaṃskārasādhyāṃ ca vipariṇāminīṃ cānityāṃ cayenānabhipretā bhavati
T07vakobhau:11521: yadi cāsau svenātmanānabhipretā bhavennaiva tasyāṃ kasyacidrāgo bhavedyato vairāgyārthaṃ prakārāntareṇāpi doṣavatīṃ paśyeyuḥ /
T07vakobhau:11523: yattu bhagavatoktaṃ "yatkiñcidveditamidamatra duḥkhasye"ti tadbhagavataiva nītārthaṃ "saṃskārānityatāmānanda mayā saṃghāya bhāṣitaṃ
T07vakobhau:11525: ato na duḥkha-dukhatāṃ saṃdhāyaitaduktamiti siddhaṃ bhavati /
T07vakobhau:11526: yadica svabhāvata eva sarvaṃ veditavyaṃ duḥkhamabhaviṣyatkimarthamāryānanda evaṃ bhagavantamaprakṣyat
T07vakobhau:11527: tisra ime vedanā uktā bhagavatā sukhā duḥkhā 'duḥkhāsukhā ca /
T07vakobhau:11529: kiṃ nu saṃdhāya bhagavatā bhāṣitam yatkiñcidveditamidamatra duḥkhasyeti /
T07vakobhau:11530: evaṃ hi so 'prakṣyat kiṃ nu saṃdhāya bhāṣitaṃ tisro vedanā iti /
T07vakobhau:11532: idaṃ mayā saṃdhāya bhāṣitaṃ tisro vedanā iti /
T07vakobhau:11535: idaṃ tu saṃdhāya mayā bhāṣitaṃ yatkimcidveditamidamatra duḥkhasyetyābhīprāyikametadvākyaṃ darśayati /
T07vakobhau:11538: sukhatvaṃ ca svabhāvatomanāpatvād duḥkhatvaṃ ca paryāyato vipariṇāmānityadharmatvāt /
T07vakobhau:11539: sā tu sukhato dṛśyamānā bandhāya kalpate tadāsvādanāt /
T07vakobhau:11542: yathā dṛśyamānā mokṣāya kalpate tathaināṃ draṣṭumājñāpayanti buddhāḥ /
T07vakobhau:11549: lokasya hi sukhasaṃjñā vedanāyāṃ kāmaguṇeṣūpapattau ca /
T07vakobhau:11550: tatra sūkhaṃ vedanāṃ paryāyeṇa duḥkhaṃ satīmekāntasukhāṃ paśyato viparyāsaḥ /
T07vakobhau:11553: yadi tu svabhāvata eva sarvaṃ veditaṃ duḥkhamabhaviṣyat tisro vedanā iti vacane koguṇo 'bhaviṣyat
T07vakobhau:11556: "yacca sukhendriyaṃ yacca saumanasyendriyaṃ sukhaiṣā vedanā draṣṭavye" ti vistareṇoktvā "yenemāni pañcendriyāṇyevaṃ yathābhūtaṃ samyak prajñayā dṛṣṭāni trīṇi cāsya saṃyojanāni prahīṇāni bhavantī" tyevamādi /
T07vakobhau:11557: loko 'pi ca kathaṃ duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ trividhāṃ vyavasyet /
T07vakobhau:11560: sukhasyāpi trividhatvāt mṛdvādiṣu duḥkheṣvadhimātrā disukhabuddhiḥ syāt /
T07vakobhau:11561: yadā ca gandharasaspraṣṭavyaviśeṣajaṃ sukhaṃ vedayate tadā katamat duḥkhaṃ mṛdubhūtaṃ yatrāsya sukhabuddhirbhavati /
T07vakobhau:11562: anutpannavinaṣṭe catasminmṛduni duḥkhe sutarāṃ sukabuddhiḥ syāt /
T07vakobhau:11565: kathaṃ ca nāmedaṃ yojyate yanmṛdunivedite suvyaktastīvro 'nubhavo gṛhyate madhye punaravyakta iti /
T07vakobhau:11566: triṣu ca dhyāneṣu sukhavacanāt mṛdu duḥkhaṃ syāt /
T07vakobhau:11567: ūrdhvamaduḥkhasukhavacanānmadhyaṃ duḥkhamiti na yujyate mṛdvādiṣu duḥkheṣu duḥkheṣu sukhādivedanāvyavasthānam
T07vakobhau:11568: uktaṃ ca bhagavatā "rūpaṃ cenmahānāmannekāntaduḥkhamabhaviṣyanna sukhaṃ na
T07vakobhau:11574: āśrayaviśeṣāpekṣo hi viṣayaḥ sukhaheturvā bhavati duḥkhaheturvā /
T07vakobhau:11576: sa yāṃ kāmavasthāṃ prāpya sukhaheturbhavati na tāṃ punaḥ prāpya kadācinna bhavatīti vyavasthita eva sukhahetuḥ /
T07vakobhau:11577: tadyathā sa evāgniḥ pākyabhūtaviśeṣāpekṣaḥ svādupākaheturbhavati sa evāsvādapākahetuḥ na tu yāṃ pākyabhūtāvasthāṃ prāpya svadupākahetustāṃ punaḥ prāpya na heturityeṣa dṛṣṭāntaḥ /
T07vakobhau:11578: dhyāneṣu ca kathaṃ na vyavasthitaḥ sukhahetuḥ /
T07vakobhau:11579: yattu punaḥ duḥkhapratikāre sukhabuddhirityuktaṃ tatra vihitaḥ pratīkāraḥ
T07vakobhau:11580: yadā gandhādiviśeṣajaṃ sukhaṃ vedayate tadā kasya pratīkāreṣu sukhabuddhirbhavatyanutpannavinaṣṭe ca tasmin duḥkhe sutarāṃ sukhabuddhiḥ syāt /
T07vakobhau:11581: dhyānaje sukhe kaḥ kasya pratīkāra ityevamādi /
T07vakobhau:11598: "karma ca tṛṣṇā ca atho avidyā saṃskārāṇāṃ heturabhisaṃparāya" iti /
T07vakobhau:11603: upapattyabhinirvṛttihetuṃ sahetukaṃ brūvatā gāthāyāṃ karma ca tṛṣṇā cāvidyoktā /
T07vakobhau:11609: tayoryathākramaṃ karma ca bhavatṛṣṇā ca hetuḥ /
T07vakobhau:11616: satṛṣṇā eva jātā dṛśyante na vītatṛṣṇā iti /
T07vakobhau:11620: yatra ca satṛṣṇā tatrābhīkṣṇaṃ cittasaṃtatiṃ namantīṃ paśyāmaḥ /
T07vakobhau:11622: na cātmabhāva evaṃ kenacidāgṛhīto yathā tṛṣṇayā /
T07vakobhau:11624: na cānyo heturevamanuṣatto yathātmasneha ityeṣā yuktiḥ /
T07vakobhau:11626: dve api satye saṃvṛtisatyaṃ paramārthasatyaṃ ca /
T07vakobhau:11628: yatra bhinnena tadbuddhiranyāpohe dhiyā ca tat /
T07vakobhau:11630: yasminnavayavaśo bhinne na tadbuddhirbhavati tat saṃvṛtisat /
T07vakobhau:11632: tatra hi kapālaśo bhinne ghaṭabuddhirna bhavati /
T07vakobhau:11633: tatra cānyānapohya dharmān buddhacyā tadbuddhirna bhavati taccāpi saṃvṛtisadveditavyam /
T07vakobhau:11636: teṣveva tu saṃvṛtisaṃjñā kṛteti saṃvṛtivaśāt ghaṭaścāmbu cāstīti brūbantaḥ satyamevāhurna mṛṣetyetatsaṃvṛtisatyam /
T07vakobhau:11641: tatra hi paramāṇuśo bhinne vastuni rasārhānapi ca dharmānapohya buddhacyā rūpasya svabhāvabuddhirbhavatyeva
T07vakobhau:11644: yathā lokottarena jñānena gṛhyate tat pṛṣṭhalabdhena vā laukikena tathā paramārthasatyam /
T07vakobhau:11651: satyāni ha draṣṭukāma ādita eva śīlaṃ pālayati /
T07vakobhau:11653: śrutvā cintayati aviparītaṃ cintayitvā bhāvanāyāṃ prayujyate /
T07vakobhau:11654: samādhau tasya śrutamayīṃ prajñāṃ niśritya cintāmayī jāyate /
T07vakobhau:11665: suśikṣitā plavan nirapekṣastaratītyeṣa dṛṣṭāntaḥ iti vaibhāṣikāḥ /
T07vakobhau:11666: asyāṃ tu kalpanāyāṃ cintāmayī prajñā na siddhacyatītyapare /
T07vakobhau:11667: yāhi nāmālambanā śrutamayī prāpnoti yā 'rthālambanā bhāvanāmayīti /
T07vakobhau:11674: tasya punarevaṃ bhāvanāyāṃ prayuktasya kathaṃ bhāvanā saṃpadyata ityāha /
T07vakobhau:11686: nanu ca sā 'tibhūyaskāmatā 'labdha eva na labdhe bhavatīti ko 'nayorviśeṣa
T07vakobhau:11713: dharmasvāminā hi bhagavatā parityaktasvavṛttikarmāntebhyaḥ śiṣyebhyo mokṣārthamabhyupagatebhyo dvayaṃ prajñaptaṃ vṛttiśca karma ca /
T07vakobhau:11715: anayā vṛttyedaṃ karma kurvāṇā bhavantī na cirānmokṣaṃ prāpsyantīti /
T07vakobhau:11731: tasya tvevaṃ pātrobhūtasya katham tasyāṃ bhāvanāyāmavatāro bhavati /
T07vakobhau:11737: adhiko rāgo vitarkaścaiṣāṃ ta ime adhirāgavitarkāḥ /
T07vakobhau:11745: tatra punaścaturvidho rāgaḥ varṇarāgaḥ saṃsthānarāgaḥ sparśarāga upacārarāgaśca /
T07vakobhau:11747: dvitiyasya vikhāditakavikṣiptālambanāṃ tṛtīyasya vipaṭumnā pūyanibaddhāsthyālambanāṃ caturthasya niśceṣṭamṛtkāyālambanām /
T07vakobhau:11750: asthisaṃkaklāyāṃ hi sarvametaccaturvidhaṃ rāgastu nāstīti adhimuktiprādeśikamanaskāratvādaśubhayā na kleśaprahāṇam viṣkambhaṇaṃ tu /
T07vakobhau:11751: sa punar ayam aśubhāṃ bhāvayan yogācāras trividha ucyate /
T07vakobhau:11756: svāṅgāvayave cittaṃ nibadhnāti pādāṅguṣṭhe lalāṭe yatra cāsyābhiratiḥ /
T07vakobhau:11757: sa tatra māṃsakledapītā dhimokṣakrameṇāsthiviśodhayan sakalāmasthisaṃkalāṃ paśyati /
T07vakobhau:11758: tathaiva ca punardvitīyāmadhimucyate yāvadvihārārāmakṣetrakrameṇa samudraparyantām pṛthivīmasthisaṃkalāṃ
T07vakobhau:11764: sa punaḥ cittasaṃkṣepaviśeṣārtha tasyāmasthiśaṅkalāyāṃ pādāsthīni hitvā śeṣaṃ manasi karoti
T07vakobhau:11765: evaṃ krameṇa yāvat kapālasyārdhaṃ hitvā 'rdhaṃ manasi karoti kṣayakṛtaparijayaḥ /
T07vakobhau:11767: so 'rdhamapi kapālasya muktvā brūvormadhye cittaṃ dhārayati /
T07vakobhau:11769: astyaśubhā ālalmbanaparīttatayā parīttā na vaśitāparīttatayā parītteti catuṣkoṭikam /
T07vakobhau:11771: atha kiṃsvabhāveyamaśubhā katibhūmikā kimālambanā kva cotpadyate /
T07vakobhau:11774: alobhasvabhāvā daśabhūmikā sasāmantakadhyānāntareṣu caturṣu dhyāneṣui kāmadhātau ca kāmāvacara dṛṣyālambanā kiṃ poounrdṛśyavastusaṃsthāne /
T07vakobhau:11794: pañcasu bhūmisu triṣu sāmantakeṣu dhyānāntare kāmadhātau copekṣāsaṃprayogitvāt /
T07vakobhau:11797: ye tu mauleṣvapi dhyāneṣu samāpannasyopekṣāmicchanti neṣāmaṣṭabhūmikā /
T07vakobhau:11809: gaṇanayā 'nugamena sthāpanayā upalakṣaṇayā vivarttena pariśūddhacyā ca /
T07vakobhau:11810: tatra ca gaṇanā nāma āśvāsapraśvāseṣu cittaṃ dattvā 'nabhisamskāreṇa kāyaṃ cittaṃ cādhyupekṣya smṛtimātreṇa gaṇayatyekaṃ dvau yāvaddaśa /
T07vakobhau:11819: kiyaddūramete praviśanti vā niṣkrāmanti vā kimete sarvaśarīravyāopina ekadeśacāriṇa iti /
T07vakobhau:11821: niṣkrāmato vitastivyāmāntaraṃ yāvadvāyumaṇḍalaṃ vairambhāśca vāyava ityapare /
T07vakobhau:11823: sthāpanā nāma nāsikāgre yāvat pādanṅguṣṭhe sthitāṃ paśyati /
T07vakobhau:11825: kimanugrāhakā ete upadhātakāḥ śītā uṣṇā iti /
T07vakobhau:11826: upalakṣaṇā nāma naite kevalā vāyava eva /
T07vakobhau:11827: catvāryetāni mahābhūtāni mahābhūtābhinirvṛttamupādāyarūpaṃ tadāśritāścittacaittā iti pañcaskandhānupalakṣayati
T07vakobhau:11828: vivarto nāma vāyvālambanāṃ vṛddhiṃ vivarttyottareṣu kuśalamūleṣu saṃniyojanaṃ yāvadagradharmeṣu
T07vakobhau:11832: "gaṇanānugamaḥ sthānaṃ lakṣaṇārthavivarttnā pariśuddhiśca ṣoḍheyamānāpānasmṛtirmatā" iti saṃgrahaślokāḥ /
T07vakobhau:11839: yadi hi kāyaḥ śuṣiro bhavati āśvāsapraśvāsabhūmikaṃ ca cittaṃ saṃmukhībhūtamevaṃ te varttante
T07vakobhau:11840: jāyamānasya caturthadhyānādvyuttiṣṭhamānasya ca praviśanti bhiyamāṇasya caturthaṃ ca dhyānaṃ samāpadyamānasya niṣkrāmanti /
T07vakobhau:11850: nādhareṇa lakṣayete manasā ca tau // VAkK_6.13 //
T07vakobhau:11862: sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ tu anityatā saṃskṛtānāṃ duḥkhatā sāsravāṇāṃ śunyatā
T07vakobhau:11867: sāmāhitasya kila kāyaṃ paramāṇuśaḥ kṣaṇikataśca paśyataḥ kāyasmṛtyupasthāṇaṃ niṣpannaṃ bhavati
T07vakobhau:11894: tadyathā hyuktamāyuṣmatā aniruddhena "tasya kāye kāyānupaśiyano viharataḥ
T07vakobhau:11896: bhagāvatā 'pi coktaṃ "tasya kāye kāyānupaśiyano viharata upasthitā
T07vakobhau:11903: yathālambanaṃ caiṣāṃ nāma svaparobhayasaṃtatyālambanatvāt pratyekameṣāṃ traividhyam /
T07vakobhau:11908: yato vā kāmarāgasya kāyo 'dhaṣṭhānaṃ sa ca vedanā 'bhilāṣātsa ca cittasyādāntatvāt tatkleśāprahāṇāditi vaibhāṣikāḥ /
T07vakobhau:11910: śucisukhanityātmaviparyāsanāṃ caturṇāṃ pratipakṣeṇa catvāri smṛtyupasthā nānyuktāni yathākramaṃ nādhikanyūnāni evaṃ ca trīṇyasaṃbhinnālambanāni caturthamubhayathā /
T07vakobhau:11912: atha kāyādīnāṃ dve trīṇi catvāri vā samastāni paśyati saṃbhinnālambanam /
T07vakobhau:11916: saṃbhinnalambane dharmasmṛtyupasthāne sthitastān kāyādīn sarvānabhisamasya caturbhirākāraiḥ paśyati /
T07vakobhau:11927: nirodhaṃ caturbhiḥ nirodhataḥ śāntataḥ praṇītato niḥsaraṇataśca /
T07vakobhau:11947: yathā mūrdhāna uktāḥ evaṃ mṛdumadhye kṣāntī tathaivākaraṇāt /
T07vakobhau:11956: yadā kila rūpārupyapratipakṣādyekaikasatyālambanāpahlāsena yāvat kāvāvacarameva dukhaṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣaṇābhyāṃ manasi karotyeṣā sarvaiva madhyā kṣāntiryadaikameva kṣaṇaṃ tadadhimātreti /
T07vakobhau:11965: ta eta ūṣmagatādayaḥ smṛtyupasthānasvabhāvatvāt prajñātmakā ucyante /
T07vakobhau:11971: tatra trisatyālambanoṣmagatākaraṇe dharmasmṛtyupasthānaṃ pratyutpannamanāgatāni catvāri bhāvyante
T07vakobhau:11977: mūrdhākaraṇe catuḥsatyālambane 'pi nirodhālambanavardhane cāntyamanāgatāni catvāri ākārāḥ sarve /
T07vakobhau:11984: ityetāni catvāri nirvedhabhāgīyāni kuśalamūlāni yadutoṣmagataṃ mūrdhānaḥ kṣāntayo 'gradharmāśca
T07vakobhau:11985: eṣāṃ dve mṛdūnī calatvāt parihāṇitaḥ kṣāntayo madhyamagradharmā adhimātram /
T07vakobhau:11988: niścito vedhā nirvedhaḥ āryamārgastena vicikitsā prahāṇāt satyānāṃ ca vibhajanādidaṃ duḥkhamayaṃ yāvat mārga iti /
T07vakobhau:11995: anāgamyaṃ dhyānāntaraṃ catvāri ca dhyānānyasya bhūmistatsaṃgṛhītatvāt /
T07vakobhau:12004: bhadantaghoṣakasya tu dve prathame nirvedhabhāgīye saptabhūmike kāmāvacare api taḥ /
T07vakobhau:12018: yadbhūmikānyanena pratilabdhānibhavanti tāṃ bhūmi tyajannāryastānyapi tyajati nānyathā bhūmityāgaḥ punarbhūmisaṃcārāt /
T07vakobhau:12026: yo mauladhyānabhūmikāni nirvedhabhāgīyānyutpādayati satatraiva janmāti satyānyavaśyaṃ paśyati
T07vakobhau:12029: yadā vihineṣu punarlābhobhavatyapūrvāṇyeva tadā labhyante na pūrvaṃ tyaktāni /
T07vakobhau:12053: ūṣmagataṃ mūrdhānaṃ ca śrāvakagotrādutpannaṃ vyāvartya punarbuddhaḥ syādityasti saṃbhavaḥ
T07vakobhau:12061: trīṇyapi nirvedhabhāgīyāni śrāvakagotrādvacyāvartya buddhādibhavaḥ syāt pratyekabuddha ityarthaḥ
T07vakobhau:12070: kiṃ punaḥ prathama eva janmani kṛtaprayogo nirvedhabhāgīyānyutpādayet /
T07vakobhau:12123: tataḥ punarduḥkhe dharmajñānakṣānteranantaramatraia kāmāvacare duḥkhe dharmajñānamutpadyate
T07vakobhau:12126: yathā ca kāmāvacare duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntirdharmajñānaṃ cotpadyate
T07vakobhau:12153: duḥkhe hi dṛśyamāne tasya trividho 'bhisamayaḥ samudayādīnāṃ kāryābhisamayaḥ /
T07vakobhau:12158: na tarhi satyānāṃ duḥkhādito darśanaṃ syāt /
T07vakobhau:12160: "ihāryaśravakasya duḥkhaṃ vā duḥkhato manasi kūrvataḥ samudayaṃ vā samudayato yāvat mārga vā mārgato manasi kurvato 'nāsraveṇa manasikāreṇa saṃprayukto yo dharmāṇo pravicaya" iti /
T07vakobhau:12164: athāpyekasya darśanāccheṣeṣu va4itvalābhādekābhisamayaṃ brūyānna doṣaḥ syāt /
T07vakobhau:12165: antarā tu vyutthānamasti nāstīti vicāryaṃ syāt /
T07vakobhau:12166: atha punarbrūyāt duḥkhameva parijānansamudayaṃ prajahāti nirodhaṃ sākṣāt karoti mārgaṃ bhāvayati
T07vakobhau:12168: evamapi na doṣaḥ syādekasya darśane śeṣāṇāṃ kāryābhisamayavacanāt /
T07vakobhau:12169: darśanābhisamayaṃ tu prati sūtre satyānāṃ krameṇābhisamaya ukto lakṣyate /
T07vakobhau:12170: "nahaiva gṛhapate satyānāmekābhisamayo 'pi pūrvābhisayaya" iti vistareṇa sadṛṣṭāntāni trīṇi sūtrāṇi /
T07vakobhau:12171: "yo duḥkhe niṣkāṅkṣo nirvicikitso buddhe 'pi sa" iti sūtrādekābhisamaya iti cet /
T07vakobhau:12178: kasmāt punaḥ kṣāntayo jñānāni cavaśyaṃ bhavanti /
T07vakobhau:12186: yadi punardvitīyenānantaryamārgeṇaiva saha visaṃyogaprāptirutpadyeta kiṃ syāt /
T07vakobhau:12188: kṣāntibhiḥ kleśaprahāṇānnava saṃyojananikāyā jñānavadhyā iti śāstravirodha iti cet /
T07vakobhau:12196: duḥkhadharmajñānakṣāntimārabhya yāvat mārge 'nvayajñāna kṣāntirete pañcadaśa kṣāṇā darśanamārgaḥ
T07vakobhau:12212: na hi sarvaṃ satyadarśanaṃ samāptamiti tadantarālatvāttanyappi darśanamārgaḥ /
T07vakobhau:12215: ya ete darśanamārgasvabhāvāḥ pañcādaśa kṣaṇa uktā veditavyau
T07vakobhau:12227: phalānāmādyaṃ srota āpattiphalaṃ sarvaphalaprāptau tasya prathamatvāt /
T07vakobhau:12228: tāveva śraddhādharmānusāriṇau yadi pūrvaṃ laukikena mārgeṇāprahīṇabhāvanāheyau bhavataḥ sakalavandhanau to srota āpattiphalapratipannakāvucyete /
T07vakobhau:12230: yadi pūrvaṃ laukikena mārgeṇa kāmāvacarāṇaṃ bhāvanāheyānāṃ yāvat pañca prakārāḥ prahīṇā bhavanti
T07vakobhau:12234: yadi tayostasmāt pareṇa ṣaṭ saptāṣṭau vā prakārāḥ pūrvaprahīṇā bhavanti /
T07vakobhau:12239: yadi punarnavamasyāpi prakārasya prahāṇāt kāmadhātorvītarāgau bhavata ūrdhvaṃ vā yāvadākiñcanyāyatanāt tau tṛtīya pratīpannakāvucyete /
T07vakobhau:12242: ṣoḍaśe tu phalasthau tau yatra yaḥ pratipannakaḥ /
T07vakobhau:12243: ṣoḍaśe tu citta utpanne tau na punaḥ śraddhādharmānusāriṇāvucyete /
T07vakobhau:12247: yatra phale yaḥ pratipannako bhūtaḥ sa tadānīṃ tatra phalasthito bhavati /
T07vakobhau:12248: srota āpattiphale sakṛdāgāmiphale vā anāgāmiphale vā /
T07vakobhau:12253: tasminkāle yo mṛdvindriyaḥ śraddhānusāripūrvī sa śraddhādhimukta ityucyate
T07vakobhau:12256: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ prahīṇapañcaprakāro 'pi ṣoḍaśe citte srota āpanna evocyate na sakṛdāgāmiphalapratipannakaḥ
T07vakobhau:12260: phale hi labhyamāne phalaviśiṣṭo mārgo na labhyata ityeṣa niyamaḥ /
T07vakobhau:12261: ataḥ phalastho yāvanna viśeṣāya prayujyate phalāntaraprāptau tāvat pratipannako nocyate /
T07vakobhau:12263: yastu tṛtīyadhyānavītarāgo 'dharāṃ bhūmi niśritya niyāmamavakrāmati so
T07vakobhau:12265: anyathā hi sa tasmādūrdhvopapannaḥ sukhendriyeṇāsamanvāgataḥ syāt /
T07vakobhau:12269: yathaite kāmadhātau navaprakārāḥ kleśā upadiṣṭā evaṃ
T07vakobhau:12274: tatpratipakṣā apyānantaryavimuktimārgākhyā guṇā bhūmau bhūmau navaprakārā eva /
T07vakobhau:12278: teṣāṃ punaḥ pratyekaṃ mṛdumadhyādhimātratvena trividhatvāt nava vyavasthāpyante /
T07vakobhau:12279: tadyathā mṛdumṛduḥ prakāro mṛdumadhyo mṛdvadhimātro madhyamṛdurmadhyamadhyo madhyādhimātro
T07vakobhau:12283: ādita evādhimātramārgasaṃbhavādutpannādhimātramārgasya cādhimātrakleśāsaṃbhavāt audāriko hi malaścelātpūrvaṃ nirdūyate paścāt sūkṣmaḥ /
T07vakobhau:12284: audārikaṃ ca tamaḥ sūkṣmeṇālokena hanyate sūkṣmaṃ cādhimātreṇetyeṣa dṛṣṭāntayogaḥ /
T07vakobhau:12285: śuklā hi dharmā valavanto durbalāstu kṛṣṇāḥ /
T07vakobhau:12290: yasya hi phalasthasyaiko 'pi bhāvanāheyaḥ prakāro 'prahīṇaḥ sa srota āpanaḥ /
T07vakobhau:12298: tadasāvāpanna āgataḥ prāpta iti srota āpannaḥ /
T07vakobhau:12304: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ sa eva nāṣṭamakaḥ /
T07vakobhau:12316: yathārutaṃ vā kalpyamāne 'ntarābhavo 'pi na syāt evamapyūredhvasrotaso
T07vakobhau:12320: iha caiva kiṃ jñāpakaṃ pratyekaṃ devamanuṣyeṣu saptakṛtvo na pounarubhayeṣveva saptakṛtva iti /
T07vakobhau:12326: yaśca manuṣyesu srota āpanno bhavati sa tānevāgamya parinirvāti /
T07vakobhau:12344: "kṛtvā budho 'lpamapi pāpamadhaḥ prayāti kṛtvā budho mahadapi prajahātyanartham majjanyadho 'lpamapi vāriṇi saṃhataṃ hi

T07vakobhau:12952: kāmarāgānuśayio 'prahīṇo bhavatyaparijñātaḥ kāmarāgaparyavasthānīyāśca dharmā ābhāsagatā bhavanti tatra cāyoniśo manaskāra" iti /

T07vakobhau:12971: kiṃ punarime 'rhanta eva ṣaḍgotrā bhavanti athānye 'pi ṣaḍgotrā bhavanti /

T07vakobhau:12982: dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārā adhigatāstato 'hamasyānyatamānyatamasmāt parihāṇiṃ vadāmi yā tvanenaikākinā yāvadakopyā cetovimuktiḥ kāyena sākṣātkṛtā tato

T07vakobhau:13079: indriyagotramārgavairāgyāśrayataḥ paṇḍitāḥ śatasahasraṃ saṃpadyante sahasrāṇi ca saptacatvāriṃśacchatāni cāṣṭau pañcaviśatiśca /
T07vakobhau:13087: yaduktaṃ bhagavatā "kleśān prahāyeha hi yastu pañca ahāryadharmā paripūrṇaḥ śaikṣa" iti
T07vakobhau:13097: samāpattita eva samāpattīndriyaśca paripūrṇatvaṃ nāsti vina phalena /
