T07vakobhau:13114: eṣa hi nirvāṇasya panthā etena tadgamanāt /
T07vakobhau:13125: caturdhyāneṣu mārgaḥ sukhā pratipadaṅgaparigraha śamathavipaśyanā samatābhyāmayiatnavāhitvāt
T07vakobhau:13127: anyāsvanāgamyadhyānāntarārupyabhūmiṣu mārgo duḥkhā pratidaṅgāparigrahācchamathavipaśyanānyūnatvācca yatnavāhitvāt śamathanyūne hyanāgamyadhyānāntare vipaśyanānyūnā ārupyā iti /

T07vakobhau:13168: tānyetāni pañca dravyāṇi evamete bodhipakṣyā daśa dravyāṇi bhavanti /

T07vakobhau:13252: yo hi tayoḥ prasādaḥ so 'śaikṣyeṣu buddhakarakeṣu dharmeṣu śaikṣāyāśaikṣeṣu ca saṃghakarakeṣu prasādaḥ /
T07vakobhau:13260: buddhadharmasaṃghāvetyaprasādāḥ śraddhāsvabhāvāḥ āryakāntāni ca śīlāni śīlamiti dve dravye bhavataḥ /
T07vakobhau:13267: samyaksaṃbuddho vata bhagavān svākhyāto 'sya dharmavinayaḥ supratipanno 'sya śrāvakasaṃgha iti vaidyabhaiṣajyopasthāpakabhūtatvāt /
T07vakobhau:13271: sūtra ukta"maṣṭābhiraṅgai samanvāgataḥ śaikṣo darśabhiraṅgaiḥ samanvāgato
T07vakobhau:13273: kasmācchaikṣasya samyak vimuktiḥ samyagjñānaṃ ca noktam /
T07vakobhau:13278: binā ca vimuktacyā kathaṃ vimuktijñānam vyavasthāpyate /
T07vakobhau:13279: aśaikṣastu sarvakleśabandhanātyantanirmokṣādvimuktitatpratyātmajñānābhyāṃ prabhāvita iti tasyaiva tadvacanaṃ nyāyyam /
T07vakobhau:13291: saiva saṃskṛtā vimuktirdve vimuktī sūtra ukte /

T07vakobhau:13338: yena vastu nirvidyate virajyate 'pi tena vastunā /

T07vakobhau:13357: abhidharmakośabhāṣye mārgapudgalanirdeśo nāma ṣaṣṭhaṃ kośasthānaṃ samāptamiti
T07vakobhau:13361: kṣāntayaścocyante jñānāni ca samyagdṛṣṭiḥ samyagjñānaṃ ca /

T07vakobhau:13437: prathamau ca dvāvaṣṭamaṃ ca samudayānvayajñānaṃ mṛduprayogatvāt /

T07vakobhau:13446: tadupādāya yat jñānaṃ darśanaṃ vidyā buddhirbodhiḥ prajñā āloko 'bhisamayamidamucyate kṣayajñānam
T07vakobhau:13448: duḥkhaṃ me parijñātaṃ na pounaḥ parijñeyamiti jānāti yāvat mārgo bhāvito na punarbhāvayitavya iti /

T07vakobhau:13472: kasmāt punaretāni vīṇi santi daśa vyavasthāpyante /

T07vakobhau:13519: tatra sarāgaṃ saṃprayuktaṃ cittaṃ dvābhyāṃ sarāgaṃ tato 'nyatsāsravaṃ

T07vakobhau:13545: kuśalaṃ tu mahāparivāraṃ caturbhiśca skandhaiḥ sānuparivartam /

T07vakobhau:13575: "yasminsamaye līnaṃ cittaṃ bhavati layābhirśaṅka vā akālastasminsamaye
T07vakobhau:13577: yasminsagaye uddhātaṃ cittaṃ bhavati auddhatyābhiśaṅki vā akālastasminsamaye dharmavicayavīryaprītisaṃvodhyaṅgānāṃ bhāvanāyā" iti /

T07vakobhau:13638: śreṣṭhato viśiṣṭataḥ paramataḥ śuddhito muktito nairyāṇikataḥ kāṅkṣāto vimatito vicikitsātaḥ

T07vakobhau:13708: tṛṣṇāvicaritānāṃ dvau pañcakau dvau catuṣkau catvāraśchandāḥ /
T07vakobhau:13709: "asmīti bhikṣavaḥ sāti itthamasmīti bhavati evamasmīti bhavati anyathā
T07vakobhau:13711: bhaviṣyāmītyasya bhavati na bhaviṣyāmi itthaṃ bhaviṣyāmi evaṃ bhaviṣyāmi evaṃ bhaviṣyāmi śranyathā bhaviṣyāmi /
T07vakobhau:13712: syāmityasya bhavati itthaṃ syām evaṃ syām anyathā syām apitu syām apītthaṃ syām apyevaṃ syām apyanyathā syāmityasya bhavati /
T07vakobhau:13715: "iti hi bhikṣavo duḥkhāḥ saṃskārāḥ śāntaṃ nirvāṇami"ti vacanāta /

T07vakobhau:13730: nāsti mārgaḥ kumārgo 'yamanyo mārgaḥ punarāvartī mārga iti dṛṣṭicaritānāṃ mārganyāyapratipannairyāṇikākārā iti /
T07vakobhau:13733: evaṃ tarhi prajñā sākārā na bhaviṣyati /

T07vakobhau:13757: anvayajñānaṃ tāsveva ca ṣaṭsu bhūmiṣvārupyatraye ca /
T07vakobhau:13760: bhedena punrdharmajñānasaṃgṛhītāni ṣaṭsu anvayajñāna saṃgṛhītāni navasu /
T07vakobhau:13796: traidhātu kāmalā dharmā akṛtāśca dvidhā dvidhā /
T07vakobhau:13801: ime daśa dharmāḥ kathaṃ yojyāḥ kasya jñānasya katyālambanamiti /
T07vakobhau:13802: tatra saṃvṛtijñānasya sarve daśa dharmā ālambanam /
T07vakobhau:13818: saṃvṛtijñānaṃ svasmātkalāpādanyān sarvadharmānanātvato jānīyāt sarvadharmā anātmāna iti /
T07vakobhau:13822: tacca kāmāvacaraṃ śrutacintāmayaṃ rūpāvacaraṃ śrutamayam bhāvanāmayam /
T07vakobhau:13837: ataḥ paraṃ caturṣu kṣaṇeṣu ekaikajñānavṛddhirasya jñātavyā /
T07vakobhau:13839: samudayanirodhamārgadharmajñāneṣu samudayanirodhamārgajñānāni vardhanta iti mārgadharmajñāne saptabhirjñānaiḥ samanvāgato bhavati /
T07vakobhau:13844: darśanamārge yadyadevotpadyate kṣāntirjñānaṃ vā tajjātīyamanāgataṃ bhāvanāṃ gacchati tadākārā eva catvāraḥ /
T07vakobhau:13847: tatraiva darśanamārge saṃvṛtijñānaṃ cāpi bhāvyate triṣu duḥkhasamudayanirodhānvayajñāneṣu
T07vakobhau:13854: kṛtsnaṃ hi duḥkhaṃ śakyate parijñātuṃ samudayaḥ prahātuṃ nirodhaḥ sākṣātkartu na tu mārgaḥ śakyate kṛtsno bhāvayitum ityabhisamayāntābhāvānna tasminnābhisamayāntikaṃ bhāvyate /
T07vakobhau:13855: samudayo 'pi na tadā sarvaḥ prahīṇo bhavatīti na syādābhisamayāntikam /
T07vakobhau:13858: mārgastaddarśanaheyapratipakṣo na sarvaḥ śakyate bhāvayituṃ vahugotratvāt ityasti mahānviśeṣaḥ
T07vakobhau:13865: alabdhalābhāt kathamidānīṃ tatpratilabdhaṃ yadi naiva saṃmukhīkartu śakyate /
T07vakobhau:13869: evaṃ tu sidhyati yad āhuḥ pūrvācāryāḥ /
T07vakobhau:13871: lokottaramārga-sāmarthyāt saṃvṛtijñānaṃ bhāvyate yad vyutthitaḥ satyālambanam viśiṣṭataraṃ laukikaṃ jñānaṃ saṃmukhīkaroti /
T07vakobhau:13872: eṣa eva ca tasya lābho yat-tat-saṃmukhībhāva-samarthāśrayalābhaḥ /
T07vakobhau:13873: gotre hi labdhe labdhaṃ gautrikaṃ bhavati /
T07vakobhau:13878: yadbhūmiko darśanamārgo bhavati tadbhūmikam cāvarabhūmikaṃ ca saṃvṛtijñānaṃ bhāvyate /
T07vakobhau:13881: evaṃ yāvaccaturthadhyānabhūmike darśanamārge saptabhūmikaṃ saṃvṛtijñānaṃ bhāṣyate /
T07vakobhau:13884: nirodhe 'bhisamite yat saṃvṛtijñānaṃ tadantyaṃ smṛtyupasthānaṃ dharmasmṛtyupasthānam /
T07vakobhau:13885: ekasya parisaṃkhyānātsiddhaṃ bhavati śeṣaṃ catvāri smṛtyupasthānānīti /
T07vakobhau:13896: avītarāgasya ṣoḍaśe mārgānvayajñānakṣaṇe dve jñāne pratyutpanne /
T07vakobhau:13903: ṣoḍaśāt kṣaṇādurdhvaṃ bhāvanāmārge yāvanna vītarāgo bhavati tāvat sarveṣu prayogāntaryavimuktiviśeṣamārgeṣu sapta jñānāni bhāvyante /
T07vakobhau:13911: tāsāṃ jayaḥ vairāgyaṃ tasmin saptabhūmike vairāgye pañcasu cābhijñāsu akopyaprativedhe ca vyavakīrṇabhāvite ca dhyāne śaikṣasya yāvantaḥ ānantaryamārgāsteṣvapi sarveṣu sapta jñānāni bhāvyante tānyeva /
T07vakobhau:13917: saptabhūmivairāgyādapi cordhvaṃbhavāgravairāgye vimuktimārgeṣvaṣṭāsu saptaiva jñānāni bhāvyante
T07vakobhau:13923: śaikṣasyendriyottāpanāyāṃ vimuktimārge sarāgasya ṣaṇṇāṃ bhāvanā dharmānvayaduḥkhasamudayanirodhamārgajñānānāṃ vitarāgasya saptānāṃ paracittajñānaṃ prakṣipya /
T07vakobhau:13928: vītarāgasyāvītarāgasya vā śaikṣasyendriyottāpanāyāmānantaryamārge ṣaṇṇāṃ bhāvanā pūrvavat
T07vakobhau:13941: yastvakopyadharmā bhavati tasya daśānāṃ jñānānāṃ bhāvanā /
T07vakobhau:13944: yo 'pyakopyatāṃ saṃcarati tasyāpyantye vimuktimārge daśānāṃ bhāvanā /
T07vakobhau:13952: aśaikṣasya punarabhijñādiprayogavimuktaviśeṣamārgeṣu nava jñānāni daśa vā
T07vakobhau:13954: pṛthagjanasya tu kāmatridhyānavairāgyāntyavimuktimārgeṣu dhyānabhūmikeṣu ca prayogābhijñātrayavimuktimārgāpramāṇādiguṇābhinirhāreṣu saṃvṛtijñānamanāgataṃ bhāvyate paracittajñānaṃ cānyatra nirvedhabhāgīyebhyaḥ /
T07vakobhau:13959: saṃvṛtijñānaṃ tāvadyadbhūmiko mārgo yāṃ ca prathamato bhūmi labhate tadbhūmikamanāgataṃ bhāvyate
T07vakobhau:13960: anāsravaṃ tu na kevalaṃ yadbhūmiko mārgaḥ /
T07vakobhau:13963: yadbhūmivairāgyāyāpi hi dvividho 'pi mārgo bhavati prayogamārgādiḥ yāṃ ca bhūmi labhate vairāgyatastdbhūmikānyadhobhūmikāni cānāsravāṇi jñānāni bhāvanāṃ gacchanti /
T07vakobhau:13965: kṣayajñāne tu sarvabhūmikāḥ sāsravā api guṇāḥ kṣayajñānalābhikā bhāvanāṃ gacchanti a4ubhānāpānasmṛtismṛtyupasthānāpramāṇavimokṣādayaḥ
T07vakobhau:13973: kiṃ khalu pratilambha eva bhāvanā netyucyate /
T07vakobhau:13991: ye buddhasyaiva bhagavataḥ kṣayajñāne bhāvanāṃ gacchanti nānyasya /
T07vakobhau:13993: daśa balāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni trīṇi smṛtyupasthānāni mahākaruṇā ca /
T07vakobhau:14018: atha kṣīṇasravasaṃtāne jñānamāsravakṣayajñānaṃ tato daśa jñānāni /
T07vakobhau:14034: yasmādasya sarvatra jñeye jñānabhavyāhataṃ vartate tasmādvalam /
T07vakobhau:14037: sthaviraśāriputreṇa pravrajyāpekṣapuruṣapratyākhyānaṃ śyenopadrutasya pakṣiṇa upapattyādīparyantājñānaṃ cātrodāharaṇam /
T07vakobhau:14051: prākṛtagandhahastimahānagnapraskandināṃ daśāttaravṛddhacyārdhanārāyaṇaṃ balaṃ tat dviguṇaṃ nārāyaṇa mityapare /
T07vakobhau:14054: taccatatkāyikaṃ balaṃ sarvasyaiva spraṣṭavyāyatanasvabhāvaṃ mahābhūtaviśeṣa eva /
T07vakobhau:14062: yathā sthānāsthānajñānabalamevaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhasya vata me sate ityetadvaiśāradyaṃ veditavyam
T07vakobhau:14063: yathāsravakṣayajñānabalamevaṃ kṣīṇāsravasya vata me sata ityetadvaiśāradyam /
T07vakobhau:14064: yathā karmasvakajñānavalamevaṃ ye vā punarmayā śrāvakāṇāmantarāyikā dharmā ādhyātā ityetadvaiśāradyam
T07vakobhau:14065: yathā sarvatragāminī pratipajjñānaṃ valamevaṃ yo va punarmayā śrāvakāṇāṃ niryāṇāya mārga ādhyāta ityetadvaiśāradyaṃ veditavyam /
T07vakobhau:14075: yadā śrāvakasyāpi śuśrūṣamāṇāśuśrūpamāṇobhayeṣvānandī na bhavatyāghāto vā
T07vakobhau:14078: athavā yasya śrāvakāstasya cacchūśrūṣamāṇāśuśrūṣamāṇobhayeṣu saumanasyādyavakāśaḥ sutarāṃ na tathā 'nyasyeti tasyaiva tānutpādādāścarya vyavasthāpyate nānyasyeti /
T07vakobhau:14083: anyathā hi na sarvasattvālambanā sidhyet na ca triduḥkhatākārā /
T07vakobhau:14103: kiṃ punaḥ sarve buddhāḥ sarvaprakārasāmānyā bhavanti /
T07vakobhau:14111: etāmeva ca trividhāṃ saṃpadaṃ manasikurvāṇena viduṣā śakyaṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmantike tīvraprema gauravaṃ cotpādayituṃ yaduta hetusaṃpadaṃ phalasaṃpadamupakārasaṃpadaṃ ca /
T07vakobhau:14121: sarvakleśaprahāṇam atyantaprahāṇaṃ savāsanaprahāṇaṃ sarvasamādhisamāpattyāvaraṇaprahāṇaṃ ca caturvidhā prabhāvasaṃpat /
T07vakobhau:14127: tacca punarbuddhā eva sakalaṃ jñātuṃ baktuṃ ca samarthāḥ yadyanekāsaṃkhyeyaṃ kalpaṃ jīvitamadhitiṣṭheyuḥ
T07vakobhau:14129: atha capunarbālāḥ svaguṇadāridracyahatādhimokṣāḥ śruṇvanto 'pi tāṃ tādṛśīṃ guṇasamṛddhiṃ buddhaṃ ca nādriyante tasya ca dharmam /
T07vakobhau:14130: paṇḍitāstu punarmajjābhirapi taṃ bhagavantamabhiprapadyante tasya ca dharmam /
T07vakobhau:14131: te he śraddhāmātrakeṇāpyekāntikenābhiprasannā aniyatavipākānāṃ pāpānāṃ rāśīnabhibhūya daivīṃ mānuṣīṃ ca śriyamabhibhūya nirvāṇaparāyaṇāḥ saṃvartante /
T07vakobhau:14144: tatrāraṇā nāma kaścidevārhan kleśaprabhavaṃ sattvānāṃ duḥkhaṃ viditvātmānaṃ ca dakṣiṇīyaviśeṣaṃ pareṣāṃ tadālambanaṃ kleśotpādaṃ parihartukāmastādṛśaṃ jñānamutpādayati bhena pareṣāṃ sarvathā 'pi raṇaṃ notpādayati /
T07vakobhau:14145: na kasyacittadālambano rāga utpadyate dveṣo māno vā /
T07vakobhau:14154: anyo hi svasaṃtānādapi kadācit kleśaraṇaṃ parihartu na śaknoti /
T07vakobhau:14158: anāgatāḥ kāmāvacarāḥ savastukāḥ kleśāḥ asyā ālambanaṃ nāpareṣāṃ kleśa udapādītyevaṃ pravṛttatvāt
T07vakobhau:14159: avastukāstu kleśā na śakyāḥ parihartuṃ sarvatragāṇāṃ sakalasvabhūmyālambanatvāt /
T07vakobhau:14162: tadapi hi saṃvṛtijñānaṃ dhyāne 'ntye 'kopyadharmaṇaḥ manuṣyāśrayaṃ ca
T07vakobhau:14169: praṇidhipūrvakaṃ jñānaṃ praṇidhijñānaṃ yaddhi praṇidhāya prāntakoṭikaṃ caturtha dhyānaṃ samāpadyate
T07vakobhau:14173: dharmārthayorniruktau ca pratibhāne ca saṃvidaḥ // VAkK_7.37 //
T07vakobhau:14189: sarvabhūmikā cāsau kāmadhātau yāvat bhavāgre vāṅmārgayoranyatarālambanāt /
T07vakobhau:14197: anye tu dve dharmaniruktipratisavidau saṃvṛtijñānasvabhāve nāmakāyādivāgālambanasvabhāvatvāt
T07vakobhau:14204: "padavyañjane tasyaivarthe tasyaikadvivahustrīpuruṣādyadhivacane tasyāsaktatāyāmavivartyajñānaṃ dharmāvipratisaṃvida" ityata evāsāṃ kramasiddhiḥ /
T07vakobhau:14208: āsāṃ ca kila pratisaṃvidāṃ gaṇitaṃ buddhavacanaṃ śabdavaidyā hetuvidyā ca pūrvaprayogo yathākramam
T07vakobhau:14211: yasya caikā tasyāvaśyaṃ catasraḥ pratisaṃvidī bhavanti /
T07vakobhau:14221: niruktipratisaṃvidastadvalena lābho na tu sā caturthadhyānabhūmikā /
T07vakobhau:14229: pratilomaṃ punaryāvatkāmāvacaraṃ cittaṃ tataḥ punaranulomaṃ yāvaccaturthadhyānamevaṃ sarvabhūmyanulomitam
T07vakobhau:14271: kīdṛśe 'pi me kāye kīdṛśaṃ cittam bhavaty evaṃ
T07vakobhau:14274: pūrvanivāsaṃ samanusmartukāmaḥ samanantaraniruddhamanovijñāno nimittamudgṛhya tatsamanantaraprātilomyenāvasthāntarāṇi manasikaroti /
T07vakobhau:14287: yadbhūmikā ṛddhacyabhhijñā bhavati tāṃ bhūmi tayā gacchati /
T07vakobhau:14289: evaṃ divyaśrotrābhijñayā svabhūmikameva śabdaṃ śṛṇotyadharabhūmikaṃ vā nordhvabhūmikam /
T07vakobhau:14293: ata evārupyabhumikaṃ cittaṃ cetaḥparyāyapūrvanivāsabhijñābhyāṃ na gṛhlātyurdhvabhūmikatvāt
T07vakobhau:14297: janmāntarābhyastā abhijñā vairāgyato labhyante vaiśeṣikyaḥ prayogataḥ /
T07vakobhau:14308: kathaṃ tarhi "cyutopapādajñānenaiva jānāti amī bhavantaḥ sattvāḥ kāyaduścaritena samanvāgatāḥ" ityevamādi /
T07vakobhau:14337: iṣṭe śaikṣsya nokte tu vidye sāvidyasaṃtateḥ // VAkK_7.46 //
T07vakobhau:14351: asti hi ca gāndhārī nāma vidyā yayāphāśena gacchati īkṣaṇikā ca nāma vidyā yayā paracittaṃ jānāti /
T07vakobhau:14352: na tu yathābhūtānuśāsanam anyathā śakyaṃ kartumavybhicāritvāt /
T07vakobhau:14353: pradhānamāvarjanamātraṃ ca tābhyāmanuśāsanaprātihāryeṇa tu hitena iṣṭenaphalena yogo bhavatyupāyopadeśādityevāvaśyam ṛddhirityucyate /
T07vakobhau:14362: śarīravāhinī ādhimokṣikī manojavā ca tatra gatiḥ /
T07vakobhau:14364: manasa ivāsyā rava iti manojavā gatirbuddhasyaiva nānyasya /
T07vakobhau:14366: ata e"vācintyo buddhānāṃ buddhaviṣaya" ityuktaṃ bhagavatā /
T07vakobhau:14384: kāmadhātāvidaṃ caturvidhaṃ nirmāṇamevaṃ rūpadhātau-ityaṣṭavidhaṃ samāsato nirmāṇam /
T07vakobhau:14385: kathaṃ rūpadhātūpapannasya kāmāvacaranirmāṇe gandharasābhyāṃ na samanvāgamo bhavati /
T07vakobhau:14397: evaṃ tṛtīyacaturthadhyānabhūmikāni catvāri pañca ca yojyāni /
T07vakobhau:14410: nirmāṇacittādapi śuddhakaṃ dhyānaṃ nirmāṇacittaṃ cotpadyate nānyat /
T07vakobhau:14411: na hi samādhiphalasthitasvāpraviśya punaḥ samādhiṃ tasmāt vyutthānamasti /
T07vakobhau:14417: kāmadhātuprathamadhyānabhūmiko hi nirmitaḥ svabhūmikenaiva cittena bhāṣyate /
T07vakobhau:14423: yadā ca vahavo nirmitā bhavanti tadā yugapat bhāṣante /
T07vakobhau:14425: ekasya tūṣṇīṃbhūtasya sarvetūṣṇīṃ bhavanti ta" iti gāthā /
T07vakobhau:14426: buddhasya pūrva paścādvā yathecchaṃ nirmitā bhāṣante /
T07vakobhau:14427: yadā bhāṣaṇacittaṃ tadā nirmāṇacittābhāvo nirmāṇacittābhāvānnirmitābhāva iti kathamenaṃ bhāṣayanti
T07vakobhau:14443: jitāyāṃ tvabhijñāyāmekena cittenānekaṃ nirmiṇoti yāvannirmātumiṣṭaṃ bhavati /
T07vakobhau:14448: upapattipratilambhikaṃ tu nirmāṇacittaṃ kuśalākuśalamavyākṛtaṃ bhavati devanāgapiśācādīnām
T07vakobhau:14453: ṛddhirmantrauṣadhābhyāṃ ca karmajā ceti pañcadhā // VAkK_7.53 //
T07vakobhau:14458: kimete divye eva āhosvit divye eva divye /
T07vakobhau:14463: dhyānasamāpannasya śabdālokābhogaprayogeṇa dhyānabhūmikāni bhūtānyupādāya rūpaprasādau nirvartete cakṣuḥśrotrasāmantake rūpaśabdyordarśanaśravaṇahetū iti dhyānabhūmikatvāt divye eva te cakṣuḥśrotre te ca punaḥ
T07vakobhau:14465: nāsti divyaṃ cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ ca tatsabhāgaṃ nityaṃ vijñānasahitatvāt nāpi vikalaṃ kāṇavibrāntābhāvāt
T07vakobhau:14476: sarvābhhisaṃskāreṇa saha śrāvako 'pi dvisāhasra lokadhātuṃ divyena cakṣuṣā paśyati /
T07vakobhau:14491: yaccāpi tārkikaṃ paracittajñānaṃ naimittikānāṃ yacca vidyākṛtaṃ tadapi trividhaṃ veditavyam
T07vakobhau:14507: asya svabhāvānāṃ tu kartavya ityādita eva dhyānānyārabhyante sarvaguṇāśrayatvāt /
T07vakobhau:14528: evaṃ tarhi cittānyevaikālambanāni samādhirna caitasikaṃ dharmāntaramiti prāpnoti /
T07vakobhau:14530: yena tu tānyekāgrāṇi vartante sa dharmaḥ samādhiḥ /
T07vakobhau:14532: nanu ca kṣaṇikatvātsarvaṃ cittamekāgraṃ dvitīyasya tasmādavikṣepa iti cet /
T07vakobhau:14534: yata eva ca smādhistata eva cittānāmekālambanatvaṃ kiṃ neṣyate /
T07vakobhau:14538: tathā hyadhicittaṃ śikṣā cittapariśuddhipradhānaṃ ca sūtre catvāri dhyānānyuktānītyapare /
T07vakobhau:14550: sa hi śamathavipaśyanābhyāṃ yuganddhavāhitvāddṛṣṭadharmasukhavihāra uktaḥ sukhā ca pratipaditi
T07vakobhau:14558: kīdṛśaṃ punaḥ kuśalamaikāgyraṃ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ kīdṛśaṃ yāvaccaturtham /
T07vakobhau:14568: vicāravivarjitaṃ prītisukhavat dvitīyaṃ vicāraprītivarjitaṃ tṛtīyaṃ vicāraprītisukhavarjitaṃ caturthamiti /
T07vakobhau:14588: na hi tatra rūpasaṃjñā vibhūtā na vigatetyarthaḥ /
T07vakobhau:14589: yaduktaṃ "catuskandhā" iti sādhyaṃ tāvadetadārupyeṣu rūpaṃ nāstīti /
T07vakobhau:14593: yadi kāyavāk saṃvaramātraṃ kathaṃ tadabhāve tatsaṃvarau bhaviṣyataḥ /
T07vakobhau:14610: āyuruṣmaṇoḥ saṃsṛṣṭavacanānnaḍakalāpīdvayavannāmarūpayoranyonyaniśritavacanā "dvijñānapratyayaṃ nāmarūpami"ti vacanāt anyatrarūpādyāvatsaṃskārebhyo vijñānasyāgatigatipratiṣedhāccārūpyeṣu rūpāstitvasiddhiriti cet /
T07vakobhau:14614: yacca nāmarūpayoranyonyāśritatvamuktaṃ kimidaṃ kāmarūpāvacaraṃ nāma saṃdhāyoktamāhosvitsarvamiti
T07vakobhau:14615: yacca vijñānapratyayaṃ nāmarūpamuktaṃ kimatra sarva vijñānaṃ nāmarūpasya pratyayamuktamāhosvitsarve nāmarūpaṃ vijñānapratyayamiti /
T07vakobhau:14617: kimatra sarvaireva tairvinā tatpratiṣedha āhosvit ekenāpīti /
T07vakobhau:14620: bāhyasyāpi hyaṣmaṇa āyuṣā binā bhāvo na prāpnoti /
T07vakobhau:14623: "atikramya devān kavaḍīkārā hārabhakṣāni"ti vacanāt prītyāhāravacanāccāprasaṅga iti cet /
T07vakobhau:14627: "arupiṇaḥ santi sattvāḥ sarvaśo rūpasaṃjñānāṃ samatikramādi"ti vacanāt /
T07vakobhau:14628: sati hi rupe svaṃ rūpamavaśyaṃ saṃjānīranniti /
T07vakobhau:14636: bhavena bhavasyāniḥsaraṇavacanaṃ tu tenaiva tasyāniḥsaraṇādasarvānatyanta niḥsaraṇācca /
T07vakobhau:14637: dhyānesu coktaṃ bhagavatā "yattatra bhavati rūpagataṃ vā yāvadvijñānagataṃ veti /
T07vakobhau:14638: ārupyeṣu tūktaṃ "yattatra bhavati vedanāgataṃ vā yāvadvijñānagataṃ ve"ti /
T07vakobhau:14639: satyāṃ tesu rūpajātau kasmādrūpagataṃ veti nāvakṣyat /
T07vakobhau:14659: anantamākāśamanantaṃ vijñānaṃ nāsti kiñcidityeva manasikurvāṇasteṣu prayujyante yathāsaṃkhyam
T07vakobhau:14663: na hi sā paṭvī saṃjñā na ca punarnaiva saṃjñeti /
T07vakobhau:14664: "yadyapi tatrāpyevaṃ prayujyante saṃjñārogaḥ saṃjñāgaṇdaḥ saṃjñāśalyaḥ āsaṃjñikasaṃmohaḥ etacchāntametatpraṇītaṃ yaduta
T07vakobhau:14666: kasmāttu taistadevaṃ gṛhyata ityavaśyamidaṃ vaktavyaṃ jāyate /
T07vakobhau:14669: ityetānyaṣṭau maulāni samāpattidravyāṇi yaduta catvāri dhyānāni catvāra ārupyā iti /
T07vakobhau:14692: eṣāṃ ca samāpattidravyāṇāṃ dhyānānyeva bhavanti nārupyāḥ /
T07vakobhau:14697: vitarko vicāraḥ prītiḥ sukhaṃ cittaikāgratā cetyetāni pañcāṅgāni samādhiḥ kilāṅgaṃ dhyānaṃ ca /
T07vakobhau:14699: yathā caturaṅgā senā evaṃ pañcāṅgaṃ dhyānam /
T07vakobhau:14703: tṛtīye pañca tūpekṣā smṛtiḥ prajñā sukhaṃ sthitiḥ /
T07vakobhau:14723: ata evocyate yānyaṅgāni prathame dhyāne dvitīye 'pi tānīti catuṣkoṭikam /
T07vakobhau:14734: iha prasrabdhisukhaṃ tatra vedanāsukhamiti kuta etat /
T07vakobhau:14741: na cāpi tayoḥ paryāyeṇa dhyāne vṛttiryuktā pañcāṅgavacanāditi /
T07vakobhau:14743: nāstyeva caitasikaṃ sukhendriyaṃ triṣvapi hi dhyāneṣu /
T07vakobhau:14746: yatsukhavedanīyena sparśena spṛṣṭasyotpadyate kāyikaṃ caitasikaṃ sātaṃ veditaṃ vedanāgatamidamucyate sukhendriyami"ti /
T07vakobhau:14749: "sukhaṃ ca kāyena pratisaṃvedayata" iti svaśabdena vacanācca /
T07vakobhau:14758: "yasminsamaye āryaśrāvakaḥ pravivekajāṃ prītiṃ kāyena sākṣātkṛtvopasaṃpadya viharatī"tyatra sūtre prasrabdhisukhayoḥ pṛthagvacanānna prasrabdhireva sukham /
T07vakobhau:14779: na cānāsrave kiñcidaṅgaṃ sāsravaṃ kicidanāsravaṃ syāditi cet /
T07vakobhau:14780: ayaugapadyātko doṣaḥ sukhaprītyasamavadhānānna pañcāṅgaṃ syāditi cet /
T07vakobhau:14784: tasmādyānyeva prathamadhyāne pañcāṅgāni teṣāṃ dvitricaturaṅgāpakarṣeṇa dvitīyādidhyānavyavasthānam
T07vakobhau:14785: ata eva ca prathame dhyāne pañcānāmaṅgatvamuktam /
T07vakobhau:14793: naiva tu pūrvācāryā evaṃ nirdiśanti sma yāvantaḥ prajñāntam /
T07vakobhau:14797: sormikeva hi nadī vitarkavicārakṣobhitā saṃtatir aprasannā vartate iti /
T07vakobhau:14798: na tarhi sa dravyāntaram iti kathaṃ dravyata ekādaśāṅgāni bhavanti /
T07vakobhau:14813: yathecchanti nikāyāntarīyāḥ dharmāntarameva caitasikaṃ prītiḥ saumanasyaṃ tu triṣvapi dhyānesu sukhamiti /
T07vakobhau:14814: na vai sukhaṃ dhyāneṣu saumanasyaṃ yujyate /
T07vakobhau:14816: uktaṃ hi bhagavatā aviparītakasūtre tṛtīyaṃ dhyānamuktvā "atrāsyotpannaṃ
T07vakobhau:14818: caturthe ca dhyāne sukhendriyaṃ nirudhyata" ityuktam /
T07vakobhau:14819: punaścoktaṃ "sukhasya ca prahāṇāt duḥkhasya ca prahāṇātpūrvameva ca
T07vakobhau:14823: kiṃ punaḥ kliṣṭeṣvapi dhyāneṣu yathāvihitānyaṅgāni bhavanti /
T07vakobhau:14824: na hi kiṃ teṣu na vidyate /
T07vakobhau:14840: trīṇi ca dhyānāni señjitāni uktāni bhagavatā /
T07vakobhau:14844: vitarkacārau śvāsau ca sukhādi ca catuṣṭayam // VAkK_8.11 //
T07vakobhau:14850: taskiṃ yā dhyānasamāpattiṣu vedanāstā eva dhyānopapattiṣu /
T07vakobhau:14863: yadi dvitīyādiṣu dhyāneṣu trayo vijñānakāyā na saṃvidyante vitarkavicārau ca katham te paśyanti yāvatspṛśanti katham cāvijñapti samutthāpayanti /
T07vakobhau:14869: prathamadhyānabhūmikaṃ cakṣuḥśrotrakāyavijñānaṃ vijñaptisamutthāpakaṃ ca dvitīyādiṣu ca dhyāneṣu saṃmukhīkurvanti /
T07vakobhau:14872: anivṛtāvyākṛtaṃ ca tat prathamadhyānabhūmikaṃ vijñānaṃ veditavyaṃ yatte saṃmukhīkurvanti /
T07vakobhau:14885: ata evocyate "syācchuddhakaṃ dhyānaṃ vairāgyeṇa pratilabheta vairāgyeṇa vijahyāt /
T07vakobhau:14898: nanu ca niyāmā vakrāntito 'pyanāsravaṃ prathamato labhate /
T07vakobhau:14914: svabhūmike dve ākāśānantyāyatanacaturthadhyānabhūmikāni catvāri ākiñcanyāyatanabhavāgrabhūmikāni trīṇīti /
T07vakobhau:14919: śubhagrahaṇena śuddhamanāsravaṃ ca gṛhyate kuśalatvāt anāsravasya samāpatti dravyasyānantaraṃ svabhūmike ca śuddhānāsrave utpadyete /
T07vakobhau:14921: vyutkrāntakasamāpattāro hi tṛtīyāt pareṇa laṅghayituṃ notsahante /
T07vakobhau:14925: tathā śuddhāt kliṭaṃ cāpi svabhūmikam // VAkK_8.15 //
T07vakobhau:14932: kleśotpīḍito hyadharamapi samāpattiṃ śuddhakaṃ bahu manyate /
T07vakobhau:14936: pūrvāvedhāt pūrvaṃ hi sa evaṅkāmo bhavati varamadhastāt śuddhakaṃ nopariṣṭāt kliṣṭamiti /
T07vakobhau:14941: śuddhakāt kliṣṭācca samanantaraṃ svabhūmikameva kliṣṭamutpadyate nānyabhūmikamiti /
T07vakobhau:14950: hānabhāgīyaṃ viśeṣabhāgīyaṃ sthitibhāgīyaṃ nirvedhabhāgīyamiti caturvidhaṃ śuddhakam /
T07vakobhau:14955: kleśotpattyanuguṇaṃ hānabhāgīyaṃ svabhūmyanuguṇaṃ sthitibhāgīyamūrdhvabhūmyanuguṇaṃ viśeṣabhāgīyamanāsravānuguṇaṃ nirvedhabhāgīyam /
T07vakobhau:14958: dve trīṇi trīṇi caikaṃ ca hāna bhāgādyanantaram /
T07vakobhau:14973: sāsravā aṣṭau bhūmiranulomapratilomasamāpattito nirjitya anāsravāśca sapta
T07vakobhau:14976: evaṃ punaḥ pratilomaṃ nirjitya anāsravā apyekalaṅghitā anulomapratilomaṃ ca samāpadyate /
T07vakobhau:14978: yadā tu prathamātsāsravāt tṛtīyamanāsravaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate tasmātsāsravamākāśānantyāyatanaṃ tasmādanāsravamākiñcanyāyatanam /
T07vakobhau:14982: tāṃ ca triṣu dvīpeṣu asamayavimukta evārhannutpādayati /
T07vakobhau:14984: dṛṣṭiprāptasya yadyapi tīkṣṇendriyatvāt samādhau vaśitvaṃ na tu niṣkleśaḥ /
T07vakobhau:14985: samayavimukto yadyapi niḥkleśo natvasya samādhau vaśitvamiti /
T07vakobhau:14990: bhavāgraṃ bhavāgre ca saṃmukhīkriyate adhaśca yāvatkāmadhātau /
T07vakobhau:14995: nahi tasyādhareṇa samāpattidravyeṇa kiñcit prayojanaṃ vidhīyate /
T07vakobhau:15012: maulānāṃ kuśalārūpyāṇāmadhobhūmikaṃ sāsravaṃ vastu nālambanaṃ svordhvabhūmyālambanatvāt /
T07vakobhau:15029: kiṃ tānyapi trividhāni tathaiva ca teṣu vedanā /
T07vakobhau:15032: śuddhakāni ca tānyupekṣendriyasaṃprayuktāni ca yantabāhyatvādadhobhūmyudvegānapagamāt vairāgyapathatvācca nāsvādanāsaṃprayuktāni /
T07vakobhau:15034: ādyaṃ sāmantakamanāgamyaṃ tacchuddhakaṃ cānāsravaṃ ca yadyapi sāmantakacittena pratisaṃdhibandhaḥ kliṣṭo bhavati /
T07vakobhau:15043: ata eva dvitīyādiṣu dhyāneṣu na vyayasthāpyate viśeṣābhāvāditi /
T07vakobhau:15054: tāṃ hi dhyānāntarikāṃ bhāvayitvā mahābrahmā bhavati /
T07vakobhau:15055: punaḥ sarvasamādhīn saṃkalayya trayaḥ samādhayaḥ uktāḥ sūtre /
T07vakobhau:15059: tatra dhyānāntaraṃ tāvadavitarko vicāramātraḥ samādhhiriti jñāpitam /
T07vakobhau:15081: paraiḥ śeṣaiḥ satyākāraiḥ saṃprayuktaḥ samādhipraṇihito daśākāraḥ /
T07vakobhau:15082: anityaduḥkhataddhetubhya udvegāt mārgasya ca kolopamatayā 'vaśyatyājyatvāttadākāraḥ samādhirapraṇihitaḥ
T07vakobhau:15103: na duḥkhato na hetvādito 'nāsravasyātallakṣaṇatvānna mārgākāraiḥ dūṣaṇīyatvāt /
T07vakobhau:15123: asti samādhibhāvanā āsevitā bhāvitā vahulīkṛtā dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārāya
T07vakobhau:15126: samādhibhāvanā dhyānaṃ śubhamādyaṃ sukhāya hi // VAkK_8.27 //
T07vakobhau:15127: kuśalaṃ prathamaṃ śuddhakamanāsravaṃ vā dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārāya samādhibhāvanā /
T07vakobhau:15133: prayogajāḥ sarve guṇāstraidhātukā anāsravāḥ prajñāprabhedāya samādhibhāvanā /
T07vakobhau:15135: yaścaturthadhyāne vajropamaḥ samādhiḥ sa āsravakṣayāya samādhibhāvanā /
T07vakobhau:15139: idānīṃ samādhisaṃniśritānāṃ guṇānāṃ nirdeśakāla iti vyākhyāyante
T07vakobhau:15165: sukhitā vata sattvā iti manasikurvan maitrīṃ samāpadyate /
T07vakobhau:15166: duḥkhitā vata sattvā iti karuṇāṃ modantāṃ vata sattvā iti muditāṃ sattvā ityeva manasi kurvannupekṣāṃ samāpadyate /
T07vakobhau:15168: atadvatāṃ sukhādhimokṣatvāt kathaṃ na viparītatvaṃ bhavati /
T07vakobhau:15201: yathā sukhitamātmānaṃ manyate parānvā śṛṇoti buddhabodhisattvāryaśrāvakāṃstathā sattvānāṃ tatsukhamadhimucyate evaṃ sukhitā vata santu sattvā iti /
T07vakobhau:15202: na cecchaknoti kleśasyodbhatavṛttitvāt sa mitrapakṣaṃ tridhā bhittvā
T07vakobhau:15205: teṣu cetsamāṃ maitrīṃ labhate tata udāsīnapakṣe /
T07vakobhau:15206: tataḥ śatrūpakṣaṃ tridhā bhittvā mṛdau tat sukhamadhimucyate /
T07vakobhau:15208: tataścedadhimātra iva mitrapakṣe sukhādhimokṣo na vyāvartate /
T07vakobhau:15209: tataḥ krameṇa grāmarāṣṭrasukhādhimokṣo yāvadekāṃ diśaṃ yāvatsarva lokaṃ maitryā sphurati /
T07vakobhau:15211: śakyaṃ hi samucchinna kuśalamūle 'pi guṇagrāhiṇā bhavituṃ pratyekabuddhe
T07vakobhau:15213: evaṃ karuṇāyāṃ muditāyāṃ ca prayujyate amī sattvā bahuvidhavyasanīdhanimagnā apyevaṃ duḥkhādvimucyeran apyevātipramoderannityadhimucyamāna upekṣāṃ tūdāsīnapakṣādārabhate /
T07vakobhau:15218: kiṃ punarya ekenāpramāṇena samanvāgataḥ so 'vaśyaṃ sarvaiḥ /
T07vakobhau:15226: śubhaṃ vimokṣaṃ kāyena sākṣātkṛtvopasaṃpadya viharatīti tṛtīyaḥ /
T07vakobhau:15246: kuśalāḥ samāhitā eva cārūpyavimokṣākhyāṃ labhante na kliṣṭā nāpyasamāhitāstadyathāmaraṇabhave
T07vakobhau:15258: bhavāgraṃ hi saṃjñā sūkṣmaṃ tat punaḥ sūkṣmataraṃ kṛtvā nirodhaṃ samāpadyante /
T07vakobhau:15261: bhāvāgrikeṇa vā śuddhakena cetasā tato vyutthānaṃ bhavatyākiñcanyāyatana bhūmikena vā sāsraveṇa
T07vakobhau:15262: tadevaṃ tasyāḥ sāsravaṃ samāpatticittaṃ bhavati sāsravānāntarya tu vyutthānacittamiti /
T07vakobhau:15268: ārūpyavimokṣāṇāṃ svabhūmikordhvabhūmikaṃ duḥkhaṃ taddhetunirodhau cālambanaṃ sarvaścānvayajñānapakṣo mārgaḥ /
T07vakobhau:15273: aśubhayā līnaṃ saṃtatiṃ pramodayituṃ jijñāsanārthaṃ vā /
T07vakobhau:15275: evaṃ ca punastau niṣpannau bhavato yadi śubhato 'pi manasi kurvataḥ kleśo
T07vakobhau:15284: adhyātmaṃ rūpasaṃjñī vahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati parīttāni suvarṇāni durvarṇāni tāni khalu rūpāṇyabhibhūyajānātyabhibhūya paśyatītyevaṃsaṃjñī bhavatīdaṃ prathamamabhibhvāyatanam /
T07vakobhau:15291: yathā prathamo vimokṣa evaṃ dve abhibhvāyatane prathamadvitīye /
T07vakobhau:15293: yathā dvitīyo vimokṣa evaṃ dve abhibhvāyatane tṛtīyacaturthe /
T07vakobhau:15318: sarvāṇi caitāni vimokṣādīni pṛthagjanāryasāṃtānikāni sthāpayitvā nirodhavimokṣam /
T07vakobhau:15325: ārupyavimokṣā ārupyakṛtsne ca traidhātukāśrayāṇi śeṣaṃ manuṣyāśrayameva /
T07vakobhau:15334: dhyānānāṃ rūpadhātau tu tābhyāṃ dharmatayāpi ca // VAkK_8.38 //
T07vakobhau:15335: rūpadhātau dhyānotpādanametābhyāṃ hetukarmabalābhyāṃ dharmatayā ca saṃvartanīkāle /
T07vakobhau:15341: tatrāgamaḥ sūtravinayābhidharmā adhigamo bodhipakṣyā ityeṣa dvividhaḥ saddharmaḥ /
T07vakobhau:15342: dhātārastasya vaktāraḥ pratipattāra eva ca // VAkK_8.39 //
T07vakobhau:15345: ato yāvadete sthāsyanti tāvatsaddharma iti veditavyam /
T07vakobhau:15349: yo 'yamiha śāstre 'bhidharma uktaḥ kimeṣa eva śāstrābhidharmo deśitaḥ /
T07vakobhau:15355: saddharmanītau tu punarbuddhā eva pramāṇaṃ buddhaputrāśca /
T07vakobhau:15356: nimīlite śāstari lokacakṣuṣi kṣayaṃ gate sākṣijane ca bhūyasā /
T07vakobhau:15358: gate 'tha śāntiṃ paramāṃ svayaṃbhuvi svayaṃbhuvaḥ śāsanadhurdhareṣu ca /
T07vakobhau:15361: balakālaṃ malānāṃ ca na pramādyaṃ mumukṣubhiḥ // VAkK_8.43 //
T07vakobhau:15372: kathaṃ punaridaṃ gamyate skandhasaṃtāna evedamātmābhidhānaṃ vartate nānyasminnabhidheya iti
T07vakobhau:15374: ye hi dharmāḥ santi teṣāṃ pratyakṣamupalabdhirbhavatyasatyantarāye /
T07vakobhau:15379: sati kāraṇe kāraṇāntarasyābhāve kāryasyābhāvo dṛṣṭo bhāve ca punarbhāvistadyathāṅkurasya /
T07vakobhau:15380: satyeva cābhāsaprāpte viṣaye manaskāre ca kāraṇe viṣayagrahaṇasyābhāvo dṛṣṭaḥ punaśca bhāvo 'ndhavadhirādīnāmanandhāvadhirādīnāṃ ca /
T07vakobhau:15387: kiṃ cedaṃ dravyata iti kiṃ vā prajñaptitaḥ /
T07vakobhau:15403: yadyayamarhtaḥ skandhānāṃ lakṣyate teṣveva pudgalaprajñaptiḥ prāpnoti /
T07vakobhau:15411: na hi vinendhanenāgniḥ prajñapyate na cānya indhanādagniḥ śakyate prajñapayituṃ nāpyananyaḥ
T07vakobhau:15414: evaṃ na ca vinā skanvaiḥ pudgalaḥ prajñapyate /
T07vakobhau:15415: na cānyaḥ skandhebhyaḥ śakyate pratijñātuṃ śāśvataprasaṅgāt /
T07vakobhau:15420: etadevātra vaktavyaṃ kiṃ dāhyaṃ kok dāhaka iti /
T07vakobhau:15421: loke hi tāvadapradīptaṃ kāṣṭḥādikamindhanamucyate dāhyaṃ ca /
T07vakobhau:15423: yacca bhasvaraṃ coṣṇaṃ ca bhṛśaṃ ca tena hi tadidhyate dhyate ca /
T07vakobhau:15426: yathā kṣīraṃ pratītya dadhi madhu pratītyaśuktam /
T07vakobhau:15429: yadi caiyaṃ pudgalaḥ skandhān pratītyotpadyate sa tebhyo 'nyaścānityaśca
T07vakobhau:15431: atha punastatraiva kāṣṭhādau pradīpte yadīṣṇyaṃ tadagnistatsahajātāni trīṇi bhūtānīndhanamiṣyante
T07vakobhau:15435: na hi tattasya kāraṇaṃ nāpi tat prajñapteḥ /
T07vakobhau:15438: skandhā apyevaṃ pudgalasyāśrayasahabhūtāḥ prāpnuvantīti vispaṣṭamanyatvaṃ pratijñāyate /
T07vakobhau:15447: atha punaḥ sarvameva tat pradīptaṃ kāṣṭhādikamindhanaṃ cāgniśceṣyate /
T07vakobhau:15449: skandhā eva ca pudgalā ityananyatvamanivāryaṃ prāpnoti /
T07vakobhau:15451: yathendhanamupādāyāgniḥ prajñapyate evaṃ skadhānupādāya pudgalaḥ iti /
T07vakobhau:15452: yadi cāyamanyaḥ skandhebhyo na vaktavyaḥ "pañcavidhaṃ jñeyamatītānāgataṃ
T07vakobhau:15454: naiva hi tadatītādibhyaḥ pañcamaṃ nāpañcamaṃ vaktavyam /
T07vakobhau:15455: yadā ca pudgalaḥ prajñapyate ki tāvatskandhānupalabhya prajñapyate āhosvit pudgalam /
T07vakobhau:15459: pudgala eva hi tasyā upādānaṃ prāpnoti /
T07vakobhau:15460: atha mataṃ satsu skandheṣu pudgala upalabhyate tataḥ skandhānupādāyāsya prajñaptirucyata iti
T07vakobhau:15461: tadevaṃ rūpasyāpi cakṣurmanaskārālokeṣu satsūpalambhāt tānupādāya prajñaptirbaktavyā /
T07vakobhau:15467: cakṣurvijñeyāni cedrūpāṇi pratītyapudgalaṃ pratibhāvayati cakṣurvijñeyaḥ pudgalo vaktavyaḥ no tu vaktavyo rūpāṇi vāno vā /
T07vakobhau:15468: evaṃ yāvat manovijñeyān ceddharmān pratītya pudgalaṃ prativibhāvayati manovijñeyaḥ pudgalo vaktavyo no tu vaktavyo dharmā vā no vā /
T07vakobhau:15470: cakṣurvijñeyāni cedrūpāṇi pratītya kṣīraṃ vibhāvayatyudakaṃ vā cakṣurvijñeyaṃ kṣīramudakaṃ ceti vaktavyaṃ no tu vaktavyaṃ rūpāṇi vā no vā /
T07vakobhau:15471: evaṃ ghrāṇajihvākāyavijñeyaṃ vaktavyaṃ no tu vaktavyaṃ spraṣṭavyāni vā no vā /
T07vakobhau:15473: ato yathā rūpādīnyeva kṣīramudakaṃ vā prajñapyate samastānyevaṃ skandhāḥ pudgala iti siddham
T07vakobhau:15474: yaccocyate cakṣurvijñeyāni rūpāṇi pratītya pudgalaṃ prativibhāvayatīti /
T07vakobhau:15476: kiṃ tāvadrūpāṇi pudgalopalabdheḥ kāraṇaṃ bhavatiti āhosvidrūpāṇyupalabhamānaḥ pudgalamupalabhata iti /
T07vakobhau:15477: yadi rūpāṇi pudgalopalabdheḥ kāraṇaṃ bhavanti sa ca tebhyo 'nyo na vaktavyaḥ /
T07vakobhau:15483: rūpādabhinnasvabhāvaḥ pudgalaḥ prāpnoti rūpa eva vā tatprajñāptiḥ /
T07vakobhau:15484: idaṃ ca rūpamayaṃ pudgalaḥ kathamidaṃ gamyate /
T07vakobhau:15494: yadi cāyamasti no tu vaktavyo rūpāṇi vā to vā /
T07vakobhau:15497: kiṃ tadrūpāṇi pratītyotpadyate āhosvit pudgalamubhayaṃ vā /
T07vakobhau:15500: yameva hi viṣayaṃ cakṣurvijñāneṣu pratītyotpadyate vijñānaṃ sa eva tasyālambanapratyayaḥ /
T07vakobhau:15503: sūtre hi nirdhāritaṃ dvayaṃ pratītya vijñānasyotpādo bhavatīti /
T07vakobhau:15506: yatkiñcit bhikṣo cakṣurvijñānaṃ sarvaṃ taccakṣuḥ pratītya rūpāṇi ceti /
T07vakobhau:15508: "ye hi hetayo ye pratyayā vijñānasyotpādāya te 'pyanityā" iti sūtre vacanāt /
T07vakobhau:15509: atha pudgalo na tasyālambanaṃ na tarhi tena vijñeyaḥ /
T07vakobhau:15515: "yānīmāni brāhmaṇa pañcendriyāṇi nānāgocarāṇi nānāviṣayāṇi svaṃ svaṃ
T07vakobhau:15518: tadyathā cakṣurindriyaṃ śrotrendriyaṃ ghrāṇendriyaṃ jihvendriyaṃ kāyendriyam /
T07vakobhau:15519: mana eṣaṃ pañcānāmindriyāṇāṃ gocaraviṣayaṃ pratyanubhavati manaścaiṣāṃ
T07vakobhau:15524: ṣaḍimānīndriyāṇi nānāgocarāṇi nānāviṣayāṇi svaṃ svaṃ gocaraviṣayamākāṅkṣantī tyuktaṃ ṣaṭprāṇakopame
T07vakobhau:15528: yacca tatkevalaṃ mana ādhipatyādhyākṛtaṃ manovijñānaṃ naivaṃ tadanyeṣāṃ viṣayamākāṅkṣatyato nāstyeṣa doṣaḥ /
T07vakobhau:15529: uktaṃ ca bhagavatā "sarvābhijñeyaṃ vo bhikṣavo dharmaparyāyaṃ
T07vakobhau:15530: deśayiṣyāmī"tyuktvā cakṣurabhijñeyaṃ rūpāṇi cakṣurvijñānaṃ cakṣuḥsaṃsparśo yadapi taccakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayamadhyātmamutpadyate veditaṃ suḥkhaṃ vā
T07vakobhau:15533: ata etāvadevābhijñeyaṃ pratijñeyaṃ cetyavardhāryate na pudgalaḥ /
T07vakobhau:15536: cakṣuṣa ca pudgalaṃ paśyām iti paśyanta paudgalikā anātmanā ātmānaṃ paśyāma iti dṛṣṭisthānamāpannā bhavanti /
T07vakobhau:15539: "cakṣuḥpratītya rūpāṇi cotpadyate cakṣurvijñānaṃ trayāṇāṃ saṃnipātaḥ sparśaḥ sparśasahajātā vedanā saṃjñā cetanā itīme catvāro rupiṇaḥ skandhāśvakṣurindriyaṃ ca rūpametāvanmanuṣyatvamucyate atreyaṃ saṃjñā sattvo naro manuṣyo mānavaśca poṣaḥ puruṣaḥ pudgalo jīvo janturiti /
T07vakobhau:15540: atreyaṃ pratijñā ahaṃ cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi paśyāmīti /
T07vakobhau:15541: atrāyaṃ vyavahāra ityapi sa āyuṣmānevaṃnāmā evañjātya evaṅgotra evamāhāra evaṃsukhaduḥkhapratisaṃvedī evandīrghāyurevañcirasthitika evamāyuḥparyanta iti /
T07vakobhau:15543: sarva ime dharmāḥ anityāḥ saṃskṛtāśceti tāḥ pratītyasamutpannā iti /
T07vakobhau:15547: yadi cāyaṃ pudgalo nāyatanaṃ na sostīti siddham /
T07vakobhau:15549: teṣāmapi caivaṃ paśyato "yāvatā bhikṣo cakṣuryāvatā rūpāṇi vistareṇa etāvatā bhikṣo tathāgataḥ sarvaṃ ca prajñāpayati sarvaprajñaptiṃ ce"ti /
T07vakobhau:15550: bimbisārasūtre coktam "ātmā ātmeti bhikṣavo bālo 'śrutavān pṛthagjanaḥ prajñaptimanupatito na tvātrā tmā vā ātmīyaṃ vā duḥkhamidamutpadya
T07vakobhau:15553: "manyase ki nu sattveti māradṛṣṭigataṃ hi te /
T07vakobhau:15556: evaṃ skandhānupādāya saṃvṛtyā sattva ucyate" // iti /
T07vakobhau:15559: yathā saṃkliśyate cittaṃ yathā cittaṃ viśudhyati //
T07vakobhau:15561: nāstīha sattva ātmā vā dharmāstvete sahetukāḥ //
T07vakobhau:15565: na labhyate so 'pi kaścidyo bhāvayati śūnyatāmi"ti /
T07vakobhau:15570: śūnyatāyāmasya cittaṃ na praskandati na prasīdati na saṃtiṣṭhate na vimucyate /
T07vakobhau:15572: na vaita evaṃ grandhaṃ pramāṇaṃ kurvanti /
T07vakobhau:15576: yadi nikāya eva pramāṇaṃ na tarhi teṣāṃ budhaḥ śāstā /
T07vakobhau:15585: yo hi granthaḥ sarveṣu nikāyāntareṣvāmnāyate na ca sūtraṃ dharmatāṃ vā bādhate so 'smābhirapāṭhānna buddhavacanamiti vacanaṃ kevalaṃ sāhasamātram
T07vakobhau:15586: kiṃ cedamapi teṣāṃ sūtraṃ nāsti "sarvadharmā anātāna" iti /
T07vakobhau:15588: naiva hi pudgalo dharma ucyate nāpyanyo dharmāditi /
T07vakobhau:15591: iha caivaṃ vikalpyate "anātmanyāteti saṃjñāviparyāsa ścittaviparyāso dṛṣṭiviparyāsa" iti
T07vakobhau:15592: anātmanyātmeti viparyāso na tvātmani kiṃ ca punaḥ /
T07vakobhau:15593: "nātmā skandhāyatanadhātavaḥ" yattāvaduktaṃ prāk "no tu vaktavyaṃ rūpāṇi
T07vakobhau:15595: uktaṃ ca sūtrāntare "ye kecit bhikṣavaḥ śramaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā ātmeti samanupaśyantaḥ samanupaśyanti sarve ta imāneva pañcopādānaskandhāni"ti /
T07vakobhau:15597: tathoktaṃ "ye kecidanekavidhaṃ pūrvanivāsaṃ samanusmarantaḥ samanusmārṣuḥ samanusmaranti samanusmariṣyanti vā punaḥ sarve ta imāneva opañcopādanaskandhāni"ti /
T07vakobhau:15600: yadi tu rūpavantaṃ pudgalaṃ paśyetsatkāyadṛṣṭiprasaṅgaḥ syāt /
T07vakobhau:15603: yadyevaṃ tarhi na buddhaḥ sarvajñaḥ prapnoti /
T07vakobhau:15604: na hi kiñcictrittamasti caittā vā yatsarvaṃ jānīyāt /
T07vakobhau:15607: evaṃ tarhi cittavināśe pudgalasyāvināśābhyupagamāt nityatvamasyābhyupetaṃ bhavati /
T07vakobhau:15608: naiva ca vayaṃ sarvatra jñānasaṃmukhībhāvād buddhaṃ sarvajñamācakṣmahe /
T07vakobhau:15611: yā hyasau buddhākhyā saṃtatistasyā idamasti sāmarthyaṃ yadābhogamātreṇāviparītaṃ jñānamutpadyate yatreṣṭam /
T07vakobhau:15613: saṃtānena samarthatvādyathāgniḥ sarvabhuṅmataḥ tathā sarvavideṣṭavyo 'sakṛtsarvasya vedanāt
T07vakobhau:15616: "ye cābhyatītāḥ saṃbuddhā ye ca buddhā anāgatāḥ /
T07vakobhau:15617: yaśca etarhhi saṃbuddho bahūnāṃ śokanāśana" iti /
T07vakobhau:15618: skandhā eva ca traiyadhvikā iṣyante na pudgalā yuṣmābhiḥ /
T07vakobhau:15620: "bhāraṃ ca vo bhikṣavo deśayiṣyāmi bhārādānaṃ ca bhāranikṣepaṇaṃ ca bhārahāraṃ ce"ti /
T07vakobhau:15622: na hi bhāra eva bhārahāro yuktaḥ /
T07vakobhau:15630: "yo 'sāvāyupmānevaṃnāmā yāvadevañcirasthitika evamāyuḥparyantaḥ" sa eṣa yathā vijñāyeta
T07vakobhau:15631: mānyathā vijñāyi nityo vā avaktavyaṃ veti /
T07vakobhau:15632: skandhā eva ca skandhānāmupadhātāya saṃvartante pūrvakā uttareṣāmiti bhāraṃ ca bhārahāraṃ ca kṛtvoktāḥ /
T07vakobhau:15634: asty eva pudgalo yasmād uktaṃ "nāsti sattva upapāduka iti mithyādṛṣṭiḥ" /
T07vakobhau:15635: kaścaivam āha nāsti sattva upapāduka iti /
T07vakobhau:15636: sattvastu yathā 'sti tathā vibhakto bhagavateti brūmo mānuṣyakasūtre /
T07vakobhau:15637: tasmād yaḥ paratropapādukasattvākhyaskandhasaṃtānāpavādaṃ karoti tasyaiṣā mithyādṛṣṭir nāsti sattva upapāduka iti /
T07vakobhau:15639: athaiṣā mithyādṛṣṭiḥ pudgalāpavādikā satī kiṃprahātavyā bhavet /
T07vakobhau:15642: "ekaḥ pudgalo loka utpadyamāna utpadyate" iti vacanāt na skandhā iti cet /
T07vakobhau:15645: saṃskṛta iti vā pudgalo vaktavya utpatīmattvābhyupagamāt /
T07vakobhau:15646: na sa evamutpadyate yathā skandhā apūrvaprādurbhāvāt /
T07vakobhau:15649: yathā yājñiko jāto vaiyākaraṇo jāta ityucyate vidyopādānāt /
T07vakobhau:15652: na pratikṣepāt sūtra eva hi pratikṣiptaṃ bhagavatā paramārthaśūnyatāyām /
T07vakobhau:15654: ya imāṃśca skandhānnikṣipati anyāṃśca skandhān pratisaṃdadhātyanyatra dharmasaṃketāditi /
T07vakobhau:15655: phalgusūtre coktam "upādatta iti phalgu na vadāmīti /
T07vakobhau:15657: kaṃ ca tāvadbhavānyājñikaṃ yāvadvacyā dhita madhimucyate /
T07vakobhau:15669: yadi ca skandhānāmapūrvotpādo na pudgalasyeṣyate so 'nyaśca tebhyo nityaśca sphuṭaṃ dīpito bhavati /
T07vakobhau:15670: pañca skandhā ekaḥ pudgala iti brūvatā kathamanyatvaṃ nocyate /
T07vakobhau:15671: kathaṃ tāvat bhūtāni catvāri rūpaṃ tvekaṃ na ca bhūtebhyyo 'nyadrūpam /
T07vakobhau:15675: tathāpi tu yathā bhūtamātraṃ rūpamevaṃ skandhamātraṃ pudgala ityabhyupetaṃ bhavati /
T07vakobhau:15676: yadi skandhamātraṃ pudgalaḥ kasmāt bhagavatā sa jīvastaccharīrakanyo veti navyākṛtam /
T07vakobhau:15679: sa ca kasmiścinnāstīti kathamasyānyatvamananyatvaṃ vā vyākriyatām /
T07vakobhau:15684: yadi yadeva pṛccheyaṃ tadeva vyākuryā iti /
T07vakobhau:15689: nanu bhadantaḥ pūrvameva pratijñāṃ kārito nā 'nyadvacyākartavyamiti /
T07vakobhau:15692: ahamapi mahārājaṃ pṛccheyaṃ bahuvollakāśca rājāno bhavanti /
T07vakobhau:15693: yadi yadeva pṛccheyaṃ tadeva vyākuryā iti /
T07vakobhau:15695: yaste 'ntaḥpure ābhravṛkṣastasya kimamlāni phalāni āhosvit madhurāṇīti /
T07vakobhau:15697: nanu mayā pūrvameva mahārājaḥ pratijñāṃ kārito nānyadvacyākartavyamiti /
T07vakobhau:15699: sa āha kathamasato vṛkṣasya phalānāmamlatāṃ madhuratāṃ vā vyākaromīti /
T07vakobhau:15700: evameva mahārāja sa eva jīvo nāsti kuto 'sya śarīrādanyatāmananyatāṃ vā vyākaromīti /
T07vakobhau:15703: sa hi yasyāpi skandhasaṃtānasya jīva ityākhyā tasyāpyabhāvaṃ pratīyāditi mithyādṛṣṭiṃ pātitaḥ syāt /
T07vakobhau:15708: pṛṣṭo vyākuryāṃ nanvakalpaṃ syādvacanāya sarvadharmā anātmāna iti /
T07vakobhau:15709: nāstyātmetyānanda vatsasagotrāya parivrājakāya praśnaṃ pṛṣṭo vyākuryāṃ nanu vatsasagotraḥ parivrājakaḥ pūrvameva saṃmūḍho bhūyasyā mātrayā saṃmohamāpadyeta abhūt me ātmāsa me etarhi nāstīti /
T07vakobhau:15715: ātmāstitvaṃ hyupagato bhinnaḥ syāddṛṣṭidaṃṣṭrayā bhraṃśaṃ kukśalapotasya kuryādaprāpya saṃvṛtimi"ti
T07vakobhau:15719: jīvākhyā tatra sā na syāt jīvanāstitvadeśanāt //
T07vakobhau:15721: abhavyaḥ śūnyatāṃ boddhuṃ tadānīṃ tādṛśo janaḥ //
T07vakobhau:15722: tathā hyātmāsti nāstīti pṛṣṭo vāstyeva nāvadat /
T07vakobhau:15723: āśayāpekṣāyā praṣṭuḥ sati tvastīti nāha kim //
T07vakobhau:15725: yadi hi tāvadātmā loka iṣṭaḥ syāttasyābhāvādayuktaṃ caturdhā vyākaraṇam /
T07vakobhau:15727: śāśvate loke na kasyacit parinirvāṇaṃ prāpnuyāt /
T07vakobhau:15728: śāśvate loke na kasyacit parinirvāṇaṃ prāpnuyāt /
T07vakobhau:15730: ubhayathātve niyamata ekeṣāṃ parinirvāṇaṃ prāpnuyāt ekeṣāṃ na /
T07vakobhau:15732: ato mārgadhīnatvāt parinirvāṇasya caturdhāpi niyamo na vyākriyate
T07vakobhau:15735: tathāhi muktikaḥ parivrājaka eva catuṣkaṃ pṛṣṭvā punaḥ pṛṣṭavān kiṃ nu sarvo loko 'nena mārgeṇa niryātyāhosvidekadeśo lokasye"ti /
T07vakobhau:15736: sthavira ānanda āha "yameva tvaṃ muktika tatprathamato bhagavantaṃ praśnaṃ pṛṣṭavāṃstame vaitarhi pṛcchasyanena paryāyeṇe"ti sarvam /
T07vakobhau:15737: bhavati tathāgataḥ paraṃ maranādityapi catuṣkaḥ praṣṭurāśayāpekṣayā na vyākṛtaḥ /
T07vakobhau:15738: sa hi muktvāmānaṃ tathāgataṃ kṛtvā pṛṣṭavān /
T07vakobhau:15739: paudgalikastu paryanuyojyaḥ kiṃ kāraṇaṃ bhagavān jīvantaṃ pudgalamastīti vyākaroti paraṃ maraṇānna vyākarotīti /
T07vakobhau:15746: yadi ca bhagavān pūrvaṃ pudgalaṃ dṛṣṭvā parinirvṛtaṃ punaḥ na paśyatyajñānānna vyakarotīti sarvajñatvaṃ śāsturutpāditaṃ bhavati na vā so 'stītyabhyupagantavyam /
T07vakobhau:15748: arthatadapi na vaktavyaṃ paśyati vā naveti /
T07vakobhau:15749: evaṃ tarhi idamapi śanaiḥ śanairavaktavyaṃ kriyatāṃ sarvajño vā na vā bhagavānna veti /
T07vakobhau:15750: astyeva pudgalo yasmātsatyataḥ sthitito nāsti me ātmeti dṛṣṭisthānamuktam /
T07vakobhau:15757: yadi tarhi pudgalo nāsti ka eṣa saṃsarati /
T07vakobhau:15759: uktaṃ ca bhagavatā "avidyānivaraṇānāṃ sattvanāṃ saṃdhāvatāṃ saṃsaratāmi"ti
T07vakobhau:15763: yathātu kṣaṇiko 'gniḥ saṃtatyā saṃsaratītyucyate tathā sattvākhyaḥ skndhasamudāyastṛṣṇopādānaḥ saṃsaratītyucyate /
T07vakobhau:15764: yadi skandhāmātramidaṃ kasmādāha bhagavān "grahameva sa tena kālena tena samayena sunetro nāma śāstā 'bhūvami"ti /
T07vakobhau:15772: yadi cātmā bhavettthāgatā eva suvyaktaṃ paśyeyuḥ /
T07vakobhau:15779: atha mataṃ naivātmani pravartate sneha iti /
T07vakobhau:15780: tat ka idānīmeṣa yogo yadanātmanyātmadhimokṣāt sneha utpadyate ātmanyeva tu notpadyate /
T07vakobhau:15781: tasmāt dṛṣṭacyarvudametasmin śāsane utpannaṃ ya eṣa ekeṣāṃ pudgalagrāha ekeṣāṃ sarvanāstitāgrāhaḥ
T07vakobhau:15782: ye 'pi ca dravyāntaramevātmānaṃ manyante tīrthakārāstepāmeva mokṣābhāvadoṣo niṣkampaḥ /
T07vakobhau:15783: yadi tarhi sarvathāpi nāstyātmā kathaṃ kṣaṇikeṣu citteṣu cirānubhūtasyārthasya smaraṇaṃ bhavati pratyabhijñānaṃ vā /
T07vakobhau:15788: tādṛśo 'pi hyatadanvayaścittaviśeṣo na samarthaḥ tāṃ smṛtiṃ bhavayituṃ
T07vakobhau:15789: tadanvayo 'pi cānyādṛśo na samarthastāṃ smṛtiṃ bhavayitum /
T07vakobhau:15790: labhayathā tu samartha ityevaṃ smṛtirbhavatyanyasyāṃ sāmarthyādarśanāt /
T07vakobhau:15792: evaṃ hi devadattacetasā dṛṣṭaṃ yajñadattacetaḥ smaret /
T07vakobhau:15794: na hi tayoḥ saṃbandho 'sti akārya kāraṇabhāvādyathaikasaṃtānikayoḥ /
T07vakobhau:15797: saṃtatipariṇatyā yathoktamiti ka evaṃ sati doṣaḥ /
T07vakobhau:15806: tato caitrākhyātsaṃtānāttāṃ bhavantīṃ dṛṣṭvocyate caitraḥ smaratīti /
T07vakobhau:15814: kva ca punaḥ smṛtirviniyoktavyā va evaṃ tasyāḥ svāmī mṛgyate /
T07vakobhau:15823: hetureva tarhi svāmī prāpnoti phalameva ca svam /
T07vakobhau:15824: yasmāddhetorādhipatyaṃ phale phalena ca tadvān heturiti /
T07vakobhau:15826: yaścāpi sa caitrābhidhānaḥ saṃskārasamūhasaṃtāna ekato gṛhītvā gavākhyasvāmītyucyate sa cāpi tasya deśāntaravikārotpattau kāraṇabhāvaṃ cetasi kṛtvā na tu khalu kaścidekaścaitro nāmāsti na cāpi gauḥ /
T07vakobhau:15828: evaṃ ko vijānāti kasya vijñānamityevamādiṣu vaktavyam /
T07vakobhau:15830: yo 'pyāha bhāvasya bhavitrapekṣatvāt sarvo hi bhāvo bhavitāramapekṣate /
T07vakobhau:15831: yathā devadatto gacchatītyatra gatirbhāvo gantāraṃ devadattamapekṣate /
T07vakobhau:15838: so 'pi na kaścidekaḥ saṃskārā hi ta evaṃnāmānaḥ /
T07vakobhau:15839: tatra yathā devadatto gacchati yathā vijānāti /
T07vakobhau:15841: kṣaṇikā hisaṃskārā abhinnasaṃtānā devadatta iti bālairekasattvapiṇḍagraheṇādhimuktāḥ svasya saṃtānasya deśāntare kāraṇaṃ bhavanta ucyante gacchati devadatta iti /
T07vakobhau:15844: ta eva ca punarvijñānasya kāraṇaṃ bhavanta ucyante jānāti devadatta iti /
T07vakobhau:15846: yattarhi "vijñānaṃ vijānātī"ti sūtra uktaṃ kiṃ tatra vijñānaṃ karoti /
T07vakobhau:15854: ata eva tadindriyādapyutpannaṃ viṣayaṃ vijānātītyucyate nendriyam /
T07vakobhau:15858: api khalu yathā pradīpo gacchati tathā vijñānaṃ vijānātīti /
T07vakobhau:15864: yathā cābhijāyate tiṣṭhati rūpamityatra bhaviturbhāvādanarthantaratvamevaṃ vijñānasyāpi syāt
T07vakobhau:15865: yadi vijñānādvijñānamutpadyate nātmānaḥ kasmānna nityaṃ tādṛśamevotpadyate na ca kramaniyamenāṅkurakāṇḍapatradivat
T07vakobhau:15867: eṣa hi saṃskṛtasya svabhāvo yadavaśyaṃ prabandhasyānyathātvaṃ bhavati /
T07vakobhau:15868: anyathā hi nikāmadhyānasamāhitānāṃ sadṛśakāyacittotpattau prathamakṣaṇaniṃrviśeṣatvāt paścādapi na syāt svayaṃ vyutthānam /
T07vakobhau:15873: yadyathā strīcittānantaraṃ yadi tatkāyavidūṣaṇācittamutpannaṃ bhavati tatpatiputrādicittaṃ vā punaśca paścātsaṃtatipariṇatyā strīcittamutpadyate tat samartha bhavati tatkāyavidūṣaṇācittotpādane tatpatiputrādicittotpādane vā /
T07vakobhau:15876: atha punaḥ paryāyeṇa strīcittādvahuvidhaṃ cittamutpannaṃ vahutara māsannataraṃ vā tadevotpadyate
T07vakobhau:15879: saiva balīyasī bhāvanā kasmānnityaṃ na phalati /
T07vakobhau:15887: ya eva tvayamekīyastīrthika ātmaprabhavāṃ cittotpattiṃ manyate tasyaivedaṃ sphuṭaṃ codyamāpadyate kasmānna nityaṃ tādṛśamevotpadyate na ca kramaniyamenāṅkurakāṇḍapatrādivaditi /
T07vakobhau:15891: saṃyoginostu paricchinnatvādaprāptipūrvikā prāptiḥ samyoga iti lakṣaṇavyākhyānāccātmānaḥ paricchedaprasaṅgaḥ
T07vakobhau:15896: astu vā saṃyogastathāpi nityamaviśiṣṭe manasi kathaṃ saṃyogaviśeṣaḥ /
T07vakobhau:15898: sa eva paricodyate kathaṃ buddhiviśeṣa iti /
T07vakobhau:15901: nahi kiñcidātmanaḥ upalabhyate sāmarthmauṣadha kāryasiddhāviva kuhakavaidyaphuḥsvāhānām /
T07vakobhau:15906: na hi te citravadarādivadādhārye nāpi sa kuḍacyakuṇḍādivadādhāro yuktaḥ /
T07vakobhau:15913: ko hi sa gandhādibhyo 'nyāṃ pṛthivīṃ nirdhārayati /
T07vakobhau:15915: te hyeva tadākhyā gandhādayo yathā pratīyerannānya iti /
T07vakobhau:15919: sa eva valiṣṭhaḥ kasmānnityaṃ na phalati /
T07vakobhau:15923: smṛtyādīnāṃ guṇapadārthatvāt tasya cārthādavaśyaṃ dravyāśritatvāt teṣāṃ cānyāśrayāyogāditi cet /
T07vakobhau:15932: ahaṃ sukhī syāmahaṃ duḥkhī na syāmityevamarthaḥ /
T07vakobhau:15938: gauro 'hamahaṃ śyāmaḥ sthūlo 'hamahaṃ kṛśaḥ jīrṇo 'hamahaṃ yuveti gaurādibuddhibhiḥ sāmānādhikaraṇo 'yamahaṅkāro dṛśyate /
T07vakobhau:15941: ātmana upakārake 'pi śarīra ātmopacāro yathā ya evāyaṃ sa evāhaṃ sa evāyaṃ
T07vakobhau:15942: me bṛtya iti bhavatyupakārake 'pi ātmopacāro natvahaṅkāraḥ /
T07vakobhau:15945: yenaiva hi sahāsya saṃvandhaḥ kāyena cittena vā yatraivāyamahaṅkāra utpadyate nānvatra /
T07vakobhau:15954: asatyātmani ka eṣa sukhito duḥkhito vā /
T07vakobhau:15960: asatyātmani ka eṣāṃ karmaṇāṃ kartā kaśca phalānāṃ bhoktā bhavati /
T07vakobhau:15966: asti punaḥ kvacideva kārye kasyacit svātantryam /
T07vakobhau:15972: tatra kāyakarmaṇi tāvat kāyasya cittaparatantrā vṛttiḥ /
T07vakobhau:15973: cittasyāpi kāye svakāraṇaparatantrā vṛttistasyāpyevamiti nāsti kasyacit svātantryam /
T07vakobhau:15977: yattu yasya pradhānaṃ kāraṇaṃ tattsya kartetyucyate /
T07vakobhau:15978: na ca ātmanaḥ kvacidapi kāraṇatvaṃ dṛśyate /
T07vakobhau:15980: smṛtijo hi cchandaḥ cchandajo vitarko vitarkātprayatnaḥ prayatnādvāyustataḥ karmeti kimatrātmā kurute /
T07vakobhau:15981: phalasyāpica ka upabhogo yamayamātmā kurvannupabhoktā kalpyate /
T07vakobhau:15985: vedanādyanāśrayatvāt tadāśrayaśca ṣaḍāyatanaṃ nātmā yathā tathoktam /
T07vakobhau:15987: ātmanyapi sati kathaṃ vinaṣṭāt karmaṇa āyatyāṃ phalotpattiḥ /
T07vakobhau:15991: naiva tu vayaṃ vinaṣṭāt karmaṇa āyatyāṃ phalotpattiṃ brūmaḥ /
T07vakobhau:15999: tat punaḥ puṣpānniṣpannaṃ kasmāttasya vījasya phalamityucyate /
T07vakobhau:16001: yadi hi tatpūrvikānnabhaviṣyat tattādṛśasya phalasyotopattau na samarthamabhaviṣyat /
T07vakobhau:16006: kā punaḥ saṃtatiḥ kaḥ pariṇāmaḥ ko viśeṣaḥ /
T07vakobhau:16007: yaḥ karmapūrva uttarottaracittapravasaḥ sā saṃtatistasyā anyathotpattiḥ pariṇāmaḥ /
T07vakobhau:16011: trividhakarmapūrvakatve 'pi yatkarma guru vā bhavatyāsannamabhyastaṃ vā yatkṛtaṃ sāmarthyaṃ dyotyate natvanyasya /
T07vakobhau:16013: "yat guru yaccāsannaṃ yaccābhyastaṃ kṛtaṃ ca yat /
T07vakobhau:16015: tatra vipākahetvāhitaṃ tu vipākaphaladānasāmarthyaṃ vipākaṃ dattvā vinivartate /
T07vakobhau:16019: na tāvat dṛṣṭāntena sarvaṃ samānaṃ bhavati /
T07vakobhau:16020: tatrāpi tu na phalādeva punaḥ phalāntaramutpadyate /
T07vakobhau:16023: yo hi tatra bhūtaprakārāṅkuraṃ nirvartayati sa tasya vījaṃ nānyaḥ /
T07vakobhau:16024: bhāvinyā tu saṃjñāyā sādṛśyādvā pūrvako 'pi saṃtāno bījamityākhyāyate /
T07vakobhau:16025: evamihāpi tasmādvipākādyadi sadasaddharmaśravaṇā dipratyayaviśeṣajaḥ kuśalasāsravo 'kuśalo vā cittavikāra utpadyate
T07vakobhau:16028: yathā lākṣārasarañjitāt mātuluṅgapuṣpātsaṃtatipariṇāmaviśeṣajaḥ phale raktaḥ keśara upajāyate na ca tasmāt punaranyaḥ evaṃ karmajādvipākāt na punarvipākāntaramiti /
T07vakobhau:16030: nānāvidhaśaktibhinnaistu karmabhiradhivāsitāḥ saṃtataya etāmavasthāṃ gatā īdṛśaṃ phalamabhinivartayantīti buddhānāmeva viṣayaḥ /
T07vakobhau:16042: ye dharmahetuprabhavā hetuṃ teṣāṃ tathāgato hyavadat /
T07vakobhau:16043: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodha evaṃvādī mahāśramaṇaḥ //
